column2: Ingabo za Ukraine zateye intambwe mu bumanuko zitera zisugereza Kherson
column3: Ingabo za Ukraine zatoboye ibirindiro vy’ingabo z’Uburusiya ku ruzi Dnieper mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko bw’igisagara ca Kherson, igisagara ngirakamaro ku ngabo z’Uburusiya zikigenzura, mu bumanuko bwa Ukraine. Igisirikare c’Uburusiya n’abategetsi bashizweho n’Uburusiya nyene muri ako karere nibo batangaje aya makuru y’iyi ntambwe yatewe nabasirikare ba Ukraine, bakavuga ko ingabo z’Uburusiya zihanganye nabo bikomeye. Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky wa Ukraine avuga ko “hari uduce dushasha twabohojwe mu turere tutari duke”. Mu buseruko, ingabo za Ukraine zarasatiriye gushika mu ntara ya Luhansk iri mu minwe y’Uburusiya. Perezida Zelensky avuga ko "intambara zikomeye zibandanya mu turere twinshi", aho hari mw’ijambo yama ashikiriza buri mugoroba ku gihugu, ariko nta nsiguro yatanze. Ku wa gatandatu, ingabo ziwe zarabohoje igisagara gikomeye ca Lyman mu buseruko, kikaba kiri hafi y’urubibe rw’intara ya Luhansk. Uburusiya bwari bwagize Lyman ikirindiro co gushikizamwo uburyo nkenerwa bw’urugamba.. Abarwanyi begamiye Uburusiya mu ntara ya Luhansk bemeza ko ingabo za Ukraine zinjiye ibirometero bikeya hagati mu ntara ya Luhansk. Amakuru avuga ko abanya-Ukraine bariko batera basatira ibisagara biri mu minwe y’Uburusiya vya Kremenna na Svatove muri Luhansk. Mu bumanuko, Vladimir Saldo, umukuru wa Kherson yashizweho n’Uburusiya, avuga ko ingabo za Ukraine zatoboye zigashika hafi ya Dudchany, igisagara kiri ku ruzi Dnieper, ku birometero hafi 30 uvuye ahahora habera urugamba. Abanya-Ukraine uru ruzi barwita Dnipro. Saldo  ati: "Hari ibigwati biri mu minwe y’ingabo za Ukraine”. Ni mu gihe hari amakuru amwe avuga ko abanya-Ukraine ubu bafashe Dudchany. Umuvugizi w’ubushikiranganji bw’Uburusiya bujejwe kwivuna abansi, Igor Konashenkov, avuga ko vya bimodoka ntamenwa “vyinshi kudusumba vyinjiye hagati”, mu bumanuko bwa Zolota Balka, ikigwati cahoze kiberamwo urugamba ku ruzi Dnieper. Avuga ko Abarusiya bishe abasirikare ba Ukraine hafi 130 muri iyo ntambara. Nk’uko Saldo abivuga, ibatayo (bataillons) zibiri za Ukraine zagerageje kwinjira ku rugomero rw’umuyagankuba rwa Kakhovka, ku birometero hafi 70 mu buseruko bwa Kherson. Uru rugomero ruri mu gisagara ca Nova Kakhovka  kiri ku nkengera. Ingabo za Ukraine ziriko zisatira mu ntumbero yo kuraba ingene zozibira amayira ajana uburyo ku ngabo zishika 25.000 z’Uburusiya ziri mu burengero bw’uruzi Dnieper, nk’uko vyandikwa n’itororokanirizo ry’amakuru Reuters. Utera uva mu buraruko bushira uburengero bwa Kherson, vya muzinga vya Ukraine vyononye cane ikiraro ca Antonivsky, ikiraro gikomeye ku ngabo z’Uburusiya ziri muri ico gisagara. Kherson na Luhansk ziri mu ntara zine Perezida Vladimir Putin w’Uburusiya aherutse gutangaza ko zegukira Uburusiya, inyuma y’icitwa amatora ya kamarampaka yiyamirijwe na Kyiv n’intuci zayo zo mu Burengero. Uburusiya ntibugenzura intara n’imwe yose muri izo zine. Ibintu vyagiye gukomerana igisirikare c’Uburusiya inyuma y’amasaha make gusa y’ijambo rya Putin ryo ku wa gatanu hamwe n’ibirori bikomeye mu kibanza c’amakoraniro (Place Rouge/Red Square ) i Moscou mu kwigina intambwe Uburusiya bwari buhejeje gutera yo kwihagira ubutaka bwa Ukraine. Kyiv yariyemeje ko izoruhuka ibohoje ubutaka bwose bwihagiwe n’Uburusiya, harimwo mbere na ka karere ka Crimée/Crimea kigaruriwe n’ingabo z’Uburusiya mu 2014. Ubushikiranganji bw’Uburusiya bujejwe kwivuna abansi bumenyesha ko abanditswe kugira ngo binjire mu gisirikare ku kamo katewe na Putin mu kwezi guheze ubu bariko bahabwa imyimenyerezo ya gisirikare y’urutavanako mu turere tugenzurwa n’Uburusiya tw’intara za Luhansk na Donetsk. Kremlin itegura kwinjiza izindi ngabo zababa 300.000 – n’aho Putin ata gitigiri ntabanduka yashinze.

column2: Abavugabutumwa bo muri Africa bariko basabira Trump ngo atsinde amatora
column3: N'aho asanzwe afise imvugo y'agasuzuguro kuri Afrika, Perezida Donald Trump wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika arakunzwe cane na bamwe mu bihaye Imana bo kuri uyu mugabane. Mu nyigisho ziwe yatanze mu kwa gatandatu, Pasitori wo muri Nijeriya, Chris Oyakhilome, umuvugabutumwa azwi cane ku mboneshakure, yagize ati: "Mumusengere [Trump] kuko iyo Imana ishize imbere umwe mu bana biwe, shetani rimwe na rimwe ikora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo imusambure". Agabisha kandi ko abanegura uyu mukuru w'igihugu akomoka mu mugambwe w'aba Repubulika ariko arondera kwitoreza ikiringo kigira kabiri mu kwa cumi na rimwe banka urunuka abamushigikiye. Uyu mupasitori akunzwe cane kw'isi yose, harimwo na Amerika avuga ati: "Bafitiye ishavu ryinshi Trump kubera arwanira abakristu/abakristo, ico mukimenye. Rero abankwa ni mwebwe abakristu". Ikigo Pew Research gikora ubushakashatsi ku mibereho y'abantu kivuga ko mu gihe Perezida Trump azwi ko ari umutegetsi yacanishijemwo isi, mu bihugu nka Nijeriya na Kenya arakundwa cane nk'uko amatohoza y'iki kigo yavyerekanye mu kwa mbere uno mwaka. Kivuga ko amajambo yavuze mu 2018 yo kugereranya ibihugu vya Afrika "nk'imisarani" bobo ko ata kibazo ateye. Ibi bihugu vyompi bisanzwe bizwi ko bigendera cane ku madini. Mu bumanuko bwa Nijeriya, igihugu ca Afrika gifise abantu benshi, harangwamwo amashengero menshi, mu gihe muri Kenya naho abanyapolitike bakoresha cane amashengero mu gutanga ubutumwa ku banywanyi babo, ari naco gituma amadini afise ikibanza kinini muri ibi bihugu. Amashengero menshi ya kikristu muri Afrika, asanzwe arwanya cane ivyo gukorora inda, abubakana bahuje ibitsina, bakongera bagashigikira Israyeli, ntibigeze biyumvamwo uwasubiriwe na Trump, umu Democrate Barack Obama, n'aho afise amamuko muri Kenya. Richard Chogo, Pasitori mu rusengero rwa Deliverance ku mugwa mukuru wa Kenya, Nairobi, yabwiye BBC ati: "Ubutegetsi bwa Obama bwarahimirije umugambi w'ukwigenga (liberalisme) hano muri Afrika, kandi uwu mugambi wateje impungenge mu bategetsi bamwe bamwe b'amadini. Rero kabaye agahengwe ku butegetsi bwa Trump yahisemwo gusubiza ibirenge inyuma". Arashimagiza ubutegetsi bwa Trump kubona bwarashoboye guhagarika imfashanyo zahabwa amashirahamwe nka Marie Stopes, yafasha mu buryo bwo kugabanya imvyaro n'ugukoroza inda mu bihugu bitari bike vya Afrika. Iri shirahamwe ryaraneguye iyi ngingo ya Amerika yo guhagarika izi mfashanyo, rivuga ko rishira "ubuzima bw'abakenyezi mu kaga". Impari ku bijanye no gukoroza inda zimaze imyaka n'imiburiburi irenga 40. Kuva ico gihe, abavugabutumwa b'abazungu bagize uruhara rukomeye mu matora ku ruhande rw'aba Repubulika kandi ivyiyumviro vyabo vyarakwiye kw'isi yose, cane cane muri Afrika. Ibi bimeze uku mu gihe Abaporotesanti b'abirabure benshi muri Amerika bashigikiye umugambwe uharanira Demokarasi kandi bakanegura ubutegetsi bwa Trump, nk'uko icegeranyo gishasha ca  Pew Research kivyerekana. Emeka Ezeji, umupasitori mukuru mw'ishengero rya Anglicani mu ntara ya Enugu iri mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Nijeriya, avuga ko ivyiyumviro vyiwe vya politike bishingiye "ku vyanditswe" gusa. Avuga ati: "Abakristu ba Afrika bazi ko umukuru w'igihugu w'umu Repubulika ari we mwiza kuri Amerika no kw'isi". Abandanya asengera Perezida Trump ko yotsinda umukeba wiwe wo mu mugambwe w'abaharanira Demokarasi Joe Biden mu matora ategekanijwe mu kwa cumi na rimwe, kandi ko yari yafashe umwanya iminsi yose wo gusengera uyu mukuru w'igihugu ngo akire igihe aheruka mu bitaro  kubera coronavirus. Nk'uko bimeze kuri Pasitori Chogo, na we nyene abona ko "intege nke" za Trump zidategerezwa kurengera "inyungu rusangi". Nk'akarorero, ariyamiriza rya sekeza rya Black Lives Matter (Ubuzima bw'abirabure ni kirumara), isekeza Trump afata ko ari "ikimenyetso c'urwanko", akavuga ko "ryanyazwe intumbero yaryo". Yibaza ibibazo vyinshi aho avuga ati: "Abandi bantu atari abazungu nta vanguraruhu bakorerwa? Ubuzima bw'umwirabure abayabaye ubu bwoba ari bwiza ugereranije n'imyaka indwi iheze? Canke umwirabure abayabaye ubu yoba ageramiwe ubu kuri Trump gusumba kuri Obama?" Bwana Trump arirata ko ari we mu perezida wa Amerika amaze gukorera ivyiza vyinshi Abanyamerika bakomoka muri Afrika gusumba abandi baperezida bose  mu mateka ya  Amerika, kenshi agafatira ku rugero ruto rw'ubushomeri mu myaka itatu ya mbere y'ubutegetsi bwiwe, ico Bwana Ezeji akenguruka cane. Ubunyamabanga bujejwe akazi buvuga ko igitigiri c'abashomeri b'abirabure mu kw'icenda ari co gitigiri gito cane cabayeho kuva butanguye kwegeranya ibiharuro nk'ibi mu myaka ya 1970, n'aho ibi vyahindutse kubera coronavirus. Ariko Pasitori Ezeji  avuga ko Bwana Trump agifise igikorwa kinini ategerezwa gukora ku neza ya bose, aha akaba afatira ku mwami Cyrus (Kuro) w'umu perse avugwa muri Biblia ko yari yatoranijwe n'Imana kugira ngo yigarurire Babiloni, maze abanya Isirayeli bari bahunze  banona gusubira i Yerusalemu. Avuga ati: "Trump niwe we Kuro wa kino gihe". Bwana Emeka  avuga ati: "Imana irabivuze....ni umusuku wanje azorangura ishaka ryanje". Pasitori Juliet Eyimofe Binite ari mu gisagara ca Lagos muri Nijeriya aremeranya nawe. Yabwiye BBC ati: "Yatowe n'Imana". Buri ku ndwi, uyu mupasitori w'umugore yama asengera  Trump ngo atsinde amatora ku ncuro ya kabiri. Avuga ko Imana yamuhaye ubutumwa imbere y'amatora ya 2016 ko hari umuntu atunze cane yinjiye muri politike kandi ko ashigikiye ubwigenge bw'amadini, abakristu babona ko bubangamiwe. Avuga ati: "Yambwiye ko yariko irarondera umukozi, umuntu w'intungane kubera hari ibikorwa bimwe bimwe abantu beza badashobora gukora". "Dukeneye umuntu ashobora kurwanira agateka k'abemera". Avuga kandi ko Trump ataronka amashimwe akwiriye kuri politike yiwe mpuzamakungu, nk'akarorero amasezerano y'amahoro hagati ya Isirayeli na Emira Zunze Ubumwe z'Abararu (Emirats Arabes Unis). Pasitori Chogo na we nyene niko abibona: "N'aho woba uri Saddam Hussein cane Muammar Gaddafi, ntihabuze nk'ikintu kimwe canke bibiri vyiza wakoreye abanyagihugu bawe". Avuga ko Trump ashigikiwe ku mugabane wa Afrika kubera ukuntu atarya umunwa, aho avuga ko abategetsi ba Afrika bakeneye kubwirwa mu majambo yeruye kugira ngo bashobore gutunganya ibihugu vyabo. Mu butumwa butandukanye yanditse ku rubuga rwa Twitter, Bwana Trump aherutse kwibutsa abakristu bamushigikiye ko ubwisanzure mu vyo gusenga hamwe n'urugamba rwo kurwanya umugenzo wo gukoroza inda bishobora gukwama mu gihe atotsinda amatora yo mu kwa cumi na rimwe. Ariko Pasitori Ezeji afata ibintu yishimikije ubuhanuzi bwa Bibiliya buvuga ibihe vya nyuma. Ati: "Ko azotsinda canke atazotsinda, ico si ikibazo ca Trump, ahubwo ni ikibazo c'ivyo Imana ivuga". "Trump ni nka ca giti co muri Biblia abihweza ibirere bafatirako mu kwihweza ibimenyetso vy'ibihe...aramutse atsinze, tuzoba tugifise igihe co kubaho, nayo akaramuka atsinzwe nta gihe tuzoba tugisigaje".

column2: Boeing na Airbus zigabisha US ku ngorane zishobora guterwa na 5G
column3: Abakuru b'ikompanyi zibiri za mbere rutura mu gukora indege basavye reta ya Amerika gutevya gutangura gukoresha ubuhinga bushasha bw'ama terefone bwa 5G. Mw'ikete, abategetsi ba Boeing na Airbus bagabisha ko ubwo buhinga bushobora kugira "ingaruka mbi ku bikorwa vy'indege." Amakenga yari amaze gushikirizwa ko ubuhinga bwa 5G bushobora guhungabanya ivyuma vy'ubuhinga bwa electronic vyo mu ndege. Ibihangange vya telecoms (ubuhinga bwo gutumatumanako)  muri Amerika AT&T na Verizon  vyitezwe gutanguza ikoreshwa rya 5G itariki 5 za Nzero (ukwezi kwa  mbere). Abakuru ba Boeing na Airbus Dave Calhoun na Jeffrey Knittel, mw'ikete barungikiye hamwe uwujejwe gutwara abantu n'ibintu muri reta ya Amerika Pete Buttigieg, bamubwiye bati: "Uguhungabanya kwa 5G gushobora kugira ingaruka mbi ku bushobozi bw'indege bwo gukora mu mutekano". Iryo kete ryishingiye ku bushakashatsi bwakozwe n'umugwi w'ubucuruzi Airlines for Amerika rwatoye ko iyo amategeko y'urwego rwa Amerika rujejwe indege (FAA)  aba yagiye mu ngiro mu 2019, hafi ingendo 345.000 z'indege z'ingenzi  na 5.400 zitwara imizigo ziba zaracerewe, zarahinduriwe inzira canke zitabaye zikiba. Igisata c'indege n'urwego rwa Amerika rw'indege (FAA) barashikirije amakenga ko 5G ishobora guhungabanya ivyuma  vyo mu ndege nk'amaradiyo y'ibipimo vy'aho indege igeze mu kirere. Itangazo rya Airbus rivuga ko "Airbus na Boeing bakoranye n'abandi bafise uruhara mu gisata c'indege muri Amerika kugira batahure ihungabana rishobora guterwa na 5G ku vyuma bifata ibipimo vy'aho indege igeze mu kirere (altmeters)". "Iinteguro y'ingene ingorane zishoboka zoba nke cane ku ndege yarashikirijwe igisata ca Amerika kijejwe gutwara abantu n'ibintu kugira yigwe." Uku kwezi, urwego FAA rwaragabishije ko uguhungabanya ibindi vyuma guturutse kuri 5G gushobora gutuma indege zihushishwa inzira, ruvuga ko ruzotanga amakuru menshi imbere y'uko ubwo buhinga butangura gukoreshwa itariki 5 Nzero. Muri Munyonyo (ukwezi kwa 11), kompanyi za AT&T na Verizon  zarasibije gutanguza urudandazwa rwa 5G ikiringo c'ukwexzi gushika itariki 5 Nzero zica zifata ingingo zo kwiyubara zo kugabanya ko haba ihungabanya. Amakompanyi yo mu gisata c'indege avuga ko izo ngingo zidahagije, Boeing na Airbus zikavuga ko zaciye zitanga integuro yazo yo kugabanya imishwarara iturutse ku bikoresho vyo gutumatumanako imbere no mu micungararo y'ibibuga vy'indege no mu bindi bibanza nkoramutima. Ku ndwi iheze, umukuru wa United Airlines Scott Kirby yavuze ko ingingo za FAA zerekeye 5G zizobuza ikoreshwa z'ibipimo z'aho indege igeze mu kirere ku bibuga bishika 40 mu vya mbere binini muri Amerika. Kompanyi ya Amerika y'ubuhinga budaciye mu ntsinga CTIA ivuga ko 5G ata ngorane n'imwe iteye akagiriza igisata c'indege gutera ubwoba no kwerekana ukutariko uko ibintu  bimeze. Umukuru wa CTIA  Meredith Attwell Baker yavuze mu kwezi guheze ati: "Kuducereza bizogira ingaruka mbi ikomeye. Kurindira uwundi mwaka bizotuma habura miriyaridi 500 z'amadorari mw'izamuka ry'ubutunzi, mu gihe igihugu cacu kiriko kirivyukiranya  congera ciyubaka inyuma y'ingaruka za Covid".

column2: Intambara ya Tigray muri Ethiopia: Ubuzima muri Mekelle, igisagara cugaranywe
column3: Agahengwe katangajwe  na Ethiopia mu ndwi iheze kugira ngo imfashanyo zishobore kwinjira mu ntara ya Tigray iri mu buraruko bw'igihugu katanze icizere ko iyi ntambara imaze amezi 17 kumbure ishobora kuba iriko ija ku musozo. Iyi ntara imaze amezi atari make yugaranywe, ivyatumye amamiriyoni y'abantu batagira c'epfo n'ica ruguru, ata mfungurwa n'ibindi nkenerwa bashoroa kuronka. Umunyagihugu wa Mekelle, umugwa mukuru wa Tigray ugenzurwa n'inyeshamba za Tigray, yashoboye kuvugana na BBC ayibwira ingene ubuzima bumeze. Ikituraje ishinga ni ingene tworonka kuronka ikitubeshaho mu buzima bwa misi yose. Nka se w'abana babiri bakiri bato, numva intege zacitse kuko ntashobora gusumira umuryango. Ibi ahanini ni uko ntashobora gukoresha amafaranga mfise kubera amabanki yose arugaye. Abenshi muri twebwe duhanzwe n'iyi ngorane kandi nta mafaranga dufise mu minwe. Kuva mu kwa gatandatu kw'umwaka uheze, sinshobora gushikira konte yanje muri banki, ico nkora ni ukwikora ku ncuti n'abagenzi ndabagurana kugira ngo ndabe ko noshobora gusumira umuryango. Incuti ziri mu mahanga nabo nyene barashatse kumfasha ariko kubera amaterefone na internet vyugawe, nta kintu na kimwe gishoboka. Hejuru y'ibi, ibiciro vy'imfungurwa vyaraduze bimwe biteye ubwoba. Intete nyamukuru, teff, co kimwe n'ifu y'ingano, ipiripiri n'amavuta ni ibintu bisigaye bigoye kuronka. Haraciye umwaka ibiro 100 (100kg) vya teff bigurwa amadorari y'abanyamerika 80, ariko ubu kugira uyironke utegerezwa gutanga $146. Ababishoboye, bagura teff nkeya bakayivanga n'amasaka hamwe n'ingano bizimbutse kugira ngo bashobore gukora injera (icapati), iyi ikaba iri mu bigize imfungurwa nyamukuru za buri musi. Ariko hari benshi badashobora kwigurira teff. Twasabwe kurima imboga ku muhana kandi nivyo turiko turakora. Ingorane gusa ni uko tubura amazi. Hari igihe twahora turonka ingunguru y'amazi twakoresha indwi yose, ariko ubu nta buryo dusfise bwo gushobora kuyigura, duca twikora ku mazi yo mu binogo. Ubu abana kwambara uturato canke uduhuzu dushasha, canke kuronka akanyama, ni ivy'abifise. Kuronka amazi meza n'amatara bisigaye ari ingorane, umusi wose vyama biriko biracikagurika - harashobora guca n'imisi tutaronse na mba. Abantu benshi nta buzi bagifise, amaduka n'ibigo vy'ubudandaji i Mekelle vyarugaye kubera bidashoboye kuriha amazu canke bikabura ibidandazwa vyo kugurisha. Inkurikizi y'ibi ni uko abantu batanguye kugurisha ivyo batunze nk'amamodoka, intebe, imeza n'ibindi, kugira ngo bashobore kuronka ico bafungura. Kandi rero biba ngombwa ko babigurisha ku mafaranga make cane. Umuringa w'inzahabu wahora ugurwa amadorari y'abanyamerika 64 ubu ushobora kugurishwa musi y'amadorari 12. Imodoka yahora igurishwa amadorari 16.000. ubu ishobora kugurishwa ku madorari 7000. Iyo abantu baherewe n'ivyo bashobora kugurisha baca batangura gusegerereza, ari co gituma ubu abasegerereza ku mabarabara barwiriye cane - abenshi muri bo bakaba ari abagore n'abana babo. Ibigo vy'ubuvuzi navyo nyene vyaherewe n'imiti. Abarwanye indwara zidakira bariko barapfa kubera ata miti ihari. Abantu bagendana umugera wa SIDA  ni ingorane kuko batakironka neza vya binini vyo gupfupfahaza. Imisi mikuru nk'iy'idini n'iy'ubugeni yigeze kuba ishingiro ry'ubumwe mu miryango ubu isigaye ari umugani. Ubu kubera umwana wanje yasubiye kw'ishure, ndatambuka n'amaguru akuma. Nkora urugendo rw'ibirometero bibiri n'amaguru kugira ndamushikane kw'ishure. Umugore wanje nawe akaja kumutora n'amaguru nyene mu mwanya wo gufungura. Nahora ngenda n'imodoka, ariko ubu imaze amezi 18 arenga ibitswe kuko ntagishoboye kugura igitoro. Igitoro urashobora kukironka, ariko kuri magendo. Iritiro imwe ubu igurwa amadorari 10 mu gihe, imbere y'intambara, twahora tukigura amadorari 0,42 ku ma station. Gufata itagisi canke bajaj navyo nyene bisigaye ari umugani, kuko, ari ukugenda gusa, usanga utegerezwa kuriha amadorari abiri. Ubu abantu mu kwiyunguruza basigaye bakoresha za nkorofani zikwegwa n'indogobwe. Abantu benshi batanguye gukoresha amakinga, ariko nayo nyene yarazimye cane. Abanyagihugu hano barashaka ko intambara irangira mu mahoro, bakaba baranezerewe cane igihe baronka amakuru mu ndwi iheze y'uko agahengwe kagarutse. Ntibari bizeye ko ivyo bumvise vyari vyo gushika aho baboneye imodoka za mbere zizanye imfashanyo zinjiye ku wa gatanu, inyuma y'amezi atari make, ibi bikaba vyaberetse ko ibintu bishobora guhinduka. Ndishimye ko nkiri muzima ngashobora gutanga amakuru yanje, ariko hari benshi cane bagowe kunsumvya, mbere bamwe bashobora kuba bari ku mpfiro. Ariko kumbure iciza coco ntikibuze muri ibi vyose: abantu babandanya bafashanya. "Abarya bonyene, bazopfa bonyene", uwu ni umugani wo mu rurimi rwacu rw'igi Tiryinya kandi abantu barawukurikiza. Barasangira n'abandi utwo bafise n'aho vyoba bisigura ko ejo bazotubika umukanda. Abantu barafatanye mu nda cane kugira babandanye babaho bari kumwe.

column2: Lil Uzi Vert: Umuririmvyi wo muri Amerika yihomye mu gahanga diyama ya miliyoni 24 $
column3: Umuririmvyi wo muri Amerika Lil Uzi Vert yavuzweko vyinshi ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi inyuma yo gukoresha amadolari imiliyoni 24 mu kugura ubutare bupima kara 11 yahomye kuruhanga rwiwe. Inkuru zitangwa na BBC igisata ca Pidgin, zivuga ko yaguze ubwo butare mu nzu y'ubudandarizo ya Elliot Eliante ku madolari imiliyoni 24. Lil Uzi Vert yatumye haba amajambo menshi y'abakunzi biwe kw'isi yose igihe yerekana video y'ingene ubu asa, agaca anandika ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi ya Instagram ngo " Ubwiza burababaza" (Beauty is Pain). Izina nyaryo rya Lil Uzi Vert ni Symere Bysil Woods, umuririmvyi wo muri Amerika w'umudiho wa Rap, akaba n'umwanditsi w'indirimbo. Yavutse itariki 31 mu kwezi kw'indwi mu 1994 mu buraruko bwa Philadelphia i Francisville muri Amerika. Ikintu gituma uwo muririmvyi atandukana n'abandi, n'ibicapo afise ku mubiri (Tatoo), n'ingene yagiye aritobora mu maso, ingene agenda ahindura uko yisokoza n'inyambaro ya kera. Lil Uzi yamenyekanye cane inyuma yo gushira ahabona ururirimbo rwiwe rwa Luv is Rage mu mwaka wa 2015. Izindi ndirimbo zatumye aba rurangiranwa ni nk'ururirimbo rwiwe  Money Longer yaririmvye mu 2016, You was Right, Gucci Mane, Bad na Bouje iza mu kibanza ca 100 kuri Billboard muri Amerika hamwe na Tour Life rwatumye ahabwa agashimwe ka MTV k'ururirimbo rwa mbere mu gihe c'ubushuhe. Bivugwa ko uwo muririmvyi yoba afise ubutunzi bushika ku miliyoni 16 z'amadolari, ariko ko hagati y'umwaka wa 2017 na 2018 yoba yararonse imiliyoni 20 avuye mu ndirimbo aririmbira ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi hamwe n'ibiteramo vyiwe.

column2: SA: Jonas Gwangwa, umunyamuziki wa jazz yahanganye n'intwaro karyanishamiryango, apartheid
column3: Umuziki wa Afria y'Epfo no kw'isi nzima watakaje igihangange inyuma y'urupfu rw'uyu mucuraranzi  Jonas Gwangwa wo mu mudiho wa jazz yakoresha itarumbeta. Uyu mucuraranzi yapfuye ku wa 23 z'uku kwa mbere afise imyaka 83, akaba yahitanywe n'indwara y'umutima. N'aho imyaka myinshi y'ubuzima bwiwe yayimaze mu buhungiro, Gwangwa ntiyamenyekanye cane ku muziki wiwe gusa, azwi ko yagize uhurara rudasanzwe mu kurwanya bwa butegetsi karyanishamiryango bw'inkehwa z'abazungu muri Afrika y'Epfo. Gwangwa yavukiye mu karere ka Soweto mu gisagara ca Johannesburg  ku wa 19 z'ukwa cumi 1937, akaba yamaze imyaka irenga 60 mu muziki watumye amenyekana cane. Muri ico gihe yarumvise akamo yari atewe na Oliver Tambo yari arongoye ANC, kugira ngo arongore umurwi wiswe Amandla. Uyu murwi wari washinzwe mu myaka ya 1980 kugira ngo werekane uruhande rworoshe mu rugamba rwo kurwanya intwaro karyanishamiryango ya apartheid, ukaba warashigikiwe cane mu mpande zitandukanye z'isi. Reta y'umugambwe w'inkehwa z'abazungu, National Party, yabona ko ibikorwa vy'umuziki n'ukurwanira akaranga vya Gwangwa nk'ikibazo gikomeye cane ku nzego z'umutekano, maze zica zitera ibibombe ku nzu yiwe muri Botswana mu 1985. Imana yose ni uko uyu nyakwigendera hamwe n'abandi bose bari basanzwe baba muri iyo nzu ata n'umwe yari ahari. Ukwitanga kwiwe mu rugamba rwo kwibohoza hamwe n'impano idasanzwe mu bijanye n'umuziki vyatumye Gwangwa ahabwa agashimwe kitwa  Ikhamanga in Gold - agashimwe ko ku krwego rwo hejuru mu gihugu. Aka gashimwe yaronse mu 2010 kibutsa ingene "yabaye rurangiranwa kw'isi yose mu buhinga bwiwe nk'umunyatugenegene. Mu myaka irenga 30, yazungurutse isi yose aterwa amashurwe aho yaca hose". Mw'ijambo ryiwe ryo gusezera Jonas Gwangwa, Perezida Cyril Ramaphosa  yasohoye itangazo aho avuga ko "yinjiye mu murwi w'abanyamuziki bakomeye muri kahise kacu, baranzwe n'ubuhinga bukomeye hamwe n'ukwitangira uburenganzira bw'abanya Afrika y'Epfo bose - kandi bagahimiriza isi yose kurwanya intwaro karyanishamiryango ya apartheid". Thabo Mbeki yahoze arongoye igihugu nawe yashimiye uyu mucuraranzi ati: "Kuva mu ntango y'umwuga wiwe, Bra JG, nk'uko yari akunzwe kwitwa mu cubahiro bamuha, yaratahuye akamaro kadasanzwe ko kuvanga akaranga n'utugenegene nk'ikirwanisho nyaco mu rugamba rwo kuhabuza igihugu". "Afadikanije n'abandi bo mu runganwe rwiwe, Gwangwa yarakoresheje inguvu z'umuziki, atari gusa kuryohera abantu, ariko kandi aba icirore c'abanyagihugu yongera aragaragariza isi yose amabi y'ubutegetsi karyanishamiryango bwa apartheid". Akiri muto, Gwangwa yarakunzwe cane n'abakunzi biwe bari barwiriye mu karere ka Sophiatown kari nk'icicaro c'imico y'abirabure mu gisagara ca Johannesburg, gushika aho reta karyanishamiryango ya apartheid  isohoreye itegeko ko kizira ko abirabure bakoranira hamwe, maze ica itangura kubuza ibiteramo vya jazz, hari mu 1960. Ari kumwe n'ibindi bihangange  vya Afrika y'Epfo mu muziki, nka Masekela, Abdullah Ibrahim na Miriam Makeba, Gwangwa yahisemwo guhunga hagupfukamira igikenye ca apartheid. Yatanguye kumenyekana cane kw'isi mu 1965 mu giteramo citiriwe Ijwi rya Afrika (Sound of Africa) i New york ari kumwe n'abandi nka Makeba, Masekela, na Letta Mbulu. Cabaye intango y'igikorwa mpuzamakungu yakoresheje mu rugamba rwo kurwanya ubutegetsi bw'inkehwa z'abazungu rwaguma rutera intambwe uko bukeye uko bwije. Mu 1987, ari kumwe n'umwanditsi w'umuziki w'umwongereza George Fenton, Gwangwa yanditse amajambo y'umuziki w'ireresi yitwa Cry Freedom, ivyatumye ahabwa agashimwe kitiriwe Oscar incuro zibiri. Yararonse kandi n'ubushimwe butari buke muri Afrika y'Epfo. Yashinguranywe iteka ejo ku wa gatanu mu birori vyerekanywe ikibiriraho ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi rw'iradiyo y'igihugu, bikaba vyashoboye guhuza abataherukana kubera ingingo za coronavirus zo kwitaramura. Urupfu rwa Gwangwa  rubaye inyuma y'indwi zibiri gusa inyuma y'urwo umugore wiwie Violet, rukaba rufatwa nk' uruhombo runini ku muziki wa Afrika y'Epfo.

column2: India: Amashusho asobanura ikibazo ca coronavirus
column3: Kuva mu misi iheze, Ubuhindi buhanganye bikomeye n'iyongerekana ry'abandura Covid-19 ku rugero ruteye ubwoba, aho ibitaro bitandukanye vyo ku mugwa mukuru no mu bundi burere bw'igihugu cose bisubiza inyuma abarwayi kubera ubukene bw'impwemu ya oxygène n'ibitanda. Za rusehabaniha zifise oxygène zirakenye mu gihe biriko bigorana ubwayo  imiryango ingene ishikana abarwayi bayo ku bitaro n'aho hoboneka igitanda. Ibintu bimeze nabi cane ku mugwa mukuru Delhi, aho abantu babandanya bapfa kubera ukubura oxygène. Abandi basubizwa inyuma kubera ibitaro vyuzuye, mbere n'abaganga bakaba barengewe. Ibi biraboneka cane mu mashusho ava mu bibanza vyategekanirijwe iki gikorwa mu gihugu cose - aho imiryango ibabaye irindira amasaha n'amasaha kugira ngo ishobore kurangura uwu mugirwa wo gusezera ubwa nyuma ababo, mu bindi bisagara navyo ugasanga ibiziga bishirwa mu kibanza kimwe kugira bituririrwe hamwe kubera ibibanza vyabuze. Abanyamakuru mu bisagara bitandukanye barabeshuza ibitigiri bitangwa n'ubutegetsi, akenshi bakamara imisi itari mike ku bibanza vyo gutuririramwo ibiziga biharurira bonyene abapfuye. Ibiharuro bitangwa vyerekana ko abapfa mu bisagara bimwe bimwe basumba incuro cumi ibitangwa n'ubutegetsi. Aya mashusho yose yatangiwe uburenganzira.

column2: Coronavirus: Papa asaba ko urucanco n'imiti bishikira bose kw'isi
column3: Papa Francis yateye akamo abategetsi bo kw'isi ngo bafashe kugira abantu bose bashobore kuronka urucanco rwa coronavirus ata nzitizi. Mw'ijambo rya Noheli yashikirije ku rubuga rwa internet ubwa mbere, Papa yagabishije kudashiraho "uruhome" kubakeneye imiti. Ico kiza catumye ubutumwa bwa Urbi na Orbi budatangirwa ku rubaraza rwa Bazelike St Pierre ku bantu benshi, nk'uko vyari bimenyerewe. Ahubwo Papa yatanze ubwo butumwa ari mu cumba i Vatikano. Uko kugabisha kwa papa kuje inyuma y'amakenga y'ingene ibihugu bitunze  bigura incanco zitagira uko zingana gusumba ibihugu bikenye. Yavuze ati:"Ese umwana w'Imana yogarukana mu bategetsi ba politike n'amareta agatima ko gufashanya n'amakungu, bahereye ku magara y'abantu, kugira ngo bose boshobore gushikirwa n'urucanco hamwe n'imiti. "Imbere y'iki kibazo kitagira imbibe, ntidushobora kwiyubakirako uruhome. Twese hamwe turi mu bwato bumwe." Papa yavuze ko ingaruka y'iki kibazo c'amagara y'abantu zerekanye ko ubumwe bw'amakungu bukomeye cane. "Muri iki gihe c'akahise, tugeramiwe n'ibibazo vy'ibidukikije hamwe n'ubusumbasumbane mu butunzi no mu mibano vyagiye kunyurwa n'ikiza coronavirus, birakenewe cane ko twemerana nka benewacu na bashiki bacu." Papa yateye akamo ngo habe umutima wo gufasha no gushigikira abakozweko n'ico kiza, adoma urutoke cane cane ku bapfasoni bahohotewe muri iki gihe abantu bugaranywe. Avuga ku zindi ngorane ziri kw'isi, yahamagariye abantu gukomeza ubumwe no gusubiza hamwe muri Syria, Yemen, Libya, Nagorno-Karabakh, Sudan y'epfo , Nigeria, Cameroun na Irak. Vyitezwe ko azogira urugendo muri Irak mu kwezi kwa gatatu, urugendo rushobora kuba rubaye urwa mbere rwa Papa mu gihugu cazahajwe n'intambara.

column2: Ndayishimiye: ‘Karashize ingani, abakozi ba Reta bitwe abatishoboye?’
column3: Umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburundi Evariste Ndayishimiye avuga ko ibibazo Uburundi bwagiye buracamwo vyatumye igihugu gisigara inyuma mu bisata bitandukanye. Akebura  abakozi gukura amaboko mu mpuzu kugira bagwize umwimbu. Mw'ijambo yaraye ashikirije Abarundi buca bahimbaza umusi mpuzamakungu wahariwe abakozi, Perezida Ndayishimiye ahamagarira Abarundi kwemanga ko basamaye hanyuma bafate ingingo yo gukura amaboko mu mpuzu. Mu gihe abakozi ba reta bari biteze ko umusi nk'uwu ari akaryo keza ko kwongerwa imishahara, Perezida Ndayishimiye avuga ko batokwitega ko bahava bongerwa agashirukabute mu gihe "n'umwenda Reta yafashe mu myaka iheze kugira ihembe abakozi utararihwa". Perezida Ndayishimiye avuga ko gushika ubu hari abakozi bironderera kwongerezwa impembo mu gihe ataco bariko bafasha reta kugira ironke uburyo bukwiye, bakagomba ko reta isaba imfashanyo kugira ngo ibahembe. Ati: "Uno musi urasanga umukozi wa Reta ashaka agashirukabute gakirurutse ariko we nyene abona abanyonora ikigega ca reta akihorera canke akabakingira ikibaba. Mbere hari naho usanga ari we nyene ariko aranyonora agaca asaba impembo irengeye. "Hari abandi bareka ibidandazwa vyari gutanga amakori bigaca ku ruhande ariko ukwezi kwahera agasaba impembo. None yibaza ko iyo mpembo ica iva hehe, ko hari aho nyene?" Perezida Ndayishimiye ntiyumva ivyo gusaba imfashanyo, kuko kubw'iwe, abakeneye imfashanyo ni abatishoboye. Ahamagarira  abarundi gutahura ko ivyo bagiye baracamwo  vyatumye basamara. Ati: "None ko umuntu wo gufashwa ari uwutishoboye, koko karashize ingani, abakozi ba Reta bitwe abatishoboye?  Jewe si uko ndavyumva; sindanavyemera; ni co gituma bintera isoni gusega". Perezida Ndayishimiye abona ko uwutakoze atari akwiye guhembwa ukwezi guheze kuko ku bw'iwe, "ni we ngumba y'ukuri kuko imana yamuhaye ubwenge n'inkomezi hanyuma abipfisha ubusa". Avuga ko muri kino gihe igihugu kirangwamwo amahoro, agasaba Abarundi guhaguruka bakiyishura ivyo bataye, bakarangura imigambi yo kwiteza imbere. Ati: "Twarabuze vyinshi, twarataye umwanya mwinshi kubera ububegito bwa benshi muri twebwe bwatumye tubura amahoro. "Muri uwo mwanya twataye, ibikorwa bitakozwe ni vyinshi kandi biraturindiriye. "Kurima, tukworora kijambere ntavyo twitaho; twarira ikija mu nda gusa, umusesekara ntiwotubajije, tukitwaza imyibutsa yataye igihe ngo ivy'ejo biraba ab'ejo. "Guhingura itunga kama uwo wari umugani kuko biteba kwimbuka ... gutunganya aho abamukerarugendo ... vyari umugani." "Ivyo vyose vyari akazi koduha itunga dukeneye kandi n'ubu karacaturindiriye".Atera akamo abarundi ko bova hasi bagakora kugira ngo bahamvye ibindi bihugu kuko vyovyo vyamaze kugera kure. Ati: "Abandi barakamaze. Barubatse amabarabara, barubaka amashure, barubaka ingomero z'umuyagankuba, barubaka ivyo ba mukerarugendo bakenera, barubaka ibikoresho vy'ubuhinga ngurukanabumenyi, barubatse amahinguriro, ubu ntaco basigaje. "Twebwe, ivyo vyose biracaturindiriye, dukure amaboko mu mpuzu dukore".

column2: Burundi: Gen. Maj. Evariste Ndayishimiye azoserukire CNDD-FDD mu matora ni inde?
column3: Kuri uyu wa Mungu 26/01/2020 niho Jenerali Majoro Evariste Ndayishimiye yemezwa n'abanywanyi b'umugambwe CNDD-FDD ngo azoserukire uwo mugambwe mu matora ategekanijwe mu kwa gatanu uno mwaka. Yatowe mw'ikoraniro kaminuza ridasanzwe ry'uwo mugambwe ryabereye i Gitega, umugwa mukuru wa politike w'u Burundi, inyuma y'igikorane cari kimaze minsi itatu kibera muri iyo ntara. Iryavuzwe riratashe kuko izina rya Evariste Ndayishimiye ryari rimaze iminsi rizunguruka ku mbuga hwaniro zitandukanye ko ari we afise amahirwe yo guhiganirwa ico kibanza kugira ngo asubirire Perezida Petero Nkurunziza. Evariste Ndayishimiye yinjiye mu rutonde rw'abandi ba candida bamaze kumenyesha ko bemejwe n'imigambwe yabo kugira ngo bayiserukire muri ayo matora ategurwa ko azoba ku wa 20/05/2020. Mu mwaka wa 2018, u Burundi bwarahinduye ibwirizwashingiro, ivyanuganurwa ko yari amayeri ya Perezida Nkurunziza yo kurondera kwigumiza ku butegetsi, nk'uko abakuru b'ibihugu vyinshi vya Afrika basanzwe babigira. Hagati aho, umunsi ariterako igikumu yatangaje abatari bake aho amenyeshereje ko atazokwisubirako ku vyo yari yemeye igihe yitoza mu 2015, ko cari ikiringo ciwe ca nyuma. Ariko kuri benshi, amazinda ntiyaheze n'aho yagumye abisubiramwo igihe cose. Rero, ayo matora abaye mu mugambwe CNDD-FDD amaze amazinda ku bibaza ko Perezida Nkurunziza yari agifise umugambi wo gusubira kwitoza ngo abandanye atwara igihugu. Ingingo yo kwitoreza ikindi kiringo mu 2015 yatumye u Burundi bwinjira mu ndyane za politike, maze imigenderanire y'u Burundi n'ibihugu bitari bike iratoseraka. Evariste Ndayishimiye ni umunyamabanga mukuru w'umugambwe uri ku butegetsi CNDD-FDD  kuva mu kwezi kw'umunani 2016, aho uwo mugambwe usubiriyemwo itunganywa ryawo, asubirira Pascal Nyabenda yari umukuru wawo. Yavukiye muri komine Giheta y'intara ya Gitega ubu isigaye ari umugwa mukuru wa politike w'u Burundi kuva mu 2018. Jenerali Ndayishimiye azwi ko yarwanye muri uwo mugambwe ucitwa umuhari, mu ntambara yadutse mu Burundi inyuma y'igandagurwa rya Perezida Melchior Ndadaye yari amaze amezi atatu ku butegetsi. Melchior Ndadaye yari yatowe ku wa 01/06/1993, ashikirizwa ubutegetsi ku wa 10/07/1993.  Inyuma y'amezi atatu gusa, ni ukuvuga ku wa 21/10/1993, yaragandaguwe n'igisirikare c'ico gihe, bica bituma igihugu cinjira mu ntambara hagati y'Abarundi bo nyene yamaze imyaka irenga cumi. Jenerali Ndayishimiye ari mu bacitse kw'icumu mu bwicanyi bwakorewe abanyeshure b'Abahutu kuri kaminuza y'u Burundi mu kwa gatandatu 1995. Yaciye ahamvya abandi barwanyi b'umuhari, ico gihe wari ucitwa CNDD ishami ryawo rikitwa FDD, urongowe na Leonard Nyangoma yawutanguje mu 1994. Uyo muhari, mu nyuma wagiye kwitwa CNDD-FDD, umaze kwinjira mu masezerano y'amahoro ya Arusha yo mu 2000 ugashira ibirwanisho hasi mu 2003, Jenerali Ndayishimiye yarakoze mu biro bikuru vya gisirikare. Inyuma y'amatora y'umukuru w'igihugu ya 2005 yatsinzwe na CNDD-FDD, Jenerali yaragenywe nk'umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati mu 2006-2007, imbere y'uko agenwa kuba umuhanuzi wa gisirikare mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu. Ku myaka 52 y'amavuko, Evariste Ndayishimiye aharurwa mu bategetsi bakomeye b'igihugu.

column2: Qatar World Cup 2022: Paris mu bindi bisagara bitazerekana inkino
column3: I﻿gisagara ca Paris kibaye ica vuba mu Bufaransa kimenyesheje ko kitazoshira imboneshakure nini abafana borabirako umupira mu gihe himirije inkino z'isi zizobera mu gihugu ca Qatar. I﻿co gisagara kivuga ko bitewe n'imvo z'agateka ka zina muntu hamwe n'ibidukikije mu gihugu kizakira iryo higanwa. I﻿bisagara vya Lille, Marseille, Bordeaux, Strasbourg na Reims  na vyo biramaze kumenyesha ko bitazerekana izo nkino bifatiye kuri izo mpamvu nyene. P﻿ierre Rabadan ajejwe igisata ca Sport mu gisagara ca Paris, avuga ko no kuba izo nkino zateguwe kuba mu gihe c'ubukonje na vyo vyatumye hafatwa iyo ngingo. I﻿vyo vyatanguye ku musi wa gatandatu aho umukuru w'igisagara ca Lille wo mu mugambwe w'aba socialiste, Martine Aubry, avugiye ko inkino z'igikombe c'isi muri Qatar "ata gaciro zifise uravye agateka ka zina muntu, ibidukikije na Sport". C﻿o kimwe n'abandi bakuru b'ibisagara, ariyamiriza uko uburenganzira bw'abakozi bwubahirizwa muri Qatar; ibivugwa ko hari igitigiri kinini c'abapfuye  mu bakozi b'abanyamahanga; hamwe n'ingaruka y'ibibuga vyubatswe ku bidukikije, vyose bifise ubuhinga bwo gutanga akayaga hanze yavyo. I﻿ Marseille, harabaye imigambi yo gushiraho imboneshakure nini mu gihe Ubufaransa bwoshika mu rukino rwa nyuma, ariko ubu ivyo bikaba vyahagaritswe. U﻿mukuru w'ico gisagara w'umu socialiste, Benoit Payan, yavuze ko iryo higanwa "ryagiye rihinduka buhoro buhoro iryo gusinzikaza agateka ka muntu no kutubahiriza ibidukikije, ibitajanye n'inyifato twari twiteze muri Sport - na cane cane mu mupira w'amaguru - dukwiye guteza imbere". N﻿tibiramenyekana igitigiri c'ibisagara vyo mu Bufaransa biriko birategura ikibanza aho abakunzi b'umupira bashobora gukurikiranira umugwi w'Ubufaransa, ufise igikombe c'inkino zabereye mu Burusiya mu 2018.

column2: Kenya igiye guhererwa n'inkingo za Covid-19
column3: Uwujejwe umugambi wo gukingira ikiza ca Covid-19 muri Kenya yabwiye BBC ko ububiko bw'inkingo Kenya yahawe buzoba bugaragara mu ntango z'indwi iza. Dr Willis Akhwale yavuze ko Kenya yari yaronse inkingo zirenga umuriyoni mu nkingo imiriyoni 3,5 za AstraZenea ico gihugu cari casavye umugambi Covax (ujejwe kuronsa inkingo ibihugu). Yagize ati "twateye incanco abanye Kenya bashika hafi 940.000, rero nta zindi nkingo dusigaranye." Ibi bisigura yuko abanye Kenya bari munsi ya 2% ari bo baronse urukingo rwa mbere. Abajejwe ivy'amagara bari bizigiye gutangura gutanga urukingo rwa kabiri kuva mu ndwi yambere y'ukwezi kwa gatandatu, ariko iyo gahunda isa n'iyitagikunze. Guhagarika kurungika hanze inkino vyagizwe n'Ubuhinde mu gihe bugeramiwe n'ikiza ca Covid-19, kwabangamiye imigambi yo gukingira hirya no niho kw'isi, cane cane mu bihugu vyikora ku rukingo rwa AstraZeneca. Dr Akhwale yavuze ko Kenya yari yatumije inkingo imiriyoni 30 za Johnson & Johnson bikaba vyitezwe ko zishika mu kwezi kwa munani. Abahinga bagabisha yuko kubura inkingo zikwiye mu bihugu vyo muri Afrika bishobora kuzotuma coronavirus yihindukiranya, hakaza ikibazo gikomeye nk'icibonekeje mu Buhinde. Dr Akhwale yavuze ko gusabikanya inkingo ku buryo bungana "bitegerezwa kuba". Yongeyeko ati "'ntushobora gutekana gushika abandi bose batekanye' kigomba kuguma ari icivugo ngenderwako".

column2: République tchèque: Abantu ibihumbi bakoze ibirori vyo gusezera coronavirus
column3: Mu gihe ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi OMS muri ino ndwi ryagabishije ko ikiza ca coronavirus kitariko kirahera ubu bwa vuba, mu gihugu ca Repubulika ya tchèque hoho bari mu minsi mikuru yo kugisezera. Abantu baharurwa mu bihumbi bakoraniye ku meza ipima uburebure bwa metero 500 ku kiraro Charles Bridge kiri ku mugwa mukuru Prague ku wa kabiri banywa bongera bafungura ivyo baje bitekereye. Abari batumiwe muri ico kirori basabwa gusangira n'abo begeranye kandi na ya ngingo yo gutandukana ntibayikurikije, ivyo ababa mu bihugu bikigendera kuri ya ngingo ya guma mu rugo babona nk'umugani. Muri ico gihugu kirimwo abantu bangana n'imiliyoni cumi, abashika hafi 12,000 ni bo banduye iyo ndwara, abashika 350 nabo irabahitana. Uwateguye ivyo birori yavuze ko vyashobotse kubera ata bakerarugendo bakiri muri ico gisagara kizwi ko kiri mu bisagara biteye igomwe. Amasanamu yava muri ivyo birori yerekana abari muri vyo bicaye hamwe, banywa bongera barorera abariko bakora ibikino. Ondrej Kobza, asanzwe afise inzu y'uburiro akaba ari nawe yateguye ivyo birori, yabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP ati: "Twashatse kwigina ko coronavirus yaranduranywe n'imizi mu gutumira abantu kugira ngo basubire baramukanye kandi berekane ko badatinya kuramukanya, ko batanatinya no gusangira umukate n'abagenzi". Ibibanza vyari vyateguwe vyose vyari vyuzuye. Repubulika ya tchèque yihutiye gufata ingingo za guma mu rugo hakiri kare ikaba yarashoboye kugabanya ubukari bw'ico kiza kitarasasika inganda. Mu ndwi iheze, leta yararekuye amakoraniro y'abantu bashika 1,000. Ibibanza vy'ubwogero, amazu ndangakaranga, ibibanza vy'iyororero ry'ibikoko n'amazu y'amakoraniro ubu arashobora kwugururwa akakira abantu bose bashoboka. Amazu y'uburiro n'ay'ubunywero arashobora kwakira abakiriya mu kiringo c'ukwezi. Ikiboneka ni uko abanyagihugu b'Aba-tchèque bashoboye guhangana n'ico kiza kubera ububangutsi mu gufata ingingo ruhasha. Hagati aho, nivyo ko gutezura ingingo za guma mu rugo kutatumye ibitigiri vyiyongera; ariko hariho mu burere bwa kure cane uvuye ku mugwa mukuru Prague hakiboneka abandura, mu gihe muri ico gisagara hibonekeza abatarenga 15 gusa bandura ku munsi.

column2: Wari uzi ko ushobora kwandurira coronavirus mu kazu ka surwumwe?
column3: Abashakashatsi berekana ko, mu bakoresha twa tuzu twa surwumwe twa none, kurya gusunika amazi yo mu gikono umufuniko wuguruye bituma haba umwuka uja mu mpwemu duhema maze umuntu agashobora kwinjiza imigera nk'iya coronavirus  biciye mu guhema. Abahinga b'abashinwa bavuga ko kurya gusunika amazi gushobora gutuma umwuka urimwo amazimazi uvuye muri kirya gikono ushobora kuduga ukagera ku burebure bwo gushika ku mutwe canke no kurenga. Uwo mwuka ugizwe n'amazimazi ushobora kuguruka gushika hafi mu metero yose uja mu kirere nk'uko abahinga bo kuri kaminuza ya Yangzhou babisigura. Basaba ko mu gusunika amazi iyo umuntu ahejeje kwituma ari ukubanza gupfundikira kirya gikono. Coronavirus ikwirakwizwa n'imphwemu iyo umuntu akoroye canke yasamuye, canke agakora ku bikoresho vyasizweko imigera. Abantu basanzwe baranduye uwo mugera nabo nyene bashobora kugira iyo migera mu mazirantoke abavamwo, n'aho bitererekanwa neza nimba iyo nayo ishobora kuba inzira yo kwanduza abandi. Abahinga kw'isi yose bariko barapima neza amazi atwara imicafu kugira ngo bamenye nimba koko hari abantu boba baranduye coronavirus biciye kuri ayo mazi. Hari iyindi migera ishobora gukwirakwira bivuye kw'isuku rike ry'utuzu twa surwumwe. Rero ngo iyo amazi asunitswe avuye mu ngunguru ya karya kazu ka surwumwe, akubita kunkuta z'igikono, bigatuma haba uruvangatirane n'uwo mwuka uva mu gikono. Uwo mwuka ugizwe n'utubumbe duto cane rwose tw'amazi ku buryo dushobora kuguma mu kirere mu kiringo kirenga umunota wose, nk'uko Ji-Xiang Wang na bagenzi biwe bo kuri kaminuza ya Yangzhou mu Bushinwa babisigura. Ku ruhande rwiwe, Dr Bryan Bzdek wo mu kigo kijejwe ubushakashatsi ca Bristol kw'ishure kaminuza rya Bristol, avuga ko n'aho bitaboneka neza ko coronavirus ishobora gukwirakwira muri ubu buryo, birumvikana neza ko ari vyiza kuba magabo. Ati: "Abakoze ubwo bushakashatsi bavuga ko ari iyo umuntu ahejeje kwituma ari vyiza kwugara kirya gikono c'akazu ka surwumwe mu gihe co gusunika amazi, kugirira isuku imbuga za kirya gikono n'ahandi hose umuntu ashobora gukorakora, kandi agakaraba neza iyo avuye mu kazu ka surwumwe". Abona ko n'aho bitaboneka neza ko ivyo bishobora kugabanya ikwirakwira ry'imigera ya Covid-19 na SARS, ni vyiza ko izo ngingo zerekeranye n'isuku ry'akazu ka surwumwe zikurikizwa ngo kuko hari n'iyindi migera myinshi cane yandukira iciye mu mazirantoke.

column2: Ukraine - Russia: Abasirikare 10.000 ba Ukraine bamaze kwicwa, Kyiv niko ivuga
column3: Ukraine ivuga ko ingabo zababa 10.000 z’igisirikare cayo bamaze gupfira muri ino ntambara kuva igitero c’Uburusiya gitanguye mu mpera z’ukwa kabiri. Umuhanuzi w’umukuru w’igihugu  Oleksiy Arestovych yatangaje ibi mu kiganiro cacishijwe ku mbuga hwaniro, igihe yari abajijwe igitigiri c’abasirikare Ukraine imaze gutakaza mu misi 100 ya mbere y’intambara – ni ukuvuga, gushika ku wa 03 Ruheshi (6). Ukraine ivuga ko itakaza hafi abasirikare 100 bari ku rugamba buri musi, abandi baharurwa mu majana nabo bagakomereka. Arestovych avuga ko abo Uburusiya bumaze gukataza bobo barenga kure n’iyo incuro zitari nke. Reta ya Ukraine ivuga ko ingabo z’Uburusiya zirenga 30.000 zimaze gupfa, ariko ibitigiri ngereranyo bitangwa n’igendereza ry’Ubwongereza biri hasi – abarenga 15.000. Intambara yose ya Afghanistan yo kuva mu 1979 gushika 1989 yahitanye ingabo z’icahoze ari Reta zunze Ubumwe z’abasoviyeti zababa 15.000. Abategetsi b’Uburusiya ntibaratanga igitigiri nyaco ico ari co cose ku vyerekeye n’abo bamaze gutakariza muri iyi ntambara ya Ukraine kuva ku wa 25 Ntwarante (3), aho bavuze ko abasirikare n’intwazangabo 1351 ari bo bari bamaze gupfa. Igisata ca BBC gikoresha ururimi rw’ikirusiya cemeza ko abasirikare b’Uburusiya 3502 bapfuye – ariko aba bakaba ari babamenyekanye kandi bahamwe mu matongo y’abapfuye. Perezida Joe Biden wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika avuga ko mugenziwe wa Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky  atashatse kwumvira Amerika igiye yariko igabisha ko Uburusiya bwariko butegura igitero ku gihugu ciwe. Mw’ijambo yashikirije mu gihe yari mu gikorwa co kegeranya uburyo ejo ku wa gatanu, afatira ku mburi z’uko Uburusiya bwoba bwariko butegura igitero, Biden yavuze ati: “Ndazi ko abantu benshi bibaza ko nariko ndashikuza”. “Ariko nari nzi ko dufise amakuru yose yavyerekana”. Yongera ko y’uko ata nkeka zari zihari ko umukuru w’igihugu c’Uburusiya Vladimir Putin yariko atera “aja ku mupaka” ariko “Zelensky ntiyashatse kuvyumva, co kimwe n’abanyagihugu benshi”. “Ndatahura igituma batashatse kuvyumva, ariko yarinjiye”. Amerika yatanguye kugabisha ko Uburusiya bwariko butegura igitero kuri Ukraine imisi itari mike imbere y’uko Putin atangaza “igikorwa kidasanzwe” kuri iki gihugu ku wa 24 Ruhuruma (2) . Izi mburi zafashwe nk’ugushikuza mbere ziranegurwa bikomeye n’ibihugu bimwe bimwe vy’incuti za Amerika i Bulaya, vyafashe ico gihe ko Amerika yariko irashikuza. Kuva iyi ntambara itanguye, Uburusiya buramaze kwigarurira ibisagara bikeya, ubu ikaba yashize inguvu zose mu buseruko aho iriko irondera kwigarurira intara za Luhansk na Donesk ziri mu karere ka Donbas. Ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bw’Ubwongereza buvuga ko igisagara ca Severodonetsk kiriko kiberamwo intambara z’urutavanako. Buvuga ko bisa n’uko impande zompi ziriko ziratakaza igitigiri kinini c’ingabo muri izi ntambara zikomeye zibera ku mabarabara y’ico gisagara. Hagati aho, ubu bushikiranganji buvuga ko ingabo z’Uburusiya ata ntambwe ziratere utera uja mu bumanuko bw’iki gisagara. Buvuga kandi ko Uburusiya buriko buregeranya invugu zo hasi no mu kirere kugira ngo bushobore gucuvya burundu ingabo za Ukraine. Mu buseruko bwa Ukraine, itsinzi ku rugamba ibandanya ironkwa n’uwufise ibikoho binini binini. Ni vya muzinga n’ibindi birasa ibisasu kure – bishobora gutera ibirindiro vy’umwansi. Iyi ni intambara – bisa nk’aho – Uburusiya ari bwo bworohewe ubu. Umwe mu bategetsi bo hejuru mu gisata c’umutekano yabwiye ikinyamakuru co mu Bwongereza, Guardian ko uruhande rwiwe ubu ruriko ruraherezwa n’amasasu. Vadym Skibitsky avuga ko abarusiya ubu basumvya ibikoresho abanya Ukraine incuro kuva kuri cumi gushika kuri cumi na zitanu, ko rero ingabo za Ukraine zikeneye vuba bwango ibindi bikoresho. Hari vyinshi bimaze kwemerwa – cane cane vya muzinga bigezweho vyo mu bwoko bwa HIMAR na M270 vyo muri Amerika no mu Bwongereza – ibi bikaba ari ntahusha. Ariko ntibirashika ku rubuga rw’intambara  igenda iba nabi. Bimwe mu bisagara biherutse kwigarurirwa n’ingabo z’Uburusiya harimwo Mariupol, igisagara kiri ku nkengera y’inyanja mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Ukraine, ubu kikavugwa ko gishobora kwadukamwo ikiza ca cholera, nk’uko bivugwa n’ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bw’Ubwongereza. Inyubakwa hafi zose zo muri iki gisagara zarononekaye canke zirasenyurwa, amazi akaba yavanganye n’imyanda iva mu tuzu twa surwumwe nk’uko bivugwa n’ishirahamwe ONU. Iki kiza caribonekeje i Mariupol imbere y’aha, kandi abarwayi bakaba baribonekeje irya n’ino mu kwezi guheze. Umukuru w’igisagara wo ku ruhande rwa Ukraine, Vadym Boychenko, yabwiye BBC ko “cholera, amacinya n’izindi ndwara zandukira zamaze gushika mu gisagara”, kandi ko cugawe kugira ngo ntihaduke akaranda gakomeye. Aya makuru ntashobora guhinyuzwa na BBC, mbere umukuru w’iki gisagara yagenywe n’Uburusiya avuga ko ibipimo vyama bikorwa igihe cose kandi ko ata muntu n’umwe arwaye cholera arigera aboneka.

column2: Ikigo kijejwe kurwanya indwara CDC kirashima ingene Africa yarwanije coronavirus
column3: Umuyobozi w'ikigo ca Afrika gishinzwe kurwanya indwara (CDC) yashimiye ibihugu vy'Afrika ku kungene vyashoboye guhagarika ikwirakwira rya coronavirus. Ku mugabane wose wa Afrika, abantu umuliyoni 1.4 nibo banduye, abashika ibihumbi 34 bakaba ari bo bapfuye kuva mu kwa gatatu. Ibi biharuro biri hasi cane ugereranije n'ivya Bulaya, Aziya, Amerika, kandi bikaba bigenda bigabanuka. John Nkengasong arongoye ikigo CDC yabwiye BBC ko ingingo zafashwe hakiri kare muri Afrika zafashije cane mu kurwanya ikwirakwira ry'uwu mugera. Ikigo CDC ni ikigo kijejwe amagara y'abantu kikaba cegukira umuryango w'ibihugu vya Afrika AU. Uyu mugabane utuwemwo n'abantu barenga gato umuliyaridi ufise ibice biri munsi ya 5% vy'abanduye umugera kw'isi yose, hamwe na 3.6% vy'abapfuye. Muganga Nkengasong avuga ko amakuru avuga ko abandura umugera hamwe n'abo uhitana atavugwa ko ari "ibinyoma". Ati: "Kumbure birashoboka ko hari abandura ntitubamenye, nk'uko biri no mu bindi bice vy'isi…ariko ntabo tubona bapfira ku mabarabara canke bahambwa mu binogo rusangi muri Afrika". Kuva habonetse umurwayi wa mbere mu kwa gatatu, ibihugu vyose vya Afrika vyaciye vyihutira gufata ingingo mu ntumbero yo kurwanya uwu mugera. Vyinshi muri vyo, harimwo na Afrika y'Epfo, vyarafashe ingingo za guma mu rugo mu gihugu cose, ariko hari n'ibindi vyovyo nka za Etiyopiya vyafashe ingingo zibayabaye. Hagati aho, Muganga Nkengasong avuga ko kubona ibitigiri vy'abanduye vyagumye hasi vyavuye "ku gukorera hamwe kw'ibihugu vyose vy'umugabane", vyaciye vyitaho "gupima ku murindi munini kandi bigaca bihimiriza abantu kwambara udupfukamunwa". Ati: "Mu bihugu vyinshi, harimwo na Etiyopiya nsanzwe nkomokamwo, winjiye mu mabarabrara ya Addis-Abeba uzosanga hafi 100% bose bambaye udupfukamunwa". Muganga Nkengasong avuga kandi ko kubona abenshi mu batuye ku mugabane wa Afrika ari abakiri bato ko navyo vyafashije. Avuga kandi ko hampande y'ibi, utwigoro two gushigikira abanyagihugu be n'uburambe mu guhangana n'indwara z'ivyaduka nka Ebola, vyarafashije cane guhangana na coronavirus.

column2: Zelensky abwira ingabo za Russia ati: ‘Vyobabera vyiza kurokoka muri muri Russia hako muza kugwa iwacu’
column3: Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky wa Ukraine avuga ko Uburusiya buriko bugerageza gusatira ingabo za Ukraine nu ntara ya Donbas iri mu buseruko. Mw'ijambo yashikirije nijoro ku wa gatandatu mw'ijoro, yavuze ko bariko "begeranya izindi ngabo mu ntumbero yo gukora ibitero bishasha muri ako karere" ariko akaba yatanze  ubutumwa bw'agasuzuguro ku ngabo z'Uburusiya. Ati: "Vyobabera vyiza murondeye kubandanya mubaho mu Burusiya gusumba gutikirira ku butaka bwacu". Ati: "Turazi ko intwazangabo z'Uburusiya ziriko zitegura abandi benshi bashasha baza guhona. Muri aba bantu, bamwe muri bo bacitse intege mu kwa gatatu n'ukwa kane, hari benshi bariko barinjizwa ariko batavyishimiye cane, mbere batamenyereye n'intambara". "Buri Murusiya arashobora kurokora ubuzima bwiwe". Zelensky avuga ko Ukraine iriko irakora "ibishoboka vyose" kugira ngo habe igikorwa co guhungisha abasirikare n'abasivire amajana n'amajana bagotewe mu gisagara ca Mariupol. Avuga ko Ukraine iriko irakorana n'incuti zayo mu gufatira Moscou ibindi bihano kandi ko yizeye y'uko ingingo yo gufatira ibindi bihano ku gitoro igihe gusohoka "vuba cane". Avuga ko ibarabara ry'ikibuga c'indege ca Odesa ryabomowe rigiye gusanurwa, yongera yemerera igihugu ko ibisagara vyigaruriwe n'ingabo z'Uburusiya, harimwo Kherson, Melitopol na Berdyansk bigiye kubohorwa. Ni mu gihe ariko Uburusiya bubandanya bushinga imizi mu gisagara ca Kherson, nk'uko umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi w'Ubwongereza abivuga, aho amenyesha ko Uburusiya bugomba gutsimbara mu nzira ya poritike n'ubutunzi muri ako karere. Iki gisagara co mu bumanuko bwa Ukraine cigaruriwe   n'ingabo z'Uburusiya mu ntango z'ukwa gatatu, kikazofasha Uburusiya gukomeza ubutegetsi bwabwo muri Crimée/Crimea, bwongere bworoherwe mu bitero amaja mu buraruko no mu burengero, nk'uko ubutumwa bw'ubushikiranganji bwacishijwe ku rubuga rwa Twitter bubivuga. Kuva uno musi, mu ntumbero yo gutsimbataza ubutegetsi bwabwo muri ako karere, Uburusiya bwatanze ikiringo c'amezi ane kugira ngo ifaranga ryabwo, rouble, rizobe ryasubiriye irya Ukraine, hryvnia. Ni mu gihe bivugwa ko Ingabo za Ukraine zasubije inyuma iz'Uburusiya mu micungararo ya Kharkiv. Igisirikare ca Ukraine gitangaza ko ejo ku wa gatandatu cigaruriye uturere tune turi mu buraruko no mu buseruko bw'igisagara ca Kharkiv, ari two agace ka Roganka, Ruska Lozova, Slobidske na Prelesne. Ikigo Institute for War Studies, gikora ubushakashatsi ku bijanye n'ivyo kwivuna abansi hamwe n'imigenderanire, kivuga ko ibi biri mu rukurikirane rw'ibitero vyo kwivuna ingabo za Ukraine zagize hanze y'ico gisagara. Ingabo za Ukraine "zarigaruriye uduce tutari duke mu buraruko no mu buseruko mu micungararo y'igisagara", kikavuga ko ibi bizotuma uturere dutuwemwo n'abanyagihugu tumaze igihe duterwa ama bombe turonka akoyoko. Ibi bivugwa mu gihe Ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bw'Uburusiya butangaza ko ingabo zabwo zirwanira mu kirere zakoroye indege z'intambara zibiriza Ukraine Su-24m mu kirere ca Kharkiv mw'ijoro ryakeye, nk'uko vyandikwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters. Ubu bushikiranganji buvuga kandi ko bwakoze igitero ku birwanisho Amerika n'ibihugu vya Bulaya vyari bihaye Ukraine, kandi ko bwasambuye ibarabara ry'ikibuga c'indege ca gisirikare hafi y'igisagara ca Odesa. Ubu bushikiranganji buvuga ko bwakoresheje misire zidahusha, zizwi nka Onyx, mu gutera ico kibuga c'indege, inyuma y'aho Ukraine ikaba yaciye yagiriza ko yateye ibarabara rishasha ku kibuga c'indege ca Odesa. Umukuru w'inama nshingamateka ya Amerika Nancy Pelosi yagize urugendo giturumbuka i Kyiv aho yabonanye na Perezida Zelensky ejo k uwa gatandatu. Mw'ireresi yacishijwe ku rubuga rwa Twitter yerekana Pelosi mu mabarabara y'umugwa mukuru wa Ukraine, Perezida Zelensky avuga ko "Amerika ari yo ifata iya mbere mu gushigikira Ukraine mu ntambaraya yayo yo kurwanya igitero c'Uurusiya". "Turabashimiye cane ku kungene mufahsa mu gukingira ubwigenge n'ubusugire bw'igihugu cacu". Uyu mukuru w'Inama nshingamateka ya Amerika avuga ko we n'intumwa yari arongoye batewe  "iteka rinini ryo kubonana n'umukuru w'igihugu wa Ukraine ejo". Avuga ko ibiganiro vyabo vyibanze ahanini "ku mfashanyo mu vyo umutekano, ubutabazi n'ubutunzi, ariko kandi no gusanura igihugu mu gihe intambara izoba irangiye".

column2: Burundi: OLUCOME iriyamiriza ingingo yo kwugara ibiryo vy'abavunjayi (bureau de change)
column3: Umukuru w'ishirahamwe ryishinze kurwanya igiturire n'isesagurwa ry'itunga ry'igihugu, OLUCOME, aranegura ingingo y'Ibanki Nkuru y'u Burundi yo kwugara amazu adandaza amafaranga  mvamakungu. Mw'itangazo yasohoye kuri uyu wa kabiri, Gabriel Rufyiri arongoye Olucome avuga ko iyo ngingo itazotorera umuti ikibazo c'ikena ry'amafaranga mvamakungu cibonekeza mu gihugu. Ku wa 07 z'uku kwa kabiri, Ibanki Nkuru y'Uburundi, BRB, yarafashe ingingo yo kwaka impusha amashirahamwe yose acuruza amafaranga mvamakungu mu Burundi. Iyagiriza ko atashoboye gukurikiza ibiri mu rwandiko rwerekana ingene amafaranga mvamakungu avunjwa, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bw'igihugu, nk'uko BRB ibivuga. Mw'iryo tangazo, Bwana Rufyiri avuga ati: "Iyo ata mafaranga y'agaciro ahari, ingingo nk'iyo siyo iza gukemura ikibazo kuko ibiciro vy'amafaranga y'agaciro bivana n'ingene aboneka kw'isoko ryayo". Yibutsa ko iryo kena ry'amafaranga y'agaciro rituma ibidandazwa bimwe bimwe mu gihugu bikena kubera hakenerwa ayo mafaranga kugira ngo hagurwe ibikoresho nkenerwa mu guhingura ivyo bidandazwa. Atanga akarorero k'isima, amafanta, ibiyeri n'ibindi, avuga ko "iyo bibonetse usanga bigurishwa ku biciro vy'umurengera". Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyahora bifasha u Burundi vyarahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco, bituma kandi amafaranga y'agaciro akena. Leta y'u Burundi yagiye ifata ingingo mu ntumbero yo kugenzura ko urudandazwa rw'amafaranga mvamakungu, ariko cagumye ari ikibazo ngorabahizi, arico catumyeIbanki Nkuru y'igihugu yugara amashirahamwe yose adandaza ayo mafaranga. Olucome isaba leta kuvyura imigenderanire n'ibihugu bitanga imfashanyo, kwongereza ibidandazwa bishorwa hanze, guhimiriza abarwizatunga b'banyamahanga kuzana imitahe yabo mu gihugu, kunagura igisata c'ingenzi, ivyo vyose kugira ngo amafaranga mvamakungu yinjire mu Burundi.

column2: South Africa yashinguranye iteka Musenyeri Desmond Tutu
column3: Abanya Afrika y'Epfo biriwe mu birori vyo gushingura wa musenyeri Desmond Tutu  yarwanije intwaro y'ivanguramoko ya Afrika y'Epfo, ibirori vyabereye mw'isengero nkuru ya Anglican  i Cape Town. Tutu, yagize uruhara rukomeye mu kurangiza intwaro y'ivanguramoko muri Afrika y'Epfo akanahabwa agashimwe kitiriwe Nobel, yapfuye ku wa Mungu afise imyaka 90. Perezida  Ramaphosa wa Afrika y'Epfo ni we yashikirije ijambo rikuru muri ibi birori vyo gushingura uyu musenyeri kuri uyu wa gatandatu, ibirori vyari vyitabiriwe n'abantu 100 gusa kubera amategeko yo kurwanya ikiza ca coronavirus. Mw'ijambo ryiwe, Perezida Ramaphosa  yavuze ko Tutu  ari "umuvyeyi w'imitima w'igihugu cacu gishasha". Kuva yitavye Imana ku wa Mungu uheze, ibihumbi n'ibihumbi baragiye kumwunamira kw'isengero  St George's Cathedral,  aho ikiziga ciwe cari. Tutu ni umwe mu bantu bakomeye barwanije cane intwaro y'amacakubiri n'ivanguramoko yashizweho n'inkehwa z'abazungu mw'ikubagurwa bakoreye nyarwinshi b'abirabure, kuva mu 1948 gushika mu 1991. Perezida Ramaphosa yavuze ko Tutu yari "umurwanyi mu rugamba rwo kurwanira ubwigenge, ubutungane, amahoro n'uburenganzira kuri bose. Atari muri Afrika y'Epfo honyene...ariko kandi no kw'isi yose". Ati: "Niba dushaka kumenya akarorero k'umuntu w'igihagararo kidasanzwe, w'imico idasanzwe kandi yitaho abantu, nta nkeka ko ari uyu mugabo turiko turashingura uyu musi". Mu bitabiriye ibi birori kw'ishengero rikuru rya Cape Town harimwo abagenzi, umuryango, abarongoye ishengero n'abanyaporitike. Tutu yari yasavye ashimitse ko mu kumushingura hatoba "ugusesagura canke gukoresha uburyo buhanitse", kandi bagakoresha "isandugu izimbutse ishoboka". Yasavye kandi ko amashurwe yonyene yoba ari mw'isengero yoba "urugori rw'amashure rw'umuryango wiwe", nk'uko bivugwa n'ibigo  Archbishop Tutu IP Trust hamwe na Desmond and Leah Tutu Legacy Foundation. Vyitezwe ko ibisigarira vyiwe bihambwa inyuma ya arutari mw'isengero nkuru St George's Cathedral - isengero nkuru yamaze imyaka 35 arongoye. Mu butumwa yatanze mu buryo bwa videwo, Musenyeri mukuru wa Canterbury yasiguye ingene Tutu "yamurikiye isi yose". Avuga ko icubahiro yahaye Tutu ari nk ' "imbeba yunamira inzovu". Umukobwa wa Tutu Mpho yavuze ko urukundo berekanye kuri se wiwe "rwatsimbataje imitima yabo". Ati: "Kubera twamusangiye n'isi, namwe muradusangije igice c'urukundo mwari mumufitiye". Igihe ikiziga ciwe cashirwa ahagaragara muri Cape Town, abantu benshi baraje kumusezera ubwa nyuma. Umugabo umwe, Wally Mdluli, yagenze ibirometero birengo 1000 kuva Bloemfontein gushika Cape Town agenda arasaba ko bamwunguruza kuri gusa (lift)  - aca mu ncuti n'abagenzi asaba ko bomufasha kugira ashobore gukora urugendo rwiwe, mbere akaryama muri station y'igitoro igihe yari ku rugendo. Yabwiye umunyamakuru wa BBC i Cape Tow ati: "Numva nuzuye umunezero inyuma y'aho mboneye isandugu y'ikiziga. Ni nk'uko umengo umutima wiwe uri muri jewe". Tutu yarakoresheje igihagararo ciwe mu kwiyamiriza agahotoro kakorerwa abirabure mu gihugu ciwe, akama avuga ko yabikora kubw'ukwemera atari ku mvo za poritike.

column2: OMS/WHO igabisha ko Africa ihanzwe n'igihuhusi kigira gatatu ca Covid
column3: Ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi OMS/WHO rigabisha ko Afrika iri hafi yo guhura n'igihuhusi kigira gatatu ca Covid-19, ko rero ari nkenerwa kwongereza incanco. Igitigiri c'abamaze kwandura iki kiza carenze imiriyoni zitanu mu gihe ibihugu bishika indwi vy'uwu mugabane ata ncanco bigifise. Umukuru wa OMS mu karere ka Afrika, Matshidiso Moeti, avuga ati: "Afrika irakeneye amamiriyoni yandi y'incanco muri kino gihe". Afrika y'Epfo, Maroc, Tunisia, Ethiopia na Misiri nivyo bihugu bifise abanduye benshi gusumba ibindi ku mugabane wose. Uganda na Namibia birahanzwe n'igihuhusi ca gatatu ca Covid kiriko kiriha inkumbi, aho buri musi gihitana abatari bake. OMS ivuga ko abantu 136.000 bamaze guhitanwa n'iki kiza mu bihugu bitandukanye vya Afrika. Ubwoko bushasha bwa coronavirus bwiswe Delta buramaze kwibonekeza mu bihugu 14, mu gihe ubundi nabwo bwiswe Beta bwatanguye kwibonekeza muri Afrika y'Epfo, bumaze kugera mu bihugu 25. OMS ivuga ko gushika ubu ata kirangamisi c'ingene izindi ncanco zizobonekera, ariko ko zikenewe mu buryo bwihutirwa.

column2: Ebola ngo nta mpungenge iteye irushanwa rya volley beach mu Rwanda
column3: Mu Rwanda kuva uyu munsi hariko habera amahiganwa mpuzamakungu y'urukino bita volley yo ku mucanga canke volley beach. Ayo mahiganwa asanzwe atunganywa n'urunani  rw'amashirahamwe y'urukino rwa Federation International de Volley Ball canke FIVB. Ayo mahiganwa yitabiriwe n'imigwi yo mu bihugu bitandukanye birenga 20, birimwo 2 vyo muri Afrika n'ukuvuga u Rwanda nyene na Cote d' Ivoire, akazobera mu karere ka Rubavu hafi y'urubibe n'umuji wa Goma. Florentine Kwizera yabajije umukuru w'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaboko Volley Ball mu Rwanda, Leandre Karekezi, nimba ata mpungenge bafise ku ngwara ya Ebola na burya ivugwa hakurya y'umupaka kandi izo nkino zikaba zikwega abantu benshi.

column2: Ukraine: Umuvugizi wa Kremlin yemeje ko Russia imaze gutakaza vyinshi
column3: Uburusiya bwemeye ko "bumaze gutakaza ingabo nyinshi cane" muri Ukraine, ni mu gihe uyu musi ugira 44 kuva iki gitero gitanguye. Umuvugizi w'ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu Dmitry Peskov yabwiye ikinyamakuru co mu Bwongereza Sky News ko Abarusiya bamaze gupfira muri Ukraine ari "amahano akomeye kuri twebwe" . Avuga ko afise icizere ko Moscou igiye gushika kw'ihangiro ry'iyi ntambara "mu misi iri imbere". Amajambo ya Peskov aje inyuma y'aho Uburusiya bwirukaniwe mu Nama ya ONU ijejwe agateka ka zina muntu ku wa gatatu. Ibihugu bishika 93 kuri 193 bigize Inama Nkuru ya ONU bemeje iyi ngingo, inyuma y'aho ingabo z'Uburusiya zagirijwe ko zahonyanze agateka ka zina muntu mu buryo bw'agahomerabunwa mu gisagara zari zigaruriye ca Bucha mu buraruko bwa Ukraine. Mu kwishura, Moscou yaciye itangaza ko itanze imihoho muri iyo nama. Iyi nama imenyesha ko "itewe cane umutima uhagaze n'ihonyangwa ry'agateka ka zina muntu", mu gihe Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky  wa Ukraine yagiriza Uburusiya ko bwakoze ayandi mahano akomeye i Borodyanka, igisagara kiri hafi y'umugwa mukuru Kyiv. Peskov arahakana ko ingabo z'Uburusiya zishe abantu mu gisagara ca Bucha, yabwiye Sky News ko "turi mu misi y'amarementanya n'ibinyoma". Ata vyemezo atanga, yavuze ko amasanamu y'abasivire bishwe muri ico gisagara ari irementanya. Hagati aho, kwemera ko Uburusiya bwahatakarije abantu benshi ni ikintu kidasanzwe. Ku wa 25 Ntwarante (3), umushikiranganji w'Uburusiya ajejwe kwivuna abansi yavuze ko 1.351 mu basirikare babwo bari biciwe mu ntambara. Ukraine yoyo ivuga ko Abarusiya bamaze kuhasiga ubuzima bababa 19.000. Vyaba ibivugwa n'Uburusiya canke na Ukraine, nta ruhande rwigenga rurashobora kubihinyuza - abihweza ibintu n'ibindi bakagabisha ko Uburusiya bushobora kuba butuvya igitigiri c'ababwo bamaze gupfira mu ntambara, mu gihe Ukraine nayo ishobora kuba ikiduza kugira ngo itere intege abayo. Abategetsi bo mu bihugu vy'Uburengero bemeza ko abasirikare b'Uburusiya bari hagati ya 7.000 na 15.000 ari bo bamaze kuhasiga ubuzima. Peskov, umuvugizi wa Perezida Vladimir Putin w'Uburusiya kuva mu 2000, avuga kandi ko Uburusiya buriko burarondera ingene bworangiza iyi ntambara. Ati: "Abasirikare bacu bariko bakora uko bashoboye kwose kugira ngo ibi bikorwa vya gisirikare birangire, kandi turizeye ko mu misi iri imbere, atari kure cane, ibi bikorwa bizoshika ku ntego yavyo canke naho birangizwe n'ibiganiro hagati y'intumwa z'Uburusiya n'iza Ukraine". Uburusiya bwarakuye ingabo zabwo ahegereye Kyiv ubu bukaba bwashize inguvu zose mu buseruko bwa Ukraine - ariko nta kimenyetso na kimwe cerekana ko intambara igiye guhagarara. Icegera c'umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ukraine atera akamo abanya-Ukraine baba mu buseruko guhunga bakibishoboye, mu gihe ibibombe bibandanya bicucagirwa muri ako karere bitorohereza ibikorwa vyo guhungisha abantu. Ejo ku wa kane, ibihugu vyo mu Burengero vyafatiye ibindi bihano Uburusiya mu vyo ubutunzi mu kwihora ku vyaha vy'intambara bwagirizwa muri Ukraine. Ari imbere y'inama nshingamateka y'Uburusiya, Duma, umushikiranganji wa mbere Mikhail Mishustin yaremeje ko ingaruka z'urukurikirane rw'ibihano zisigura ko iki gihugu kigiye guhura n'ibibazo vyubutunzi bitari bwigere bibaho mu myaka mirongo. Ati: "Nta nkeka, ibibazo biri mu gihugu bishobora gufatwa ko ari vyo vya mbere bikomeye bihanze Uburusiya mu myaka mirongo itatu iheze. Ibi bihano ntivyigeze bifatwa no muri vya bihe vy'umwiza w'igihe c'intambara yo kwikekana [Guerre froire/ Cold War]". Ariko avuga ko ingaruka z'ibihano vyafashwe n'ibihugu vyo mu Burengero zabaye nto, akaba yabwiye abashingamateka ko "ikigega cacu, ari co mushinge w'ubutunzi bwose bw'igihugu, cifashe neza". Inyuma yo gukoroka mu buryo butari bwigere bubaho mu mpera z'ukwa kabiri, ifaranga ry'Uburusiya, Rouble/Ruble, ryivyukiranije risubirana agaciro ryari rifise imbere y'intambara. Perezida Zelensky wa Ukraine yasubiye gutera akamo ibihugu vyo mu Burengero ko vyomuha ibirwanisho bikomakomeye, akavuga ko ingabo ziwe zikeneye "ibirwanisho bizoha igihugu ciwe gutsinda ku rubuga rw'intambara kandi ko ari vyo bizoba ibihano bikomeye ku Burusiya".

column2: Eritrea ‘yigaruriye ibigo vy'ubuvuzi vyegukira katolika’
column3: Amakuru ashikira BBC igisata c'ururimi rwa Tigrinya, amenyesha ko leta y'igihugu ca Eritrea yategetse Ekleziya Katolika gushikiriza ibigo vy'ubuvuzi vyose bisanzwe vyegukira iryo dini. Mu ntango z'iyi ndwi, abategetsi basavye abarongoye ivyo bigo  gutera igikumu ku rwandiko rwemeza ko babishikirije. Ariko abarongoye ivyo bigo nka bose baranse gushira umukono kuri urwo rwandiko, basaba ahubwo ko bovugana n'abarongoye iryo shengero. Inyuma y'aho, abajejwe umutekano bategetse abakozi bavyo gusohoka, baca baravyugara. Nta wuzi igituma ubutegetsi bwa Eritrea bufashe iyo ngingo. Hagati aho, mu kwezi kwa kane uno mwaka, abasenyeri ba Ekleziya Katolika muri Eritrea barasavye ko hotanguzwa umugambi w'ukunywanisha mu gihugu, ivyotuma abanyagihugu bose batunganirwa. Mu rwandiko rw'impapuro 30 rwanditswe n'abo basenyeri inyuma y'amasezerano y'amahoro hagati y'ico gihugu na Ethiopia, bamenyesheje ko ari nkenerwa ko abanyagihugu bonywanishwa kugira ngo igihugu gikire. Basavye ubutegetsi ko bwogira impinduka zotuma abanyagihugu batipfuza guhunga igihugu.

column2: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Ronaldo, Raphinha, De Jong, Tielemans, Neves, Gnabry, Dembele
column3: Umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa wa Manchester United  Richard Arnold ariko arakora uko ashoboye kugira ngo yumvishe umusatirizi wa Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo w’imyaka 37, guhagarika ivyo kurondera kuva muri uno murwi. (Times) United kandi yagiranye ibiganiro na Stuttgart kugira irabe ko yoronka umusatirizi wa Autriche Sasa Kalajdzic w’imyaka 25. (Sky Germany – mu kidagi) Barcelona yemeye igiciro c’imiriyoni 65 z’amapawundi zisabwa na Leeds United ku mukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Brezili Raphinha w’imyaka 25, ubu uyu murwi wo muri Espagne ukaba urajwe ishinga no kugurisha umukinyi wayo wo hagati, umunya-Hollande Frenkie de Jong w’imyaka 25 muri  Manchester United.(Mirror) Chelsea isa n’iyiri inyuma ya Barcelona mu rugamba rwo kugura Raphinha, aba-Blues bakaba bashobora guca bavuvudikira umusatirizi wa Bayern Munich umudagi Serge Gnabry w’imyaka 26. (Mail) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Leicester City umudagi Youri Tielemans w’imyaka 25, hamwe n’umunya Portugal akina hagati muri Wolves Ruben Neves w’imyaka 25, bari ku rutonde rw’abo Manchester United ishobora kwikorako mu gihe itoronka De Jong. (Talksport) Brentford iri hafi yo kuronka umwongereza akina ku ruhande mu murwi nserukiragihugu w’abatarenza imyaka 21 Keane Lewis-Potter w’imyaka 21 ku miriyoni 16 z’amapawundi avuye muri Hull City. (Athletic) Brentford kandi irizeye ko izotsinda Manchester United mu rugamba rwo kurondera umunyegori wa Albania, Thomas Strakosha w’imyaka 27 asanzwe yirebanga. (Mail) Amasezerano y’umusatirizi w’umufaransa Ousmane Dembele w’imyaka 25 mu murwi Barcelona arangira muri rino ci, ariko akaba yiteze gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha azotuma abandanya akina muri Nou Camp gushika mu 2024. (Marca) Wolves yanse igiciro c’imiriyoni 25 z’amapawundi zitangwa na Everton ku mwongereza akina hagati Morgan Gibbs-White w’imyaka 22. (Mail) Everton kandi iripfuza umwongereza akina hagati Conor Gallagher w’imyaka 22, ariko Chelsea izovyihoza gushika mu mpera z’iri ci imbere y’uko ifata ingingo kuri kazoza kiwe. (The i) Fulham imaze kuvugana na Tottenham mu kurondera kugura umukinyi w’inyuma wa Pays de Galles/Wales Joe Rodon w’imyaka 24. (Football Insider) Fulham iri mu biganiro bigeze kure mu rugamba rwo kugura umukinyi w’inyuma, umuswisi Kevin Mbabu w’imyaka 27, asanzwe akina mu murwi w’Ubudagi wa Wolfsburg mu masezerano y’imiriyoni zitanu. (Evening Standard) Sevilla iripfuza umukinyi w’inyuma ku ruhande rw’ibubamfu wa Tottenham umunya-Espagne Sergio Reguilon.(Mail) Arsenal yemeye gutanga imiriyoni 5.9 z’amapawundi ku mukinyi w’inyuma ku ruhande rw’ibubamfu wa Benfica umunya-Espagne Alex Grimaldo w’imyaka 26, inyuma y’aho umunya-Ecosse Kieran Tierney amariye iminota 30 yonyene mu kibuga asubiriye gukina inyuma y’imisi yari amaze yaravunitse. (Star) Juventus na Roma yerekana ko yipfuza umukinyi wo hagati wa Arsenal Lucas Torreira inyuma y’aho  Fiorentina ifatiye ingingo yo kutagura uyu munya-Uruguay w’imyaka 26 yari amaze umwaka w’inkino akina muri uno murwi wo mu Butaliyano yari yaratijijwemwo. (Evening Standard)

column2: Burundi: BRB yugaye amashirahamwe agurisha amafaranga
column3: Ibanki Nkuru y'Uburundi, BRB, yaraye ifashe ingingo yo kwaka impusha amashirahamwe yose acuruza amafaranga y'agaciro yari asanzwe yemewe. Mwitangazo ryasohowe n'umukuru w'iyo banki, Ciza Jean, avuga ko iyo ngingo izotangura kuja mu ngiro mu ndwi iza, igenekerezo rya 15 z'uku kwa kabiri. Yagiriza ayo mashirahamwe ko atashoboye gukurikiza ibiri mu rwandiko rwerekana ingene amafaranga mvamakungu avunjwa, ivyo ngo bikaba vyaragize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bw'igihugu. Mu kwezi kw'icenda umwaka uheze, ibanki nkuru y'igihugu, BRB, yasohoye itegeko rishasha rigenga urucuruza rw'amafaranga mu ntumbero y'ukurwanya abikika mu kiza bakagura bakanagurisha ku biciro vy'umurengera amafaranga y'agaciro. Muri iryo tangazo, Bwana Ciza ategeka abafise amazu yo kugura n'ukugurisha amafaranga y'agaciro gukuraho vuba na bwango ivyapa n'ibindi bimenyetso biyaranga. Amenyesha ko kuva ubu, amazu yemerewe kugura n'ukugurisha amafaranga mvamakungu ari ayegukira amabanki. Mu rwandiko rwasohowe ku wa 15 z'ukw'icenda umwaka uheze wa 2019, buri shirahamwe ryategerezwa kuvunja amafaranga ryisunze igiciro cashinzwe n'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu "ritarengeje inyungu y'ibice 15%". Iyo ngingo isa n'iyagoranye gushira mu ngiro, ari co catumye mu kwezi kwa 11 umwaka uheze, BRB isohora itangazo, aho yagabisha ko amashirahamwe n'amazu acuruza amafaranga y'agaciro adakurikije amategeko azofatwa nk'ayahungabanya umutekano w'igihugu. Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyahora bifasha u Burundi vyahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco, bituma kandi amafaranga y'agaciro akena.

column2: Igura n'igurishwa ry'abakinyi rikomeye kuri uyu mugoroba (19.08.2022)
column3: Umumenyereza wa Arsenal Mikel Arteta yavuze ko umukinyi w'imbere ku ruhande w'uwo mugwi, Bukaya Saka, yimirije gushira umukono ku masezerano mashasha. Yagize ati:"Mfise icizere kinini ko uruhande rwacu n'urwa Bukayo tuvyumva kumwe - igisigaye n'ukubishira mu nyandiko", (Romano via Arsenal.com) Arteta yavuze kandi ko umugwi wiwe ushaka kwihweza neza abakinyi ufise ubu imbere yo kwiyumvira kugura abandi bashasha mu mwanya usigaye w'igura n'igurishwa. "Ategerezwa kuba umukinyi mwiza, dushaka kuzana umukinyi wo ku rwego rwo hejuru, atari kuba ari umukinyi gusa." Umukinyi wa Real Madrid, Casemiro muri iki gitondo yasezeye abo bahora bakinana muri uwo mugwi inyuma yo kwemera kuja gukinira umugwi wa Manchester United. Umumenyereza wa Madrid, Carlo Ancelotti yemeje mu gitondo ko uwo mukinyi yimirije gusezera ikibuga ca Bernabéu. (Skysport) Umuyobozi mukuru wa Borussia Dortmund Hans-Joachim Watzke yamiriye kure inkuru zivuga ko uwo mugwi ushobora ugura Cristiano Ronaldo. Bivuye ku nkuru z'ikinyamakuru BILD co mu Budagi cavuze ko Dortmund ishobora kuzana uwo mukinyi wa Manchester United. Watzke yagize ati:"Ndamukunda, kuvugisha ukuri n'iciyumviro ciza - kubona Cristiano akinira kuri Signal Iduna Park. Ariko nta masezerano n'amwe dufitaniye, kuri ivyo rero tureke kubandanya tubivuga." (Sky sport football) Umumenyereza wa Newcastle Eddie Howe yabwiye Real Madrid ko yokwibagira kugerageza kugura umukinyi Bruno Guimaraes  bivuye ku nkuru zivuga ko bariko baragira inguvu zo kumugura. Uwo munye Brezil w'imyaka 24 yari yaguzwe amapawundi imiliyoni 40 mu kwezi kwa mbere mu mugwi wa Lyon, bamubona nk'uwushobora gusubirira Casemiro ariko arerekeza muri Machester United.
