column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Kane, Areola, Smith Rowe, Zouma, Coutinho, Damsgaard, Umtiti
column3: Manchester United iri imbere ya Chelsea n'umukeba wayo Manchester City mu rugamba rwo kurondera umusatirizi w'umwongereza Harry Kane w'imyaka 27, ariko Tottenham isaba imiriyoni 139 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika hamwe n'abakinyi babiri bakina mu murwi A wa Man U. (Football Insider) Manchester City yavuganye n'umusatirizi w'umufaransa Antoine Griezmann w'imyaka 30 akina muri Barcelona kugira ngo irabe ko yomugura. (Footmercato - in French) West Ham iri mu biganiro na  Paris St-Germain kugira ngo irabe ko yoronka umunyegori w'umufaransa Alphonse Areola w'imyaka 28 yari amaze umwaka wose akina muri Fulham iyo yari yaratijijwe. (Mail) Tottenham yahambije Arsenal, PSG na Atletico Madrid mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa  Lyon umufaransa Houssem Aouar w'imyaka 23. (Le10 Sport, via Metro) Arsenal  yongereje amafaranga kugira ngo irabe ko yoronka umukinyi w'inyuma wa Brighton umwongereza Ben White w'imyaka 23, aho yemeye ko ishobora gutanga imiriyoni 66.7 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika hamwe n'uturusho dushobora kwiyongerako duharurwa mu mamiriyoni umunani z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Star) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Arsenal Emile Smith Rowe w'imyaka 20 amaze kutangirwa amafaranga incuro zibiri na Aston Villa ariko bikanka, ariteguye gutera igikumu ku yandi masezerano y'imyaka itanu n'abarashi (Gunners). (Birmingham Mail) Napoli na Roma iripfuza kugura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Chelsea, umutariyano Emerson Palmieri w'imyaka 26, ariko iyo mirwi ikaba idashaka kurekura imiriyoni 20 z'ama euro zisabwa kuri uyu mukinyi afise amasezerano azorangira mu kwa gatandatu 2022.  (Calciomercato, via Football Italia) Umukinyi w'inyuma w'umufaransa Kurt Zouma w'imyaka 26  yiteze kuva muri  Chelsea muri rino ci, mu gihe  Everton, Tottenham na Roma ya Jose Mourinho yose imwipfuza, akaba aherutse kwanka kuja gukinira Wolves.(Telefoot on Twitter)ya Newcastle United, Tottenham, Wolves na Southampton iriko iregeranya amafaranga mu rugamba rwo kurondera umusatirizi wa Schalke umunyamerika Matthew Hoppe w'imyaka 20. (90min) Sampdoria yiyemeje kugumya umusatirizi wayo, umunya Danemark  Mikkel Damsgaard w'imyaka 21 n'imiburiburi mu kiringo w'uwundi mwaka, mu gihe Liverpool na Tottenham, co kimwe na Juventus hamwe na Barcelona iri mu mirwi itari mike imwipfuza.  (Gazzetta dello Sport - in Italian) Umukuru w'igisata kijejwe umupira w'amaguru ca Tottenham Fabio Paratici abona ko kimwe mu bikorwa nyamukuru ari uko agiriranira ayandi masezerano y'igihe kirekire n'umusatirizi Son Heung-min w'imyaka 29 akomoka muri Korea y'Epfo.  (90min) Manchester United ivugwa ko ifise umunoho mwinshi cane wo kugura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Barcelona, umufaransa Samuel Umtiti w'imyaka 27 mu gihe na Arsenal nyo nyene imwipfuza. (El Gol - in Spanish) Everton iri hafi kuronka umukinyi w'inyuma Ryan Bertrand ata mafaranga itanze, inyuma y'aho uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 31 yankiye kubandanya akinira Southampton. (Fabrizio Romano, via Leicester Mercury) Barcelona na Tottenham zahambiije Manchester United mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma wa Juventus umunya Argentina Cristian Romero w'imyaka 23 asanzwe akina muri Atalanta iyo yatijijwe. Ariko Atalanta nayo ifise uburenganzira bwo gushobora kumugura. (Calciomercato - in Italian) Tottenham na Manchester United iriko irakurikiranira hagufi umukinyi w'inyuma wa Lyon umunya Danemark Joachim Andersen w'imyaka 25, yari amaze umwaka akina muri Fulham iyo yari yaratijijwe.  (Footmercato - in French) Uwahoze ari umusatirizi wa  Manchester City, West Ham hamwe na Manchester United umunya Argentina Carlos Tevez w'imyaka 37, avuga ko ashaka kurangiriza umwuga wiwe w'umupira w'amaguru muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika kandi akavuga ko amaze kuronka imirwi itatu imwipfuza, ni inyuma y'aho aviriye mu murwi  Boca Juniors wo mu gihugu ciwe mu kw'indwi.  (ESPN Deportes - in Spanish) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Liverpool  Ben Davies w'imyaka 25 ntashaka kuva muri uyu murwi n'aho aronderwa n'imirwi Celtic na Bournemouth. (Mail) Uwahoze akina ku ruhande mu murwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubufaransa, Franck Ribery w'imyaka 38,avuga ko bibabaje kubona Fiorentina itashatse kumwongera ayandi masezerano ngo abandanye ayikinira inyuma y'aho ayo yari afitaniye nawe arangiriye mu mpera z'ukwa gatandatu akavuga ko yipfuza kugumua muri uwu murwi w'ihiganwa ry'Ubutariyano, Serie A.  (Toscana TV, via Football Italia)

column2: Ingabo zidasanzwe za Australia zagirizwa kwica abasivire muri Afghanistani
column3: Hari ivyemezo nyavyo vyerekana ko ingabo zidasanzwe za Australia zishe mu buryo buteye kubiri n'amategeko abantu 39 mu gihe c'intambara muri Afghanistani, nk'uko biri mu cegeranyo cari kirindiranywe igishika. Igisirikare ca Australia, Australian Defence Force (ADF), cerekanye ivyavuye mu matohoza yari amaze imyaka ine ku nyifato itabereye y'ingabo zaco. Kivuga ko igipolisi gitegerezwa gukora amatohoza ku bantu 19 bahoze canke bari mu ngabo zidasanzwe kuri ubu bwicanyi  bwakorewe "impfungwa, abarimyi canke abasivire" hagati ya 2009 na 2013. ADF ivuga ko ibi vyaha vyakozwe kubera "akageso k'uburwanyi" kari mu basirikare bamwe bamwe bananiwe kwigumya. Muri rino tohoza, Jenerali-Majoro Paul Brereton yarikoze yavuganye n'ivyabona birenga 400. Vyabonetse ko: Afghanistani ivuga ko Australia yayijeje ko yiyemeje "gushira imbere y'ubutungane" ababikoze. Dr. Samantha Crompvoets yakoze amatohoza y'intangamarara kuri ibi vyaha, yabwiye BBC ko vyakozwe "n'ibigirankana, bikorwa incuro nyinshi kandi ko ari ivyaha vyo mu ntambara", kandi ko iki cegeranyo camurenganuye. Australia ifise ingabo muri Afghanistani kuva mu 2002, inyuma y'itembagazwa ry'ubutegetsi bw'abatalibani, mu ntambara yari iyobowe na Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Mu ntango, igikorwa c'ingabo mpuzamakungu cari ukwigisha ingabo za Afghanistani, ariko rero mu nyuma zikaba zagiye zigira uruhara mu gikorwa co kurwanya inyeshamba. Kivuga ko abasirikare 25 bo mu ngabo zidasanzwe bagize uruhara mu bwicanyi ndengerabutungane bo nyene ubwabo canke "batumye abandi", mu vyaha bitandukanye 23. Kivuga ko ivyaha 36 ari vyo bitegerezwa gukorwako amatohoza. Umukuru w'igisirikare ca Australia, Angus Campbell, avuga ko hari ivyemezo ko abasirikare bamwe bo mu gisata kirwanira mu kirere, Special Air Service (SAS), bakoze ivyo bishakiye bitajanye n'amategeko. Avuga ko ababikoze bari bazi neza ivyo bariko barakora. Ati: "Iki cegeranyo cerekana ko iyi ngeso yatewe intege na bamwe mu ngabo z'inararibonye, kandi zifise igihagararo mu ntumbero yo kwerekana ko bakomeye kandi ari ba kibirengeye". Dr Crompvoets avuga ati: "Ibisongerezi barahimiriza canke bagatera intege abasirikare bakiri bato kugira bice impfungwa kugira ngo bashike ku ntego yabo yo kwica ku ncuro ya mbere, uko niko bahimiriza aba basirikare bakiri bato, mu buryo bwo kubaha urwinjizo muri uru rwego - iki nico cari kibabaje cane". Iri tohoza ryakozwe mu mpisho, vyumvikana ko gushika ubu ari bike bimaze kumenyekana. Mu ndwi iheze, umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Australia, Scott Morrison, yaragabishije ko iki cegeranyo kirimwo "amakuru aremereye cane kandi agumye ku banya Australia" ku vyerekeye ingabo zayo zidasanzwe. Ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu wa Afghanistani Ashraf Ghani bivuga ko Bwana Morrison yamuhamagaye kuri telefone amubwira ko "ababajwe cane" n'ibiri muri kino cegeranyo. Umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire w'iki gihugu yasubiwemwo n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP avuga ko ivyaha bivugwa muri iki cegeranyo "bidashobora kubabarirwa", ariko ko kubona vyagiye ahabona ari "intambwe ikomeye yo gushika ku butungane". Umurwi wigenga ujejwe agateka ka zina muntu muri Afghanistani wakiranye igishika kino cegeranyo, ariko ukavuga ko kidatanga ivyemezo bihagije kugira ngo ubutungane bubikorereko. Uvuga ko ari ngombwa ko iki gikorerwako kandi "hagatangwa n'indishi y'akababaro nyayo" bidatevye. Elaine Pearson wo mw'ishirahamwe Human Rights Watch riharanira uburenganzira bwa muntu, yabwiye BBC ati: "Ibi ni ivyemezo nyavyo - ivyemeza neza ko ibi vyaha vyakozwe". Dr Crompvoets avuga ko mu ntango "yarwanijwe cane" igihe icegeranyo ntangamarara gisohokeye, ariko ko vyabonetse y'uko ivyo yavuga atarira busema. Mu ntango z'uno mwaka, sentare mpuzamakungu mpanavyaha (ICC) yaratanguye gukora amatohoza ku vyaha bivugwa ko vyakozwe n'abasirikare ba Amerika hamwe n'abandi bagize uruhara mu ntambara ya Afghanistani. Ivyaha vyakozwe n'aba Talibani, ingabo za Afghanistani n'iza Amerika kuva mu 2003 vyitezwe gukorwako amatohoza. Icegeranyo c'iyi sentare co mu 2016 carerekanye ko hari ibimenyetso nyavyo vyerekana ko igisirikare ca Amerika cakoze ivyaha vyo kuboreza igufa abantu vyakorewe mu busho bwo mu kinyegero bw'ikigo kijejwe igendereza CIA. Iki cegeranyo kandi kivuga ko hari ivyemezo vy'uko ingabo za Afghanistani zaboreje igufa impfungwa, kandi ko aba Talibani bakoze ivyaha vyo mu ntambara nk'ubwicanyi bw'agahomerabunwa bwakorewe abasivire. Eka n'Ubwongereza buriko burakora amatohoza mu ntumbero yo kumenya niba ibirego vy'ubwicanyi ndengerabutungane bwakozwe n'ingabo zidasanzwe z'Ubwongereza bwarakorewe amatohoza neza.

column2: DRC:'﻿Imigwi yose yitwaje ibigwanisho itegerezwa gusubira mu bihugu vyayo' - EAC
column3: U﻿muhuza w'akarere ko mu buseruko bwa Afrika EAC ku kibazo ca Congo, Uhuru Kenyatta na prezida Evariste Ndayishimiye arongoye iryo shirahamwe basavye ko imigwi yose yitwaje ibigwanisho iri muri RD Congo, isubira mu bihugu vyayo. I﻿vyo biri mw'itangazo abo bategetsi babiri basohoye inyuma y'umubonano wabereye i Bujumbura mu Burundi ku mugwa mukuru w'Ubutunzi. I﻿ryo tangazo rigira riti: "Duhamagariye imigwi yose yitwaje ibigwanisho gusubira mu bihugu yaje ivamwo ata kindi gisabwe." P﻿rezida Ndayishimiye na Uhuru Kenyatta yahora arongoye Kenya, akaba ari na we yari yanatumyeko ibiganiro vya mbere vyaheruka guhuza reta n'imigwi igwana i Nairobi muri Kenya bashinze ko hagiye kuba iyindi nama itariki 16 z'ukwezi kwa cumi na rimwe 2022. M﻿uri nama, ngo hazoba hatumiwe abantu bose bafise aho bahurira n'umutekano muke urangwa mu buseruko bwa RD Congo, harimwo n'abarongoye abandi mu mibano (Chefs traditionnels). M﻿u nama yaheruka kubera i Nairobi, yahuze ibihugu bihurikiye mw'ishirahamwe rya EAC, hari hashinzwe ko ibihugu vyose bigize iryo shirahamwe birungika ingabo zija kugwanya imigwi yitwaje ibigwanisho igisibije mu buseruko bwa Congo. G﻿ushika ubu Uburundi, Kenya na Uganda ni vyo bimaze kurungikayo abasirikare. M﻿uri uwo mubonano w'abo bategetsi babiri, bateye akamo ibindi bihugu kunyarutsa kurungika abasirikare babo. U﻿wo mubonano wabaye mu gihe prezida Etienne Tshisekedi wa Congo yaraye ashikirije ijambo abanyagihugu, aho yahamagariye urwaruka kwifatanya n'igisirikare kugwanya Urwanda. Y﻿agize ati: "Mu kwishura kuvyo urwaruka rusaba, ndabahamagariye kwiyegeraniriza mu migwi yo gukizura mu ntumbero yo gushigikira no gufasha igisirikare mu kurangura amabanga yaco ahambaye. "Aka ni na ko karyo ko kugabisha ibihemu, vyaba mu gisirikare canke abasivile bifasha umwansi, bazokurikiranwa hisunzwe amategeko, baronke igihano kijanye n’iyo nyifato. "Mu gusubiramwo gushimangira akamo nteye urwaruka rufise uwo muhamagaro, ndabasavye kwitaba ako kamo ari benshi." Y﻿agirije kandi Urwanda kwikika inyuma y'ivyitwazo ata ho bifatiye vy'uko FARDC ishigikiye umugwi w'abagwanyi b'abanyarwanda bari mu buseruko bwa Congo FDLR mu gushaka kwigarurira igihugu ciwe. Y﻿agize ati:"Mu kwikika inyuma yo kwitwaza ko FARDC ishigikiye FDLR, Urwanda muvyo ukuri rugenzwa n’agatima ko kwigarurira ikindi gihugu, rugamije kudutwara ubutare bwacu. "kugira rero bishoboke rutera akajagari mu buseruko bwa Congo, kugira ntiharangwe amahoro gutyo babandanye gukora ubwicanyi." Urwanda ruguma ruhakana ko ata ruhara rufise mu ntambara iriko irahuza abasirikare ba Congo n'umuhari witwaje ibigwanisho wa M23, uherutse kwigarurira uturere twinshi two mu karere ka Rutshuru harimwo n'umugwa mukuru waho uri ku birometero 70 uvuye i Goma, umugwa mukuru wa Nord Kivu.

column2: Kenya: Evariste Ndayishimiye asaba abagwizatunga ba Kenya kujana imitahe mu Burundi
column3: Prezida Evariste Ndayishimiye atera akamo abagwizatunga ba Kenya kujana imitahe yabo mu Burundi  kuko ngo mu myaka ibiri canke itatu iri imbere bashobora kuzoba bacerewe. Agishika muri Kenya, yaciye aca mu burengero bw'ico gihugu mu gisagara ca Kisumu, aho prezida n'abagize reta ya Kenya bari, bitegurira guhimbaza umusi mukuru wa Madaraka Day kuri uyu wa kabiri. Mu kiganiro bahaye abamenyeshamakuru, abakuru b'ibihugu Uhuru Kenyatta na Evariste Ndayishimiye bashimagije umubano mwiza, gufashanya muri politike, ubutunzi, gutsimbataza amahoro n'ishaka bafise ryo kubitsimbataza. Prezida Ndayishimiye yavuze ko amaze kuza muri Kenya kenshi, ariko ko ari ubwa mbere ashitse mu gisagara ca Kisumu. Yagize ati:"...Ntangajwe n'ubwiza hamwe n'iterambere nsanze muri kino gisagara." Yavuze ko Uburundi bumaze gutera intambwe mu mahoro n'umutekano, ko butakiri ku rutonde rw'ibihugu bitarangwamwo amahoro muri Onu, ashimira prezida Kenyatta ko "we ubwiwe yabigizemwo uruhara." Prezida Ndayishimiye yavuze ko ubu, Uburundi buriko burashira inguvu cane mu guteza imbere ubutunzi, aranashima ko uguhanahana ibidandazwa hagati ya Kenya n'Uburundi bigenda vyiyongera. Yvuze ati:"Ndateye akamo abagwizatunga bo muri Kenya kuza mu Burundi kukoni co gihe ciza, kurindira imyaka ibiri canke itatu, mushobora gusanga mwacerewe." Umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburundi kandi yatumiye mugenzi we wa Kneya Uhuru Kenyatta kugendera Uburundi.

column2: Kenya: abatemera Imana basaba ko amasengesho mu mashure avanwaho
column3: Ishirahamwe ry'abahakanyi muri Kenya ryandikiye umushikiranganji w'indero w'iki gihugu rimusaba kubuza ivyo gusenga mu mashure ya reta imbere y'uko ibibazo vya reta bitangura. Iri shirahamwe rivuga ko guhatira abanyeshure gusenga ari uguhonyanga agateka kabo. Amashure ya reta muri Kenya afise umugenzo wo gutegura amasengesho imbere y'uko abanyeshure batangura ibibazo vya reta. Muri ino ndwi, amashure yateye akamo abavyeyi ko bokwifatanya nayo muri ano masengesho  yamaze kuba nk'umugenzo kugira ngo abana babo bitegurire neza ibibazo. Muri uru rwandiko, havuga ngo: "Abanyagihugu ba Kenya benshi bari muri ano mashure ya reta aho ivy'amasengesho ari itegeko". Iri shirahamwe rivuga ko abana bakwiye guhabwa uburenganzira bo nyene bwo kwifatira ingingo ku bijanye n'idini.

column2: Ibibazo vyanyu kuri coronavirus: Urukingo pfizer rukingira n'ubundi bwoko
column3: Tubandanya kubashikiriza inyishu ku bibazo vyanyu ku kiza ca coronavirus, uno munsi muganga akaba asubiza bibazo ku rukingo rwa pfizer hamwe n'ukwanduzanya hagati y'umugore yibungenze n'umwana wiwe. Ni ibibazo vyabajijwe n'abitwa Welsh Man na Mugisha Peter, bikaba vyishurwa na Muganga Leonard Nduwayo. Mubandanye kuturungikira ibibazo vyanyu kuri coronavirus ku rubuga rwaru rwa facebook (bbcgahuza), uko bishoboka Muganga azoja arabisubiza.

column2: Yoshiro Mori: Umukuru wa Olympic za Tokyo aratanga imihoho kubera kuvuga 'ibitabereye' ku bagore
column3: Umukuru w'umugwi utegura inkino za Olympic zizobera Tokyo agiye gutanga imihoho inyuma yo kunegurwa ko yavuze ibintu "bitabereye" ku bagore. Yoshiro Mori, w'oimyaka 83, vyanditswe ko yavuze ngo abagore bavuga menshi kandi ko inama n'abagore bo mu nama nyobozi ''zitwara umwanya muremmure''. Ayo majambo yaradugije ifurufumbi ry;abavyiyamiriza none Mori yarasavye imbabazi ico gihe ariko avuga ko atazotanga imihoho. Ariko  yagumye yotwa igitutu co gutanga imihoho. Mori, yahoze ari umushikiranganji wa mbere, yitezwe gutanga imihoho  ku mugaragaro mu nama idasanzwe izoba ku wa gatanu inyuma yo  kuvuga ivyo ku ndwi iheze. Ibigo bikomeye bishigikira izo nkino navyo vyari vyashize amajwi hejuru mu kunegura ivyo yavuze harimwo na Toyota, iri mu bakomeye bshigikira cane inkino za Olympic. Umukuru wa Toyota, Akio Toyota yavuze ko iyo kompanyi "yababajwe'' n'ivyashikirijwe. Ku wa kabiri umugwi w'abashingwamanza b'abagore bambaye impunzu zera mu kwiyamiriza ivyavuzwe na Mori, hari n'abagabo bashigikiye mu kwambara uko nyene. Ku bw'ibinyamakuru vyo mu Buyapani, abantu bashika 400 nabo baranditse bavuga ko bahagaritse gusaba gukorera ubushake mu nkino za Olympic, zitegekanijwe mu bihe biri imbere uyu mwaka. Inama y'abarongoye umugwi utegura inkino ubu igizwe n'anbantu 24, batanu muri bo bakaba ari abagore. Mu 2019,inama y'abaronmgoye uwo mugwi-ujejwe guhitamwo abayapani bazokwitaba inkino,yihaye ihangiro ryo kwongereza igitigiri c'abagore bayigize gushika ku 40 kw'ijana. Mori bivugwa ko yagize ati: "Turamutse tudugije igitigiri c'abnagore bagize inama nyobozi, dutegerezwa kubasha kugabanya umwanya bafata mu kuvuga, barafise ingorane yo kurangiza, ivyo navyo bikaba bishavuza." Mori arazwi mu gihugu kuba yakuze kugwa mu rudubi no kuvuga ibitabereye abashitsi igihe yari mu nabanga hagati ya 2000 na 2001. \yabwiye ikinyamakuru co mu Yapani Mainichi ko abagore bo mu muryangoi wiwe nabo bamuryagaguye kubera ivyo yavuze.

column2: Rwanda - Coronavirus: Katolika yafashe ingingo zijanye no gukinga ico kiza
column3: Ekleziya Katolika mu Rwanda ihamagarira abakirisu gukurikiza amategeko atangwa n'inzego zijejwe amagara y'abantu mu ntumbero yo kwirinda wa mugera ruhonyabantu coronavirus, yiswe Covid-19. Ivyo biri mw'itangazo ryaraye risohowe na Antoine Kambanda, Umwepiskopi mukuru wa Diyoseze nkuru ya Kigali akaba n'icegera c'Inama y'Abepiskopi Gatolika mu Rwanda, aho amenyesha ingingo zafashwe mu makoraniro zizofasha abakirisu babo kudakoranako ngo bahave bandukizanya. Ibihugu bishika umunani ku mugabane wa Afrika bimaze gutangaza ko uwo mugera wamaze kubishikamwo, leta z'u Burundi n'u Rwanda zikaba ziherutse gutangaza ingingo zafashe mu ntumbero yo kwirinda no gukinga uwo mugera. Mw'iryo tangazo, Inama y'Abepiskopi Gatolika mu Rwanda isaba abakirisu "guhana amahoro ya Kristu ku mutima gusa ata guhana ibiganza canke guhoberana". Isaba kandi ko "mu gihe co gusangira (guhazwa mu Kinyarwanda) ari ugutega ibiganza, atagutega ururimi". Iyo nama yafashe kandi ingingo yo gukura "amazi y'umugisha" (amazi ahezagiye mu kirundi) mu twombo yashirwamwo mw'isengero, maze abakirisu bakaja barayakoramwo mu kugira urumenyetso rw'umusaraba. Basaba abakirisu kudasubira gukora aho yahora ashirwa kuko atakirimwo "kugeza igihe ikibazo kizoba gikemutse". Muri iryo tangazo, Inama y'Abepisikopi Gatolika mu Rwanda, yemereye abakirisitu ko izobandanya ikurikirana uko bimeze, ikazofata n'izindi ngingo zo kwikingira ni vyaba ngombwa. Gushika ubu, ibihugu birenga 80 biramaze guterwa n'uwo mugera watanguriye mu gisagara ca Wuhan c'intara ya Hubei mu Bushinwa. Ku mugabane wa Afrika, ibihugu vya Togo, Nigeria, Senegal, Misiri, Algeria, Tuniziya, Afrika y'Epfo na Cameroon nivyo bimaze guterwa n'uwo mugera. Mu ntumbero yo kurwanya uwo mugera, ibihugu vy'u Rwanda n'u Burundi biherutse gutangaza ingingo vyafashe mu ntumbero yo gukinga ko ishika muri vyo. U Burundi  bwatangaje ko ingenzi zivuye mu bihugu vy'u Bushinwa, Koreya y'epfo, Iran, Ubutaliyani, Ubudage, Ubufaransa, Ubuyapani na Espanye zizobanza gushirwa mu kibanza categuwe ukwazo nyene mu kiringo c'iminsi 14. Nayo mu Rwanda, leta isaba abanyagihugu "kugabanya ingendo zitari ngombwa" mu bihugu birangwamwo coronavirus, yongera kandi itangaza n'ingingo zitandukanye harimwo n'izo isuku, kugira ngo birinde kwandura.

column2: Abashingamateka ba Bulaya basaba irekurwa ry'abamenyeshamakuru b'ikinyamakuru Iwacu
column3: Hari abashingamateka ba Bulaya bandikiye umushikiranganji w'ubutungane w'u Burundi bamusaba kurekura abamenyeshamakuru b'ikinyamakuru Iwacu bapfunzwe. Térence Mpozenzi, Agnès Ndirubusa, Egide Harerimana, Christine Kamikazi barapfunzwe kuva ku wa 26 z'ukwezi kw'icumi bagirizwa "kugira uruhara mw'ihungabanywa ry'umutekano w'igihugu". Bafashwe mu gihe bariko bakurikirana igitero c'abitwaje ibirwanisho mu ntara ya Bubanza cabaye ku wa 22 z'ukwezi kw'icumi. Ku wa 20/11 Sentare isubiramwo imanza ya Ntahangwa mu gisagara ca Bujumbura yafashe ingingo yo kubandanya ipfunze abo bamenyeshamakuru. Mu kwezi guheze, Umushikirizamanza mukuru wa Repubulika y'u Burundi yatangaje ko abo bamenyeshamakuru badapfunzwe kubera umwuga wabo ahubwo kubera ivyaha bagirizwa. Abo bashingamateka ba Bulaya bamenyesha ko abamenyeshamakuru badategerezwa gufatwa nk'inkozi z'ikibi kubera bashitse ahariko habera imidugararo mu ntumbero y'ukumenya ukuri. Muri iryo kete ryanditswe n'abashingamateka 38 bari mu nama nshingamateka ya Bulaya, bamenyesha umushikiranganji Aimée Laurentine Kanyana ko batewe impungenge n'uko abo bamenyeshamakuru babandanya bapfunzwe, bahorwa igikorwa cabo co kurondera amakuru. Ibiro vy'umwe mu bariteyeko igikumu vyemereye BBC ko iryo kete ari iry'aba bashingamateka. BBC ntirashobora kuvugana n'ubushikiranganji bw'ubutungane w'u Burundi kuri iri kete. Aba bashingamateka bibutsa ko ari uburenganzira bw'abamenyeshamakuru kurondera n'ukumenyesha abanyagihugu ibijanye n'ubuzima bw'igihugu. Bavuga ko ipfungwa ryabo rishobora gutuma abamenyeshamakuru badashobora gushikiriza amakuru ajanye n'ibibazo nkoramutima. Muri ivyo bavuga ivyerekeye imirwi yitwaje ibirwanisho, ihonyangwa ry'agateka ka zina muntu canke ihotorerwa rishingiye ku vyiyumviro vya politike. Bibutsa ko ibwirizwashingiro ry'u Burundi riha Abarundi uburenganzira bw'ugushikiriza ivyiyumviro vyabo, harimwo n'uburenganzira bw'ukumenyesha amakuru. "Kuri ivyo, ipfungwa ryabo rirateye amakenga kandi riteye kubiri n'ivyo u Burundi bwiyemeje mw'ibwirizwashingiro n'amasezerano mpuzamakungu". Basaba ko ikibazo cabo cosubirwamwo, bakarekurwa ata kirinze gusabwa, kandi bakareka abamenyeshamakuru bagakora umwuga wabo badatinya gufatwa canke gukubagurwa.

column2: ONU ivuga ko abantu 117 bishwe mu ndyane hagati y’aba Lendu n’aba Hema muri Kongo
column3: Icegeranyo c'intangamarara c'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU cemeza ko ubwicanyi mu gihugu ca Republika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Kongo bumaze guhitana abantu 117 mu ntara ya Ituri. Abenshi mu bapfuye ni abo mu bwoko bw'aba Hema batunzwe cane cane n'ubworozi bw'inka, mu gihe abakoze ivyo bitero ari abo mu bwoko bw'aba Lendu batunzwe ahanini n'uburimyi. Iyo mirwi ibiri yo muri iyo ntara ya Ituri izwi ko yamye ishamirana kuva kera, ariko ico cegeranyo ca ONU kimenyesha ko hashobora kuba hariyongereyeko n'izindi mvo zishingiye kuri politike be no ku butunzi. Ico cegeranyo kivuga ko abo bantu baguye mu bitero vyabaye hagati y'amagenekerezo ya 10 na 13 z'uku kwa gatandatu muri iyo ntara iri mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko bw'ico gihugu. Umurwi w'abashakashatsi bakoze ico cegeranyo bamenyesha ko bamwe muri bishwe baciwe amazosi, kandi ko harimwo abagore n'abana. Mu gihe amazu n'ivyarimwo vyaturiwe, ishirahamwe ONU rivuga ko uravye ingene ivyo bitero vyari bikaze, vyaboneka ko abakoze ivyo bitero bari bafise intumbero yo kwomora abantu ntibasubire kugaruka mu zabo. Igisirikare ca Kongo kimenyesha ko umurwi wakoze ico gitero urongowe n'uwitwa Ngudjolo, kikavuka ko cafashe ikirindiro cawo inyuma y'intambara ikaze. Buramatari w'intara ya Ituri, Jean Bamanisa,  yabwiye BBC ko abajejwe umutekano babandanya bakora amatohoza kandi ko ababikoze bazorengutswa imbere y'ubucamanza. Kuva mu mwaka uheze, abantu barenga ibihumbi 300 baramaze guhunga kubera izo ndyane zo muri iyo ntara ya Ituri, bakaba baba mu makambi y'abateshejwe izabo be no mu ncuti ku mugwa mukuru w'iyo ntara, Bunia, hamwe no mu micungararo yaho. Muri ico gihugu kandi havugwa amakuru y'intambara zibera mu mitumba ya Minembwe mu ntara ya Kivu y'Ubumanuko. Mu gihe  hari ibihuha vyavuga ko hoba hari abasirikare b'u Rwanda bariko barwanira ku butaka bwa Kongo, umunyamakuru wa BBC, Gaius Kowene, akorera muri ico gihugu amenyesha ko abenshi mubo bavuganye bahakana ayo makuru. Amakuru atangwa n'inzego zitandukanye, haba mu baserukira ishirahamwe ONU, mu mashirahamwe adaharanira inyungu za politike, mu bamenyeshamakuru bakorera muri ako karere, mi gisirikare c'u Rwanda, eka mbere no mu gisirikare n'inzego zijejwe igendereza muri ico gihugu ca Kongo, yose avuga ko ayo makuru ari ibihuha.

column2: Gloria Estefan avuga ko yakorewe ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina afise imyaka icenda
column3: Umuririmvyi Gloria Estefan yanyeguruye ko yahohotewe bishingiye ku gitsina n'umuntu wo mu muryango igihe yari afise imyaka icenda. Uwo muririmvyi w'amamamuko ya Cuba na Amerika  w'imyaka 64 avuga ko yashurashujwe ari kw'ishure ry'umuziki n'umuntu nyina yizera. Yavuze ko "93% y'abana  bahohoterwa bazi kandi baba bizeye ababibakorera. Kandi ivyo ndabizi kuko nari umwe muri abo." Yavuze kuri iryo hohoterwa ubwa mbere mu kiganiro co kuri Facebook Watch  ari kumwe n'umukobwa wiwe akuze n'umukobwa w'uwo bavukana. Clare Crawley azwi mu biganiro vyo kuri television nawe nyene yagaragaye mu kiganiro Red Table Talk: The Estefans, nawe avuga ingene yashurashujwe n'umupatiri. Madame Crawley yavuze ko yashurashujwe "n'umujenama'' igihe yiga kw'ishure rya Katolika. Madame Estefan yamubwiye ati: "Nashaka kuvuga iki kibazo kuko birakenewe cane ko cokwirindwa. Kandi sinashaka kwicara ngaha ataco mvuze nawe uriko uratubwira ivyagushikiye kandi mu butwari". Madame Estafan yaririmvye indirimbo zizwi cane nka Conga na Rythm is Gonna Get You, yavugiye muri ico kiganiro ko incuti itari iya hafi yafatiye ku kwizerwa nyina yari ayifitiye kugira imushurashuze. Umukobwa w'uwo bavukana, Lili, w'imyaka 54 yaciye yishura uwo muririmvyi ati: "Waindiriye  uwu mwanya igihe kirekire". Yavuze ati: "Yari incuti, ariko atari iya hafi. Yari afise ububasha kuko mama yari yanshize mw'ishure ryiwe ry'umuziki aca atangura kumubwira buno nyene ingene nari mfise impano nyinshi n'uko nari nkeneye kwitabwaho bidasanzwe, nca ntangura kwumva ingene yari amahirwe kubona anyitaho gutyo." Madame Estafan , yavukiye muri Cuba hanyuma akimukira Miami n'umuryango wiwe akiri umwana w'igitambambuga, yavuze ko iryo hohoterwa ryatanguye  "buke buke hanyuma birihuta". 'Igihe kibangamye' Uwo muririmvyi amaze gutwara agashimwe ka Grammy Award gatatu yavuze ko yabona ko ari "mu gihe "kibangamye" ariko atashobora kwishitura uwo mugabo. "Naramubwiye, 'Ibi ntibibaho, ntushubora gukora ibintu nk'ibi.' Nawe agaca avuga: 'So ari muri Vietnam, nyoko ari wenyene kandi nzoca ndamwica hamwe womubwira." "Nari inzi ko uwo mugabo ari igipfu nico gituma nibaza ko vy'ukuri yashobora kugirira nabi mama." Yavuze ko ayo maganya yatumye atakaza ibice vy'umushatsi , ariko araruha arabwira nyina ivyariko biraba. N'ubwo nyima yabibwiye igiporisi, yagiriwe inama yo kudashingisha urubanza kuko yari "kurushirizaho guhahamurwa no kuja guhagarara  imbere ya sentare kuvuga ivyamushikiye".

column2: Africa mu mafoto muri iyi ndwi: 7-13 Nzero 2022
column3: Amwe mu mafoto ya mbere meza yo muri Afrika n'ahandi muri iyi ndwi duhejeje. Amafoto yose aba afitiwe uruhusha

column2: Africa – Covid-19: Menya ibihugu bimaze gutangura gutanga incanco
column3: U Rwanda, Kenya na Nigeria vyatanguje ku munsi umwe ku wa gatanu  isekeza ryo gutanga incanco za Covid zavuye muri Covax, umugambi wa ONU wo gusabikanya neza kw'isi inanco zo gukinga indwara ya Covid-19. Kenya n'u Rwanda  bibaye ibihugu vya mbere vyo mw'ishirahamwe ry'ibihugu vya Africa y'Ubuseruko (EAC) bitanguje iryo sekeza. Mu Rwanda gukingira Covid-19 vyatanguye ku mugaragaro mu bitaro bitandukanye haciye umunsi umwe incanco za mbere zishitse mu gihugu. Abakingiwe bemeje inyandiko ko atawe bazokurikirana ku ngaruka urukingo rushobora kubagirako. U Rwanda rwaronse ku wa gatatu incanco zirenga ibihumbi 300 za AstraZeneca na Pfizer zitanzwe muri uwo mugambi wa Covax. Hari n'izindi ncanco 50.000 rwaronse zitanzwe n'Ubuhindi. Intego y'ico gihugu n'ugukingira 30% by'abanyagihugu uyu mwaka na 60% gushika mu 2022. Muri  Kenya, umutegetsi wo mu bushikiranganji bw'amagara, Patrick Amoth, ni we yabaye uwa mbere mu guterwa urwo rucanco. Ku wa gatatu niho Kenya yaronka incanco zirenga gato umuriyoni za AstraZeneca zakozwe n'ikigo co mu Buhindi, Serum Institute of India, nazo nyene zitanzwe n'umugambi Covax. Co kimwe n'u Rwanda na Kenya, Nigeria nayo yatanguje isekeza ryo gucanca ku wa gatanu. Muri ivyo bihugu uko ari bitatu, abakozi bo kwa muganga bari mu baza imbere mu kubanza kuronswa urucanco. Ghana na Côte d'Ivoire navyo nyene vyatanguye gutanga incanco muri iyi ndwi. Ikindi gihugu ca EAC kimaze kuronka incanco ni Uganda. Ku wa gatanu Uganda niho yakira incanco za  mbere zirenga ibihumbi 860 nazo zivuye muri uwo mugabmbi wa Covax. Ibindi bihugu bitatu vya EAC, Uburundi, Tanzania na Sudan y'Epfo, gahunda zavyo zo kuronka incanco no gutangura kuzitanga ntiziramenyekana. Abategetsi ba Tanzania bo basanzwe baramenyesheje ko ata mugambi w'incanco bihutira. Ibindi bihugu bimaze kuronka incanco muri uwo muganbi mpuzanakungu ni  Angola, DR Congo na Gambia. Afrika y'Epfo  yo yatanguye gutanga incanco haraheze indwi zibiri, ni naco gihugu cabaye ica mbere mu gukoresha urucanco rwa Johnson & Johnson. Izashitse ubwa mbere zari ibihumbi 80 ariko ngo izitezwe zishika umuriyoni. Urwa AstraZeneca ico gihugu cari  cabanje kuronka cararetse kurukoresha kuko rwoba rudakinga neza ubwoko bushasha bwa coronavirus bwatowe ubwa mbere aho muri Africa y'Epfo. Afrika y'Epfo, igihugu ca mbere kirimwo abanduye corona benshi kuruta ibindi muri Afrika, yizigiye kuronka incanco zikwiye 10 kw'ijana y'abanyagihugu baco biciye mu mugambi Covax, kikaba cahawe isango ryo kuzironka hagati y'ukwezi kwa kane n'ukwa gatandatu. Senegal nayo nyene imaze  hafi indwi zibiri itanguye gutanga incanco za Sinopharm yahawe n'igihugu c'Ubushinwa. Yiteze kuronka kandi izirenga umuriyoni zitanzwe mu mugambi wa Covax.

column2: Kanye West yahinduye icese izina ryiwe yiyita Ye
column3: Umuririmvyi yari azwi nka Kanye West  kuva ubu agiye kwitwa icese izina rigufi rya Ye. Umucamanza wo muri Los Angeles yemereye uwo muhinga wa rap guhindura izina, nk'uko vyemejwe n'uwujejwe kumenyesha amakuru muri Sentare nkuru ya Los Angeles. Uwo rurangiranwa w'imyaka 44 yari yabisavye mu kwezi kw'umunani avuga ko ari "ku mvo ziwe bwite". Uwo mu rapper, azwi ku ndirimbo nka Gold Digger na Stronger, yari asanzwe amaze gukoresha Ye nk'iritazirano hanyuma mu 2018 arikoresha nk'umutwe w'urukurikirane rw'indirimbo.  Iyo album imaze igihe isohotse, yanditse kuri twitter ati: "N'ubwo nzwi mu buryo bwemewe nka Kanye West. Ndi YE." Ubu rero yabitangaje icese izina yari asanganywe - Kanye Omari West - ntirikiriho. Mu gihe kuri twitter yari asanzwe yitwa Ye, kuri Instagram no ku rubuga rwiwe (website) hari hagikoreshwa izina ryiwe gushika ku wa kabiri. N'ubwo ari impfunyapfunyo ya Kanye, iryo zina yihaye rifise n'ico risigura mu bijanye n'idini kuri ico camamare. Mu 2018 yavugiye mu kiganiro yahaye umuremesha-biganiro vya radio, Big Boy, ati: "Nibaza ko Ye ariryo jambo rikoreshwa cane muri Bibiriya, kandi muri Bibiriya risigura wewe. N'ukuvuga ndi wewe, ndi twebwe, ni twebwe." "Rivuye kuri Kanye, risigura we wenyene, rija kuri Ye ryerekana uko tuba tumeze, neza, nabi, tuzazaniwe, ivyo uko turi vyose." Ye yasohoye album yiwe ya vuba Donda mu kwezi kwa munani irimwo indirimbo 27 zimara amasaha abiri. Mu nyuma yaciye avuga ko abasanzwe basohora indirimbo ziwe, Universal Music Group, basohoye atabahaye uruhusha album yiwe igira 10 yari irindiriwe umwanya munini cane. Abandi baririmvyi nka Prince, Snoop Dogg na Sean Love Comb nabo baragiye barahindura  amazina yabo, bamwe mbere kenshi. Ye yaravuzwe cane mu binyamakuru muri uyu mwaka igihe yavana n'umugore wiwe bari bamaranye imyaka indwi,  Kim Kardashian. Uwo mugabo n'uwo mugore bafitaniye abana bane, bari mu bantu babaye ivyamamare cane kw'isi. Ubukwe bwabo bwabaye bumwe mu bw'abantu b'ivyamamare kw'isi bwakurikiranywe cane muri iyi myaka irenga mirongo iheze. Iyo nkuru yakurikiye umugambi  wa Ye utagenze neza wo kwitoza mu kibanza c'umukuru w'igihugu wa Amerika mu 2020.

column2: 12 bahagaritswe bagirizwa kubomora imva ya DJ Arafat muri Côte d'Ivoire
column3: Igipolisi ca Côte d'Ivoire cahagaritse abantu 12 bagirizwa kubomora imva y'umuririmvyi azwi cane muri ico gihugu bapfundurura isandugu yari yahambwemwo. Abanya Côte d'Ivoire benshi bababajwe n'ireresi yazungurutse ku mbuga hwaniro yerekana abakunzi ba DJ Arafat,  yasandavye mu kwezi guheze mw'isanganya,  bakura isandugu yiwe mu ruhafu barayugurura kugira ngo barabe koko y'uko irimwo ikiziga ciwe. Ivyo bibaye inyuma y'urukurukuru n'ibihuha vyakwiragijwe bivuga y'uko yoba atapfuye. Ku munsi wa gatanu w'indwi iheze, abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi baritavye igiteramo cabereye ku kibuga c'umupira mu ntumbero y'ukwibuka ubuzima bwiwe. DJ Arafat, izina ryiwe ry'ukuri akaba yari Ange Didier Houon, yari yavutse ku wa 26 z'ukwa mbere 1986 asandaba ku wa 12 z'ukwezi kw'umunani guheze azize isanganya ry'ipikipiki. Yari azwi cane nk'umuririmvyi w'umucuraranzi rurangiranwa muri Côte d'Ivoire no muri Afrika yo munsi y'ubugaragwa bwa Afrika. Yafatwa nk'icirore c'umuziki wo mu mudiho witwa Coupé-décalé wabiciye bigacika mu myaka ya 2000 na 2010, umudiho wahavuye wizizirwa n'urwaruka rwa Côte d'Ivoire muri kino gihe.

column2: South Africa: Kwivuza uri umunyamahanga ntivyoroshe
column3: Umushikiranganji wa Afrika y’Epfo ajejwe amagara y’abantu yagabishije abanyagihugu ko atari bo bajejwe kwubahiriza amategeko agenga abanyamahanga. Joe Phaahla yabivuze igihe yagendera ibitaro vyo ku murwa mukuru, Pretoria, aho abantu bo mu mugwi wiyita Operation Dudula bagize  imyiyerekano bagerageza kubuza abanyamahanga kwivuza. Uwo mugwi Operation Dudula wagirizwa kwanka abanyamahanga, ariko abanywanyi bawo bavuga ko abanyamahanga batuma  amavuriro n’ibitaro vy’igihugu cabo birengerwa. Phaahla yabwiye abamenyeshamakuru ko abantu bava mu bihugu bibanyi – eka mbere no mu vya kure nk’Ubuhindi – baza kwivuza muri Afrika y’Epfo. Yavuze ko ivyo bibandanije gutyo, Afrika y’Epfo izoshika aho irengerwa. Ariko yashimangiye ko ibwirizwa nshingiro ritomoye ku burenganzira bwo kwivuza ku muntu wese aba muri Afrika y’Epfo. Abagiye mu myiyerekano babandanije gusaba ko abantu babanza kwerekana ubwenegihugu bwabo imbere y’uko binjira ibitaro n’ubwo hari ingingo ya sentare ibihagarika. Bivugwa ko abantu b’urukoba (uruhu) rwirabura aribo batotwa hanyuma bagahatirwa kwerekana ko bazi kuvuga rumwe mu ndimi zisanzwe zivugwa aho muri Afrika y’Epfo. Ku wa kane hadutse intureka hagati y‘abanywanyi ba Operation Dudula n’abadashigikiye iyo myiyerekano hanze y’ivyo bitaro. Igiporisi carashe amasasu ya caoutchouc kugira gishwiragize  iyo migwi ibiri. Reta ya Afrika y’Epfo ntisanzwe iharura abanyamahanga baja kwivuza mu mavuriro y’igihugu. Ariko hari impungenge ku ngaruka abanyamahanga b’abimukira batagira ibibaranga bashobora kugira ku nzego z’ubuvuzi muri ico gihugu. Muri Afrika y'Epfo si ubwa mbere havuzwe ikibazo co kwanka abanyamahanga. Mu kwezi kwa gatatu uyu mwaka, abanywanyi ba Alexandra Dudula Movement bagize imyirekano bavuga ko abanyamahanga bigaruriye amazu ya reta. Muri iyo myiyerekano bari bafise ivyapa bimwe bivuga ngo   "tahe iwanyu" .

column2: Rwanda-Covid: reta yatezuye ingingo ariko uticandagishije ntugiye kworoherwa
column3: Reta y'Urwanda yafashe ingingo zo gutezura amabwirizwa yo gukumira ikiza ca Covid-19, ariko igategeka ko Abanyarwanda n'abandi bose basanzwe baba muri iki gihugu bategerezwa kwicandagisha vyuzuye kugira bemererwe kuja ahahurira abantu benshi. Nk'uko biri mw'itangazo ryasohowe inyuma y'inama nshikirangaji yakoranye  ejo ku wa gatanu, ingingo zaraye zifashwe zitangura gukurikizwa kuva kuri uyu wa 05 Ntwarante (Werurwe mu Kinyarwanda), zikazosubirwamwo inyuma y'ukwezi kumwe "hashingiwe kw'isesengura ry'inzego z'Ubuzima". Amakoraniro rusangi kandi aruguruwe guhera ku wa mbere igenekerezo rya 07 z'uku ariko bikaba ngombwa kwerekana ko bipimishije Covid-19 mu gihe c'amasaha 48 (ni ukuvuga imisi ibiri) imbere yob kuyitabira. Zimwe mu zindi ngingo zafashwe ni uko kuva ku musi wa mbere igenekerezo rya 07 uku kwezi imbibe zo ku butaka zizoba zuguye, ariko bibaye ngombwa ingenzi zibanze gusuzumwa Covid-19 imbere yo kwinjira. Ingendo n'ibikorwa vyose biremerewe kubandanya amasaha 24/24, havuyemwo ibiteramo vy'umuziki, amazu y'ubutambiro, ububare, ibirori vyo kwiyakira (receptions) hamwe n'ibikino vy'akamari (betting) bidategerezwa kurenza isaha umunani z'ijoro. Kwunguruza abantu ku mamodoka rusangi, ku mapikipiki no kumakinga birarekuwe ariko bigasaba ko bene kuvyurira no kubikoresha babanza kwerekana ko bicandagishije. Amanama n'amakoraniro rusangi, amasengero, amazu y'uburiro, nay'ubunywero, ibibanza vy'inkino n'ibigo vy'imyimenyerezo ngororamubiri biremewe, ariko ibi vyose ni ngombwa ko ababijamwo bategerezwa kuba "barikingije Covid-19 mu buryo bwuzuye". Ibigo vy'inzego za reta n'ivy'abikorera utwabo navyo nene biremerewe gukoresha abakozi bavyo bose, ariko ni ngombwa ko abakozi bose bo mu gisata c'abikorera utwabo "baba barikingije Covid-19 mu buryo bwuzuye. Ubushikiranganji bw'ubuzima bushobora kwugara vy'agateganyo inyubakwa zaba iza reta canke iz'abikorera utwabo mu gihe bibonetse ibitigiri binini vy'abanduye Covid-19 , nk'uko iri tangazo rya reta ribivuga. Eka n'bikorwa vyo mu gisata c'ingenzi birabandanya ukuri kwamye ariko reta igasaba ko amabwirizwa yo kwirinda Covid-19 yubahirizwa. Urwanda ni kimwe mu bihugu biri imbere mu gukingira abanyagihugu bavyo muri Africa, kikaba ica mbere mu karere k'ibiyaga binini. Abantu benshi mu Rwanda barikingije ku gushaka kwabo mbere n'abajejwe amagara y'abantu bavuga kwikingiza bikorwa ku gushaka, ariko hari abanyagihugu bamwe mu ntara za ruguru bavuga ko abatabishaka bacandagwa ku ngufu.

column2: Coronavirus - Burundi: Leta imenyesha ko hari abandi batanu basanzemwo uwo mugera
column3: Itangazo ryasohowe n'ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu n'ukurwanya SIDA uyu munsi kuwa kabiri, rivuga ko abo bantu batanu bari mu bantu 198 bapimwe kubera bazwi ko bari bamaranye umwanya n'abandi batanu baherutse gutorwa uwo mugera. Gushika ubu, abashika 11 nibo bamaze kumenyekana ko banduye uwo mugera kuva umuntu wa mbere atowe ko yanduye muri ico gihugu. Mw'iryo tangazo, ubwo bushikiranganji bumenyeshako babandanya bakurikirana « abantu bamaranye umwanya munini n'abo barwayi bashasha batowe coronavirus mu ntumbero yo kumenya abandi boba baranduye ». Hagati aho, ubwo bushikiranganji ntibutanga umwidondoro w'abo bantu bashasha banduye Covid-19. Busaba abanyagihugu kubandanya bakurikiza impanuro zo kwikingira no gukingira abandi uwomugera. Ibiro vy'ubwo bushikiranganji bivuga ko bane muri ba barwayi batanu ba mbere batangura gufatwa n'uwomugera bapimwe ku magenekerezo ya 18 na 19 z'uku kwa kane bagasanga nta migera bagifise, bakaba bahawe uruhusha rwogusubira mu miryango yabo kuri uyu wa 21/04. Umugera wa coronavirus watanguye kumenyekana ko winjiye mu Burundi ku wa 31 z'ukwezi kwa gatatu guheze. Gushika ubu mu Burundi nta mategeko abuza abantu gusohoka arafatwa nk'uko biri mu bimwe cyo mu karere, kiretse gusa kubaha impanuro zo kugira isuku. Eka n'amashure n'abasengero arabandanya ibikorwa vyayo ukuri kwamye. Ingendo z'indege zunguruza ingenzi nizo zahagaritswe, imbibe nazo zikaba zugaye ku ruja n'uruza rusanzwe. Gushika ubu Afrika niyo irangwamwo abanduye coronavirus bake ugereranije n'iyindi migabane, ariko hakaba ubwoba ko mu minsi uyu mugabane ushobora kuba ikiririmbiro rishasha ry'uwu mugera.

column2: Ethiopia: Umusigiti wa mbere muri Africa, al-Nejashi, wasambuye n'ibibombe muri Tigray
column3: Reta ya Ethiopia yemeye ko igiye gusanura umusigiti wa kera cane wasambuwe mu kwezi guheze mu ntambara ya Tigray mu buraruko bw'ico gihugu. Umusigiti wa al-Nejashi uvugwa ko watewe ibibombe, ivyari muri wo biranyagwa, eka mbere n'imva z'abategetsi b'idini rya Isilamu bo muri kahise zirononekara. Reta ivuga ko n'urusengero rwasambuwe muri ico gihe c'intambara na rwo nyene ruzosanurwa. Abanyagihugu baba muri ako karere bazi ko umugisiti wa al-Nejashi wubatswe n'Aba-Isilamu ba mbere bimukiye muri Afrika mu gihe c'Intumwa Muhammad. Bari bahunze amabi bariko barakorerwa i Makka baca bahabwa ubuhungiro mu cahoze ari ubwami bwa Aksum. Aba-Isilamu bo muri ako karere bazi ko abasangirangendo 15 b'Intumwa Muhammad bahambwe muri izova zasambuwe . Bazi kandi  ko uwo musigiti ari wo wa mbere watanguye kwubakwa muri Afrika, n'aho hari abandi bavuga ko uwa mbere wubatswe muri Afrika uri muri Misiri. Uwo musigiti uri mu gisagara ca Wukro kiri ku birometero hafi 800 uvuye ku mugwa mukuru wa Ethiopia, Addis Ababa. Urusengero Emanueli Mweranda (Saint Emmanuel) rw'Abakristu b'idini rya Orthodoxe na rwo nyene rwarasambuwe ariko nta nsiguro zatanzwe. Mu mwaka wa 2015 hari ishirahamwe ryo muri Turukiya ryatanguje ibikorwa vyo gusanura uwo musigiti, rivuga ko ryashaka "kubungabunga uwo mutungo wo muri kahise", rigahindura ako karere kugira ngo gashobore kwirukirwa n'ingenzi. Uwu musigiti hamwe n'urusengero rwari hafi yawo vyasambuye mu bitero vya gisirikare vyamaze ukwezi kumwe  bifise intumbero yo kwomora ubutegetsi bw'umugambwe Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF) wari urongoye akarere ka Tigray. Ishirahamwe ryigenga ry'Ububirigi rikorera muri Afrika rivuga ko ku wa 18 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri uwo musigiti wa al-Nejashi "wabanje guterwa ibombe mu nyuma unyagwa urukombamazi n'abasirikare ba Ethiopia na Eritrea". Iryo shirahamwe rivuga kandi ko ibinyamakuru vya Tigray vyatangaje ko abantu batari bake bishwe bariko bagerageza gukingira uwo musigiti. Reta ntaco irashikiriza kuri ivyo vyegeranyo vy'iryo shirahamwe. Ariko, reta za Ethiopia na Eritrea zompi zirahakana ko hari abasirikare ba  Eritrea bari muri Tigray gufasha mu ntambara yo kurwanya TPLF. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na BBC igisata ca Amharic, icegera c'umukuru w'igisata kijejwe gukingira umurage wo muri kahise, Abebaw Ayalew, yavuze ko ko komite idasanzwe izoshikanwa muri ako karere kugira ngo yige ingene uwo musigiti n'urwo rusengero vyasambuwe imbere y'uko ibikorwa vyo gusanura bitangura. Ati: "Ubu burere ntibuzwi gusa ku bijanye n'ugusenga, ariko kandi ni umutungo wo muri kahise kuri Ethiopia yose". Mu ntango z'ukw'icumi na rimwe, intambara yaradutse mu karere ka Tigray igihe umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ethiopia, Abiy Ahmed, yagomora ingabo mu ntumbero yo gutuza abarwanyi ba TPLF. Hari haciye amezi atari make hari ukutumvikana hagati ya reta ya Abiy n'abategetsi ba TPLF, umugambwe wari urongoye Tigray.

column2: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Foden, Vardy, Traore, Ronaldo, Gomez, Maddison
column3: Umurwi wo mw’ihiganwa rya Arabia Saoudite Pro League umenyesha ko uzobandanya urondera umusatirizi wa Manchester United, umunya- Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo w’imyaka 37 mu gihe ikibazo ca kazoza kiwe kitotorerwa umuti inyuma y’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose. (CBS Sports) Umukinyi wo hagati, umwongereza Phil Foden w’imyaka 22, yemeye amasezerano mashasha y’igihe kirekire muri Manchester City aho azohembwa amapawundi 225.000 ku ndwi. (Mail) Manchester United na Chelsea iriko irakurikiranira hagufi umusatirizi wa Leicester City Jamie Vardy w’imyala 35 yahoze akinira umurwi nserukiragihugu w’Ubwongereza, akaba asigaje umwaka umwe gusa mu masezerano yiwe. (90min) Tottenham ishobora kuvuvudikira umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Wolves  Adama Traore w’imyaka 26, mu gihe yonanirwa no kuronka umukinyi wo hagati wa Roma umutaliyano Nicolo Zaniolo w’imyaka 23. (90min) Sampdoria yemeye igiciro c’imiriyoni 16,7 z’amapawundi ku mukinyi wo hagati wa Brentford umunya Danemark, Mikkel Damsgaard w’imyaka  22. (Sky Sports) Manchester City yatanguye ibiganiro na Anderlecht ku munya-Espagne akina inyuma ku ruhande rw’ibubamfu Sergio Gomez w’imyaka 21, mu gihe yobura Marc Cucurella w’imyaka 24 asanzwe akinira Brighton. (Times) column2: I﻿tiro: Kubera iki ari ngombwa gusinzira n'imiburiburi amasaha atanu buri joro?
column3: N﻿k'uko abashakashatsi babivuga, itiro ry'amasaha atanu n'imiburiburi rishobora kugabanya ingorane z'amagara ku bantu barengeje imyaka mirongo itanu. Bemeza ko i﻿ngorane z'amagara zishobora gutuma utaronka itiro, ariko gusinzira nabi bishobora kuba ikimenyetso  c'amagara mabi. Biamaze kwemezwa ko itiro rituma umuntu aruhuka, umubiri n'umushaha bigasubira itoto, ariko  kuba umwanya umuntu amara asinziriye ushobora kuba ari ngirakamaro ntibizwi neza. I﻿cigwa ca PLoS Medicine carakurikiranye amagara n'itiro ku bakozi ba reta b'abongereza. I﻿kibazo gikurikira ni co cabajijwe umwe wese ku bantu 800 bagizweko amatohoza: "Musinzira amasaha angahe mw'ijoro mugereranije buri indwi?" B﻿amwe muri bo bari bafise isaha ku kuboko yo gukurikirana itiro ryabo. K﻿andi baragiriwe ibipimo vy'ingwara zidakira harimwo ingwara y'igisukari (Diabete), kansere (cancer)  n'ingwara ziterwa n'umutima, mu kiringo c'imyaka 20. A﻿basinzira n'imiburiburi amasaha atanu bafise imyaka 50 bagaragara nk'abashobora kugwara ingwara ku bice 30% kurusha abaryama amasaha indwi. Ivyo vyigwa vyerekanye  kandi  ko k﻿uryama umwanya muto ufise imyaka 50 ushobora gupfa, cane cane uzize ingwara zidakira. Kenshi abahinga basaba ko umuntu asinzira amasaha indwi canke umunani, nk'uko bivugwa n'abashakashatsi bo muri kaminuza za College London na Paris  Cite. A﻿bahinga ntavyo baramenya neza, ariko birazwi ko itiro rifasha ubwonko kuguma bwibuka no kugumana akanyamuneza no gukora udakebaguzwa. I﻿tiro kandi n'akaryo ku bwonko ko kwigizayo imicafu. P﻿rof Derk-Jan Dijk arongoye ikigo Surrey Sleep yabwiye BBC News ati: "Ivyo bikorwa vyaje kwemeza ko kuryama umwanya muto atari vyiza kuri twebwe. Muri rusangi, si vyiza ku magara yacu - n'aho kuri bamwe, bisa n'uko ataco bitwaye. "﻿Ikibazo gikomeye n'ukumenya kubera iki abantu bamwe bamwe baryama umwanya muto. Biva kuki? Hari ico dushobora kubikorako? Itiro n'ikintu gishobora gutuma ubuzima buhinduka ku ruhande rumwe." I﻿gihe kirekire co kudasinzira neza gishobora kugira ingaruka mbi ku kungene umuntu abaho. A﻿baganga ubu bandikira gake abagwayi imiti yo gusinzira, ishobora kugira ingaruka zishobora gutuma umuntu aca ayimenyera. A﻿riko ingorane z'itiro zishobora gutorwa inyishu  kandi uburyo bwo gufashwa buriho.

column2: India: Ingene umwambaro wa hijab wambarwa n'abagore bo muri Islam uteje ibibazo
column3: Intara yo mu Buhindi yugaye amashure yisumbuye na kaminuza biturutse ku kibazo c'umwambaro wa hijab kiriko gikurikiranirwa hagufi n'amakungu inyuma y'aho uwuharanira agateka ka muntu Malala Yousafzai yatsindiye agashimwe kitiriwe Nobel avyinjiriyemwo. Reta y'intara ya Karnataka iri mu bumanuko bw'Ubuhindi yafashe iyi ngingo inyuma y'aho abanyeshure bihereye amabarabara mu myiyerekano ishingiye ku bakobwa bambara uwu mwambaro wo mw'idini rya Islam, imyiyerekano yandurutsemwo imigumuko. Kuri uyu wa gatatu, sentare nkuru y'iyo ntara itegekanya kwiga ku rwandiko ruvugira abagore b'aba Islam. Ibi bibaye inyuma y'aho abanyeshure batandatu b'urwaruka bagiriye imyiyerekano imbere y'ishure ryegukira reta ku kibazo co kwambara hijab, imyiyerekano yaciye ikwiragira ku yandi mashure. Abanyeshure batari bake b'aba Hindu nabo baciye biha amabarabara bambaye ibitambara vy'umutugutu  - ibara ry'ikimenyetso c'idini rya Hindu - mu kwiyamiriza abakobwa b'aba Islam bambara hijab. Ejo ku wa kabiri, umupfasoni Malala - umugore yarokotse igitero c'aba Taliban muri Pakistan afise imyaka 15 ahorwa ko yariko avugira abakobwa ko boronswa uburenganzira bwo kwiga  - yateye akamo abategetsi b'Ubuhindi ko bogira ico bakoze kugira "bahagarike inenwa abagore b'aba Islam bakorerwa". Uyu mupfasoni w'imyaka 24 yanditse kuri Twitter ati: "Kubuza abakobwa kuja kw'ishure bambaye hijab zabo ni ibintu bibabaje. Ivyo gufata nabi abagore birabandanya - kubera uko bambaye". Mu Buhindi, uru ruhagarara rwongereje ubwoba n'ishavu mu nkehwa z'aba Islam bavuga ko ibwirizwashingiro ribaha uburenganzira bwo guhitamwo ivyo bambara. Ejo ku wa kabiri, amareresi yakwiragiye cane yerekana umukobwa w'umu Islam ariko azomerwa n'ikirwi c'abagabo bakiri bato  bamuvugiriza induru, n'impari zikomeye hagati y'abanyeshure bambaye hijab n'abandi bambaye ibitambara vy'umutugutu. Mu bintu bidakunze kuba, umucamanza ariko arakurikirana uru rubanza yateye akamo abanyeshure hamwe n'abandi "kubungabunga amahoro n'umutekano". Ikibazo catanguye kuja hejuru igihe abanyeshure batandatu biga kw'ishure ryisumbuye ryo mu karere ka Udupi mu ntara ya Karnataka batangura imyiyerekano kubera bari babujijwe kuja mw'ishure bambaye hijab. Udupi ni kamwe mu turere dutatu tugize intara ya Karnataka iri ku nkengera - ari naho higanje umugambwe Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) w'umushikiranganji wa mbere Narendra Modi. Abihweza ibintu n'ibindi bafata ko iyo ntara ari icicaro gitegurirwamwo poritike y'aba Hindu ari na bo benshi mu gihugu. Umugambwe BJP kandi ni wo urongoye iyi ntara ya Karnataka. Iri shure rivuga ko ryemereye abanyeshure kwambara hijab mu gihe bari mu kigo, ariko bagasabwa gusa kuzikura iyo bari mu masomero. Ariko abari mu myiyerekano  - bose bakaba bari mu mwambaro w'ishure - bavuga ko ari ngombwa ko bemererwa gupfuka imishatsi yabo mu masomero. Umwe muri aba banyeshure Almas AH, yabwiye BBC Hindi ati: "Turafise abigisha bakeya b'abagabo. Rero ni ngombwa ko dupfuka imishatsi yacu imbere y'abagao. Ni co gituma twambara hijab". Aba banyeshure barahakana ivyo bagirizwa ko bazambara babitegetswe n'umurwi Campus Front of India - ishami ry'umurwi w'abanyeshure ugendera ku vyiyumviro bikaze vya Islam, Popular Front of India - ari na wo ubavugira. Si kenshi abagore bakunze kuboneka bambaye hijab na burka (umwitwikiro w'umubiri wose mw'idini rya Islam) mu Buhindi, aho kwerekana ibimenyetso vy'idini ku mugaragaro ari ibintu bisanzwe. Ariko umukuru w'iri shure avuga ko ari ngombwa ku mwigisha kubona abanyeshure mu maso, kandi ko umwambaro w'ishure utuma ata vangura riba mu banyeshure. Inama z'urutavanako hagati y'abanyeshure, abarongoye ishure hamwe n'abaserukira reta ntaco zashitseko. Ikibazo c'abanyeshure b'abakobwa b'aba Islam bambara hijab carakwiye mu yandi mashure makuru makeya y'i Karnataka, ariko cagiye kurenga inkombe igihe amasanamu y'aba bakobwa bari mu myiyerekano i Udupi akwirakwirijwe. Ubwo nyene, abanyeshure b'aba Hindu mu yandi mashure amwe amwe baciye batangura kuza mu masomero bambaye ibitambara vy'umutugutu  - ivyatumye abarongoye ishure bategeka ko iyi myambaro yompi itemewe mu bigo. Mu ndwi iheze, ireresi yafatiwe kw'ishure rikuru rya Kundapur mu karere ka Udupi yerekana abanyeshure bambaye hijab bankiwe kurengana bariyeri, yatumye ibintu biyangara. Imirwi y'abanyeshure b'aba Hindu  - abahungu n'abakobwa - nabo baciye batangura imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza bagenzi babo bigana bambaye hijab. Gusa nta mishamirano yari bwabe gushika ejo ku wa kabiri - hasigaye amasaha makeya ngo sentare itangure kwiga urwo rwandiko - aho baciye batangura guterana amabuye mbere baranaturira mu bisagara bimwe bimwe. Abategetsi b'abakere baciye bashira mu ngiro ingingo ya 144 (Section 144) - itegeko ryo mu gihe c'ubukoloni ryabuza abantu barenga bane gukoranira hamwe - mu ntumbero yo guhagarika iyi migumuko. Mu karere ka Shivamogga, umurwi w'abanyeshure b'abahungu bafashwe amashusho baduza ibendera ry'umutugutu kw'ishure ryabo, reta ica itangaza ko hagiye gukorwa amatohoza. Mu karere ka Mandya, ireresi yazungurutse cane yerekana umukobwa yambaye burka asugerezwa n'umurwi w'abagabo bambaye ibitambara vy'umutugutu. Mu gihe babandanya bamuzomera bavuga ngo Jai Shri Ram (twogereranya na 'Mana nziza'), nawe yarihagarayeko, ashira ijwi hejuru ati "Allah Akbar" (Imana ni yo nkuru) mu gihe abarongoye ishure bamuherekeza bamuvanaho. BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga Mu nyuma, uyo mugore azwi kw'izina rya Muskan yavuze ko umukuru w'iryo shure yamwemereye ko azomushigikira. Yabwiye ikinyamakuru The Indian Express ati: "Hari abandi bakobwa b'aba Islam na bo nyene bazomerewe nk'uku. Abarongoye ishure be n'umukuru waryo ubwiwe ntibigeze batubuza kwambara burka, none ni kubera iki nokwumviriza abo hanze?" Umutegetsi mukuru mu gipolisi yabwiye BBC Hindi ko ibi ari "ikibazo gito" kandi ko bafise ibintu mu minwe. Reta y'intara ivuga iki? Umushikiranganji w'indero w'intara ya Karnataka Nagesh ashigikiye abategetsi b'ishure bavuga ko, vyaba ibitambara n'ibisikafu vy'umutugutu, vyaba ibitambara vy'imyitwikiro, vyose ntivyemewe mu bigo vy'amashure. Avuga kandi ko aba banyeshure bagumuwe "n'inkozi z'ikibi". Afatiye ku kungene ishami rya poritike ry'umurwi Popular Front of India ririko rigerageza gushinga imizi mu karere ko ku nkengera, Nagesh yabwiye BBC Hindi ati: "Vyose bishingiye kuri poritike. Ibi vyose biriko biba kubera amatora yimirije mu mwaka uza". Sentare ivuga iki gushika ubu? Sentare yahawe inzandiko zibiri zivugira abari muri iyi myiyerekano. Rumwe ruvuga ko ibwirizwashingoro ry'Ubuhindi ritanga uburenganzira kuri buri muntu guhitamwo ivyo yambara. Urundi narwo rukarwanya itegeko riherutse gushingwa na reta y'intara ritegeka inyambaro yemewe mu mashure, ribuza ibitambara vyo mu mutwe n'ama hijab. Imbere y'uko urubanza rutangura kwigwa, igihe umushingwamanza yari asavye ko rwunguruzwa, umucamanza Krishna Dixit yaranse. Ati: "Ibishobisho vyose bigume hanze. Ibwirizwashingiro ni Bhagavad Gita (igitabo ceranda c'aba Hindu). Jewe nzokorera ku ndahiro nagize igihe ntangura akazi. Si vyiza ko abanyeshure baguma hanze". Uyu mushingwamanza aburanira abari mu myiyerekano avuga ko itegeko rya reta ribuza hijab riteye kubiri n'amategeko kandi ko rihonyanga ibwirizwashingiro - agasaba kandi ko sentare ifata ingingo mfatakibanza yokwemerera abanyeshure kubandanya biga imbere y'uko ibibazo bitangura.

column2: France: Umuriro wadutse mw’isengero nkuru rya Nantes
column3: Isengero rikuru Saint-Pierre-et-Saint-Paul  ryo mu gisagara ca Nantes mu Bufaransa ryatewe n'umuriro w'icaduka. Abajejwe kuzimya imiriro y'ivyaduka barenga 60 nibo bashitse kuri iryo sengero kugira bagerageze kuwuzimya nk'uko bivugwa n'ibiyamakuru vyaho. Nta wuzi icateye uwu muriro. Amasanamu ava aho ivyo biriko biba yerekana umuriro n'umwotsi biva muri iyo nyukabwa. Uyu muriro wadutse haciye umwaka umwe gusa uwundi muriro ukoze ibara kw'isengero rikuru Notre-Dame mu gisagara ca Paris, rimwe mu mitungo ya kahise k'u Bufaransa. Televiziyo BFM TV, itangaza ko abapolisi muri ico gisagara ca Nantes kiri mu buraruko bushira uburengero bw'u Bufaransa batumweko hafi isaha imwe n'iminota 44 mu gatondo. Umwe mu babibonye avuga ko yashobora kubona uwo mucanwa ari muhira, hafi y'iryo sengero. Avuga ko yakanguwe n'urwamo rudasanzwe rw'inkengeri. Ati: "Ku vyo mbona, ni uko umwotsi utera wongerekana". Iryo sengero sibwo bwa mbere riterwa n'umucanwa. Mu 1972, umuriro warasambuye igisenge caryo, bituma ryugarwa mu kiringo c'imyaka itatu ririko rirasubirwamwo.

column2: Coronavirus: Oxford igiye gusubira gutangura rwa rucanco rwari rwabangiriwe
column3: Igerageza rw'urucanco rwa Covid-19 ruriko rutunganywa n'uruganda rw'imiti AstraZeneca n'ishure kaminuza ya Oxford rigiye kubandanya inyuma yo kubangirwa inyuma y'aho bivugiweko hari uwo rwagizeko ingaruka mbi. Ku wa  kabiri w'iyi ndwi, AstraZeneca yavuze ko iri gerageza ryari ribaye rirahagarikwa mu gihe hariko hakorwa amatohoza kugira barabe nimba ivyabaye kuri umwe  mu bantu bariko barugeragerezwako bifitaniye isano. Ariko nijoro ku wa gatandatu, kaminuza ya Oxford yatangaje ko uru rukingo ata ngorane rufise, ko rero rushobora kubandanya. Umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara y'abantu mu Bwongereza, Matt Hancock, yakiriye n'igishika cinshi iyi nkuru imenyesha ko igeragezwa ry'uru rucanco rigiye kubandanya. "Iyi ngingo yo kubangira yerekana ko twitwararitse ubuzima bwa muntu imbere ya vyose. Tuzoshigikira abahinga bacu kugira no bashobore kuduha urucanco nyarwo vuba bishoboka". Itangazo ryasohowe n'iyi kaminuza rivuga ko vyari "vyitezwe" ko bamwe "mu bariko bageragerezwako uru rucanco bashobora kubona ingaruka mbi" mu magerageza manini cane nk'iri. Ryongerako y'uko ubu bushakashatsi bushobora kubandanya bisunze impanuro bahawe n'umurwi wigenga ujejwe kwihweza ibijanye n'imiti, hamwe n'ikigo c'igihugu kijejwe kugenzura imiti n'ibijanye n'ubuvuzi. Ntiyategerezwa gutanga amakuru yerekeye umurwayi ku mpamvu z'ibanga, ariko ikinyamakuru New York Times carashoboye kumenya ko umwe mu bitanze kugeragerezwako mu Bwongereza yagize ibibazo vy'ubushe ku ruti rw'umugongo. Ishami rya ONU rijewe amagara y'abantu kw'isi OMS/WHO rivuga ko hafi incanco 180 ari zo ziriko zirageragezwa  mu mpande zitandukanye z'isi, ariko ko gushika ubu ata na rumwe rurashobora kurangira. Hari icizere kinini ko uru rucanco rushobora kuba mu za mbere zishobora gutangura gukoreshwa, inyuma y'aho rugeragerejwe ku ncuro ya mbere n'iya kabiri bikagenda neza. Iri gerageza ryo ku ncuro ya gatatu ririko rikorerwa ku bantu bashika 30.000 muri Amerika co mu Bwongereza, Brezili na Afrika y'Epfo. Incuro ya gatatu kenshi ijamwo abantu baharurwa mu bihumbi kandi igashobora no kumara imyaka itari mike. Ku wa gatatu, umuhanuzi wa leta mu bijanye n'ubuhinga mu Bwongereza, Sir Patrick Vallance, yabwiye abanyamakuru ko ivyashitse muri rino gerageza ririko rikorwa na Oxford ari ibintu bitari bimenyerewe.

column2: Burundi: Hilaire Manirakiza afasha abafise imbuga hwaniro kuduza ama 'vyuzi'
column3: Hilaire Manirakiza yize bimugoye kubera uburyo aho yagiye arahagarika ubu akaba akora akazi katamenyerewe rwose ko gufasha abafise imbuga hwaniro na YouTube kwongereza ababakurikirana (Views). Uwo musore avuga ko yize ivyerekeye ubuhinga bwa none bw'itumatumanako mu mashure yisumbuye, avuga ko yize bimugoye bituma atabandanya kaminuza. Avuga ati:"Nahagaritse imyaka itanu ntiga kubera ubukene, ngaruka kubandanya umwaka w'icenda abo twigana bahejeje. "Narasubiriye ndamara umwaka ntiga banyirukanye kuko nari maze imyaka ibiri ntariha amahera y'ishure." YouTube, iriha abafise 'accounts' bivanye n'igitigiri c'abaraba video bashirako n'igihe bazimarako. Mu Burundi hari benshi bamaze gushinga YouTube channels bashirako videos bafise intumbero yo gukorera ayo mafaranga, vyuzi rero ni wo mukate wabo. Kuri Manirakiza n'abafise ubuhinga nk'ubwiwe n'abo guha vyuzi abo bafise. Ni ubuhinga bushasha bwo kurondera amahera n'aho hari abanebagura uko bukora, hamwe  n'ubwoko bw'amakuru ashirwa kuri izo mbuga mu kurondera vyuzi. Hilaire Manirakiza avuga ko agiheza ishure yaciye aronka akazi ko gufata amasanamu ku mboneshakure yo ku mbuga hwaniro, ariko mu nyuma amasezerano bari bafitaniye aza guhagara. Avuga ko yaciye yigira inama yo kwiga uko yobaho mu gufasha abafise imbuga hwaniro kuduza ama 'vyuzi' (views). Agira ati:"Abafise imbuga hwaniro bampemba hakurikijwe igikorwa bantumye ico ari co. "Uwo mfashije kuronka nk'ama vyuzi 1000 ku musi, ampa ibihumbi 15 vy'amarundi. "Birantunze kuko kuva bampagaritse ku kazi, inzu nguma ndayiriha uko nahora, gufungura canke kwambara ni kwa kundi." Mu kwezi kumwe amaze atanguye ico gikorwa, Manirakiza Hilaire amaze gufasha abantu barenga cumi kuduza ama vyuzi. N'akazi akorera aho ari ho hose, kuri telefone ngendanwa canke ku nyabwonko, ariko akavuga ko afise umugambi wo kwugurura ibiro vyo gukoreramwo. Ahanura urundi rwaruka kwicara rufise ikintu ruzi gukora ku buryo n'aho bokwirukana mu kazi k'ivyo wigiye, ushobora guca wikorera ivyawe.

column2: Frank Lampard: Ibintu bishobora kuba nabi muri Chelsea, niko Chris Sutton abibona
column3: Ibintu "bishobora kuba bibi" kuri Frank Lampard muri Chelsea mu gihe itoronka intsinzi vuba bwango, nk'uko bivugwa na Chris Sutton yahoze ari umusatirizi w'Ubwongereza. Mu nkino zitanu zose ikinye, Chelsea yatahiye amanota ane yonyene inyuma y'aho urukino rwa nijoro ku wa mbere rurangiriye inganya igitindo kimwe na Aston Villa, ica ija mu kibanza ca gatandatu mw'ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Bwongereza, Premier League. Sutton yabwiye Radio 5 Live yegukira BBC ati: "Muri iki gihe, bari mu bibazo kuko bariko bakina nabi". "Bacitse intege, Frank akeneye ko umurwi wiwe utsinda n'imiburiburi inkino nkeya vuba bishoboka kuko, nk'uko tubizi, ibintu bishobora kuba nabi muri Chelsea". Frank yahoze ari rurangiranwa muri uyu murwi yagenywe kuba umumenyereza wawo mu mwaka uheze, maze ashobora kuwushikana mu mirwi ine ya mbere, anawushikana mu rukino rwa nyuma rw'igikombe c'Ubwongereza, FA, catahukanywe na Arsenal. Yarahawe uburyo bwinshi cane kugira ngo ashobore kugura abakinyi, aho yakoresheje imiriyoni zirenga 270 z'amadorari y'Abanyamerika mu kugura Hakim Ziyech, Timo Werner, Kai Havertz, Ben Chilwell hamwe na Edouard Mendy. Ariko Sutton abona ko Lampard atarashobora gushikana uyu murwi ku rugero wategerezwa kuba uriko. Sutton ati: "Tuvyanka tuvyemera, uyu mwaka si mwiza cane kuri Frank. Araremerewe; yakoresheje amahera menshi. Ubu ari mu mazi abira". "Si nipfuza guca urubanza hakiri kare kuri Chelsea na Frank kuko nk'ubu ari nka hamwe botsinda inkino nka zibiri bikurikiranya, barashobora kwisanga mu kibanza ca kabiri, maze icizere co gutsinda ihiganwa kigaca gisubira kuvyuka". "Ariko sinibaza ko Chelsea ishobora gutsinda iri higanwa. Ni babanze bagere ku rugero rwo gukina uko bategerezwa gukina". N'aho Sutton abona nabi ibintu muri Chelsea, ikizwi ni uko mu nkino 14 zayo zose yakiniye ku kibuga cayo, yatsinzwe urukino rumwe rudende, itsinda 10, urwo rukino rukaba ari urwayihuje na Liverpool mu kw'icenda, rurangira itsinzwe 2-0. Hanyuma kandi tugiye muri rya higanwa rya Buraya rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo, UEFA Champions League, Chelsea ni iya mbere mu murwi E, kandi mu nkino zose imaze gukina ntirigera itsindwa. Mu gihe Chelsea yamara inkino 17 zose idatsindwa - ivyarangiye itsinzwe na Everton - Lampard yavuze yijiriwe ko ibintu bitararangira. Aho rero nijoro aho umurwi wiwe unganirije na Aston Villa kandi wari muhira, yasubiye kuvuga ko abakinyi biwe bakeneye kwongereza inguvu gusumba uko bariko barakina muri kino gihe. Ati: "Iki nico gihe kigoye muri uno mwanya. Dutegerezwa gukura amaboko mu mpuzu tukarwana urugamba, kandi ndazi ko tuzosubira tukaduga". "Mu gihe nk'iki c'umwaka, uba ukeneye amanota. Ndumva abakinyi bacitse intege kuko bakeneye gutsinda". "Mu ndwi nkeya ziheze, abantu badufata nk'umurwi ushobora gutahukana iri higanwa. Ubu ibintu ntivyoroshe. Ndizeye ko abakinyi bashasha bazogenda bamenyera uko imisi izogenda". Muri aba bakinyi baguzwe ku mahera y'umurengera mu ci riheze, Mendy na Chilwell ni bo bonyene batanguye mu kibuga. Sutton ashira amakosa yose kuri uyu yahoze ari umusatirizi wa Leipzig, Timo Werner, ariko ngo na Kai Havertz ntiyavyifashemwo neza. Werner yinjije ibitsindo 34 mu Budagi mu mwaka w'inkino uheze, ariko mu nkino 16 zose amaze gukina muri Premier League, amaze gutsinda bine gusa. Bitegekanijwe ko ku wa Mungu Chelsea yakira Manchester City, ariko nta wuzi ko ruzoba, kuko na nijoro urukino rwari guhuza City na Everton rwingurujwe kubera abakinyi batari bake bayo banduye wa mugera wa coronavirus.

column2: Qatar 2022: Messi, Ronaldo, Mbappé, Neymar n’ibindi bihangange vyiteguriye inkino za 1/4
column3: Na Shamoon Hafez BBC Sport i Doha Imirwi umunani gusa niyo isigaye mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose ca 2022 muri Qatar, yose ifise indoto imwe yo guterura igikombe ku wa 18 z’uku kwa cumi na kabiri. Inyuma y’ihiganwa ryo mu matsinda ryabereyemwo ibitangaza, ubu turi mu nzira y’igikorwa nyaco, igice ca kane gishira ica nyuma kikaba cuzuye abakinyi b’ibihangange. Itandatu mu mirwi isigaye ni iyigeze gutsindira iri higanwa canke yashitse muri finale – kandi hagati yayo imaze gutsindira iki gikombe incuro cumi. Ariko gusa ibitangaza vyovyo bishobora gushika, aho Maroc ubu irondera kuba igihugu ca mbere ca Afrika coba gishitse mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma, inyuma yo gushika mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma ku ncuro ya mbere muri kahise k’umupira w’amaguru muri ico gihugu. BBC Sport, igisata ca BBC gikurikirana inkino, irihweza bimwe mu vyitezwe, mu gihe abakinyi barondera kwerekana ubuhinga bwabo muri uru rubuga rw’umupira w’amaguru. Ku wa gatanu: Croatia v Brezili (17:00 mu masaha y’Uburundi n’Urwanda), Ubuholande v Argentina (21:00 mu masaha y’Uburundi n’Urwanda). Ku wa gatandatu: Maroc v Portugal (17:00 mu masaha y’Uburundi n’Urwanda), Ubwongereza v Ubufaransa (21:00 mu masaha y’Uburundi n’Urwanda). Kubona ibihugu nk’Ubudagi n’Ububirigi bisezererwa mu nkino z’amatsinda mu buryo butangaje  - hamwe n’ugutsindwa kwa Espagne mu gice c’umunani gishira ica nyuma – ni ibintu bizoguma mu mitima y’abantu igihe kirekire kubona ibihugu nk’ibi binanirwa no gushika muri iki gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma. Lionel Messi na Cristiano Ronaldo ni amazina agaruka cane mu binyamakuru, ariko ibihangange nka Neymar, Harry Kane, Kylian Mbappe na Luka Modric baracahagaze. Ubwongereza n’Uburafansa – igihugu gisanzwe gifise iki gikombe – bigiye guhurira mw’ihiganwa rikomeye ku ncuro ya mbere mu myaka cumi, ikaba ari n’incuro ya mbere mu gice co gukuranamwo. Iyi mirwi yaheruka guhura muri Euro 2012 mu nkino zo gukuranamwo aho yanganije 1-1, ariko ubwa nyuma iheruka guhura mu gikombe c’isi yose hakaba hari mu 1982. Bryan Robson yateye ibitsindo bibiri mu rukino Ubwongereza bwatsinze 3-1, ico gihe kizigenza w’Ubufaransa akaba yari igihangange Michel Platini. Umurwi nserukiragihugu w’Ubwongereza, uzwi nka, Three Lions, ntiwashoboye kubandanya ngo utsindire ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose uwo mwaka muri Espagne, ariko igihe conyene baherukira kugitwara – ni ukuvuga mu 1966 – umwe mu mirwi batsinze mu rugendo rwabo, kumbure ushobora kuba uwikeka, ni Ubufaransa. Si ikimenyetso kibi. Hagati aho, bafise igikorwa kitoroshe co guhura n’umusatirizi rutura Mbappé, ari na we ari imbere mu bitsindo muri rino higanwa, aho amaze kwinjiza bitanu, akaba akinana n’umukinyi mugenziwe ari na we amaze kwinjiriza Ubufaransa ibitsindo vyinshi gusumba abandi muri kahise k’umupira w’amaguru muri ico gihugu, Olivier Giroud. Kizigenza w’Ubwongereza, Kane, ati: "Ku wa gatandatu ntibizoba vyoroshe. Ubufaransa ni umurwi ukomeye, ari na wo ufise igikombe, rero turazi ko uzoba ari umugoroba utoroshe na gato. "Nibaza ko nimba ushaka gutsindira igikombe c’isi yose, utegerezwa guhura n’imirwi y’ibihangange kw’isi, Ubufaransa rero buri imbere”. Ku wa Mungu, igenekerezo rya 18 Kigarama. Urugamba rutoroshe ku kibuga ca Lusail i Doha. Ibihangange bibiri kw’isi mu gihe cabo bararwanira ubugabo, akaryo kabo ka nyuma  ko kurwanira iri teka ry’igikombe c’isi yose. Ubutigu bwageze. Messi wa Argentina hamwe na Ronaldo wa Portugal bamaze imyaka baterana inkokora umwe wese arondera kwandika amateka. Muri rino higanwa ryonyene, Messi yinjije igitsindo ku rukino rwiwe rwari rugize 1000 igihe bahura na Australia mu gice c’umunani gishira ica nyuma, mu gihe Ronaldo nawe yabaye umukinyi wa mbere yinjije ibitsindo mu mahinganwa atanu yose y’igikombe c’isi yose. Bompi baramaze gutsindira igikombe c’amahiganwa ku migabane yabo – Messi yatsindiye Copa America mu mwaka uheze, mu gihe Ronaldo yari yatsindiye ihiganwa rya Bulaya mu 2016 – ariko iki gikombe ca mbere nyamukuru kw’isi kiracari umugani kuri bo. Ku myaka 35 Messi aboneka ko ari ryo higanwa rya nyuma ry’igikombe c’isi yose kuri we, mu gihe Ronaldo wewe azoba afise imyaka 41 mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose kizokurikira. Aha ata nkeka biraboneka ko ari yo mahirwe ya nyuma kuri bo yo gushobora guterura iki gikombe c’iteka. Hagati aho, vyabaye ngombwa ko Ronaldo yemera ko yari afise uruhara ruto mu rukino rwa Portugal rw’igice c’umunani gishira ica nyuma - aho yashizwe ku rutonde rw’abagombora, mu gihe uwamutwaye ikibanza Goncalo Ramos w’imyaka 21 yakoze ibintu bidasanzwe mu gutera bitatu wenyene mu rukino rwabo n’Ubuswisi. Nko mu gihe vyoshika ibi bihangange bigahurira muri finale, ivy’ari vyo vyose n’abatagira aho begamire bogira amero. None twizere ko impari kuri ‘GOAT’ (impfunyapfunyo ya Greatest Of All Time, twogereranya na ‘Igihangange c’ibihe vyose) zishobora kuba zigiye guhera? Imbere y’aho, birashoboka ko turorera urukino ruryoheye ijisho rwo mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma. Mu gihe yompi yorengana Croatia n’Ubuholande uko ikurikirana, urugamba rw’agakura muri Amerika y’Ubumanuko ni rwo rwokurikira hagati ya Brezili na Argentina ku kibuga ca Lusail. Brezili, igihugu kimaze gutahukana iri higanwa incuro zitanu kandi kikaba ari co gihabwa amahirwe menshi, yarerekanye ubuhinga bwayo mu kwirahira bikomeye Korea y’Epfo, mu gihe Argentina yari ikeneye ubuhinga bwa kizigenza wayo Messi kugira ngo ishire Australia ku ruhande. Iyi mirwi imaze guhura incuro zine mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose, ariko ubwa nyuma iheruka guhura hakaba hari mu 1990, igihe igitsindo ca Claudio Caniggia mu minota ya nyuma y’urukino cahaye akaryo Argentina ko kwinjira mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma. Amahirwe yo kuvana iki gikombe i Bulaya ari cane cane mu minwe y’ino mirwi ibiri, Brezili ikaba ari co gihugu ca nyuma kitari ico ku mugabane wa Bulaya giheruka gutsindira iki gikombe, hari mu 2002. Igihangange Neymar yarakize imvune yo mw’ivi yari yanduye mu rukino rwabo rwa mbere, yongera araninjiza igitsindo mu gice c’umunani gishira ica nyuma na Korea y’Epfo, ubu akaba akeneye igitsindo kimwe gusa kugira ngo anganye n’igihangange Pele ku bitsindo 77 mu murwi nserukiragihugu wa Brezili, uzwi nka Selecao. Ariko Croatia ya Luka Modric hamwe n’Ubuholande bwa Virgil van Dijk navyo bifise ijambo rikomeye mu kwemeza nimba iki kirori kizoshoboka canke kitazoshoboka. Tugiye ku Buholande, uyu murwi wa Louis van Gaal hamwe na Argentina ni abakeba bamenyeranye cane muri rino higanwa, biteze guhura ku ncuro ya gatandatu barwanira itike yo mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma. Ni isubiramwo rya finale yo mu 1978, aho uyu murwi wo muri Amerika y’Ubumanuko ari wo watahukanye intsinzi, mu gihe urukino rwa nyuma iyi mirwi yaheruka guhuriramwo ari urwabaye mu myaka umunani iheze, Argentina ikaba ari yo yatsinze ku ma penalties. Ariko kimwe mu bihe ntibagiranwa - atari gusa hagati y’ibi bihugu ariko muri kahise k’igikombe c’isi yose – ni icabaye mu 1998 igihe Dennis Bergkamp yinjiza igitsindo ciza cane cahaye akaryo Ubuholande kubandanya mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma. "Dennis Bergkamp, Dennis Bergkamp, Dennis Bergkamp," niko umunyamakuru w’Ubuholande yiha karuru avuga igihe uyu mukinyi yakinira Arsenal yakubita icenga n’ubuhinga bwinshi ku mupira yari ahawe na Frank de Boer, aca aroba Roberto Ayala maze yinjiza igitsindo ciza cane. None Cody Gakpo arashobora gukora nk’ibi muri kino gihe...? Penalty ya Achraf Hakimi muri wa mwanya w’ama penalties ari nayo yahaye intsinzi Maroc kuri Espagne yatewe neza cane, umupira uca neza neza hagati mw’igori aho umunyegori yari avuye, uva mw’igitsindo casarishije abarorerezi mu kibuga ca Education City. Itsinzi yabo yatumye bashika mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yashimagijwe n’ubwami bw’ico gihugu, aho umumenyereza Walid Regragui yahamagawe kuri terefone n’umwami  wa Maroc Mohammed VI urukino ruheze. Umurwi upanze neza kandi ugoye gutsinda, Maroc ni urutare,  ntirigera itsindwa na rimwe muri rino higanwa ry’iki gikombe c’isi yose, ikaba imaze kwinjizwa igitsindo kimwe gusa mu nkino zabo indwi ziheruka. Maroc kibaye igihugu ca kane c’umugabane wa Afrika gishitse mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma, kikaba kiriko kirondera itike yo gushika mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma. Hagati aho, ni ikindi gipimo gikomeye kiyirindiriye imbere y’uyu murwi w’i Bulaya – na rirya Portugal nayo iriko irondera kwandikisha amateka mu kurondera gushika mu gice ca nyuma ku ncuro ya mbere.

column2: MISS KAYANZA: Neilla Mutoniwimana niwe yatsinze, imbonekarimwe ku Batwa mu Burundi
column3: "Ni iteka rinini kuri jewe nk'umukobwa w'umutwakazi kubona narashoboye gutsinda ihiganwa rya Miss Kayanza, ibitari bimenyerewe mu gihugu ko ubwoko bw'abatwa buja mu mahiganwa nk'ayo". Uyo ni Neilla Mutoniwimana, umwigeme w'umutwakazi yatsindiye ihiganwa rya Miss Kayanza, aho avuga ko yiteguriye no kuja mu yandi mahiganwa ku rwego rw'igihugu. Miss Kayanza ni ihiganwa rihuza abigeme bo mu ntara ya Kayanza ryatanguye kuva mu mwaka wa 2012 rikaba ritegurwa n'umurwi Umuco w'aba SCOUT. Yatowe mu bandi umunani bari muri iryo higanwa rigize icenda ryabaye ku wa 01 /01/2020, inyuma y'amezi atatu yose bari bamaze bitegura. Kubwo ishirahamwe ryateguye uyo mwigeme, intsinzi ya Neilla Mutoniwimana, ni amateka adasanzwe muri kahise k' u Burundi. Neilla Mutoniwimana ni umutwakazi yiga mu mwaka wa 12 kw'ishure ryisumbuye rya Muhanga avuka ku mutumba wa Gashibuka, ya zone na komine Muhanga  mu ntara ya Kayanza. Avugana na BBC, umwigeme Mutoniwimana ahanura abandi bigeme b'abatwakazi kureka kwikumira bakaja hamwe n'abandi, maze bashobore kugira uruhara mu kintu ico ari co cose giteguwe mu Burundi. Kubw'iwe, iyo wikumiriye, n'abandi baragukumira. Ati: "Narerekanye neza ko na twebwe dushoboye mu bintu vyose. Jewe sinikumira, iyaba narikumiriye sinari gushobora kuja muri iri higanwa. Nagize umwete kugira ngo nshobore kuvyifatamwo neza". Ku bateguye ihiganwa, uyo mwigeme yerekanye ubukerebutsi budasanzwe. Gilbert Biziyaremye arongoye  umuhari wa SCOUT mu ntara ya Kayanza ariwo wateguye iryo higanwa avuga ko vyabanezereje kuko bwari ubwa mbere babonye umwigeme w'umutwakazi asumbije abahutukazi n'abatutsikazi bari basanzwe batsindira iryo higanwa. Ati: "Mu gihe turiko turabategura twabona umengo ntavyo azoshobora, vyabonetse ko yari yibitse, maze ibintu bikomeye cane aca avyerekanira imbere y'abarorerezi". "Nivyo ko hahora hatsinda abahutukazi n'abatutsikazi gusa, ariko abibaza ko twoba twashize imbere ivyo ubwoko kugira ngo nabo baserukirwe sivyo na gato, yarabasumbije". Neilla Mutoniwimana yateguwe n'ishirahamwe Fondation FEMIDEJABAT risanzwe ririko rirategura ihiganwa MISS INAKARANGA  rizohuza abigeme b'abatwakazi mu gihugu cose. Nk'uko bivugwa na Isaac Bakanibona, umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa wa FEMIDEJABAT akaba kandi ariwe ahagarariye MISS INAKARANGA, iryo higanwa rifise intumbero yo guhimiriza abigeme b'abatwa no kubategura kugira ngo bazoshobore kwitabira ihiganwa rya MISS BURUNDI. Bwana Bakanibona  yabwiye BBC ko ari ibintu bihimbaye kubona umwana bateguye ashoboye guhiganwa n'abandi mbere akanabatsinda. Ati: " Twaramuhimirije twongera turamurungika kuja guhiganwa n'abandi bigeme bo mu Kayanza, arashikiriza imigambi y'imbonekarimwe yatangaje abari aho bose ku buryo yabonetse ko ari intwari n'incabwenge idasanzwe". Ahimiriza Abarundi n'amakungu ko boshigikira abigeme b'abatwakazi, eka n'abandi bigeme bose baboneka ko basigaye inyuma mu mateka kugira ngo nabo bashobore gufashwa, maze batere intambwe bashike ku rugero abandi bariko. Ati: "Kuko birerekana neza ko ata muntu n'umwe, iyo ashigikiye canke afashwe mu mugongo, atoshobora ikintu ico ari co cose". Mutoniwimana yarushije abariko bahiganwa nawe mu migambi yashikirije yo guteza imbere abigeme b'abatwakazi hamwe n'abandi bigeme muri rusangi, mu kubahimiriza kuja hamwe n'abandi, bakaja mu mashure bakirinda imbanyi z'ishushu zituma abigeme bamwe batabandanya amashure. Bwana Bakanibona avuga ko muri rusangi abigeme b'abatwa bakwije ibisabwa vyose muri ayo mahiganwa ahuza abigeme, ariko ko igikenewe ari ukubafata mu mugongo. Ati: "Twebwe nta bwoba dufise, no mw'ihiganwa rya MISS BURUNDI, ni ryategurwa neza, turizeye neza ko abo bana bacu tubandanya dutegura bazovyifatamwo neza bagatahana ikibanza ciza". Mu Burundi, Abarundi bo mu bwoko bw'Abatwa ni inkehwa zari zaribagiwe mu buzima bw'igihugu kuva imyaka itari mike, bamye bikumira, aho wasanga no mu kugabangana ubutegetsi bataharurwamwo. Hagati aho, amasezerano y'amahoro yateweko igikumu mu mwaka wa 2000 agatuma intambara yari yari yadutse hagati y'Abahutu n'Abatutsi mu 1993 igaharara, yarategekanijwe ibibanza vy'Abatwa mu bisata bitandukanye bigize ubuzima bw'igihugu. Haranatangujwe mbere n'amashirahamwe afise intumbero yo guhimiriza Abatwa kugira ngo bikangure baje hamwe n'abandi. Hagati aho, n'aho bamwe bariko barajijuka, haracibonekeza abatari bake bikumira, bakabona ko bobo atari nk'abandi barundi bagenzi babo b'Abahutu n'Abatutsi.

column2: Urucanco Ervebo rwa Ebola rwemewe muri RD Congo, mu Burundi, muri Ghana no muri Zambia
column3: Ibihugu bine vya Afrika- Repubulika y'intwaro rusangi ya Congo, u Burundi, Ghana na Zambia - vyemeje urucanco rwa Ebola rukaba rushobora gutangura gutangwa. Ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu, OMS/WHO rimenyesha ko iyo ari intambwe ikomeye mu rugamba wo kurwanya ico kiza. Ivyigwa vy'intangamarara vyerekana ko urwo rucanco, Ervebo rwakozwe n'ikompanyi Merck rushobora gukinga gushika ku rugero rwa 97,5%. Ivyo vyigwa vyerekana kandi ko urwo rucanco ruhawe abamaze kwandura rushobora kubongerereza amahirwe yo kubandanya babaho. Igihugu ca RD Congo  gihanzwe n'ico kiza kuva mu kwezi kw'umunani 2018 kikaba kimaze guhitana abantu bagera ku 2.249. Umukuru w'ishirahamwe OMS, Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, ati: "Ni intambwe nshasha  kubona urwo rucanco rwemewe muri ivyo bihugu mu rugamba rwo kurwanya ico kiza ruburakigongwe". "Afrika yarashize inguvu hamwe kugira ngo ikomeze intambwe imaze gushikwako bigoranye mu gukingira abanyagihugu bayo umugera wa Ebola". Nivyo ko igitigiri c'abandura Ebola muri RD Congo cagabanutse bimwe bishimishije, ariko umutekano muke n'amayira ameze nabi mu burere bubangamiwe bibandanya kuba ibibazo ngorabahizi. Ivyo ni ibishikirizwa na muganga Michel Yao ajejwe ibikorwa vy'ubutabazi ku rwego rwa Afrika mw'ishirahamwe OMS, igihe yavugana na BBC ejo ku wa Mungu. Avuga ko muri ino minsi hibonekeje abantu bake cane banduye uwo mugera. Ati: "Twari dufise uburere bw'ubuvuzi bbubangamiwe bushika 29. Ubu dufise uburere bw'ubuvuzi bubiri gusa bubangamiwe, kamwe muri bwo kamaze iminsi ine ata wanduye, akandi nako haheze iminsi 17". Avuga kandi ko igitigiri c'abandura ku ndwi "cagabanutse bimwe biboneka", akavuga ko ubu ku ndwi hashobora kuboneka hagati ya bane na batanu banduye uwo mugera. Muri kino gihe, hari abashika 1800 bakurikiranirwa hafi, bitandukanye no mu kwa kane kw'umwaka uheze aho babarirwa mu 20.000, ico kibaba ari ikimenyetso ko habaye intambwe, nk'uko bivugwa na bamwe mu bahinga mu vyo amagara y'abantu muri Congo. Abajijwe ko kutoba ari ukwihuta mu kuvuga ko habaye iterambere mu kurwanya ico kiza, siko abibona, akavuga ko ibiharuro vyonyene arivyo bivyerekana.

column2: Kenya igiye kuronka miriyoni zafatiwe muri Jersey zifashe kugwanya Covid
column3: Miriyoni z'ama dorari z'amafaranga y'igihugu bivugwa ko zibwe n'abanya-Kenya babiri ba mbere batunze cane zigiye kugarukanwa mu gihugu zigurwemwo ibikoresho  vyo kurokora ubuzima mu kugwanya  indwara ya Covid-19 hisunzwe  amasezerano y'imbonekarimwe yashitsweko i Londres. Ayo mazezerano na Jersey, izinga ryigenga mu ntwaro mu  kiyaga ca Manche (Ensglish Channel) yakiriwe nk'"intsinzi ku banya-Kenya" n'uwuhagarariye ico gihugu mu Bwongereza, Manoah Esipisu. Urufatangane rwahavuye ruvamwo  ayo masezerano rwatanguriye ku rubanza rwo kwahukana. Mu 2006, Samuel Gichuru, umuntuzi afise kompanyi y'umuyagankuba muri Kenya,  n'umugore wiwe Salome Njeri barahukanye. Hageze kugabura ivyo batunze, Madame Njeri yabonye ko ataronse ibikwiye. Yaciye avuga ko bimwe  mu vyo umugabo wiwe atunze vyanyegejwe hanyuma, sentare, ica ikora urutonde rw'ama konte yose umugore yavuze ko ari  aya Gichuru muri Jersey, izinga risanzwe rizwi gushingwamwo amakompanyi ba nyeneyo batamenyekana kandi rigatangisha amakori ari hasi cane. Ivyo vyatumye haba amatohoza yamaze imyaka icenda akorwa n'abategetsi ba Jersey. Muri ayo matohoza, mu 2011, bagirije Gichuru n'uwahoze ari umushikiranganji ajejwe ikigega ca reta kujana muri kompanyi yari yanditswe muri Jersey amafaranga ya "commissions" bahabwa n'amakompanyi mpuzamakungu. Abategetsi ba Jersey baciye basohora imitahe yo gufatisha abo bagabo bompi,  kuva ico gihe bakaba bakirinridiye ko barungikwa bava aho bari muri Kenya. Ivyaha vy'ubutunzi bagirijwe vyarimwo amasezerano na kompamyi yo muri Finlande yo kwubaka uruganda rw'umuyagankuba hafi ya Mombasa, igisagara kiza ubwa kabiri mu bunini muri Kenya, aho ngo bahawe miriyoni na miriyoni z'amafaranga y'abongereza ya 'commissions'  bayahawe n'amashirahawe yo kwubakisha yo mu Bwongereza, Norvege, Ubudagi na kompanyi y'igihangange mu gutumatumanako yo muri Amerika. N'ubwo BBC yagerageje kenshi kubarondera, abo bagabo bompi n'abashingwamanza babo ntibashimye kugira ico bavuze kuri ivyo bagirizwa. Ariko iyo kompamnyi yanditswe muri Jersey Windward Trading Limited yahavuye yemera ivyaha bine vyo kugira amafaranga y'inkomoko mbi muri sentare yo muri Jersey.
