Sentare yaciye ishinga ingingo, ko iyo kompanyi, nyeneyo asanzwe ari Gichuru, itegerezwa kwakwa amafaranga arenga miriyoni 4,9 z'ama dorari mu vyo itunze kubera  amafaranga y'inkomoko mbi. Menshi muri ayo mafaranga niyo bivugwa ko yavuye mu biturire muri Kenya hagati ya 1999 na 2002 ubu ariyo agiye kugarukanwa mu gihugu. Ivyo vyashobotse kubera amasezerano yo mu 2018  yashizweko umukono na ministre wa mbere w'Ubwongereza w'ico gihe Theresa May, umukuru wa Kenya Uhuru Kenyatta hamwe na reta za Jersey n'Ubuswise.  Ayo masezerano yavuga ko amatungo yibwe ashobora gusubizwa muri Kenya ariko agakoreshwa  gusa ku bijanye n'imigambi y'iterambere. Ayo masezerano azwi nka Return of Assets from Corruption and Crime to Kenya (Fracck) aha abategetsi ba Jersey uburenganizra bwo kurekura amafaranga bazi ko yibwe hanyuma akarungikwa imbere y'uko abagirizwa kwiba bashikanwa imbere ya sentare. Ikoreshwa neza ry'ayo mafaranga kizoba ari igikorwa ca Crown Agents, ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ridaharanira inyungu ryitaho iterambere. Umukuru waryo Fergus Drake, yabwiye BBC  ko avugana n'abategetsi bajejwe amagara y'abantu muri Kenya kugira bavugane ibikenewe mu kurwanya Covid -19. Drake yiteze gushikiriza ibikoresho vya nkenerwa cane ku bitaro birenga 10 mu mezi ari imbere. Yavuze ko gupima neza bizofasha abanya-Kenya kurwanya ico kiza neza no kumenya ibice bikeneye incanco kurusha ibindi. Gushika ubu  muri Kenya abantu bamaze kuronka incanco ntibarenga 20% mu gihugu cose. Hasigaye amezi make ngo prezida Uhuru ave ku butegetsi, agishika ku butegetsi akaba yari yiyemeje kurwanya ibiturire. Muri iyo ntumbero abategetsi n'abanyaporotike bariko barasabwa kuvuga amatungo  bafise, hagakorwa isuzumwa ry'uko ata biturire yaciyemwo. Drake yavuze ko ayo mafaranga agiye gusohora -miriyoni 3.5 z'ama dorari - atazokora ''ibintu vyinshi cane'' mu gikorwa c'igihugu co kurwanya Covid-19 , ariko yibaza ko bene iyo mfashanyo igenewe ahantu runaka izogira ingaruka zishika kure mu kurwanya uwo mugera. Abaharanira uburenganzira bavuga ko akarorero ka Fracck ari inzira nshasha yo kwerekana ko amafaranga abantu baba baronse mu buryo butari bwiza ashobora gusubizwa. Ubwongereza busanzwe bwaremeje kandi ayandi masezerano -amasezerano ya ONU yo kurwanya ibiturire -gutyo bukaba butegerezwa gusubiza amafaranga yaciye mu vyaha aho ibikenewe biba vyakwiye kugira asubizwe. Ariko ku bwa Steve Goodrich, umukuru w'ubushakashatsi n'amatohoza muri Transparency International (TI) UK, amafaranga asubijwe ava mu Bwongereza akenshi ntaja mu bikorwa vy'iterambere ata handi aciye. Atanga akarorero k'amafaranga yigeze gusubizwa yari ayo inkomoko mbi y'uwahoze ari umukuru w'intara ya Delta muri Nigeria  James Ibori mu 2012 agahabwa reta ya Nigeria. Afise amakenga ko amafaranga asubijwe ashobora guherera mu biturire. Goodrich  avuga ko ivyo vya Jersey ari intambwe mu nzira nziza. Ariko yongerako ko kugirango hajeko "igitururuza cizewe" ku bantu bibaza kuja kunyegeza amafaranga bivye mu Bwongereza, reta "vy'ukuri ikeneye gukaza umukono wayo" ku gusubira ku matungo (aba yibwe). Nk'akarorero, avuga ko Ubwongereza bukwiye gutangura gusuzuma ivyo yibaza ko ari "ibibanza/amazu biciye amafaranga arenga miliyaridi 5 z'ama pound (£ canke pound:amafaranga y'abongereza)  vyaguzwe mu Bwongereza n'amafaranga yo kwinuba. Aha rero hari n'ukuraba neza ikibazo c'ibiturire muri Kenya. Kenya kiza ubugira 128 ku rutonde rwa Transparency International rw'igipimo c'ibiturire kw'isi, abategetsi n'abagwizatunga bakaba  bavugwa cane mu biturire. Hasigaye amezi make ngo prezida Uhuru ave ku butegetsi, agishika ku butegetsi akaba yari yiyemeje kurwanya ibiturire. Muri iyo ntumbero abategetsi n'abanyaporotike bariko barasabwa kuvuga amatungo  bafise, hagakorwa isuzumwa ry'uko ata biturire yaciyemwo. Uwuhagarariye Kenya mu Bwongereza, Esipisu, yigeze kuba umuvugizi w'umukuru w'igihugu, yabwiye BBC ko amasezerano ya Fracck ari "intererano ikomeye cane" ku mugambi w'umukuru w'igihugu kuko atanga ubutumwa ko "abantu bivye amafaranga " batazotekanirwa ngo n'uko gusa banyegeje amafaranga yabo mu mahanga". Yongerako ati "ayo ni amafaranga yibwe abanya-Kenya, yasahuwe abanya-Kenya, kubera ayo masezerano ayo mafaranga agiye kugaruka gufasha abanya-Kenya ari nabo ubwa mbere na mbere yari asanzwe agenewe. Rero iyo ni intsinzi ku banya-Kenya". Ubu amafaranga ari mu nzira ava muri Jersey aja muri Kenya, ubu abantu bazoca bahindukirira kuraba ko abo bagabo bagirizwa barungikwa muri Jersey. Mu kwezi kwa kabiri,  ibikeneye gukorwa kugira barungikwe vyaratanguye gukorwa muri sentare ya Nairobi City  Magistrates Court, inyuma y'imyaka 10 y'impari zo kumenya urwego rwoja imbere mu kubikora. Ubu igisata c'ubushikirizamanza nico kiriko kirabikora kandi icegera c'umuyobozi waco  Victor Mule yavuze ko intahe yitezwe mu kwezi kwa gatanu. Yavuze ko yizeye ko bitazosubira gufata iyindi myaka 10. Igihe BBC yabarondera, abashingwamanza ba Gichuru bahisemwo kutagira ico bavuze ku biriko birakorwa. Umukenguzamateka Ian Gorst, umushikiranganji wa Jersey ajejwe imigenderanire,  aremera ko ubwa mbere hoho hari ibitagenze neza  kugira ayo mafaranga bivugwa ko yibwe abe yarashitse muri iryo zinga. Agabisha abandi bashobora gukora gutyo muri kazoza ko amategeko y'iryo zinga ubu yakajijwe cane ariko kandi ko amafaranga yose yashitseyo aciye mu nzira zitari zo azoronderwa iyo ari kandi ko "tuzoyasubiza ku banyagihugu bo beneyo".

column2: Iran: Igisirikare ca Amerika cemeza ko cishe umukuru w’ingabo zidasanzwe za Quds, Qasem Soleimani
column3: Jenerali Qasem Soleimani, umukuru w'ingabo zidasanzwe, Quds, zo mu gisata c'igisirikare kijejwe gukingira ubutegetsi bwa ki isilamu (Iranian Revolutionary Guards'), yishwe n'ingabo za Amerika muri Irak. Ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bwa Amerika, Pentagon, bwemeza ko yishwe "kw'itegeko ry'umukuru w'igihugu". Igihe yahitanwa n'ico gitero c'indege za Amerika, Jenerali Soleimani yari mu modoka  imureruye imukura ku kibuga c'ingege  ca Baghdad, ari kumwe n'umurwi w'abarwanyi ushigikiwe na Irani. Indongozi  nkuru ya Irani, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, avuga ko "igihugu kizokwihora bikomeye inkozi z'ikibi" zakoze ico gitero. Yatangaje kandi ikigandaro c'iminsi itatu. Jen. Soleimani yari umuntu akomeye mu butegetsi bwa Irani. Ingabo ziwe, Quds, zakukira Ayatollah Ali Khamenei ubwiwe kandi yafatwa nk'incungu y'igihugu. Hagati aho, Amerika yafata ingabo za Quds n'umukuru wazo nk'umurwi w'iterabwoba, kandi ikabagiriza ko aribo bishe abanyamerika baharurwa mu majana. Aciye ku rubuga rwa Twitter, umukuru w'igihugu ca Amerika Donald Trump yakwiragije ibendera rya Amerika iyo nkuru imaze kumenyekana. Inyuma gato y'ico gitero, ibiciro vy'igitoro vyaciye biduga gushika ku bice birenga 4%. Ibinyamakuru vya Amerika bivuga ko Jen. Soleimani n'abategetsi b'umurwi w'abarwanyi ushigikiwe na Irani bariko bava ku kibuga c'indege ca Baghdad bari mu modoka zibiri igihe baterwa n'indege hafi y'ahashikira imizigo. Jen. Soleimani avugwa ko yoba yari avuye muri Libani canke Syria. Ibisasu vya misire bitari bike vyateye abari muri urwo rugendo, bikavugwa ko abantu bashika batanu ari bo baguye muri ico gitero. Igisirikare kijejwe gukingira ubutegetsi bwa ki isilamu muri Irani kimenyesha ko umukuru w'umuhari w'abarwanyi ba Irak, Abu Mahdi al-Muhandis, ari mu bahitanywe n'ico gitero. Itangazo rya Pentagon rivuga riti: "Kw'itegeko ry'umukuru w'igihugu, igisirikare ca Amerika cakoze igitero gikomeye co kwivuna kugira ngo gikingire abanyamerika bakorera mu mahanga mu kwica Qasem Soleimani". Ryongerako riti: "Iki gitero cari gifise intumbero yo gusambura integuro z'ibitero vyategurwa na Irani. Amerika izobandanya ifata ingingo zikenewe kugira ngo ikingire abanyagihugu bacu n'inyungu zacu aho zizoba ziri hose kw'isi". Ico gitero ca drone cabaye  inyuma y'aho abari mu myiyerekano batereye ibiro vy'ubuserukizi bwa Amerika ku mugwa mukuru Baghdad, aho batanye mu mitwe n'ingabo za Amerika zicungereye ivyo biro. Pentagon ivuga ko Jen. Soleimani yatanze uruhusha rw'ivyo bitero kuri ivyo biro vy'ubuserukizi. Ubutegetsi bwa Perezida Trump bwagiriza ingabo za Quds  ko ari "umurwi nyamukuru wa Irani ukwiragiza ukanafasha" imirwi y'iterabwoba irwanya Amerika mu karere k'Uburasirazuba bwo hagati, mu kuyiha ibirwanisho, amahera, imyimenyerezo n'ibindi. Muri iyo mirwi harimwo Hezbollah yo muri Libani, hamwe na Islamic Jihad yo muri Palestina, Umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire wa Irani, Javad Zarif, avuga ko ivyabaye ari "igikorwa c'iterabeoba mpuzamakungu", akavuga ko Amerika "ariyo izobazwa ibizokurikira ico gitero c'ubuhimbiri". Mohsen Rezaei yahoze arongoye igisata  kijejwe gukingira ubutegetsi bwa ki isilamu, avuga ko Irani "izokwihora Amerika bikomeye". Uumvugizi wa leta ya Irani amenyesha ko igisata  c'igihugu kijejwe umutekano gitegura kubonana mu nama yo "kwihwereza hamwe ivy'ico gitero". Kuva mu 1998, Jenerali Majoro Qasem Soleimani yari arongoye ingabo za Quds, ingabo zidasanzwe z'igisata  kijejwe gukingira ubutegetsi bwa ki isilamu, zisanzwe zikora ibitero vyo mu kinyegero hanze ya Irani. Zagize uruhara rudasanzwe mu ntambara ya Syria, aho zafashe mu mugongo ingabo za Perezida Bashar al-Assad w'ico gihugu, zongera zifasha mu buryo bwa gisirikare abarwanyi ibihumbi n'ibihumbi b'aba Isilamu bari kumwe muri iyo ntambara. Eka no muri Irak uwo murwi usanzwe ufasha abarwanyi b'aba Shia bafashije kurwanya umurwi Etat Islamique. Izo ntambara nizo zatumye Jen. Soleimani aba rurangiranwa muri Irani.

column2: Uwagandaguye John Lennon yasavye imbabazi ku 'caha c’agahomerabunwa' yakoze haciye imyaka 40
column3: Mark Chapman, umugabo yishe John Lennon, yasavye imbabazi umupfakazi, Yoko Ono w'imyaka 40, yasizwe n'uyu yahoze ari muririmvyi rurangiranwa, inyuma y'imyaka 40 apfuye. Uyu mucuraranzi w'umwongereza John Lennon azwi ko yashinze umurwi w'abanyamuziki Beatles wabikoze bigacika kuva utangujwe mu ntango za 1960. Chapman yarashe Lennon amasasu ane amusanze hanze y'inzu yabamwo mu karere ka Manhattan mu gisagara ca New York, amurasira mu maso y'umugore wiwe Ono, hari mu 1980. Yarankiwe kurekurwa vy'agateganyo igihe yari arengukishijwe ku ncuro ya cumi na rimwe mu kwezi guheze. Igihe yariko arumvirizwa, Chapman yavuze ko yishe uyu munyamuziki rurangiranwa wo mu bwoko bwa rock arondera gusa icubahiro, akavuga ko mu bisanzwe yari akwiye igihano c'urupfu. Yongera ko y'uko igihe cose aguma yicuza iki "caha c'agahomerabunwa", akemera ko ashobora kumara ubuzima bwiwe mw'ibohero. Ari imbere y'abacamanza i New York, Chapman yavuze ati: "N'ukuri nongeye gusaba imbabazi kuri iki caha". "Nta citwazo na kimwe mfise. Ibi vyari ivyo kwihesha agaciro. Nibaza ko iki ari icaha kitagira urugero gishobora gukorerwa umuntu w'intungane". "Yari rurangiranwa. Ntabwo namwishe kubera imico yiwe canke uko yari ameze. Yari umugabo w'intungane afise umuryango. Yari umuntu w'akarorero. Yari umuntu yavuga ibintu turiko turavuga ubu kandi ni ikintu gikomeye". "Nkoresheje amajambo yanyu, naramwishe, kubera yari umuntu azwi cane, cane, cane rwose, nico cabintumye, kandi nabikoze nshaka cane, cane, cane rwose icubahiro, ukwikunda birengeje". "Ndashaka kongerako iki kintu, kandi ndagishimangire cane. Narakoze icaha c'ukwikunda. Ndababajwe n'umubabaro nateye umugore wiwe Ono. Ni ikintu kitarigera kimva mu mutwe". Abandanya avuga ko mu bisanzwe yari akwiye igihano c'urupfu - igihano cagiye gukurwaho mu ntara ya New York mu 2007 - n'aho ata wari bwigere anyongwa kuva mu 1963. Ati: "Iyo uzi neza ko uriko utegura umugambi wo kwica umuntu ukamenya ko ari bibi kandi ukabikora wewe nyene ubwawe, kubwanje ico ni igihano c'urupfu". Abajijwe nimba ubutungane bwakoze neza, Champan yishuye ati: "Eka ntaco maze, ntaco". "Mu gihe amategeko hamwe na mwebwe mwofata ingingo yo kungumiza hano mu minsi nsigaje kubaho, si noja ng'aho ngo ndiko ndaharira n'ukuri". Mu 2015, uyu munyatugenegene Yoko Ono akomoka mu Buyapani, akaba yagumye arwanya Chapman igihe cose yarondera ko yorekurwa vy'agateganyo, yabwiye ikinyamakuru Daily Beast co ku ngurukanabumenyi ko yumva ubwoba bwinshi cane mu gihe Chapman yorekurwa. Ati: "Ico nguma niyumvira ni uko yabikoze rimwe, ariko kandi ashobora gusubira kubikorera uwundi muntu - ico ni ukukimenya. Ashobora kubikorera jewe, canke Sean [umwana wiwe], eka ashobora kubikorera uwo ari we wese, rero iyi niyo ngorane". Impapuro z'urubanza zashitse mu minwe y'ishirahamwe ry'ibinyamakuru Press Association zerekana ko abacamanza banse ko Chapman arekurwa, bavuga ko "bishobora guhungabanya umutekano w'abanyagihugu". Igihe akora iki caha, Chapman yari afise imyaka 25. Ubu afise 65, yararongoye umugore wiwe akaba aba hafi y'aho amaze imyaka umunani apfungiwe. Mu nama y'abacamanza bariko bariga nimba yari akwiye kurekurwa vy'agateganyo, Chapman yasiguwe nk'umuntu asigaye yarihebeye cane Imana kandi ko ari "umukirisu akomeye". Urubanza rwo kwiga nimba ashobora kurekurwa vy'agateganyo ruzosubira mu kiringo c'imyaka ibiri.

column2: Ntahokatarondererwa: Ornella Uwimana yize ivyo kuvura kuri kaminuza ariko akora intebe mu mapine
column3: Umwigeme Ornella Uwimana yahejeje ivyigwa vy'amagara y'abantu muri kaminuza mu 2020 ubu akaba akora akazi ko gukora intebe mu mapine. Intebe za mbere yazikoze mu 2016 akiri ku ntebe y'ishure, umuvyeyi wiwe aca arazimugurira kugira amutere intege. Agira ati:"Naguze amapine umunani ku bihumbi mirongo ine, hanyuma nca ndayakoramwo intebe. "Mu kuntera intege, umuvyeyi wanje arazishima aca arazingurira azishira kw'ibaraza" Ornella avuga ko akunda kwiyigisha gukora ibintu bitandukanye kuri YouTube. Ahejeje kaminuza mu gisata c'ivy'amagara y'abantu "Sante Publique" mu 2020, ivyo gukora intebe mu mapine yaciye abigira umwuga. Avuga ko abona ko amaze gutera imbere ugereranije n'aho yatanguriye. Agira ati: "Natanguye nkorera muhira ariko ubu narakotesheje ikibanza nkoreramwo ndiha ku kwezi. "Nkoresha abakozi batatu baza buri musi, n'abandi bane baza igihe mba ndabakeneye." Gushika ubu avuga ko yoba ageze ku mutahe wa miliyoni zine z'amarundi. Ornella Uwimana ahanura urwaruka kwubahuka gukora ico ari co cose rubona gishobora kuruteza imbere. Avuga ko hari benshi bagaya akazi canke ntibashiruke umwete wo kugakora. Ati: "Hari abambona ndiko ndahiga amapine bagatangara. Bakanayanyima nkarinda guca ku bafundi b'imodoka "Hari n'abantwenga bambonye ndiko ndatobora amapine kandi baheruka nari nagiye gusigisha inzara. "Ubu ariko batanguye gutahura kuko babona ntanguye gutera imbere. Uburundi buherutse gushinga umugambi wa PAEEJ (Programme d'Autonomisation Economique et d'Emploi des Jeunes Diplômés), werekeye urwaruka ruhejeje amashure kugira rwishingire imigambi yo gukora. Uwo mugambi reta yawuhaye imiriyaridi 48 z'amafaranga y'amarundi. Ariko n'ubu hari abacibaza uruhara nyarwo rwa PAEEJ, mu gihe abandi bafise amakenga ko bashobora gufasha koko urwaruka kwigenga mu butunzi rukareka kuzera inze.

column2: 'Umukuru wa Twitter Elon Musk 'ntari hejuru y’amategeko'' - Umugenzuzi wa US
column3: Kimwe mu bigo vy’ubugenzuzi vya Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika kivuga ko kiriko kirakurikiranira hagufi ingene ibintu biriko biragenda muri Twitter "n’impungenge nyinshi". Ni inyuma y’aho hari abakozi bo ku rwego rwo hejuru mu bajejwe amabanga hamwe no kwubahiriza amategeko bavugwa ko batanze imihoho. Umurwi w’igihugu ujejwe ubucuruzi (Federal Trade Commission,FTC) uvuga ko umukuru w'urwo rubuga mushasha Elon Musk atari  "hejuru y’amategeko ". Mu yandi makuru, Musk avugwa ko yoba yarabwiye abakozi ko n’ivyo kwugara bishoboka. Iyi kompanyi iri mu mayira abiri kuva aho Musk atanguriye kwirukana ibihumbi n’ibihumbi vy’abakozi mu ndwi iheze. Ubushobozi bwo kugura 'status' ku bakoresha uru rubuga mu gihe ari uwiyandikishije gushasha bwongereje impungenge ko Twitter ishobora kwuzura ama konte y’ibinyoma. Ejo ku wa kane, Yoel Roth, yari arongoye igisata ca Twitter kijejwe umutekano yashize umwidondoro mushasha kuri runo rubuga hwaniro amenyesha ko atakiri muri ico kibanza. Amakuru avuga ko umukuru w’igisata kijejwe amakuru y’ibanga Damien Kieran be n’umukuru w’igisata kijejwe ivyo kwubahiriza amategeko Marianne Fogarty batanze imihoho. N’uwujejwe umutekano muri iyo kompanyi Lea Kissner na we nyene yaratanze imihoho. Kubona aba bantu baragiye bishobora kwongereza ivyago vya Twitter vyo guhonyanga amabwirizwa y’ubugenzuzi. Mu kwezi kwa gatanu, iyi kompanyi yaraciwe ihadabu ry’imiriyoni 150 kubera kugurisha amakuru y’abayikoresha, bikaba vyabaye ngombwa ko yemera ko hashingwa ayandi mabwirizwa mashasha ajanye no gucungera amakuru y’ibanga. Douglas Farrar, umukuru w’igisata kijejwe imigenderanire muri FTC, avuga ati: "Turiko turakurikirana ibiherutse kuba kuri Twitter n’impungenge nyinshi”. "Nta muyobozi canke ikompanyi iri hejuru y’amategeko, kandi amakompanyi ategerezwa gukurikiza ivyo twemeranije”. Farrer avuga ko FTC ifise “ibikoresho bishasha biyiha ubushobozi bwo kugenzura ko kompanyi iriko ikurikiza ivyo yiyemeje kandi turiteguye kubikoresha”. Twitter yarishe ihadabu mu kwezi kwa gatanu inyuma yo kwagirizwa ko yari yagurishije mu buryo buteye kubiri n’amategeko amakuru y’ibanga y’abayikoresha kugira biyifashe kugurisha amatanganzo yo kwamamaza. Iruhande y’iri hadabu, yategerejwe kwemera amabwirizwa mashasha, kandi ikemera gushiraho umugambi  ukomeye wo gucungera amabanga n’umutekano vy’abayikoresha – bigenzurwa n’aba bategetsi bavugwa ko batanze imihoho. Kuva afashe mu minwe Twitter, Musk yarirukanye uwahoze ari umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa Parag Agrawal hamwe n’abandi bategetsi bo hejuru, mbere n’abajejwe ibikorwa vyo kwamamaza n’amasoko na bo nyene baragiye. Ibi vyose biza kwongereza amakenga kuba Twitter idafise abantu bakwiye bashobora gucungera nimba ibandanya igendera ku mategeko ngenderwako. Vyongeye, amwe mu makompanyi makuru makuru yamamaza yaratewe ubwoba n'inzira Musk ariko atwaramwo iyi kompanyi y’urubuga hwaniro. Twitter yinjiza amafaranga yayo hafi yose biciye mu kwamamaza, ariko amakompanyi amwe amwe yabaye arabangira kurekura amahera yayo, mu gihe acihweza impinduka Musk ariko arazana. Amakompanyi amwe amwe avugwa ko afise amakenga ko Musk azodegura mu mategeko yo kugenzura ibica ku rubuga rwiwe mbere anahindure ingingo zo kwugara imbuga z’abantu bamwe bamwe bateje ibibazo, harimwo na Donald Trump yahoze arongoye Amerika. Bivugwa ko Musk yoba yarabwiye abakozi bari mu nama ko atabona neza kazoza k’ingene ubutunzi bwiyongera muri iyo kompanyi, kandi ko atawoshira kure guhomba burundu. Twitter yarasabwe kugira ico ishikirije. Urubuga ngurukanabumenyi The Verge ari na rwo rwasohoye ijambo ryose Musk yashikirije abakozi, ruvuga ko Twitter itagifise igisata c’ukumenyesha amakuru.

column2: Umugwizatunga Rujugiro ashima icemezo ca sentare kuri UTC ngo ariko ntibikwiye
column3: Umugwizatunga w'Umunyarwanda Tribert Rujugiro avuga ko ashima icemezo ca sentare y'akarere ka Afrika y'Ubuseruko ku vyerekeye inyubako yagurishijwe na leta y'u Rwanda. Ariko uwo mugwizatunga atakiba mu Rwanda kubera kutumvikana na leta y'ico gihugu, avuga ko kumuha amafaranga atari vyo yashaka kuko adashaka kugurisha. Iyo nyubako ivugwa ni inyubako izwi nka Union Trade Centre (UTC) iri mu muji wa Kigali iberamwo ibikorwa vy'ubudandaji, izi zizwi mu Congereza nka Shopping Mall. Sentare y'Ubutungane ya Afrika y'Ubuseruko yafashe icemezo c'uko Bwana Rujugiro ahabwa amafaranga iyo nyubako yagurishijwe akanahabwa ayo yari imaze kwinjiza igihe yari imaze ikora kuva yagurishwa. Ariko we avuga ko naho ashima ingingo ya sentare, ivyo adashobora kuvyemera kuko agaciro k'iyo nyubako ari kanini cane ugereranije n'ayo yoba ahawe. Yagize ati: "Umwanzuro narawushimye kuko weretse amakungu ko rirya tegeko bakoresheje na birya vyo kugurisha bitajanye n'amategeko. "... ngirango umuntu wese azi guharura, inzu yinjiza $1,500,000 ku mwaka, yobona agaciro kayo. Kandi amafaranga bayigurishije ni $6,800,000". Mu 2017 ikigo kijejwe amakoli mu Rwanda cafashe ingingo yo kugurisha inyubako UTC ya Bwana Rujugiro kimwagiraza ko agiheraniye amakoli. Ikigo Kigali Investment Company ni co cegukanye iyo nyubakwa cemeye gutanga amahera arusha ay'abandi (6,877,150,000). Ku vyerekeye kumwagiriza kutariha iryo koli, Bwana Rujugiro avuga ko sentare yabisiguye neza. Yagize ati: "Bwa mbere iyo nzu bari bayifise (urwego rushinzwe amakoli) kuva mu 2013. Iryo deni ry'ikoli bavuga ko mfise barizanye mu 2017, bamaranye inzu imyaka ine. "Noneho waraba amafaranga bafashe yagera ku miriyoni $5 zirenga. Kandi itegeko bagendeyeko ryavuga ko amafaranga yose avuye mu nzu bafashe, 50% bizoja bija muri Banki Nkuru akazohabwa nyene umutungo igihe yoboneka. "Urumva yuko nibaba bari bafise $2.800.000, ideni rikaba ryari $1.100.000, kuki batafashe muri ayo ngo barihe?" Abajijwe niba azokwunguruza ku ngingo ya sentare mu gihe we avuga ko adashaka kugurisha inzu yiwe, yavuze ko yabihaye abashingwamanza biwe nihafatwa ingingo akazoyitangaza. BBC yagerageje kuvugana n'uruhande rwa leta y'u Rwanda ariko batubwira ko ata co bashobora kuvuga kuri ico kibazo.

column2: RD Congo: Intambara zasubiye kwaduka muri Minembwe, abantu bataye izabo
column3: Mu karere ka Minembwe muri Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo haravugwa ingwano zongeye kwaduka abantu benshi barata izabo bahunga. Gad Mukiza arongoye ako karere, avuga ko izo ntambara ziri hagati y'imirwi yitwaje ibirwanisho y'abanyamulenge ku ruhande rumwe, n'abo mu bwoko bw'Abafulero, Ababembe, n'Abanyindu ku rundi ruhande. Bwana Mukiza avuga ko zatanguriye muri Segiteri ya Tombwe iri muri 'Territoire ya Mwenga,  hari kw'igenekerezo rya ndwi uku kwezi kw'icenda. Ubu zikaba zasubiriye. Bwana Mukiza avuga ko Leta yarungitse ingabo muri ako karere kugira ngo zigarukane ituze, akibaza ko mu minsi mikeya abahunze bashobora gusubira mu zabo. Umunyamakuru wa Radio Televiziyo y'igihugu ca Congo, Mahoye Madiba Issa, ari mu karere ka Fizi, avuga ko izo ntambara zari zacureshe. Ibi vyabaye inyuma y'aho abategetsi batari bake, harimwo abaserukira MONUSCO bagendeye ako karere kugira ngo basukemwo mabisi. Ingwano ariko avuga ko zasubiriye busha muri iyi minsi n'abantu bakaba bataye ivyabo barahunga. Aka gace kama mu ruhagarara rushingiye ku moko kuva mu myaka ya 1960. Bwana Mukiza avuga ko kuva kera ubutegetsi butashoboye guhagarika izo ntambara. Ati: "Ni Abanyamulenge barwana n'abaturanyi babo b'Abafulero, Ababembe n'Abanyindu. Ni ikibazo kigenda kigaruka kigafata isura y'amoko". "Ibintu bija kwunyurwa n'abanyepolitike babironderamwo inyungu zabo ari nabo bateranya abanyagihugu bafatiye ku moko". Iyo mirwano yasubiye kwaduka yatumye abantu ibihumbi bahungira mu bice bitandukanye vy'igihugu, abandi nabo bahungira mu bihugu bibanyi. Bwana Mukiza avuga ko ku mugwa mukuru wa komine Minembwe honyene habarizwa impunzi zingana na 49.500 ahanini bagizwe n'Abanyamulenge. Avuga ko hari n'igitigiri kitari gito kigizwe n'Abafulero, Ababembe  n'Abanyindu bahungiye mu karere ka Fizi. Avuga ko izo mpunzi ziri mu ngorane zikomeye kubera bigoye ko imfashanyo zibashikira kubera amabarabara atameze neza.

column2: Imvo n'imvano ku kibazo ca Afghanistan
column3: Ikiganiro c’uyu musi cerekeye inkuru imaze iminsi ivugwa cane kw'isi, iyo nayo nta yindi n'ikurwa ry'ingabo z'Amerika n'abo bafatanyaga mw'ishirahamwe ryo kwivuna abansi NATO / OTAN mu gihugu ca Afghanistan. Izo ngabo zari zimaze imyaka 20 ziri muri ico gihugu kiri muri Asia yo hagati. Kuri uyu wa gatatu, igenekerezo rya 31 z’ukwezi kw’umunani  ni ho harangira intamabara yahuza Amerika n’incuti zayo hamwe n’aba Talibani  ku mugaragaro nk’uko biri mu masezerano y’i Doha izo mpande zibiri zari zashizeko umukono mu biganiro vyabahurije mu gihugu ca Qatar kw'itariki 29 z'ukwa 2 mu mwaka uheze wa 2020. Amerika yari yagiye muri ico gihugu inyuma y’ibitero vy’iterabwoba vyo kuwa 11 ukwezi kw’icenda mu 2001, vyagizwe i New York bihitana abantu 3.000 mu bibanza bitandukanye, aho ico gihugu cavuga ko kigiye gushigikira demokrasi no kurandurana n’imizi iterabwoba ry’umuhari Al-Qaeda. Ico gihugu n’incuti zaco zihurukiye mw’ishirahamwe ryo kwivunira umwansi hamwe OTAN, baciye birukana aba Talibani bari ku butegetsi mu ntambara bivugwa ko yagiye iratwara amadolari imiriyaridi 100 buri mwaka.  Inyuma y’imyaka cumi y’intambara y’urutavanako n’uruhigi rukomeye rwo gufata canke kwica  Osama Ben Laden, yari arongoye umuhari wa Al-Qaeda, Amerika yaje kumwicira mu gihugu kibanyi, Pakistan. Kuva Amerika itanguye gukura abasirikare bayo muri ico gihugu, aba Talibani baciye batangura kwigarurira ibisagara bitandukanye harimwo n’umugwa mukuru Kaboul. Bagifata Kaboul, umuvugizi w’aba Talibani yabwiye BBC ko bijeje abanyagihugu ba Afghanistan muri rusangi, cane cane ababa mu gisagara ca Kaboul vy’umwihariko, ko ivyo batunze, ubuzima bwabo,  vyose biri mu mutekano, ko ata kwihora bizobaho. Ufatiye kuri aya majambo umuntu yovuga ko aba Talibani b’ejo atari bo b’uyu musi? Ko Afghnistani kigiye kuba igihugu kirangwamwo amahoro n’umutekano? Coba kigiye kwemerwa n’amakungu? Kazoza k’iyindi mihari yishimikiza idini rya Islam n’akahe? Muri kino kiganiro Cyriaque Muhawenayo ari kumwe na Manirambona Jean Bosco, umwigisha muri kaminuza y’Uburundi, Ismael Buchana umwigisha kuri kaminuza mu Rwanda, akaba ari n’icegera c’uwurongoye ishirahamwe riharanira iterambere ry’abanyafrika mu Rwanda, hamwe rero na Gilbert Mwenedata umuhinga muvyo gucunga imigambi y’iterambere, akaba yarakoreye mu bihugu nk’Urwanda, Republika ya Demokrasi ya Congo na Afghanistan. Ubu akaba akorerera muri Amerika mu ntara ya Washington DC.

column2: Michelle Obama yumviye impuhwe Meghan ku macakubiri afatiye ku rukoba
column3: Umugore w'uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu wa Amerika Michelle Obama yavuze ko "bitatangaje cane" kwumva Duchesse wa Sussex  avuga ibijanye n'amacakubiri afatiye ku rukoba mu kiganiro giherutse guca  kuri television. Umupfasoni wa Obama yavugiye  mu kiganiro Today ca NBC ku kiyago ca Meghan na Harry na Oprah Winfrey. Meghan na Harry barugurutse baravuga ibintu bitari bike bijanye n'ubuzima bwabo  bwite, harimwo ibijanye n'amagara yo mu mutwe. Meghan yavuze ko Harry  yabajijwe n'umuntu atavuzwe izina wo mu muryango w'i bwami ingene urukoba rw'umuhungu wabo Archie rushobora kuzoba ruzize. Ikirimba ca Buckingham cavuze ko ibibazo vy'amacakubiri ashingiye ku rukoba vyavuzwe na Meghan na Harry, b'imyaka 39 na 36, biteye ''impungenge'', kandi ko "bizofatwa nkama" kandi vyigirwe mu muryango. Mu  kiganiro ciwe na NBC, Madame Obama yabajijwe icaciye mu mutwe wiwe igihe yariko araraba ikiganiro co guserura akari ku mutima Meghan yagiranye na Oprah. "Kuba mu mabanga y'igihugu n'uguhagarara ahantu habona cane, hakarishe kandi hashushe'' nk'uko bivugwa na Madame Obama yamaze imyaka umunani muri Maison Blanche (White House) igihe umugabo wiwe, Barack Obama, yari umukuru w'igihugu. "Kandi abantu benshi ntibavyumva, kandi ntibanategerezwa no kuvyumva. Ikintu ngumiza mu mutwe n'uko ivyo vyose biterekeye twebwe mu mabanga y'igihugu, vyerekeye abo dukorera." Umupfasoni wa Obama, w'imyaka 57, yabajijwe ico avuga igihe yumva Meghan abwiye Oprah ko ''yahuye n'amacakubiri ashingiye ku rukoba". Yishuye ati: "Nk'uko nigeze kubivuga, ibibazo vy'urukoba si bishasha muri iyi si ku bantu b'urukoba rutera, nta kinini cantangaje rero kwumva ivyamushikiye kandi akabivuga ku mugaragaro". Mu kindi kiganiro na  Access Hollywood, Madame Obama yavuze ko afise icizere ko Meghan na Harrry bazoronka inzira y'ingene basubiza hamwe n'umuryango w'i bwami. Madame Obama yavuze ati: "Ico nizeye n'uko, iyo niyumviriye ibihe barimwo, nca niyumvira akamaro k'umuryango, ngaca nsenga ko hoba ikigongwe hakaba gushira umuco mu bintu n'urukundo n'ugufata ingingo igihe runaka". Madame Michelle Obama ari mu bantu bashigikiye Meghan kuva kera,  aho amwita "umugenzi" n'"umuntu w'icitegererezo" nk'uko yavyanditse kuri Instagram mu 2019. Harry n'umugenzi wa ba Obama kuva kera, bahuriye ku bikorwa vy'ubugiraneza. Umuryango wa Obama washigikiye mu ba mbere ibikorwa vya Harry mu mugambi wiwe wa Invictus Games Foundation. Meghan yarahaye ikiganiro Obama ariko ategura inomero y'ikinyamateka ca British Vogue yari mu bagihagarariye mu 2019. Muri uwo mugambi, uwo mu Duchesse yavuze ko mu bamufashije harimwo Madame Obama, avuga ko ari umuntu "yugurutse kandi yicisha bugufi". Umupfasoni wa Obama yaratanguje imigambi itari mike igihe yari muri Maison Blanche ishingiye cane cane ku ngaburo n'amagara vy'abana. Ubu ariko aramenyekanisha urukurikirane rw'ibiganiro vy'abana ku vyerekeye guteka Waffles+Mochi. Ariko ku ndwi iheze, Madame Obama yavuze ko agire afate ikiruhuko c'izabukuru ko rero asigaye yemera imigambi mike yo gushigikira.

column2: Iminsi 100 intambara itanguye: Ingene ibinyamakuru biyivuga muri Ukraine no mu Burusiya
column3: Gushika ku mutaga hagati imboneshakure (television) y’Uburusiya ntaco yari bwavuge ku c’uko iminsi 100 irumanye kuva Uburusiya buteye Ukraine. Nyinshi mu mboneshakure zikurikirwa cane mu Burusiya zataganguye amakuru yazo yo um gitondo zagiriza Ukraine gutera ata gutoronya  ibisasu ku turere tutagenzurwa na reta. Imboneshakure igenzurwa na Kremlin (ibiro vy’umukuru w’igihugu), Rossiya1, yavuze ko aba-nationalists bateye Mariupol na Donetsk’’ um gihe Channel One nayo, nayo nyene igenzurwa na reta, itanga uburorero bushasha bw’ubunyamwuga n’ukwitanga   vyerekanwa n’igisirikare c’Uburusiya um kugwanira Donbas’’. Nta n’imwe ivuga ko ‘igikorwa ca gisirikare  kidasanzwe’ c’Uburusiya muri UKraine  conjiye um munsi waco ugira 100. Imbere y’uko intambara itangura, abasigura uko ibintu biriko biragenda bari babwiye ababakurikira ko vyashoboka ko  bitwara  Uburusiya iminsi mike gusa kugira bwifatire Ukraine. Ku wa kane, urubuga rwigenga Meduza rwanditse ko hari abarubwiye ko reta yari yategegetse ibinyamakuru kudacisha um kanwa ivy’uko  ivy’iminsi 100. Rimwe mu masoko ya Meduza muri Kremlin ryayibwiye riti: ‘’ Guhagarara cane ku matariki ajanye bn’intambara bishobora gutuma abarusiya bibaza ivyari bigamijwe n’ico gitero n’ingene coba kimaze gushobora canke kunanirwa kubishikako.’’ Ibi bihushanye cane n’ibivugwa n’ibinyamakuru muri Ukraine aho imboneshakure iriko ikravuga ibiba uyu munsi ku civugo ‘Iminsi 100 yo kurya umutima amenyo’’. Uwushikiriza amakuru ku mboneshakure yigenga Prymy TV yavuze ati: ‘’Uyu si umunsi wo kwigina kandi twizeye ko ata minsi 200 tuzokwibuka kuva intambara itanguye. Amezi arenga atatu araheze kuva intambara itanguye. Iyi ni amwe mu matariki akomeye muri iyo ntambara:

column2: Samuel Eto'o: Rurangiranwa mu mupira w'amaguru yarokotse impanuka y'umuduga
column3: Samuel Eto'o, yatsindiye agashimwe k'umukinyi mwiza w'Umunyafrika inshuro zine, yararusimvye mu mpanuka y'imodoka ejo ku wa Mungu. Bwana Eto'o w'imyaka 39, yari mu rugendo aja mu gisagara ca Douala, ca mbere mu bikorwa vy'ubutunzi muri Kameruni, nk'uko bitangazwa n'umuryango wiwe. Yari avuye mu muji wa Bafoussam, mu burengero bwa Kameruni, aho yari yitavye ibirori vy'isabukuru mu mpera z'indwi. Bivugwa ko umuduga wasovye umushoferi akagonga imiduga ibiri mu yari mu rukurikirane ruherekeje Eto'o. Uyu mugabo yahoze ari rutahizamu wa Barcelona,  ari kwa muganga, nk'uko bitangazwa n'umwe mu bo mu muryango wiwe. Umuvugizi wiwe yabwiye igisata ca BBC gitangaza mu rurimi rwa Pidgin, yuko Eto'o ameze neza kandi yuko umuduga wiwe wononekaye. Frank Happi, avugira Eto'o, yabariye kandi BBC Africa Sport ko Eto'o yanse kwitwarira uwo yari atwaye uwo muduga wundi, yari yabanje guhunga mu nyuma agafatwa akajanwa ku biro vy'igipolisi. Mu nyuma, amasanamu yerekana Eto'o avugana n'uyo mushoferi, amusaba kuja atwara afise umwitwarariko gusumba. Urashobora gushima gusoma n'ibi:

column2: Ubukritsu - Isilamu: hoba hari isano hagati ya Isilamu hamwe na Yezu/Yesu na Maria
column3: Mu bihugu birwiriyemwo Abakristu, muri kino gihe ikintu kivugwa ni Noweri/Noheli, mu ndimi mvamahanga naho ni Noel canke Christmas. Biragoye kwibaza ko hoba hari ibihugu uyu munsi mukuru utazwi na gato, bobo usanga ari umunsi usanzwe nk'iyindi. Igituma nyamukuru ni uko uyu munsi ari umunsi wo kwibuka ivuka rya Yezu, umunsi wubahwa cane rwose mu mashengero y'abakristu. Mu bihugu uyu munsi mukuru wa Noweri utazwi, canke udahimbazwa harimwo ibihugu bigendera kw'idini rya Isilamu, Nk'akarorero muri Turukiya, iri genekerezo rya 25 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri ni umunsi usanzwe ku kirangamisi cayo. Uyu munsi mukuru ntawuriho ku birangamisi ry'abayahudi, Abahindi canke vy''Abasilamu. Mu bihugu vy'Abasilamu, uyu munsi mukuru usa n'iminsi mikuru ya Eid, ariho Abasilamu baja hamwe, bagatumirara, bagateka, bakagenderanira, bagatanga ishikanwa, bakambara bakaberwa bakaja gusenga mu misigiti. Nimba ushaka gutahura itandukanirizo riri hagati y'aya madini, ntuze wigere wipfuriza Umusilamu Noweri nziza. Ariko rero, si ukuvuga ko Yezu/Yesu atazwi mw'idini rya Isilamu. Yezu/Yesu canke Jesus, uba uvuze Issa? Ibi rero biratangaza abantu benshi batabizi. Abasilamu ntibahimbaza ivuka rya Yezu, ariko barakurikiza inyigisho ziwe. Abasilamu barubaha cane uyu bita intumwa y'Imana kandi afise ikibanza kidasanzwe mu kwemera kwabo. Igitabo c'Ikorowani gifata Yezu nk'umwe mu ntumwa z'Imana zubahwa cane zaboneye izuba Intumwa Muhammad (S.A.W.- Sallā Allāhu ʿalayhi Wa-sallam). Yezu mu rurimi rw'icarabu ni ukuvuga Issa, kandi aravugwa incuro nyinshi cane mw'Ikorowani, mbere aravugwa cane gusumba na Muhammad muri iki gitabo ceranda. Si ivyo gusa, harimwo n'umugore umwe rudende izina ryiwe rivugwa mw'ico gitabu ceranda c'idini rya Isilamu. Maria canke Mariam, Ikorowani imusigura gute? Uyo mugore ni Bikira Maria, mu rurimi rw'icarabu akaba azwi kw'izina rya Mariam/Maryam. Mw'Ikorowani, hari igice cose kimuvuga, kigasigura ingene yavyaye umwana kandi yari asanzwe ari isugi. Gusa iyo iriko irasigura ivy'ivuka rya Yezu, Isilamu ntiyigera ivuga ivya Yozefu, canke ba ba majusi baza bavuye mu buseruko, canke ngo bavuge ingene yaryamitswe mu bwato bw'inka. Maria yibarutse ari wenyene mu bugaragwa, ari musi y'igiti c'umunazi cumye. Aho nyene haciye haba igitangaro, inazi zihiye neza zaciye zitangura gukoroka ziva kuri ico giti cumye maze ziba imfungurwa yiwe. Hanyuma kandi, mu maguru yiwe haciye havuka umugezi w'amazi meza cane maze aba inyobwa yiwe. Umukobwa atararongorwa iyo avyaye bitera ibibazo vyinshi cane ku bijanye n'indero yiwe. Ariko uyo mwana  - Yezu/Issa - amaze kuvuka, yaciye atangura kuvuga nk'intumwa y'imana. Iki gitangaro nico gikura iceyi nyina wiwe. Iyo Abasilamu bavuga Yezu, bategerezwa gushirako Alayhi Salaam- Imigisha y'Imana ibane na we, nk'uko babivuga ku Ntumwa Muhammad n'abandi bahanuzi. Hanyuma kandi, ni nde arindiriwe ku munsi w'iherezo ku munsi w'urubanza no kugarura amahoro kw'isi, kubw'idini rya Isilamu? Ni Yezu, aho azogarukira ubugira kabiri, kandi uku kuninahazwa kwiwe kuri no mu bindi bitabo vya Isilamu, si mw'Ikorowani gusa. Umuhinga w'Umusufi, Al-Ghazali, amusobanura "nk'Intumwa ityorora imitima y'abantu". Ibn Arabi aramwandikako aho avuga ko ari "ikimenyetso c'ubweranda". Mu gihugu vyose birimwo Abasilamu, hari abahungu bahabwa izina rya Issa (Yezu), abakobwa nabo bagahabwa amazina ya Maryam (Maria). Aha urashobora kwibaza nk'umuntu ava mu muryango w'abakristu yokwita umwana wiwe Muhammad ingene vyomugendera? Idini rya Isilamu rirazi neza Yezu, kubera igihe rivuka, mu kinjana c'indwi, idini ry'Ubukristu ryari rishinze imizi mu karere k'Uburasirazuba bwo Hagati. Muhammad nta hantu na hamwe avugwa muri Bibiriya. N'aho idini rya Isilamu riha icubahiro Yezu, si ukuvuga ko mu binjana vyakurikiye iri dini rya Gikristu naryo ryabasubirije mu ndumane. Ahubwo, mu gicapo kinini co mu kinjana ca 15 kiri mw'isengero nkuru ya San Petronio mu gisagara ca Bologne mu Butariyano, uyu muhanuzi mukuru wa Isilamu yerekanwa ari mu muriro udahera, ariko arababazwa n'amashetani. Harabaye ibishushanyo vyinhi vyerekana nabi cane Intumwa Muhammad. Umuhinyanyuzi w'umutariyano Giovani da Modena yarashingiye cane ku munyavyese azwi cane Dante Alighieri, yashize Muhammad ku muzingi w'icenda w'ikuzimu mu gitabo ciwe c'ivyese citwa Divine Comedy. Iki gitabo carakoreshejwe cane n'abanyatugenegene n'abahinyanyuzi benshi ba Bulaya gushika mu kinjana ca 18 mu gushushanya Intumwa Muhammad bamwerekana ariko arahanwa mu muriro udahera. Kimwe muri ivyo bishushanyo, ni ica William Blake, umunyatugenegene akomeye cane w'umwongereza mu masanamu n'inzandiko ziwe. Mw'isengero imwe yo mu Bubirigi, hari ibishushanyo vyo mu kinjana ca 17 vyerekana iyi ntumwa ya Isilamu aryamitswe hasi ariko ahonyangwa n'abamarayika. Ibintu vyagiye guhinduka mu nyuma ku bijanye n'ingene idini rya Gikristu rifata Intumwa muhammad. Ariko gusa gushika muri kino gihe, haracari icuka kibi. Mu mwaka wa 2002, imirwi y'intagondwa ya Isilamu yaragirijwe ko yashatse kubomora ico gishushanyo co mw'isengero ya Bologne. Kuva ico gihe, harabaye ibitero vyinshi vyahitanye abantu, ibitero vyakozwe kw'izina ry'idini rya Isilamu mu bihugu bitari bike vya Buraya n'ibirwiriyemwo Abasilamu. Ibi bitero vyatumye icuka kibi hagati y'ama madini abiri kibandanya ciyongera. Hari ababona ko kumenya isano riri hagati ya Yezu n'idini rya Isilamu, hamwe n'ikibanza afise muri iri dini, bishobora gufasha Abakristu n'Abasilamu kunywana. Babona ko kwibanda ku vyo basangiye hakwibanda ku bibatandukanya bishobora gufasha gukuraho iki cuka kibi kihari.

column2: Swiss bemeje kubuza kwamamaza itabi inyuma cane y'ibihugu bibanyi
column3: Aba-Swisse batoye bemeza kubuza kwamamaza itabi ahantu hose abakiri bato bashobora kubibona. Mu vy'ukuri, kuba Ego ariyo yiganje muri ayo matora ya kamarampaka mu gihugu cose bizotuma kwamamaza itabi bicibwa burundu. Ivyo bizotuma Swisse ija ku murongo w'ibindi bihugu bibanyi vy'i Buraya, vyinshi vyashitse ku ngingo zikomeye zibuza canke zigabanya kwamamaza itabi haraheze imyaka itari mike. N'ubwo ari igihugu gisanzwe kizwi neza ku bijanye n'amagara meza n'ugukingira ibidukikije, Swisse yari igifise amwe mu mategeko yerekeye itabi  yoroshe cane i Buraya. Mu gihe haheze imyaka myinshi kunywera itabi mu nzu z'uburiro n'ubunywero vyari vyaraciwe mu Bwongereza, mu Bufaransa, canke mu Budagi, muri Swisse bari bakihanywera itabi. Mu masoko ya kijambere (supermarches/supermartkets), abariko barasuma hari igihe bakirwa n'abagore bakiri bato babamwenyurira mu gihe babaha imponjo za gusa z'itabi riba riherutse gusohoka. Mu gihe ivyo haheze imyaka bibujijwe, kwamamaza itabi vyari bikibandanya. Ashima ivyavuye mu matora yo ku wa mungu, umushingamateka w'umu-social democrat  Flavia Wasserfallen yakeje igikorwa c'amashirahamwe y'abaganga n'abigisha bakoze isekeza ryo guca ivyo kwamamaza itabi. Yabwiye television ya Swisse ati: "Abantu barakoze cane kugira haboneke  poritike yo gushira imbere ineza y'abakiri bato". Ingingo z'ishami rya ONU riraba amagara kw'isi OMS zijanye n'itabi  - Framework Convention on Tobacco Control- zimaze imyaka hafi 20 zishitsweko mu gisagara ca Geneve. Swisse yarazishizeko umukono, ariko ntiyari bwazemeze mu mategeko -kikaba arico gihugu ca Buraya co nyene cari gisigaye - kuko gushika habe amatora yo ku wa mungu, amategeko y'ico gihugu yerekeye kwamamaza, ntiyisunga izo ngingo. Ugereranije no mu bindi bihugu vy'i Buraya, itabi muri Swisse rirazimbutse kandi 27% y'abantu bakuze muri ico gihugu baranywa itabi - urugero ruri hejuru y'urw'i Buraya muri rusangi. Ni kenshi amategeko agamije kugabanya canke guca kwamamaza itabi yari amaze kunanirwa kurengana mu nama nshingamateka. N'igihe abagira isekeza baba baronse imikono ikwiye yo gusaba ko haba amatora kamarampaka yo guca kwamamaza, reta yaca ibwira abanyagihugu gutora Oya. Abashigikiye ko kwamamaza bicibwa, bavugako ivyo biterwa n'uko muri ico gihugu hariyo amwe mu ma kompanyi akomeye cane kw'isi mu rudandazwa rw'itabi. Philip Morris, British American Tobacco na Japan Tobacco yose afise ivyicaro vyayo bikuru muri Swisse. Urudandazwa rw'itabi bigereranywa ko rwinjiriza ubutunzi bwa Swisse amafaranga arenga miriyaridi 6 z'amadorari ku mwaka, rugakoresha abantu 11.000 muri ico gihugu. Imbere y'uko amatora aba vyaragaragaye ko -nk'uko benshi bavyikeka - ko ama kompanyi y'itabi yahora asuka amafaranga mw'isekeza ryo gutora Oya. Abagwanya ko hacibwa kwamamaza, bavuga ko kubuza kwamamaza ikintu cemewe n'amategeko bidakwiye kwemerwa, kandi ko ivyo vyokwugururira imyango  ingingo ku bindi bicuruzwa, nk'isukari n'inzoga, navyo bibonwa nk'ibibangamira amagara y'abantu. Ivyapa biriko  zimwe mu mfungurwa aba-Swisse bakunda cane - vyerekanywe vyandiseko amajambo y'igabisha rikomeye ngo "ibi ni vyo bizoca bikurikira". Ariko abitavye amatora ivyo ntaco vyababwiye. Muri Swisse haharurwa abantu bashika 9.000 bapfa buri mwaka bahitanywe n'indwara zifatiye kw'itabi kandi  igisata c'amagara y'abantu gisohora amafaranga menshi yo kuvura bene izo ndwara. Biduza kandi amafaranga y'ubwishingizi, uwariwe wese ategerezwa gutanga, yaba anywa canke atanywa itabi. Imbere y'uko amatora aba, ibiharuro vyo kugereranya amajwi vyerekana ko 60% bari gushigikira  guca kwamamaza. Amaherezo babaye 56%, ariko n'ubundi bagumanye ubwiganze buhagije. Stefanie de Borba wo nw'ishirahamwe rya Swisse ryo kurwanya cancer yabwiye AFP ati: "Abantu baratahuye ko amagara ahambaye kuruta inyungu z'ubutunzi." Ubundi muri Swisse iyo abatora badatahura neza ico bahamagariwe gutora, baca bakurikiza impanuro ya reta. Ku yandi mategeko abiri bari bahamagariwe kwerekana aho bahagaze co kimwe no kuri iryo ryo guca kwamamaza itabi, reta yari yabahanuye gutora Oya, yamara yaratsinzwe. Ubu  abagize reta bakeneye akanya ko kwisuzuma niba bakiri ku murongo umwe n'abatora. Nk'uko umwe mu bandika uko babona ibintu aho muri Swisse yabivuze ku wa mungu: "Hageze guhitamwo hagati y'ubwigenge bw'ubutunzi n'amagara, abatora benshi bahisemwo ico ca nyuma…Haba uguca ukwamamaza, guca kunywa itabi canke itabi rizimvye, kunywa itabi ubu ntibigifise uruvugiro mu banyagihugu -bitandukanye no mu banyeporitike."

column2: Ivana Trump, umugore wa mbere wa Donald Trump, yapfuye ku myaka 73
column3: Ivana Trump, umugore wa mbere wa Donald Trump akongera akaba na nyina w’abana biwe batatu, yasandavye ku myaka 73. Aciye ku rubuga hwaniro rwiwe bwite, Truth Social, Trump yanditse ti: “Yari umugore w’intore, mwiza kandi atangaje, yabayeho mu buzima bukomeye kandi bwigisha”. Ivana Trump, umugore yavukiye mu citwa République tchèque, yarongowe n’uyu yahoze ari umukuru w’igihugu ca Amerika mu 1977. Bagiye kwahukana inyuma y’imyaka 15 mu 1992. Bavyaranye abana batatu - Donald Jr, Ivanka na Eric Trump. Igipolisi kivuga ko ashobora kuba yahitanywe n’isanganya, nk’uko vyandikwa n’ikinyamakuru Assiciated Press. Amasoko yabwiye iki kinyamakuru ko umupfasoni Trump yatowe yataye ubwenge ku ngazi i muhira iwe mu gisagara ca New York, bikavugwa ko yoba yaguye. Donald na Ivana Trump baramenyekanye cane mu myaka ya 1980 na 1990, mbere ukwahukana kwabo kwaravuzweko vyinshi. Bamaze kwahukana, Ivana yaciye atanguza urudandaza rwiwe rw’ibimoga, impuzu n’ibisharizo vy’umubiri (bijoux). Mu gitabo ciwe co mu 2017 yise Raising Trump, Ivana arishimira kuba yarareze abana babo, akavuga ko "yafashe ingingo ku bijanye n’indero yabo, ibikorwa vyabo, ingendo, mu kubitaho no kubaha ivya nkenerwa” gushika muri kaminuza. Muri iki gitabo, avuga ko ubucuti bwiwe na Trump bwiyongereye cane kuva bahukanye, akavuga ko yama avugana nawe rimwe mu ndwi. Mw’itangazo wasohoye, umuryango wa Trump wamukengurukiye mu kuvuga ko yari “inguvu mu bikorwa, umunonotsi wo ku rwego mpuzamakungu, ubwiza bw’agahorurore, umugenzi, akaba n’umuvyeyi yitaho umuryango”. “Ivana Trump ni umucikacumu. Yahunze ubutegetsi bw’igikomunista ahungira muri iki gihugu ”, niko itangazo rivuga. “ Yarigishije abana biwe ubutwari n’ubwira, kugira impuhwe no kudacika intege”. Umwana wiwe mukuru, Ivanka avugwa ko yari yegereye cane nyina wiwe, yanditse mu butumwa bwiwe yacishije ku rubuga rwa Instagram ko ababaye cane. Yanditse ati: "Mama yari incabwenge, afise igikundiro, afise ishaka kandi atwenza cane. Yarerekanye inguvu, ubutwari n’ishaka mu bikorwa vyiwe vyose. Yabayeho ubuzima bwuzuye - ntiyigeze atakaza amahirwe yo gutwenga no gutamba ”. Donald Trump yabaye umugabo wiwe wa kabiri. Uwa mbere, Alfred Winklmayr, yari umunya-Autriche yigisha urukino rwa ski n’umugenzi wiwe, akaba yari yemeye kurongorwa nawe kugira ngo aronke ubwenegihugu bwa Autriche. Ibi vyamufashije kuva mu gihugu ciwe ca gikomunista  - ico gihe kikaba citwa Tchécoslovaquie  - atari uko yari ahunze. Igihe yaba muri Canada mu myaka ya 1970, yakoze nk’umwigisha w’urukino rwa ski akongera akaba n’umunyamideri. Igihe yari mu rugendo rw’akazi mu gisagara ca New York mu 1976, yabonanye na Trump ari mu murwi w’abanyamideri. Baciye barongorana mu mwaka wakurikiye, ubwo nyene baca batangura kuvugwa cane mu binyamakuru. Igihe yari akiri kumwe na Trump, Ivana yaranguye amabanga atandukanye mw’ishirahamwe rya Trump (Trump Organization), harimwo no kuba umukuru w’ihoteri Plaza Hotel i Manhattan. Ariko bivugwa ko Trump yamwugaraniye hanze y’ibiro vyiwe kuri iyo hoteri mu 1990 bivuye ku kutumvikana ku bintu bine vyari mu masezerano bagiriraniye imbere y’uko barongorana. Igihe bahukaniye, Ivana yarongowe incuro zibiri, ubwa mbere n’umurwizatunga w’umutaliyano Riccardo Mazzucchelli, kuva 1995-97;  hanyuka kandi n’umukinyi w’amareresi w’umutaliyano nyene Rossano Rubicondi, kuva 2008-09. Umukenguzamateka w’umu Repubulika Lindsey Graham, incuti ya hafi cane ya Donald Trump, ati : “ Yarabayeho mu buzima bw’ikinyamerika ”. Mu 2017, Ivana yabwiye ikiganiro ca ABC, Good Morning America, ko atagomvye gutera ubwishime umugore wiwe w’ubu Melania amuhamagaye muri Maison Blanche/White House. Yavuze ati : “ Ni jewe ndi umugore mukuru wa Trump. Uravyumva ? Ni jewe ndi First Lady ”. Ni amwe mu majambo menshi akomeye uyu yahoze ari umunyamideri yasubiwemwo. Mu gakino yagizemwo uruhara mu 1996 kiswe The First Wives Club, yabwiye abagore bari bahukanye ati: "Bapfasoni, mutegerezwa kwihagararako kandi mukigenga. Kandi mwibuke, ntimushavure, rondere vyose”.

column2: DRC: ONU isaba amatohoza kw’iterabwoba ryo kwicwa rikorerwa Denis Mukwege
column3: Michelle Bachelet, umunyamabanga mukuru w'igisata kijejwe agateka ka zina muntu mw'ishiramahwe ONU, asaba Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo gukora amatohoza kw'iterabwoba ryo kwicwa rikorerwa Denis Mukwege. Uyu muganga yahawe agashimwe k'amahoro kitiriwe Nobel  avuga ko yaronse amajambo amubwira ko ashobora kwicwa inyuma y'aho yiyamirije igandagurwa ry'abantu 18 mu ntara ya Kivu y'Ubumanuko mu kwezi guheze. Umupfasoni Bachelet asaba ko haba amatohoza ataho yegamiye kuri iryo terabwoba. Umukuru w'igihugu Felix Tshisekedi yariyemeje ko leta izokora amatohoza kuri iryo terabwoba kandi yiyemeza gukingira umutekano wa Muganga Mukwege. Muganga Mukwege ni umuhinga mu bijanye n'ubuzima bw'irondoka ku bagore (gynécologue), akaba afise ivuriro mu ntara ya Kivu y'Ubumanuko. Yaronkejwe agashimwe k'amahoro kitiriwe Nobel mu 2018 ku gikorwa ciwe co kwitaho abakorewe ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina mu gihe c'intambara.

column2: Intanbara ya Ukraine : Abarugwanye biteguriye intambara ku karere kigaruriwe ka Luhansk
column3: Urwamo rw'ibisasu bikomakomeye vyumvikana cane igihe twariko turagana ku kirindiro c'abasirikare ba Ukraine i Luhansk. Hari kandi n'urwamo rw'amabombe aho haza haracamwo n'urwo inkoho zito zito. Twari nko ku metero 50 uvuye ku birindiro vy'abarusiya. Iyi ishobora kuba ari intambara yo mu kinjana ca 21, ariko uko ibinogo vyo kwinyegezamwo yimbwe, bisa n'ivyo mu ntambara ya mbere y'isi yose. Ibitero vy'Uburusiya mu buseruko bwa Ukraine biza vyamaze kugwira. Ivyo ushobora kubibonera ku rukurikirane rurerure rw'amamodoka mu burengero rugana ahakiri agahengwe; ushobora no kubibonera ku mabarabara agaragara uriko uraca mu bisagara vya Donbas, kandi ushobora no kuvyumvira ku rwamo rw'ibisasu bikomakomeye vy'Uburusiya. Uburusiya buriko burarungika benshi mu basirikare babwo bahora mu buraruko no mu buseruko bwa Ukraine. Intumbero n'iyo kwongereza inguvu mu ntambara iriko ibera i Luhansk na Donetsk - ibice bimwe bimwe vyaho bikaba vyari bisanzwe vyarigaruriwe n'abiyonkoye bashigikiwe n'Uburusiya. Uburusiya buzoharonkera akoyoko mu kuronka inzira ngufi bucishamwo ivyo bukeneye ku rugamba - ivyabateye ikibazo bigatuma bananirwa mu bitero vy'i Kyiv. Uburusiya n'ababuyoboka ubu bagenzura ibice 90% vya Luhansk hamwe n'igice kirenga ca Donetsk - ahahoze ari umutima w'amahinguriro muri Ukraine. Hari umwotsi uri hejuru muri ako karere gasanzwe karasinzikajwe no kwimbwamwo ubutare hamwe n'amahinguriro. Ingabo za Ukraine zimaze imyaka umunani zigwana iyi ntambara ngaha. Muri bo harimwo bamwe mu basirikare karuhariwe b'ico gihugu. Abategetsi ba Buraya bavuga ko ingabo za Ukraine ziri mu karere ka Donbas ari aba mbere mu buhinga bwa gisirikare kandi bafise n'ibigwanisho bigezweho. Mu gihe ingabo z'Uburusiya ziriko ziregerana ziva mu buraruko, mu buseruko no mu bumanuko, hari ubwoba ko bashobora kubakikuza bagasigara mu kangaratete. Uburusiya buramaze kwigarurira igice kinini ca Ukraine. Ariko baracabandanya kwimba ibinogo  mu kubandanya urugamba.  Mu gihe twariko turaca mu buseruko ku birindiro vyabo twabonye ibirindiro vyabo vyo kwivuna umwansi, kandi hari himvye n'ibinogo. Anatoly, umusirikare w'imyaka 52, ariko ararabira mu matarubindi yinyegeje mu kinogo, ahari ibirindiro vy'abarusiya. Yambwiye ati:   "Ndabona abarusiya, turasa". Ariko yari yiteguye kugumya ico kirindiro. Yavuze ati : "Mu gihe bogerageza gufata ikirindiro cacu, nzobica. Ntabishe bazonyica. N'uko intambara imera." Bamwe mu bagabo twavuganye bemeza ko bateguye neza ibinogo binyegezamwo kandi ko uko biteguye kwivuna bibaha inguvu zisumba ababateye. Andrej, umusirikare w'imyaka 27, yari kumwe n'imbwa yiwe yitwa Lucifer mu kinogo. Yambwiye ati: "Dufise ibigwanisho vyiza, kandi dufise aho twinyegeje hakomeye, mu gihe abarusiya bodutera ngaha, bazotsindwa". Izo ngabo zivugako zagumye zirungikirwa ibigwanisho vy'i Buraya nka misile zitwa Javelin zirarasa ibimodoka bitamenwa. Barashima ariko bizeye kuronka vyinshi gusumba. Andrej yavuze ko prezida Putin "afise ingorane mu mutwe" (Psycho) ariko yongerako ko ibiziga vy'abasirikare biwe b'abarusiya bishobora kuba ibitabizo vy'isi yabo. Abo basirikare baboneka nk'abantu barushe  kubera iyo ntambara, ariko bose bavuga ko ishaka rikiri ryose. Icegera c'uwurongoye urugamba, Roman, yamaze imyaka ine yiga ivyigwa vy'inyifato y'abantu (Psychology) muri kaminuza ya Lviv. Iruhande yo kurwana, arafasha abo bari kumwe ku rugamba bafise ibibazo vyo mu mutwe. Ariko yavuze ati: "Mu bisanzwe abantu ntibakeneye ubufasha bwanje. Bafise ishaka rikomeye ryo kugwanira imiryango yabo, abagenzi n'ivyabo ugereranije n'abarusiya agereranya n'agasuzuguro kenshi nka "zombie". Abasirikare ba Ukraine bose barazi neza ko abarusiya bariko bararungika abasirikare benshi mu busruko. Barazi ko hagiye kuba ibintu bibi. Ariko Roman yemeza ko abasirikare ba Ukraine bafise amayeri yo kugwana akomeye. Avuga ko amatwara ya gisirikare y'Uburusiya atarigera atera imbere kuva habaye intambara ya kabiri y'isi yose, aho bishimikiza ibirwanisho birasa kure. Ariko ivyo bigwanisho birasa kure vy'Uburusiya bimaze gutuma abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bata izabo.

column2: China yanse umugambi wa OMS/WHO wo gukora ayandi matohoza ku mamuko ya Covid
column3: Ubushinwa buriyamiriza ibisabwa n'ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO, vyo gukora ayandi matohoza ku mamuko y'ikiza-karanda ca Covid-19. Umukuru wa OMS Muganga Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus yateye akamo Ubushinwa ko bwokwifatanya n'abazokora ayo matohoza mu kurondera kumenya ingene uwu mugera watanguye, harimwo n'ubugenzuzi ku ma laboratoires. Zeng Yixin, icegera c'umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu, avuga ko ibi  vyerekana "agakengere n'agasuzuguro mu bijanye n'ubuhinga". Avuga ko uwu mugambi ufise intumbero za poritike, rero ko Ubushinwa budashobora kuwihanganira. Mu kwa mbere uno mwaka, OMS yashoboye kurungika umurwi w'abahinga i Wuhan - igisagara catowemwo ubwa mbere uwo mugera mu kwa cumi na kabiri 2019 - kugira ngo bihweze amamuko y'iki kiza. Amatohoza yabo yerekanye ko hari amahirwe make cane y'uko coronavirus yoba yacorotse iva muri laboratoire, ariko abantu babandanya bibaza uko. Mu ntango z'uku kwezi, Dr Tedros yashikirije integuro y'aya matohoza agira kabiri asabwa, harimwo gukora umwihwezo ku bigo bijejwe ubushakashatsi mu bijanye n'ubuhinga mu turere twatowemwo uwo mugera ubwa mbere. Asaba Pékin/Beijing "gukorera mu muco, kudahisha na kimwe no gufashanya" n'abajejwe amatohoza kandi igatanga amakuru atatanzwe mu matohoza ya mbere ku barwayi ba mbere . Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru kuri uyu wa kane, Zeng yavuze ko aguye mu gahunwe yumvise ibisabwa na OMS kubera yibanda ahanini ku bivugwa ko Ubushinwa bwahonyanze ingingo ngenderwako zijanye n'ibikorwa vya laboratoire. Avuga ko Ubushinwa "budashobora" kwemera ibisabwa, yongerako kandi y'uko igihugu ubwaco catanze urutonde rw'ivyokorwa  ku bijanye n'amahotoza ku nkomoko y'uwu mugera. Reuters yasubiyemwo amajambo ya Zeng aho yavuga ati: "Twizeye ko OMS izokwihweza neza ivyiyumviro n'intumbero vyashikirijwe n'abahinga b'abashinwa hanyuma igakora amatohoza ku nkomoko ya Covid-19 yisunze ubuhinga, ikikurako abanyaporitike bagomba kuyinjirira". Yuan Zhiming, umukuru wa National Biosafety Laboratory yo ku kigo ca Wuhan cihweza ibijanye n'imigera, Wuhan Institute of Virology, nawe nyene yari muri ico kiganiro n'abanyamakuru. Yavuze ko uwu mugera ufise amamuko kama (origines naturelles), anashimangira ko atari umugera wacorotse laboratoire kandi ko ata mukozi wabo yigeze yandura kuva itangura mu 2019. Abantu barenga imiriyoni zine kw'isi yose baramaze guhitanwa n'iki kiza kuva cadutse, amakungu akaba abandanya asaba OMS gukora ayandi matohoza ku mamuko y'uwu mugera. Mu ntango z'uno mwaka, Perezida Joe Biden wa Amerika na we nyene yategetse abajejwe igendereza muri ico gihugu "kwongereza" inguvu mu twigoro twabo two gutohoza ibijanye n'iki kiza.

column2: Mesut Ozil na Sead Kolasinac ntibazokina igihe Newcastle yizoba akira Arsenal kubera ikibazo c’umutekano
column3: Mesut Ozil na Sead Kolasinac ntibari ku rutonde rw'abakinyi ba Arsenal bazoja guhura na Newcastle ejo ku munsi wa Mungu kubera "ibibazo vy'umutekano wabo". Abo bakinyi bompi baherutse guterwa n'akarwi nk'inkozi z'ikibi zahatswe kunyuruza amamodoka yabo, mu ndwi zibiri ziheze, mu buraruko bw'igisagara ca Londres. Arsenal ivuga ko yashikirije igipolisi ico kibazo kandi "ko ibandanya ifata mu mugongo abo bakinyi n'imiryango yabo". Iti: "Umutekano w'abakinyi n'imiryango yabo, nico gikorwa kiza imbere ya vyose". "Twafashe iyi ngingo inyuma y'aho tuvuganiye nabo hamwe n'ababaserukira". "Twibaza ko vuba bwango tuzoba turi kumwe nabo mu murwi". Igipolisi kivuga ko kiriko kirakora amatohoza ku vyabaye. Mw'itangazo casohoye, kivuga ko kiriko "kivugana na Arsenal kandi ko kizokora amatohoza ku bukozi bw'ikibi bwose bwashikirijwe". Hampande y'ivyo, ihiganwa ry'Ubwongerezwa Premier League ryaraye ritanguye icese, aho umurwi wa Liverpool waraye ukosoye umurwi wa Norwich. Hampande ya kizigenza wa Norwich Grant Hanley yiyinjije igitsindo ca mbere ca Liverpool ku munota w'indwi, Mohamed Salah, Virgil van Dijk, na Divock Origi babandanije bereka uwo murwi winjiye muri Premier League uvuye mu cicaro ca kabiri ko ibintu bitoroshe mu Bwongereza. Liverpool yarangije igikorwa mu gice ca mbere gusa, cagiye kurangira ifise ibitsindo bine ku busa bw'umurwi Norwich, n'aho yabandanije isatira ariko biranka ko ironka ikindi. Norwich yoyo yarinanase iraronka igitsindo kimwe rudende ku munota wa 64, urukino rurangira ari bine vya Liverpool kuri kimwe ca Norwich. Uno munsi ku wa gatandatu, hategekanijwe inkino zitandatu ziza gutangura isaha indwi n'igice ku masaha y'Uburundi n'u Rwanda, ku rukino ruza guhuza West Ham United iza kwakira Manchester City yatsindiye ihiganwa ry'umwaka uheze. Ejo ku wa Mungu, hampande ya Arsenal irindiriwe n'igishika cinshi kugira yerekane inguvu zayo aho zigera mu gihe izoramuka yakirwa na Newcastle, urundi rukino rurindiriwe cane ruzohuza Manchester United na Chelsea i Old Trafford isaha cumi n'imwe n'igice (17h30) mu masaha y'Uburundi nu Rwanda.

column2: Sudan: Reta ivuga ko yaburijemwo itembagazwa ry'ubutegetsi
column3: Ikinyamakuru cegamiye reta ya Sudani gitangaza ko muri kano gatondo ko ku wa kabiri hari abashatse kugerageza gutembagaza ubutegetsi bw'ico gihugu bagateshwa, ariko nticatangaje abo ari bo. Iki kinyamakuru kiti: "Habayeho kugerageza gutembagaza ubutegetsi, abanyagihugu bategerezwa guhaguruka bakabirwanya". Umuvugizi wa reta Mohamed Al Faki Suleiman avuga ko abikekwa muri iki gikorwa bategerezwa kubazwa. Amakuru ava muri Sudani avuga ko abashatse gutembagaza ubu butegetsi bagerageje kwifatira ibibanza bikuru bikuru, harimwo iradiyo, ariko bagateshwa. Amareresi yahanahanywe ku mbuga hwaniro avugwa ko ari ayo ku mugwa mukuru Khartoum yerekana abasirikare bari mu biduga vya burende mu mabarabara, bamwe bereka imiduga inzira itegerezwa gufata. Umutegetsi wo mu nama nkuru irongoye igihugu yabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters ko bamaze gufata ibintu mu minwe. Hari imigumuko muri Khartoum, bikaba vyari vyitezwe ko kuri uyu wa kabiri haba imyiyerekano, igisirikare kikaba cahashitse kugira gikomeze umutekano. Sudani ubu isanzwe irongowe n'umushikiranganji wa mbere Abdalla Hamdok ahagarariye reta mfatakibanza yashinzwe inyuma y'aho ubutegetsi bwa Omar al-Bashir butembagarijwe mu kwa kane 2019. Bashir yabogojwe inyuma y'imyiyerekano yari imaze amezi atari make yo kumwiyamiriza, ubu akaba akiri imbere ya sentare ku ruhara rwiwe muri coup d'Etat yamushikanye ku butegetsi mu 1989. Iyi myiyerekano yatanguye hiyamirizwa iduzwa ry'ibiciro vy'umukate n'igitoro, ikaba yagiye kuvamwo iyo kwiyamiriza uyu mukuru w'igihugu, abagore n'urwaruka bakaba barayigizemwo uruhara  rudasanzwe.

column2: Ubutunzi bwa Afghanistani buteye ahatemba
column3: Ku musi wa kabiri, itariki 23 Munyonyo (ukwezi kwa 11), hari hakwiye imisi 100 kuva abatalibani bagarutse ku butegetsi muri Afghanistani. Umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC, Yalda Hakim yaragendeye akarere ka Kabul, kurondera inkuru yerekeye ubutunzi bwagabanutse kuva imfashanyo y’amakungu ihagaritswe, bituma haba akaga ku bantu.

column2: Burundi: Leta ikemura gute ikibazo c'ikena ry'amahera y'agaciro?
column3: Leta y'u Burundi iheruka gufata ingingo mu gisata c'ubutunzi n'urudandazwa benshi bavuga ko zigamije kugerageza kubungabunga amahera y'agaciro ari muri ico gihugu. Muri urwo rwego, Banki ya Republika y'u Burundi iherutse gufata itegeko riraba abinjirana amafaranga muri ico gihugu, harimwo n'abanyamahanga. Iryo tegeko ribabwiriza gukoresha amafranga y'amarundi mu kugura ibintu vyose imbere mu gihugu. Baterezwa kandi  kuvunjisha mu bigo vyemewe n'amategeko amafranga y'agaciro baba bafise, bashaka kuyakoresha. Iyo ngingo yakurikiranye n'iyindi igenga ukudandaza ubutare n'ayandi mabuye y'agaciro muri banki y'igihugu. Ikibazo c'ikena ry'amafatanga y'agaciro mu Burundi bivugwa ko coba kiva ahanini ku bihano u Burundi bwafatiwe n'ishirahamwe rya Buraya, ryahagaritse amahera ryaha ico gihugu kuva mu 2015 igihe hatangura ingorane za politike. Mu gushaka kumenya vyinshi kuri izo ngingo leta y'u Burundi iheruka gufata, Florentine Kwizera yavuganye na Faustin Ndikumana, umuhinga mu vy'ubutunzi. Ushobora kwumva ico kiganiro ngaha

column2: UK: umushikiranganji yasavye imbabazi inyuma y'amashusho amwerekana asomana n'umufasha
column3: Imiryango yaburiye ababo muri ca kiza karanda Covid-19 iragabisha ko umushikiranganji Matt Hancock yubahutse agasomana n'umufasha mu biro iwe bishobora gutesha urubwa reta, bigatuma abantu bahonyanga amabwirizwa ajanye no kutegerana mu ntumbero yo kurwanya iki kiza. Vyabaye ngombwa ko uyu mushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu asaba imbabazi inyuma y'aho amashusho avugwa ko yafashwe ku wa 06 z'ukwa gatanu amwerekaniye ariko asomana na Gina Coladangelo. Ishirahamwe riharanira agateka k'ababuze ababo bahitanywe na Covid-19 (Covid-19 Bereaved Families for Justice) rivuga ko mu gihe vyonanirana ko Hancock yirukanwa bishobora kugira ingaruka mbi nk'izabaye kuri Cummings, maze abantu bagahonyanga amabwirizwa. Umushikiranganji wa mbere wewe abona ko ikibazo carangiye. Umuvugizi w'ibiro vy'umushikiranganji wa mbere avuga ko Boris Johnson yemeye imbabazi zasabwe na Hancock, kandi ko afitiye icizere uyu mushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu. Ishirahamwe Covid-19 Bereaved Families for Justice ryandikiye umushikiranganji wa mbere Johnson rimusaba kwirukana Hancock mu gihe atotanga imihoho, rikibaza mbere nimba uyu mushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu akibereye kuba umutegetsi yofata ingingo zijanye na Covid. Rivka Gottlieb wo mw'iryo shirahamwe yavugiye mu kiganiro The World Tonight ca BBC Radio 4 ati: "Mu gihe yoramuka atangaje izindi ngingo za guma mu rugo canke ayandi mabwirizwa, ubona hari n'umwe yokwumvira umuntu na we ubwiwe adakurikiza amabwirizwa"? "Ivyo twese vyaratubabaje. Kuri Cummings ntacabaye, yibandanirije akazi kiwe, ehe raba ivyabaye, abantu baciye batangura guhonyanga amabwirizwa. Mfise ubwoba ko ivyo ari vyo bishobora kuba". ingingo yo kutegerana ku kazi si itegeko, ariko reta isaba ko abantu batandukana imetero zibiri aho bishoboka - canke imetero imwe, hampande y'izindi ngingo zo kugabanya ikwirakwira, nk'izijanye n'ukwambara udupfukamunwa. Mu kwa gatatu kw'uno mwaka, umuhanuzi mukuru w'umushikiranganji wa mbere ico gihe, Dominic Cummings, yaniramuye afata urugendo rw'ibirometero birenga 418 ava i Londres aja mu karere ka  Durham kandi igihugu cari ingingo za guma mu rugo. Ico gihe reta yari yafashe amategeko akomeye yo kugabanya uruja n'uruza Mu nyuma we n'umugore wiwe bagiye kwandura Covid. Abanyagihugu bariyamirije Cummings, ariko umushikiranganji wa mbere yaramuryamaryamyeko, mu kuvuga ko ata "kundi yari kugira" atari ugufata urwo rugendo. Prof Stephen Reicher, wo kuri kaminuza yigisha ibijanye n'inyifato, University of St Andrews' School of Psychology, avuga ko icatumye inyifato ya Cummings ibonwa "nabi cane" si ukubera vyakozwe n'umuhanuzi wa reta, ariko ni ukubera ingene Boris Johnson yamuvugiye. Prof Reicher yabwiye Newsnight ca BBC Two ati: "Ugusamara kw'umuntu umwe kwatumye abantu bibaza ibibazo ku ntwaro, aho babona ko hari itegeko rituraba twebwe irindi rikaraba abandi". "Mu gihe igihugu gihanzwe n'ibibazo bikomeye, dukeneye reta twizeye, kandi dukeneye reta dushobora kwumviriza". Abashikiranganji bandi bari muri reta bashigikiye uyu mugenzi wabo ajejwe amagara y'abantu. Ariko Sir John Curtice yigisha ibijanye na poritike kuri kaminuza ya Strathclyde yabwiye BBC BBC Radio 4 ivyo ari vyo vyose umushikiranganji Hancock ata mahoro azoronka. Ikinyamakuru The Sun, ari naco ca mbere cerekanye aya masanamu ya Hancock n'umupfasoni Coladangelo kikayashikana mu biro bijejwe amagara y'abantu, yerekana n'ayandi mashusho y'aba bantu babiri ingene bavyifatamwo. Iki kinyamakuru kivuga ko iyi sanamu iheruka yerekana Hancock n'umupfasoni Coladangelo bari mu nzu y'uburiro ku wa 23 z'ukwa gatanu - haciye imisi 17 herekanywe amashusho y'ingene bariko basomana.

column2: Ni nde yanditse Bibiliya ?
column3: Na Edison Veiga BBC News Brazil Kuba Katolika, Bibiliya igizwe n’ibitabo 73. Ku baporoti hari 66, nayo aba-orthodoxe bavuga ko hari 78. Ni mu gihe Abayahudi bemera ibitabo 39 gusa, ibi bikaba ari ivyo abakirisu bavuga ko ari ivyo mw’isezerano rya kera. Aha turiko tuvuga igitabo kigurishwa cane gusumba ibindi vyose muri kahise k’isi, Bibiliya Nyeranda, ikonganirizo ry’ibitabo vyahinduwe mu ndimi zababa 3.000 – aho ibirenga imiriyaridi 3.9 bimaze kugurishwa kw’isi yose, nk’uko bivugwa n’umuryango wa Bibliya wa Brezili (Société biblique du Brésil). Ariko none, ni bande banditse ibi bitabo? Dufashe ko ari ibitabo vya kera cane, imbere y’uko abanditsi ba none batangura kwandika uko bandika, biragoye kuronkera iki kibazo inyishu nyayo. Intango y’iki kiyago ni ukubanza kumenya nimba ari ukugifatira ku bijanye n’idini gusa, canke nimba gikwiye gufatira ku buhinga n’ubumenyi. Umuhinga mu vya kahise no mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana Gerson Leite de Moraes asanzwe yigisha kuri kaminuza Mackenzie Presbyterian University avuga ati: "Ni ikibazo kitoroshe kubera hari imbono zibiri. Imbono ya mbere ishingiye ku kwemera Imana gushingiye ku masengero, aha tukaba dufise abiga ibijanye no kwemera Imana kubera bashaka kuba abapasitori/abapatiri mu muryango kanaka, imbono kama ». Kubw’iwe, inyigisho z’amasabamana ziganisha ku busaseredoti/ubupasitori, zitegerezwa « kugendera ku nyigisho z’uko ivyanditswe vyavugishijwe, ni ukuvuga ko ari ivyavuzwe n’Imana yo nyene ubwayo, iciye kuri Mutima Mweranda/Mpwemu Yera ». Avuga ati : "Ku rundi ruhande, inyigisho ku bijanye no kwemera Imana zishingiye ku buhinga ntizirajwe ishinga n’iyo mbono, ahubwo zozo zirondera kwihweza uko izi nyandiko zaje ufatiye ku bihe vya kahise ». Muri iyi nzira, turashobora gutahura ibitabo vya mbere vya Bibiliya, ibigize vya bitabo bitanu vya mbere bizwi nka Pentateuque (canke nka Torah y’Abayahudi), ko ari icegeranyo c’inyandiko zanditswe ubwa mbere imyaka hafi 1.000 imbere y’umuzo wa Yezu/Yesu. Ibi ni Amamuko/Itanguriro, Ihunga, Abalewi, Guharura/Kubara  hamwe na Gutegeka kwa Kabiri  (Deuteronome)  - ibitabo bivuga ivyerekeye kuva kw’irema ry’isi gushika ku rupfu rwa Musa. Kubera ari ivya kera, abahinga bavuga ko bigoye kumenya neza na neza abavyanditse. Kubw’amayagwa y’idini, ibi bitabo bitanu vyanditswe n’umuntu umwe, Musa. José Luiz Goldfarb, umwigisha wa kaminuza ya Katorika y’i São Paulo akaba arongoye n’igisata c’imico y’ikiyahudi mu murwi A Hebraica, avuga ati : "Nsomye nkongera nkavugana n’umusiguzi akongera akaba n’umukinyi w’ivyese, Haroldo de Campos (1929-2003), nahakuye icigwa ko hari inzira zibiri zishoboka. Iyo yo mw’isinagoga ivuga ko Musa ari we yanditse Torah. Tubifata nk’uko twama ‘twumviriza’ Musa buri ndwi [ibisomwa], kandi ibi bifise agaciro mu mico y’abantu ». Ihengama ry’abahinga ntiryemera ibivugwa ko ibi bitabo vyanditswe n’umuntu umwe. Ati : "Ku bijanye n’inyigisho za Bibiliya, tuvuga ibitabo vyanditswe mu myaka irenga 600 ». "Uku niko umwihwezo wa Harold urangira hampande y’ubushakashatsi yagize kuri Bibiliya, kubisigarira vy’ivya kera (archeoloie), ku bisigarira no ku nzandiko zo guhayagiza ». Avuga ko umwihwezo wimbitse w’izi nzandiko ufasha kubitadukanya ufatiye ku nyubako, amajambo azigize, n’ibirimwo ufatiye ku banditsi mu bihe bitandukanye vyo muri kahise. Ni iciyumviro cemerwa neza. Uri Lam wo mu muryango Templo Beth-El w’abanya-Israel muri São Paulo asigura ati: "Biragoye cane kuvuga ivy’ibihe canke abanditsi kuko umuntu atakara. Amatohoza y’abahinga yemeza ko izi nyandiko zifise imyaka iri hagati ya 2.700 na 3.000 canke gusumba aho kubera vyahererekanwa ku munwa ». Kubw’iwe, izo nyandiko zaratagatifujwe – ni ukuvuga ko zegeranijwe hanyuma zifatwa ko ari izigize Bibiliya y’Abahebreyi– amaja mu kinjana ca IV imbere y’umuzo wa Yezu/Yesu. Lam yemera ati : "Ariko n’aho nyene, hari impari nyinshi, kandi ntidushobora kurangiza iki kibazo ». Goldfarb abona akarusho muri ibi vyo gufatira hamwe izi nyandiko hamwe no kuzifatira mu mice itandukanye. Yibaza ati : "Nimba ari inyandiko zamaze imyaka 600, ibi ni vyiza ku bantu bakunda ibikorwa. Ni bangahe bashoboye gusohora inyandiko mu karere kamwe canke akandi ? ». Muri ico gihe nyene ivy’abanditsi bitandukanye n’ivy’ubu, ingorane nk’izi nyene zo kumenya koko uwanditse zirabandanya mu bindi bitabo biri muri Bibiliya y’Abayahudi – ikonganirizo ry’ibitabo bigize isezerano rya kera muri bibliya ya gikirisu. Goldfarb ati: "Nk’akarorero, zaburi za Dawudi. Ni agatabo gato abantu bakoresha cane mu bisabisho n’indirimbo vya misi yose kegeranya indirimbo Dawudi yakunda kuririmba mw’isinagoga. "Tuvuga ko yari umuririmvyi kandi ko ibi bisabisho vyaririmbwa. Ni nde abizi ? Ni ikibazo ciza:  ku vyo nize ngasoma, jewe ntavyo nokwemeza… ». Moraes nawe ati: "Ikiri ukuri ni uko habaye benshi banditse ibiri muri Bibiliya ». "Igishoboka cane ni uko inkuru ziri mu vyanditswe muri bibiliya muri kino gihe imbere y’aha vyahanahanwa ku munwa igisekuru ku kindi. Kandi iri ryagumye ari itunga karanga ry’idini ry’aba bantu ». Uyu mwigisha wa kaminuza ati: "Ni ukumenya kandi ko ivyo abitirirwa inyandiko mu gihe ca kera bitandukanye n’ivyo dufise ubu. Ico gihe, vyari bikunze kuba ko inyandiko kanaka yitirirwa umutware mukuru, umutegetsi akundwa, umuntu akomeye ». Aha niho rero, abanywanyi b’inyigisho zimwe zimwe, iyo bahinduye ivyo bazi bakabishira mu nyandiko, bakunda kuzitunganya nk’uko umengo ni ikintu canditswe na ba shebuja. Moraes  yongerako ati : "Kubiraba Torah, ushaka kuvuga ko izi nzandiko zanditswe na Musa? Bishobora kuba atari vyo. Kumbure afise kuba yarabigizemwo uruhara. Hari bamwe bavuga ko ata ruhara na rutoya yagize. "Ariko ni inyandiko zitirirwa Musa." Kubw’iwe, igikenewe ni uko izi nyandiko nyeranda birangira zitiriwe amadini. Moraes yibaza ko ari ibintu vyumvikana ko ibitabo vyeranda vyanditswe, nk’akarero, inyuma y’ishingwa ry’igihugu ca Israel gusumba ibihe bivugwamwo, nk’ibijanye n’ihunga ry’Abayahudi bava mu Misiri, barongowe na Musa. Ati: "Iyumvire igico c’abantu bayerera mu bugaragwa. Ivyo kwicara ngo bandike si vyo bibaraza ishinga. Ikiraje ishinga uwuriko arayerera mu bugaragwa ni ukurondera ingene abaho. Mu myaka itari mike, vyabaye ngombwa ko bategura intambara kugira ngo baronke ubutaka…nta n’umwe yari anezwe ivyo kwandika ibitabo." Uyu mushakashatsi ati: "Ikintu kinini gishoboka, ni uko ibi vyagiye kuba hashinzwe umuryango wiyubatse neza." Ariko zari inkuru zidakomeye cane, z’ubwoko butandukanye, vyarangiye zegeranijwe zigashirwa  hamwe n’umwanditsi umwe canke benshi. Umuhinga mu nyandiko nyeranda, Thiago Maerki akaba n’umushakashatsi kw’ishure kaminuza rya São Paulo (Unifesp), akaba kandi ari mw’ishirahamwe Hagiography Society, muri Amerika, arashima cane iciyumviro co gukoresha ubumenyi bwa none mu vy’indimi mu kugerageza gushira hamwe canke gutandukanya inyandiko zigize Bibiliya. Kubw’iwe, abanditsi nk’umwigisha wa kaminuza Robert Alter, umunyamerika yigisha kw’ishure kaminuza ya California, "babivuga neza ", nk’igihe avuga ko ari vyiza "gukoresha uburyo bumwe bumwe bukoreshwa mu kwiga ibijanye n’ivya kahise k’indimi n’inyandiko mu kwiga inyandiko za Bibiliya". Maerki ati: "Arihweza ubuhinga bw’inyandiko, impinyanyuro z’amajambo yakoreshejwe, ubudasa mu gushikiriza ivyiyumviro, imyumvikano ikurikizwa mu bwoko bumwe bumwe bw’inyandiko ya Bibiliya, na buri mwanditsi. "Igihe cose kugira ngo ntihabe kuzana ivyataye igihe." Indinganizo y’amayagwa nayo nyene ishobora kwisungwa mu mwihwezo w’ibitabo bine vy’injili, ibitabo bivuga ubuzima bwa Yezu, bikaba vyitirirwa Matayo, Mariko, Luka na Yohani. Umushakashatsi kuri kahise k’idini rya Gikristu kw’ishure kaminuza Université pontificale grégorienne i Rome akongera akaba n’umuhinga ku bijanye na Vaticano Mirticeli Medeiros, arabishingira intahe ko, ata gukekeranya, abanditse ibi bitabo bine ari abo bagabo bane. Asigura ati : "Ku vy’Injili, nta mpari zihari [kuba zitirirwa], n’imiburiburi ufatiye ku bushakashatsi bwa vuba. Aha ni ukwibuka ko babiri mu banditsi bazo, Matayo na Yohani, bari abatumwa ba Yezu/Yesu. Aba bandi babiri, Mariko na Luka, ku ruhande rwabo, bateguye inyandiko zabo bisunze ivyo abatumwa bashingiye intahe." Maerki arasangamwo ubudasa mu mpinyanyuro z’amajambo muri ibi bitabo bine. Asigura ati : "Matayo afatwa nk’umwanditsi adakoresha impinyanyuro itaziguye, akoresha impinyanyuro isanzwe. Yohani akoresha ururimi rugoye, rwuzuye imizunguruko, imvugo ngereranyo. Luka akoresha imvugo inonosoye, ihanitse." Nimba mw’isezerano rya kera hari ibibazo vyinshi gusumba ibizwi ku bijanye n’abitirirwa ibitabo, inyandiko zo mw’isezerano rishasha, n’aho ari iza vuba kandi n’abazitirirwa bavugwa hafi muri zose, naho nyene harimwo ibibazo. Birazwi ko bimwe muri vyo vyatanguye kwandikwa imyaka 30 canke 40 inyuma y’urupfu rwa Yezu. Moraes avuga ko "bishoboka cane ko aya mazina yose [y’aba banditsi b’Injili bane] yaje biciye mu mico n’imigenzo." Ashimangira ati : "Nta zina ry’umuntu yitirirwa ibi bitabo vya kera cane." Igisa n’uko ata mpari gitera ni uko iya mbere muri izi njili ari iya Mariko. Ati: "Mu gihe hari igisekuru, igisekuru cakurikiranye ubuzima bwa Yezu gushika apfe, ni ngombwa ko kigumana inyandiko ku vyabaye. Rero nico gitangura ubwoko bushasha bw’impinyanyuro y’amajambo, ari yo Njili." Mu gushira hamwe imico n’imigenzo hamwe n’ivyahanahanwa ku munwa, uyu mwanditsi w’injili arandika neza ivy’ubuzima bwa Yezu. Ariko ahagarara cane ku gice yashaka guhagararako ico gihe: aha ni ukuvuga ko ata kigoro agira ko kuvuga ku vyerekeye ivuka canke ubwana bwa Yezu, ahagarara cane cane ku gikorwa ciwe, ku rupfu rwiwe, ku butumwa bwiwe bwa Pasika. None uyu Mariko yari umuntu ki ? Umuhinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana (théologien) arerekana ko yari umwigishwa w’intumwa Petero. Ati: "Ariko abandi bazokubwira ko yari umwigishwa wa Paulo. Ivyo ari vyo vyose, ico tuzi ni uko atari umwigishwa wa Yezu." Injili ya Yohani nayo nyene irimwo amakenga. Ahari amakenga ni aho avuga  «umwigishwa yakundwa cane», aha amayagwa akerekana ko yari Yohani. Moraes ati : "Ariko hariho abahinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana babona ahubwo ko yashobora kuba ari Lazaro, kuko mu njili harimwo umurongo [mu gice kivuga urupfu rwa Lazaro] uvuga ko Yezu yarize,  ‘hanyuma raba ingene yamukunda." Mu kinjana ca 20 ni ho abakristu batanguye kmwemeza ko Yohani ari we yanditse iyi Njili. "Amayagwa yabigize uko nyene, tubandanya tumwita Yohani. Ariko ntivyoroshe kumenya uwayanditse, ishobora mbere kuba yanditswe n’umurwi wa benshi." Kubw’uyu muhinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana, ni vyiza ko tugumana iciyumviro c’uko ari « Injili zanditswe na» ugaca ushirako izina rimwe rimwe muri ayo, hakubafata nk’abanditsi b’ibitabo nk’uko bafatwa mu gihe ca none. Ariko nimba ikibazo ari Isezerano rishasha, ni ukwerekana uruhaha rwa Paulo, intumwa yandikiye amabaruwa menshi imiryango ya mbere ya gikristu. Medeiros avuga ati : "Amabaruwa ya Paulo, nk’uko iri zina ribivuga, [yanditswe] na Paulo hamwe n’abigishwa biwe. Nk’akarorero, ibaruwa ryandikiwe Timoteyo, rishobora kuba ryanditswe na Paulo, rero abahinga bamwe baryita Deutéro-Paulin". "Hagati aho, hari impari ku vyerekeye amabaruwa yitirirwa Petero, kandi ashobora kuba atanditswe na we nyene ubwiwe. Co kimwe kandi n’irya Paulo yandikiye abahebreyi, rishobora cane kuba ryagiye kurangizwa n’umwe mu bigishwa biwe ». Paulo yumvikana ko ari we yatanguye kwandika kuri Yezu, kuva mu mwaka wa 57 canke 58. Moraes  avuga ati : "Ikibazo nyamukuru ni ukumenya nimba yari azi ko yariko yandika inyandiko nyeranda. Ashobora kuba atari abizi." "Hari uburyo yakoresha mu kuvugana n’amasengero hanyuma agasiga amakete. Amwe muri yo yaratakaye, amwe muyo twita ko ari amabaruwa yiwe yanditswe kumbure n’abigishwa biwe, ariko ashirwa mu murwi w’ayanditswe na Paulo." Uyu muhinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana avuga ati: "Iyo tuvuga amabaruwa ya Petero, kumbure yanditswe n’abamwegereye, kuko Petero ntiyari azi kwandika, kandi arabitomora mw’ibaruwa ryiwe [rya mbere].  Yakoresha umwanditsi mu kwandika. Kumbure afise kuba yabwira icegera ciwe, yitwa Silvano, ivyo yandika."

column2: Itegeko rya Islam Sharia rirabuza umuziki, kubera iki? Haruna Nkunduwiga arasigura
column3: Inyuma y’aho aba Taliban bafatiye ubutegetsi muri Afghanistan, ikintu ca mbere batangaje ni uko iki gihugu gitegerezwa kugendera kw’itegeko rya Islam, rizwi nka Sharia.

column2: Umwamikazi Elizabeth atanguye urugendo rwa nyuma, abanyagihugu baramwunamira
column3: Urugendo rwa nyuma kandi rubabaje rw’Umwamikazi  Queen Elizabeth II w’ubwongereza rwatanguye kuri uno wa Mungu, ikiziga ciwe kikaba kivanywe i Balmoral kijanwa ku kirimba c’umwami ca Holyroodhouse muri  Edinburgh. Ibihumbi n’ibihumbi baratonze ku mabarabara mu kwunamira ubwa nyuma umwamikazi. Iyi niyo ntambwe ya mbere y’ibikorwa vyo kumushingura vyitezwe mu ndwi iza i Londres/London. Ikiziga kigenda bukebuka n’imodoka gushika Edinburgh uburebure bw’ibirometero 280. Gicishwa mu bibanza bitandukanye kuva Aberdeen, Dundee, na Perth, uru rukaba ari urugendo ruza kumara amasaha atandatu. Kiza gushikanwa i Holyroodhouse – ingoro y’Umwami w’Ubwongereza ku mugwa mukuru wa Ecosse/Scotland – kikaza gushirwa mu cumba kidasanzwe. Ku muhingamo w’ejo ku wa mbere, hazoba ikigandaro mw’Isengero nkuru yitiriwe Umweranda Giles, kizokwitabirwa n’umuryango w’i bwami. Isandugu izohamara amasaha 24, kugira ngo abantu bashobore kumwunamira ubwa nyuma. Umusi uzokurikira Umuganwakazi Anne azoherekeza ikiziga ca nyina wiwe mu gihe kizoba gitwawe n’indege i Londres.  Isandugu y’ikiziga c’Umwamikazi kizovanwa ku kibuga c’indege ca Edinburgh ijanwe i Buckingham n’indege gigishijwe ku kibuga c’indege ca RAF Northolt. Ku wa gatatu, ikiziga c’Umwamikazi kizojanwa mu ngoro ya Westminster (Westminster Hall) inyuma gatoya y’isaha umunani z’umuhingamo, urugeno ruzomara iminota yaba 40, abanyagihugu bakazoronka akaryo ko kumwunamira muri uru rugendo. Niho kizoguma imbere yo gushingurwa. Ibirori vyo gushingura umwamikazi Elizabeth bizoba ku wa mbere igenekerezo rya 19 Nyakanga (9), 2022 mw’isengero Westminster Abbey, nk’uko itangazo ryasohowe n’ikirimba ca Buckingham ribivuga. Uru rusengero ni urusengero rudasanzwe kuko niho abami n’abamikazi bimikirwa, harimwo n’uyu Mwamikazi nyene mu 1953, rukaba ari narwo rwabereyemwo ubugeni bwiwe n’Umuganwa Philip mu 1947. Nta birori vyo gufuba umwami vyari bwigere bibera muri uru rusengero kuva mu kinjana ca 18, n’aho ibirori vyo gushingura nyina w’uyu Mwamikazi ari ho vyabereye mu 2002. Abakuru b’ibihugu bavuye mu bihugu bitandukanye vy’isi bazofata urugendo bagiye kwifatanya n’umuryango w’I bwami kwibuka ubuzima bw’umwamikazi n’ibikorwa vyiwe. Abanyaporitike bakomakomeye n’abahoze ari abashikiranganji ba mbere b’Ubwongereza nabo nyene bazokwitabira ibi birori. Ibirori bizotangurwa no kuvana isandugu y’ikiziga c’umwamikazi mu cumba ca Westminster itwarwe mu Rusengero rwa Westminster mu modoka y’igisata ca gisirikare kirwanira mu mazi. Inyuma y’ibi birori, ikiziga kizovanwa i Westminster Abbey kijanwe ahitwa Wellington Arch, ari naho kizovanwa kigatwarwa gushingurwa i Windsor.

column2: Man U: Ralf Rangnick avuga ko ivyo kuwanira ubukapiteni hagati ya Maguire na Ronaldo ari 'ibinyoma'
column3: Umumenyereza mfatakibanza wa Manchester United Ralf Rangnick avuga ko amakuru y'ukutumvikana kuri hagati ya kizigenza Harry Maguire na Cristiano Ronaldo ari "ikinyoma ceruye". Inkuru yanditswe n'ikinyamakuru Mirror ivuga ko aba bakinyi babiri "bai mu rugamba rukomeye" barwanira kuba kizigenza. Rangnick avuga ko yabwiwe ivy'iyo nkuru yanditswe ariko ko itamuhagaritse umutima "kuko ndazi ko atari iy'ukuri". Uyu Mudagi ati: "Iki ni ikinyoma ceruye - sindigera mvugana n'aba bakinyi ibijanye n'ikibanza ca kizigenza". "Ico nta ngorane cigeze kintera. Harry ni we kizigenza wacu kandi azobandanya ari kizigenza wacu". Maguire yagenywe kuba kizigenza n'uwahoze ari umumenyereza w'uyu murwi Ole Gunnar Solskjaer. haraciye imyaka ibiri, ariko iyo nkuru yanditswe muri ico kinyamakuru ivuga ko igaruka rya Ronaldo w'imyaka 27 muri uyu murwi ritamworohereje. Aciye ku mbuga hwaniro, uyu mukinyi w'inyuma w'Ubwongereza avuga ko iyi nkuru atari yo kandi ko we na bagenziwe "banama rimwe kandi bafise intumbero imwe" yo kwitegurira urukino rw'ejo ku wa Mungu na Leeds United. Rangnick yongerako ati: "Ni ukuri nta mutima usimba kuko ndazi ko ari ikinyoma. Ivyo sinigera navyumviriza kuko ikindaje ishinga ari ugutegura umurwi wanje". "Numvise ivyanditswe. Ni vyo, hariho abakinyi batanezerejwe n'ingene akadirisha k'igura n'igurishwa ry'abakinyi ryaheze. Ibi vyararenganye kandi icuka mu murwi ni ciza ugereranije no mu ndwi nkeya ziheze". "Ikituraje ishinga ni ugukina neza kandi tukerekana ubumwe ku kibuga. Ico ni co twokwitaho". Rangnick avuga ko yari aherutse kubwirwa ibijanye n'ubushamirane busanzwe buri hagati ya Manchester United na Leeds kandi ko arindiranye igishika no gukinira kuri Elland Road (ikibuga ca Leeds United) yuzuye. "Twari dufise imirwi mikeya ihangana bikomeuye mu Budagi. Ariko, umurwi wacu ufise uburambe bukomeye  bwo buhangana n'imrwi mu bihe nk'ibi.
