"Uko ndabizi, ni rwo rukino rwa mbere [kuri Manchester United] ikibuga ca Elland Road  cuzuye, haraciye igihe. tuarurindiranye igishika".

column2: Lady Gaga n'umufana bituye hasi bavuye hejuru ku butambiro i Las Vegas, batanguza imitwe
column3: Lady Gaga yaraguye atanguza umutwe amaguru aja hejuru agwa mu barorerezi mu giteramo giheruka mu muji wa Las Vegas. Uwo 'musani' yari yahamagaye umufana wiwe azwi nka Jack ngo aze ku butambiro, aca asimbira mu maboko yiwe - ariko uwo mufana abura intege bose baca batembera hasi. Umwe mu bariko bararorera igiteramo yanditse agira ati "n'ukuri twari tuzi yuko apfuye". Ahubwo Gaga yaciye agaruka ku butambiro aririmba indirimbo Million Reasons na Jack amuri impande. Yagize ati "Birahimbaye. Turakundana cane ku buryo twaguye twese tuva ku butambiro." "Twagwanye mu maboko. Turi nka Jack na Rose bo muri Titanic. "Ndibaza ko tuza gusangira icayi nyuma y'aha." Abafana bari bagize ubwoba bibaza ko Gaga yababaye kuko asanzwe afise uburwayi buzwi nka fibromyalgia, uburwayi amaranye igihe butuma ababara umubiri wose. Ubwo burwayi bushobora kandi gutuma ababa birengeje, akaruha, inyama z'umubiri zikagumirwa, kwibuka bikamugora kandi akabura itiro. Mu 2013, yahagaritse ibiteramo vy'urukurikirane Born This Way amaze kuvunika ikiyunguyungu. Ariko uwo muririmvyi kugwa kw'ejo kuwa kane ntaco kwamutwaye, ahumuriza abarorerezi hamwe n'abajejwe umutekano bamufashije guhaguruka. Kanda ngaha urabe ingene Lady Gaga n'umufana baguye Yagize ati: "Vyose ni sawa. Ikintu kimwe kitagenda ni uko dukeneye ingazi kuri ubu butambiro kugira nsubire hejuru." Uwo 'musani' yanahojeje Jack, yari yarenzwe n'umwosori kubera ivyari bihejeje kuba. Gaga yagize ati: "Ntugire ingorane, vyose ni sawa. Si ikosa ryawe. Urashobora kunyemerera ikintu? Urashobora kwibabarira ubu nyene kubera ibihejeje gushika?" Nyuma muri ico giteramo, Gaga yarerekanye yuko ukwo kugwa ata na kimwe kwamutwaye aca akora ikarasisi rikomeye ariko araririmba indirimbo yiwe ikunzwe, Bad Romance.

column2: Omicron: Ubwongereza bwisubiyeko bwemerera ingenzi zo muri Afrika kwinjira
column3: Ubwongereza bwakuye ibihugu 11 vyo muri Afrika ku rutonde rutukura, ibintu vyari bibangamiye cane ingendo hagati y'ivyo bihugu na UK. Abongereza gusa canke abo muri Irlande canke abafise uruhusha rwo kuba mu Bwongereza nibo gusa bari bemerewe kwinjira mu gihugu. Ukwo gukumira kwashizweko mu kwezi guheze kugira hagabanywe ukwiyongera kw'ubwoko Omicron bwa Covid-19. Bamwe mu bavyiyamirije bavuze ko iyo ngingo ari "mvangura-rukoba" kuko ibihugu vyo muri Afrika gusa ari vyo vyari kuri urwo rutonde rutukura. Mu ntango ibihugu vyose vyari ivyo mu bumanuko bwa Afrika, birimwo Afrika y'epfo na Botswana aho Omicron yatowe ubwa mbere, ariko na Nigeria yaje kwongerwako mu nyuma. Ivyo bihugu 11 ni: Angola Botswana Eswatini Lesotho Malawi Mozambike Namibia Nigeria Afrika y'epfo Zambia Zimbabwe Guhagarika ingingo yo kubikumira biraja mu ngiro kuwa gatatu itariki 15/12/2021 saa 04:00 GMT (06:00 mu Rwanda no mu Burundi). Mu gukurako iyo ngingo umushikiranganji w'Ubwongereza ajejwe amagara, Sajid Javid, yabwiye inama nshingamateka ati: "Mu gihe ubu hamaze gutangura kwanduzanya Omicron hagati mu Bwongereza kandi Omicron ikaba imaze gukwira hose mu gihugu, urutonde rutukura nta kamaro rugifise mu kugabanya Omicron yoza ivuye hanze".

column2: Uganda: Udukingirizo imiliyoni 4 tudakwije ibisabwa bagomba ko tuvanwa mu bantu
column3: Abategetsi ba Uganda bategetse ko udukingirizo duherutse gutangwa incuro zibiri n'ishirahamwe Marie Stopes Uganda rijejwe irondoka rijanye n'amagara meza dukurwa mu bantu. Mw'itangazo ryasohowe na muganga Carole Sekimpi, arongoye Marie Stopes, avuga ati: "Turazi ko Life Guard ikwije ibisabwa n'amategeko. Ariko, izatanzwe ku ncuro zibiri ziheruka ntizikwije ivyo dusaba". Arashimangira ariko y'uko iyo ngingo yerekeye iziherutse gutangwa kuri izi ncuro zibiri za nyuma. Ikinyamakuru Daily Monitor kivuga ko utwo dukingirizo tungana n'imiliyoni zine. Ikigo kijejwe imiti muri Uganda (NDA) casohoye urwandiko mu kwezi guheze kivuga ko ibipimo vyerekana "udutoboro n'ibimenyetso bigaragaza ko utwo dukingirizo dushobora guturika". Muri urwo rwandiko, Victoria Nambasa, ajejwe kugenzura ko imiti ikwije ibisabwa n'amategeko muri ico kigo yanditse ati: "Tubahaye indwi zibiri kugira ngo mutwereke ingene muzoba mwazikuye mu bantu n'abakiriya bazoba bazisubije". Ibiharuro bitangwa n'ubushikiranganji bujejwe amagara y'abantu muri Uganda bivuga ko udukingirizo hafi imiliyoni 800 ari two dukenewe ngo birinde imbanyi batipfuza, SIDA n'indwara ziciye mu mibonano mpuzabitsina.

column2: DR Congo: Ekleziya Gatorika isaba abapatiri bavyaye kuva mu mabanga
column3: Urwandiko rw'Inama y'Abepiskopi ba Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo, CENCO, rwanyereye rugashika mu minwe y'ibinyamakuru rusaba abapatiri bo muri Congo bavyaye abana gutanga imihoho mu mabanga yabo y'ubusaserdoti, nk'uko vyandikwa n'ikinyamakuru RFI. Inama y'abepiskopi CENCO, itegeka ko kizira y'uko abapatiri barangura amabanga y'abubatse. Urwo rwandiko rusohotse mu gihe Papa Francis yimirije kugendera Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo muri Mukakaro (7) uyu mwaka. Muri uru rwandiko rw'impapuro 19 rwiswe "A l'école de Jésus-Christ. Pour une vie sacerdotale authentique" (ni ukuvuga: Kw'ishure rya Yezu/Yesu Kristu/Kristo. Ubuzima nyabwo bw'ukwihebera Imana), abasenyeri bavuga ko ubuzima bw'igipatiri budashobora kubangikanwa n'ubuzima bw'ukuba serugo. CENCO isaba uwihebeye Imana uwo ari we wese afise umwana "gusaba uruhusha Papa rwo kuva muri ayo mabanga", nk'uko bisubirwamwo na RFI. Uru rwandiko ruvuga ko mu gihe hogira abihebeye Imana bovyanka, musenyeri ashobora kwitura Vaticano kugira ngo ifate ibihano vyo ku rwego rwa nyuma, ibi bigasigura kwirukanwa burundi muri Ekleziya. Hari igice kimwe muri uru rwandiko rwa CENCO kivuga ibijanye n'abana b'aba bapatiri hamwe na ba nyina babo. Inama nkuru y'Abepiskopi ivuga ko ishaka "gushira ibintu ahabona" ku bijanye n'ingene ibintu bimeze kuri bo, ikibutsa ko muri rusangi usanga "banenwa mu kibano". Ico gice kigira kiti: "Ni ngombwa kuri twebwe ko twemeza ko abo bantu bariho kandi ko bababarira ku mutima".i: "Ni ngombwa kuri twebwe ko twemeza ko abo bantu bariho kandi ko bababarira ku mutima". Ikibazo c'abihebeye Imana bavyara abana muri Ekleziya Gatorika ni ikibazo giteje impari no mu bindi bihugu vy'akarere no kw'isi. Mu mpera z'umwaka uheze uwari Musenyeri mukuru wa Paris, Musenyeri Michel Aupetit, yasavye imbabazi aca atanga n'imihoho mu mabanga yiwe kubera "umubano udasanzwe n'umugore". Ico gihe kandi, Patiri Wenceslas Munyeshyaka w'umunyarwanda, yahagaritswe ku kuba padiri wa paruwasi ya Brionne mu Bufaransa inyuma y'uko bimenyekanye ko yemeye mu nzego z'ubutegetsi ko ari se w'umuhungu yavutse mu kw'indwi 2010.

column2: Menya umushakashatsi Mireille Kamariza, yatoye DMN-Tre.
column3: Mireille Kamariza ni umushakashatsi muri kaminuza ya Harvard muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, yatoye ubuhinga bworoshe kandi bunyaruka mu gupima ingwara y'igituntu. Yanonosoye ubumenyi mu bijanye n'ibinyabuzima ku rwego rwa doctorat muri kaminuza ya Standford. Akwirikirana cane cane ingwara zandukira, zirimwo malariya, igituntu, na SIDA. Muri kino gihe yongeyeko na coronavirus. Impamvu, Mireille Kamariza yabonye ko ari ingwara muri kazoza nayo nyene izoba ibangamiye ibihugu bikene gusumba ibindi. Yamenyekanye cane kuva mu mwaka wa 2018 aho amariye gutora uburyo bwo gupima igituntu akoresheje umwanya muto n'ibikoresho biciririkiye, bufatiye kw'irangi rya DMN-Tre. Bwabaye ubwa mbere, haboneka uburyo bwo gupima igituntu mu minota itarenga 15, hifashishijwe irangi uyu mushakashatsi yakoreye muri 'laboratoire' ya kaminuza ya Standaford muri Leta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, mu 2018. Aho ni mu gihe uwukekwa ko akirwaye yahora arindirira indwi zitatu mu kuronka inyishu y'ibipimo vyo kwa muganga. Uburyo Doctor Mireille Kamariza yatoye bwo gusuzuma ingwara y'igituntu -DMN-Tre (4-N,N-Dimethylamino-1,8-naphthalimide conjugate of trehalose), buhagaze ku guha ibara ridasanzwe imigera itera iyo ingwara y'igituntu (Mycobacterium tuberculosis), rituma yigaragaza bitagoranye muri rugagamisha (Microscope). Ni uburyo bushobora gutanga inyishu mu minota igera kuri icumi n'itanu, kandi iryo rangi rishobora kubikwa  ku  rugero rusanzwe rw'ubushuhe. Uburyo busanzwe bukoreshwa bwo kuvura igituntu, busaba kubanza gutegura igikororwa umurwayi aba yatanze, mu ntambwe zigera kuri 11, kikamara iminsi 21 muri 'laboratoire' kugirango bashobore gusuzuma ko hari imigera y'igituntu (Mycobacterium tuberculosis) yoba irimwo. Ubu buryo bwa Mireille Kamariza, burorosha kumenya nimba igituntu kigaragaye ku murwayi ari ikigatu (kitumva imiti isanzwe), canke gisanzwe. Ikindi kandi ngo bushobora gufasha kumenya nimba umurwayi ari ku miti iriko iramufasha, ko acandukiza canke atacandukiza. Ibi kandi ngo ntivyari vyoroshe gusuzuma hakoreshejwe uburyo bwari buhasanzwe bwo gupima iyo ngwara, nk'uko abashakashatsi bashigikiye ikoreshwa rya DMN-Tre babivuga. Ku bijanye n'igihe yibaza ubu buryo bworoshe bwo gupima igituntu buzoshikirira ibihugu bibukeneye nk'Uburundi, Dr Mireille Kamariza nta gihe atanga, ariko ngo ariko akora uko ashoboye n'ubwo ubu amaso yose yahindukiriye ikiza ca coronavirus. Uyu mushashatsi yimukiye muri Leta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika akiri umwana muto, ntiyibagiye ibibazo yabonye mu Burundi, igihugu ciwe c'amavuko. Avuga ko igituntu catwaye abantu yari azi, harimwo n'incuti, kandi ari ingwara ishobora kuvugwa igakira. Igituntu n'ingwara yandukira cane n'ubwo ishobora kwirindwa canke gukira iyo ivuwe. Ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi rimenyesha ko iyo ngwara ifata abantu bagera ku miriyoni icumi buri mwaka, muri abo igahitana umuriyoni n'igice. Aho ni mu gihe abagera ku ca kane ( 25%) c'abatuye isi baba bahuye n'uwo mugera, ariko 5-15% akaba aribo bawugaragaza nk'ingwara. Dr Mireille Kamariza avuga ko ubushakashatsi bwiwe yabuhebeye ingwara zifata cane cane abo mu bihugu bikene, izo ahandi basigaye bita 'ingwara za kahise'. Uretse ingwara y'igituntu, yitaho n'ubushakashatsi ku ngwara za Malariya na SIDA. Hejuru y'izi ngwara, yamaze kwongera mu bushakashatsi bwiwe, ingwara ya Covid-19. Agira ati: "Mu gihe bigaragara ko ibihugu bitunze biriko biratera intambwe mu kurwanya ikiza ca coronavirus mu gukwiragiza incanco mu banyagihugu bavyo, muri Afirika n'ibindi bihugu bikenye biraboneka ko bitazokworoha kuronka uburyo bwo kuyirwanya. "Nta nkeka ko muri kazoza na Coronavirus izosigara ari ikibazo muri ivyo bihugu cane cane." Intego ya Dr Mireille Kamariza, ni ukuronkera inyishu ibibazo birangwa mu gice c'abatuye isi kititaweho n'abandi bashakashatsi bakomakomeye. Ngo kuva akiri muto, yamye afise umwete n'ubwira vyo kubaza ibibazo no kubironderera inyishu, n'ubwo kuri bimwe bamubwira ko atazihari. Agira ati: "Naraba hejuru, nabona inyenyeri nkabaza abavyeyi igituma zitonze ukwo, bati nta nyishu zihari, nanje nti kabuki… reka tuzirondere?" Inyuma yo gutora irangi rya DMN-Tre rifasha gupima igituntu bitagoranye, Dr Kamariza yashinze ishirahamwe 'Olilux Biosciences Inc', yifatanije na Dr Carolyn Bertozzi yamubereye nk'umuhetsi (mentor) muri ubu bushakashatsi muri kaminuza ya Stanford. Intumbero ya Olilux Biosciences Inc, n'ukumenyekanisha ubu buryo bushasha bwo gupima igituntu hakoreshejwe irangi rya DMN-Tre, aba bahinga babona buzimbutse, bunyaruka, bushobora gukoreshwa aho ariho hose kw'isi no mu bice vya kure y'imiji n'ibisagara, bifise uburyo buciririkiye cane. Ikoreshwa ry'ubu buryo ngo rishobora kugabanya cane impfu ziturutse ku ngwara y'igituntu, ifatwa nk'iya mbere kw'isi ihitana abantu benshi mu ngwara zandukira, kuko bufasha abaganga gushoka bafata ingingo yo gushira umurwayi ku miti ubwo nyene mu gihe basanze yaranduye. Uyu mushakashatsi amaze gukorana n'umugambi ushigikiwe n'umurwizatunga Bill Gates mukurwanya iyo ngwara y'igituntu. Ku ntambwe amaze kugerako, avuga ko yatewe intege n'abavyeyi, abigisha, incuti n'abagenzi bamubonamwo impano idasanzwe y'umwete n'ubwenge bwo kurondera inyishu z'ibibazo. Ariko rero intambamyi ngo ntizibuze, ahanini akavuga ko zishingiye k'uko abantu bamufata, iyo babonye ivyo akora n'uwo ari. Gufata ko umuntu hari ivyo atoshobora kubera ico ari, ngo bituma benshi bataniyemera, ngo bashobore gukwirikira indoto zabo. Ni ibintu avuga ko atahura kuko nawe yabishiciyemwo, ariko agasaba abakiri bato kudateshwa intege n'ivyo abandi babibazako. Ati: "Kenshi iyo bantumiye kuvuga ijambo, baba biteze umugabo akuze w'umuzungu". Ku bwiwe ngo igikenewe n'umwete wo gukora ubushakashatsi, ntibisaba igitsina, ibara ry'uruhu canke ibindi vyose biranga abantu mu butandukane bwabo. Icifuzo ca Mireille Kamariza ngo ni ukubona abakiri bato bari inyuma yiwe baronka uburyo bwo kwiga bagashika kure. Ikimuraje ishinga ni ukubona abana b'Abarundi  bifuza kunonosora ubushakashatsi batabishobora kiretse barinze kuja mu mahanga.

column2: Russia Vs US: aba 'hackers' bakoze ikindi gitero c'imigera ku nyabwonko z'abagiraneza - Microsoft
column3: Ikompanyi ihingura inyabwonko Microsoft, ivuga ko habaye ikindi gico c'ibitero vy'abasuma bo ku nyabwonko (hackers) b'abarusiya bakoresha imigera ku nyabwonko z'amashirahamwe yegamiye reta n'amashirahamwe aharanira agateka ka zina muntu mu bihugu 24, cane cane muri Reta zunze Ubumwe za amerika. Microsoft ivuga ko amakonte muravyo (email accounts) ashika 3000 mu mashirahamwe atandukanye arenga 150 ari yo yatewe muri ino ndwi turimwo. Microsoft yagiriza abakoze vya bitero vyo mu mwaka uheze kuri kompanyi SolarWinds, aho urwego rw'Uburusiya (SVR) rujejwe igendereza rwagirijwe, ko ari rwo rwabikoze. Uburusiya burahakana ibi bitero vyompi. Kremlin (ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu w'Uburusiya) ivuga ko itazi ivy'ibi bitero bishasha, igasaba iyi kompanyi ya Amerika gutanga izindi nsiguro, harimwo ingene yagiriza Uburusiya. Mu nkuru yacishije ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi ku wa kane, Microsoft yavuze ko ibi bitero bishasha vyakozwe ku nzego za reta zijejwe imigenderanire n'amakungu mu gikorwa co "kwegeranya c'igendereza". Ivuga ko n'imiburiburi ica kane c'amashirahamwe yatewe afise uruhara mu bijanye n'ibikorwa mpuzamakungu vy'iterambere, ubutabazi hamwe n'agateka ka zina muntu. Mu gihe hafi yose ari muri Amerika, aya mashirahamwe yatewe ni ayo mu bihugu n'imiburiburi 24. Nk'uko Microsoft ibivuga, Nobelium, umurwi ukomoka mu Burusiya, niwo wakoze ibitero vyo muri ino ndwi mu kwinjira muri konte ya email ikoreshwa n'ishirahamwe rya reta ya Amerika rijejwe ugufashanya, USAID. Abo ba hackers baciye barungika ubutumwa muravyo (emails) busa nk'uko umengo ni ubw'ukuri, ariko bukaba bufise link/lien, uyifyonzeko ica yinjiza umugera mubi wiba amakuru yose ari mu nyabwonko yawe, ukongera ugaca utera imigera mu zindi nyabwonko zose ziri ku murongo umwe na rwawe (network/réseau). Umuvugizi w'urwego rwa Amerika rujejwe gukingira umutekano w'inyabwonko (Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency, Cisa) yabwiye ikinyamakuru CBS News  ko abategetsi bari bamenye iki gitero kandi ko bariko baragerageza "gutahura neza ingaruka zaco no gufasha abo bose bashobora kuba baratewe". Microsoft ivuga ko imigera y'ivyo bitero vyose ku bakiriya bayo yazibiwe mu buryo bwikora (Automatiquement). Ntibiramenyekana neza igitigiri c'izoba zarashoboye kwinjirwa n'iyo migera. Mu mwaka uheze, aba hackers barakoresheje ikompanyi ya Amerika, SolarWinds' Orion, bavogera ibisata vya reta ya Amerika, amakompanyi ategamiye reta hafi 100 hamwe n'amashirahamwe makeya y'Ubwongereza. Vyagiye kurangira abakiriya hafi 18.000 binjije iyi logiciel y'umugera. Amerika n'Ubwongereza bwagirije ikigo SVR ko ari co cari cakoze iki gitero. Kirahakana ivyo cagirizwa.

column2: Africa-Ukraine: Ingaruka z'intambara ziguma zigaragaza uko bukeye uko bwije
column3: Gaz (umwuka)  yo gutekesha (Liquified Petroleum  Gas, LPG)  yaduze igiciro muri Kenya  gushika kuri 11 kw'ijana mu ndwi imwe gusa, mu gihe intambara Uburusiya bwateye muri Ukraine iriko iragira ingaruka ku biciro v'ibitoro kw'isi. Ubu igiciro ca gaz yo gutekesha muri Kenya kimaze kuduga gushika kuri 50 kw'ijana mu kiringo c'umwaka, ubu kikaba congeye umuzigo ku banyagihugu bari bahanzwe  n'uburyo bwagabanutse kubera ingaruka z'ikiza ca Covid. Ubu igiciro co kwuzuza icupa rya gaz ry'ibiro 13 ciyongeyeko 11 kw'ijana muri iyi ndwi n'ukuvuga ko bica bisaba amafaranga angana n'ama dorari ($) 29.30 (hafi 60.000 mu marundi canke 30.000 mu manyarwanda) rivuye ku ma dorari 26.26 ku ndwi iheze. Ubu icupa ry'ibiro 6 ryuzuzwa kuri $13.68 kare ryari kuri $12.43. Ni  ikimenyetso ko ibihe biri imbere bitagiye kworoha ku bantu b'uburyo bubayabaye basanzwe bari bahanzwe n'ibiciro vy'ivyo kurya vyaduze cane. Bitandukanye n'ibindi bikomoka ku bitoro  nka essence, amazutu na kerosene, muri Kenya ibiciro vya gaz yo gutekesha ntibishingwa na reta, bisigura ko abaguzi baca bahura n'ingaruka uko ibiciro bihindutse kw'isoko mpuzamakungu. Kuri uyu wa mbere igiciro c'ibitoro bitayunguruye caduze gushika ku $140 ku kagunguru (barril)  kw'isoko mpuzamakungu. Ibihugu vyinshi vya Afrika biramaze kuduza ibiciro vy'ibitoro. Mu Rwanda havugwa kuduga kw'igiciro c'ibitoro... No mu Rwanda kuva kuri uyu wa mungu hari ibiciro bishasha vy'ibitoro. Mazutu yavuye kuri 1.140Frw ija kuri 1.201Frw, essence iva kuri 1.225Frw ija kuri 1.256Frw. Itangazo ry'ubuyobozi bubijejwe rivuga ko n'aho ryirinze kuduza igiciro uko vyategerezwa kugenda kugirango ibiciro  muri rusangi ntibice biduga cane ngo vyonone umurindi wo kwivyukiranya ingaruka z'ikiza ca Covid. Ariko abaraba ibintu n'ibindi bavuga ko  ibintu bishobora kwunyuka hamwe ihererekanywa ry'ivyo bitoro ryohungabana. Rolake  Akingube-Filani wo muri  Africa Energy Chamber avuga ati: "Amaherezo ingaruka zizova i Buraya zishike muri Afrika  aho ibiciro bishobora kuduga kurusha aho bigeze ubu." Yongerako ati: "Dukeneye kurondera uburyo bwo kwikwiza ku bitoro muri Afrika. Aho niho dushobora kwihagararako habaye ihungrana nk'iryo muri kazoza."

column2: Mu mafoto: Umusi mukuru wa Christmas hirya no hino kw'isi
column3: Abantu hirya no hino kw'isi bariko barahimbaza kimwe mu biringo vyeranda ku kirangamisi c'abakristu. Ariko inkuka z'imisa n'imisi mikuru vy'uyu mwaka vyitabwe n'abantu bake cane kubera ikiza ca coronavirus. Ukutegerana no kwambara agapfukamunwa ni vyo bintu bishasha bitegerezwa kwubahirizwa.
