column2: USA: Ibiciro vy’igitoro vyakorotse ku buryo butari bwaboneke mu mateka yaho
column3: Igiciro c'ibitoro muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika cakorotse cane ku buryo butari bwaboneke mu mateka y'ico gihugu. Ivyo bituma abahingura ico gitoro biba ngombwa ko babanza kuriha abakirangura kugira ngo bakibakureko, ku gutinya ko mu kwa gatanu bashobora kubura n'aho bagishira. Abagura igitoro baragabanutse rwose mu gihe ingingo zo kuguma  murugo ahatandukanye kw'isi yose zatumye abantu baguma biyugaranye. Vyatumye amahinguriro y'igitoro akodesha amatanki kugira ngo bashobore kubika ibitoro vy'umurengera, ibiciro mu gihugu cose bikoroka. Igiciro c'akagunguru muri West Texas Intermediate (WTI), ishingiro ry'igitoro ca Amerika, caramanutse kija musi y'amadorari 37.63 ku kagunguru. Stewart Glickman, umushakashatsi wo mu kigo ca Amerika Center for Financial Research and Analysis (CEFRA) kijejwe kwihweza ibijanye n'amafaranga avuga ati: "Ibiriko biraba birarengeye ubwenge. Igabanuka ry'abakiriya ryararengeye ivyo abantu bashobora kuba bari biteze". Avuga ko mu gihe izi ngingo za Guma murugo zobandanya uko ziri bishobora gutuma ibiciro vy'igitoro no mu kwa gatandatu bibandanya bikoroka. Ati: "Ni ukuri nta cizere mfise ko ibintu bishobora kworoha ku makompanyi adandaza igitoro canke ku biciro vyaco". Igisata c'igitoro kiri mu ngorane z'uko abagishaka bagabanutse kubera coronavirus hamwe n'ukutumvikana hagati y'ibihugu bisanzwe bicimbura. Mu ntango za kuno kwezi, ishirahamwe OPEP/ OPEC rihuza ibihugu vyimbura igitoro hamwe n'ibihugu bicuditse vyarahavuye birashika ku masezerano yo kugabanya urugero rw'igitoro cimburwa gushika hafi 10%. Muri ayo masezerano bumvikanye ko urugero rw'igitoro cimburwa rugabanywa ku buryo butari bwigere bubaho. Hagati aho, abahinga babona ko iryo gabanywa ata kintu kinini rizohindura. Stephen Innes ajejwe ubudandaji mu kigo Axicorp avuga ati: "Ntivyafashe umwanya muremure kugira ngo abadandaza igitoro babone ko amasezerano yashitsweko na OPEP/ OPEC - uravye ingene ameze ubu - atazoshobora gutuma  isoko y'igitoro isubira ku murongo". Ku bashoferi ba Amerika, ikoroka ry'ibiciro vy'igitoro - vyamanutse hafi ku bice 2/3  kuva mu ntango z'uyu mwaka - ryaragize ingaruka ku giciro co kw'ipompo, n'aho ejo ku wa mbere  bitakorotse uko vyari vyitezwe. Glickman ati: "Ikiriho ni uko, n'aho woba ukeneye kuja mw'ibarabara kubera imvo iyi canke iriya, ukenera igitoro gike cane gusumba uko vyari bimeze mu mezi ane aheze". "Ingorane nyamukuru kuri benshi muri twebwe ni uko n'aho wocuzuza, uzoja he?". Perezida Donald Trump wa Amerika avuga ko leta ishobora kugura igitoro gihingurwa muri ico gihugu. Ariko amakenga ahari ni uko ububiko bwaco bushobora kurengerwa, mu gihe ububiko bw'ikompanyi Cushing, ikompanyi nkuru itanga igitoro muri Amerika, bwarengewe gushika ku bice 50% kuva mu kwa gatatu, nk'uko bivugwa n'ibanki ANZ.

column2: Sudan y'Epfo:''Sinshaka abapatiri b'ibijuju''
column3: Umu Karidinari ari mu kiruhuko c'izabukuru muri Ekleziya Katorika yaneguye ubushobozi bwa bamwe mu ndongozi za Ekleziya muri Sudan y'Epfo. Kardinari   Gabriel Zubeir Wako yahoze ari musenyeri mukuru wa Khartoum yavuze ati: ''Sinshaka abapatiri b'ibijuju mw'isengero'', aho hari mu rugendo yagize mu gisagara ca Wau kiri mu buraruko bushira uburengero. Yavuze kuri uyu wa mungu ati: ''Mu minsi maze ngaha i Wau, hariho abapatiri twabonanye ndumva ko benshi batazi indinganizo n'inyigisho zo mw'isengero,  bigisha ibintu bidafashe. Bakeneye gusumvya aho bageza ubu ". Uwo mu karidinari azokwiza imyaka 80 y'amavuko mu kwezi kuza, , arubashwe kandi arazwi cane mu kuba yarashigikiye amashure. Yaratewe iteka na reta ya Sudan y'Epfo mu 2016 kubera uruhara rwiwe mu gushigikira indero y'abana bangana na miriyoni zibiri bari barateshejwe izabo n'intanbara muri Sudan y'Epfo. Yaranarungitse abapitiri kubandanya ivyigwa i Roma no muri Kenya , kugira bace impamyabushobozi za masters na doctorat. Mu bo yarungitse kubandanya ivyigwa harimwo uwamusubuiriye Musenyeri Mukuru Dr Michael Didi, ubu arongoye diyosezi ya Khartoum , n'uwurongoye diyosezi nkuru ya Juba, Dr Stephen Ameyu.

column2: Coronavirus: Impari ku muti kama wa Madagascar
column3: Madagascar ivuga ko yatoye umuti uvura coronavirus ariko OMS yoyo ivuga ko gushika kuri ubu "ata cemezo na kimwe" cerekana ko uwo muti ushobora "gukinga canke kuvura" coronavirus. Ku wa mbere 20/04, umukuru w'ico gihugu Andry Rajoelina yaratangaje umuti avuga ko ushobora gukinga ukanavura umugera coronavirus. We nyene ubwiwe yaranyoye uwo muti ukozwe mu biti kama anatangaza ko uwo muti mu minsi uzoboneka mu gihugu cose kugira ngo uvure coronavirus. N'aho yawutangaje ku mugaragaro, umuryango ujejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO uvuga ko ata bushakashatsi bwakozwe n'abahinga kugira ngo bemeze nimba koko uwo muti wa Madagascar uvugwa ko uvura Covid-19 ukora vy'ukuri. Eka n'ikigo c'igihugu kijejwe ubuvuzi (ANAMEM) kirafise amakenga kuri uwo muti wakozwe n'ikigo c'igihugu kijejwe ubushakashatsi (IMRA). Ikigo NAMEM kivuga ko uwo muti - Covid-Organics - ushobora kuzogira ingaruka mbi ku magara y'abazowihereza kuko ata "bushakashatsi bwakozwe kugira ngo bwemeze uwo muti". Uyo muti kama Covid-Organics uhabwa ku buntu abantu ba ntahonikora. Uyo muti ukozwe mu giterwa citwa artémisia - igiterwa gihingurwamwo umuti uvura malaria - hamwe n'ibindi biterwa vyo muri Madagascar. Ugurishwa mu macupa nk'icayi (tisane) inyuma y'aho bawugeragereje ku bantu badashika 20 mu kiringo c'indwi zitatu, nk'uko umukuru w'ibiro vya Perezida, Lova Hasinirina Ranoromaro, yabibwiye BBC. Igihe Covid-Organics  itangazwa ku wa mbere, Perezida Rajoelina yavuze ati; "Uwo muti warageragejwe - hari babiri bari barwaye barawiherezaubu barakize". "Uwo muti wo kunywa nk'icayi uvura mu kiringo c'iminsi indwi gusa". Andry Rajoelina yasavye abanyagihugu ko bonywa uwo muti mu ntumbero yo kwikingira. Ari imbere y'abaserukira ibihugu vyabo muri ico gihugu n'abandi banyecubahiro yavuze ati: "Abanyeshure bategerezwa kuwihereza….buke buke umunsi wose". Aciye kuri Twitter, Bwana Rajoelina avuga ko yanaronse ubutumwa bwo kumukeza buvuye kwa mugenziwe wa Republika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo, Félix Tshisekedi "kuri uwo muti kama Covid-Organics". Dr Charles Andrianjara arongoye ikigo IMRA, avugako Covid-Organics yokoreshwa mu buryo bwo kwikingira. Hagati aho, agumana amakenga kw'ikoreshwa ry'uwo muti mu kuvura iyo ndwara, akavuga ariko ko ubushakashatsi bw'ikiganga bwerekana ko "uwo muti usa n'uwushobora gukiza iyo ndwara", nk'uko bivugwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP risubiramwo amajambo yiwe. Iryo zinga ryo mw'ibahari Indiano rimaze kumenyesha ko abashika 121 ari bo bamaze kwandura coronavirus, ariko ko ata n'umwe irahitana. Inyuma y'itanguzwa ry'ikoreshwa rya Covid-Organics, OMS yasohoye itangazo aho ivuga ko gushika kuri ino saha "ata cemezo na kimwe" cerekana ko uwo muti wakorewe muri Madagascar ushobora "gukinga canke gukiza" coronavirus. Uyo muryango urahagarara cane ku majambo yashikirijwe n'umukuru wawo, Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, aho avuga ko "ata nzira ya hafi" iriho mu ntambara na coronavirus. Yongera ko y'uko hari ibikorwa vy'igerageza biriko biraka kw'isi mu ntumbero yo kurondera umuti nyawo. Umupfasoni Ranoromaro umukuru w'ibiro vya perezida wa Madagascar, avuga ko umukuru w'igihugu Rajoelina yari azi neza ko OMS itegerezwa kwubahiriza amategeko ayigenga, ariko y'uko ico gihugu catangaje uwo muti mu bwigenge bwaco. Ati: "Ni igikorwaciwe co kwitaho abanyagihugu ba Madagascar". Umwigisha wa kaminuza, Brian Klaas, akaba n'umuhinga ku bibazo vya Madagascar ku kigo ca  kaminuza ca Londres, abona ko ibivugwa na Bwana Rajoelina bishobora guteza ingorane ku banyagihugu hakubazanira urukiza. Yabwiye ikiganiro Newsday ca BBC ati: "Ni ingorane kubera ibituma bibiri - ica mbere ni uko abantu bazonywa Covid-Organics mu gihe bidakenewe". "Ubwa kabiri ivyo bizotuma abantu bibaza ko bakomeye, bikazobatuma bijajara bakitwara uko batategerezwa, ivyo navyo bikazobashira mu ngorane nini cane, eka banazitere na bagenzi babo". Avuga ko mu gihe iyo ndwara yokwiragira cane mu gihugu, abantu bashobora "gutikira" kubera ubuvuzi muri ico gihugu atako bwifashe, nayo igihugu kikaba gifise za mashini zifasha abarwayeguhema zitandatu gusa, ku bantu bangana n'imiliyoni 27. Mu kwa gatatu, ikigo c'igihugu citaho amagara y'abantu gifise icicaro muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, caragabishije kw'ikoreshwa ry'ivyo abantu bibaza ko ari imiti ivura coronavirus, cane cane ikozwe mu biti kama- aho cavuze ko inzira nyayo yo kwirinda kurwara ari ukwirinda kwandura uwo mugera.

column2: Imvo n'Imvano ku musi mukuru wa Noheli abakristu kw'isi bibuka ivuka ry'umwana Yezu/Yesu
column3: Ndabaramukije nongera ndabaha n'ikaze mu kiganiro c'Imvo n'Imvano co kuri uyu wa gatandatu igenekerezo rya 25 ukwezi kwa 12 mu 2021. Imvo n'Imvano y'uyu musi yerekeye umusi mukuru wa Noheli, aho abakristu hirya no hino kw'isi bibuka ivuka ry'umwana Yezu/Yesu. Buri mwaka, abemera Kristu imiliyoni n'imiliyoni hirya no hino kw'isi barahimbaza umusi mukuru wa Noheli. Noheli y'uyu mwaka, ibaye mu gihe ikiza Covid kibandanya kuvugwa mu bihugu bitandukanye kw'isi no mu gihe haherutse kugaragara ubundi bwoko bita Omicron bwandukira ku buryo bwihuta. Muri kino kiganiro, twahisemo guha umwanya abakunzi b'Imvo n'Imvano bifuje kutubwira uko bariko barahimbaza umusi mukuru wa Noheli, ari na ko tugenda tubashikiriza uturirimbo dutandukanye two guhimbaza uyu musi. None Noheli yiteguriwe gute muri iyi misi ikiza coronavirus cakwiragiye kw'isi? Ababa mu karere k'ibiyaga binini n'abari mu bindi bihugu eka mbere n'abari mu makambi y'impunzi bariko bayihimbaza gute? Inyishu ni muri kino kiganiro. Mugiye kuba hamwe na Cyriaque Muhawenayo, muri studios za BBC i Nairobi.

column2: Nigeria: Umupasitori atangisha 700$ kugira yereke abantu 'irembo ribashikana mw’ijuru’
column3: Umuvugabutumwa muri Nigeria ari mu yabira inyuma yo kubwira abantu ko azi irembo ribashikana mw'ijuru riri mu bumanuko bushira uburengero bw'ico gihugu, ariko ko kugira aribereke bategerezwa gutanga amafaranga. Pasitori Ade Abraham yarezwe mu gipolisi n'umwe mu banywanyi biwe avuga ko uyo mu pasitori yamutangishije 310.000 y'amanaira (amafaranga yo muri Nigeria), angana n'amadorari y'abanyamerika 750, kugira ngo bashobore kubona iryo rembo avuga ko riri mu gisagara ca Araromi-Ugbeshi, mu ntara ya Ekiti. Uyu muvugabutumwa yemereye BBC ko koko yabwiye abantu ivy'iryo rembo, akavuga ko ari "Imana akorera" yarimweretse mu ntumbero yo kuraba aho abanyashengero biwe bageza mu kwemera kwabo, ariko akavuga ko ata muntu n'umwe aramuha amafaranga. Ishirahamwe ry'Abakristu muri Nigeria ryasohoye itangazo ryikurako uyo mupasitori Ade Abraham, igipolisi co mu ntara ya Ekiti naco kikaba cegeranije inzandiko z'abanywanyi b'ishengero ryiwe, kikaba catanguye amatohoza. Ishengero rya Pasitori Ade Abraham ryahora rifise icicaro mu ntara ya Kogi, mu nyuma ryimukira mu ntara ya Kaduna, imbere y'uko ryimukira amaja mu bumanuko n'abanywanyi baryo, mw'ikambi yubatse mu ntara ya Ekiti. Uyu munyashengero yamureze ku gipolisi yaciye yisubirira muhira iwe i Kaduna kuva ico gihe, ariko umugore wiwe yaranse kumukurikira, akavuga ko "igihe c'umunezero" cari kigiye gushika vuba. Ariko uyu mugabo n'umugore badashaka ko amazina yabo amenyekana babwiye BBC ko babandanya bavugana kuri terefone umusi ku musi. Pasitori Ade, azwi kandi kw'izina rya Noah Abraham (Nowa Aburahamu), aherutse kwerekanwa mw'ireresi yazungurutse cane, aho yariko asaba abasenga Imana gutera akamo incuti zabo ziri mu mahanga gutanga intererano y'amafaranga mu rusengero rwiwe.

column2: Africa yahomvye miriyoni z'ama dorari kubera ihagarara rya Facebook, Instagram na Whatsapp
column3: Abifashisha  imbuga hwaniro muri Afrika kugira bagurishe ibicuruzwa bitandukanye bariko baraharura igihombo baraye bagize mu masaha atandatatu Facebook, Instagram na Whatsapp vyamaze bidakora. Ikigo kigenzura ingene internet ikora Netblocks kigereranya ko iryo hagarara rishobora kuba ryateye ubutunzi bwa Africa yo munsi y'ubugararwa (ubutayu)  bwa Sahara igihombo ca miriyoni 19,8 z'ama dorari (miriyaridi hafi 40 mu mafaranga y'Uburundi). Abahinga bavuga ko ibigo vyari vyarateye imbere cane  muri urwo rudandazwa rwo kuri internet na cane cane muri ibi bihe vya Covid arivyo vyakozweko cane n'ico gihombo. Kuri bamwe bamwe iryo hagarara ryashitse mu masaha arijo haba hageze ko bagurisha cane. Kafui Adza  atwara kompanyi ya Akosombobar, inzu y'uburiro igurisha ivyo kurya kuri internet no ku bahishikiye hagati mu gisagara ca Accra AirportCity, irabana n'ikibuga mpuzamakungu c'indege ca Kotoka. Avuga ko izo mbuga hwaniro zabaye mu masaha yo kurya ivyo ku murango. Kafui avuga ati: "Nico cari igihe cacu ciza kuko 80% y'ivyo tugurisha ni ku  bakiriya baciye kuri internet. Abakiriya bake bashoboye kuza n'imiduga muri ico gihe c'urutavanako mu mabarabara nibo bonyene bashitse ku buriro. Igihe izo mbuga zahagarara , abakozi banje baciye babona ko tutariko turaronka abadusaba kubarungikira ivyo kurya uko twahora. Benshi baca barungika ubutumwa busanzwe bwa telefone, ariko ingorane ni uko udaheza ngo urungike igoto y'ivyo kurya ushaka". Kafui yabwiye BBC ko akoresha amadorari hafi 3.200  (miriyoni zirenga 6 mu mafaranga y'Uburundi) ku mwaka kugira amenyekanishe ivyo akora kuri Facebook na Instagram. Ahandi nko muri Afrika y'ubuseruko, , Richard Gikonyo  afise Rickys Home Interiors. N'urudandazwa rushingiye i Nairobi, umurwa mukuru wa Kenya, rukoresha internet  mu gushira abakiriya ibikoresho bitandukanye vyo mu mazu mu gihugu cose. Ihagarara ry'imbuga hwaniro ryabaye mu gihe ku munsi usanzwe ariho akazi kaba gashushe. Gikonyo avuga ati: "Buno nyene naciye mbona ko habaye ikibazo kuko nama ndi ku murongo. Hagati y'isaha cumi z'umuhingamo n'isaha imwe y'ijoro, niho turonka abantu benshi ku mirongo yacu, kuko abantu baba bari mu rutavanako rwo mu mabarabara baca baja ku mbuga hwaniro bagatangura kugura ibintu". Yagiye kumenya ko vyahagaze atanguye kuronka ama terefone menshi y'abakiriya bidoga bamuhamagara  bavuga ko abakozi biwe batariko barishura ubutumwa bwabo. Avuga ati: "Tugereranya ko hari abakiriya 50 tutatunganirije, none uyu munsi (ku wakabiri), imirimo iri hasi cane". Karen Wambugu, umuhinga mu kugurisha kuri internet avuga ati: "Abakozweko cane n'abahembwa kuri buri kintu bagurishije hamwe n'imangazini ntonto, kuko nini nini zo zifise imbuga zazo (websites). Iyo imbuga hwaniro nka Facebook na Instagram zihagaze, imangazini ntonto ntizishobora kugurisha kuko nta yindi  nzira zifise" Aho iryo hagarara ribereye, abantu baciye baja ku zindi mbuga hwaniro nka Twitter kugira baronke umurongo. Ariko nko muri Nigeria, Twitter ntaco yafashije. Reta y'ico gihugu yarayihagaritse mu ntango z'ukwezi kwa gatandatu inyuma y'aho ikuriye ku rubuga rwayo ubutumwa bwa prezida Muhammadu Buhari imwagiriza kurenga ku mategeko yayo agenga "inyifato itari nziza". Ariko abanya-Nigeria bamwe babandanije kwandika kuri Twitter baciye ku buhinga buziguye bwa Virtual Private Networks (VPN).

column2: Sport: Abakuru b'imigwi y'inkino bifatanije n'abo mu mupira w'amaguru mu kwinuba imbuga hwaniro imisi 4
column3: Imigwi ikomakomeye y'umupira w'amaguru n'abakinyi bagiye kwifatanya n'inzego zirongoye inkino mu kwinuba imbuga hwaniro mu kiringo c'imisi ine kuva ku musi wa gatanu mu ntumbero yo kugwanya ifatwa nabi n'amacakubiri. "Uko gushigikirana mu kugwanya amajambo mabi aca ku mbuga hwaniro" gufise intumbero yo gutera intege izo mbuga mu gufata ingingo ruhasha ku banyamacakubiri afatiye ku rukoba no ku gitsina. Amashirahamwe ya Rugby na Cricket baraza gushigikira abo mu mupira w'amaguru muri urwo rugamba. Uko kwinuba izo mbuga kwaniro biza gutangura isaha isaha 17:00 ku musi wa gatanu gushika isaha 1:59 ku masaha yo mu Rwanda no mu Burundi. Umukuru w'ishirahamwe Kick it Out, rigwanya amacakubiri afatiye ku rukoba, Sanjay Bhandaru yavuze ati:"Uku kwinuba vyerekana agashavu kacu twese. "Mu kwinuba imbuga hwaniro, twerekanye ikimeyetso kura abo babifitiye ububasha. Dushaka ko mufata ingingo. Dushaka mufashe guhindura ibintu." Abafashe ingingo yo kwinuba Twitter, Facebook na Instagram ni: Imigwi yo mu Bwongereza y'abasiganwa ku makinga, abasiganwa ku ndogobwe, Hockey hamwe n'ishirahamwe rya Tennis na bo bari mu bitavye ako kamo. Umukinyi wa mbere kw'isi mu gusiganwa n'imodoka Lewis Hamilton co kimwe n'umudereva George Russell na bo bari mu bagiye kwinuba imbuga hwaniro muri ico kiringo c'imisi ine.

column2: Haribonekeza ubukene bwa Amstel ndende na bock mu Burundi
column3: Haraciye igihe mu Burundi hibonekeza ubukene bw'ikinyobwa ca Amstel ndende, hamwe na Amstel ngufi bita bock nk'uko abakunzi b'izi nzoga babivuga. Abihereza ivyo binyobwa bavuga ko bisigaye ari umuzi w'ibuye, bikaba ngombwa ko bihereza Primus canke Royal badakunda, canke bakanywa za skol bavuga ko ziva mu gihugu c'u Rwanda, zigurishwa ku giciro kiri hejuru. Umwe ati: "Si benshi bashoboye kwigurira skol kuko zirazimvye". Hampande y'inzoga za Amstel, haranavugwa kandi n'ikena ry'amafanta yo mu bwoko bwa coca. Ikompanyi Brarudi iremera ko izo nyobwa zikenye, ariko ko ikibazo kiri ahanini ku bakiriya b'umurengera muri kino gihe. Aho ni mu gihe hari abibaza ko vyoba bitumwa n'ikena ry'amafaranga y'agaciro. Remy Ndayishimiye ajejwe kumenyesha amakuru mw'ihinguriro ry'inzoga Brarudi, aremeza ko iyo ngorane iriho ariko ko bakora ibishoboka kugira ngo bayitorere umuti. Ati: "Mu gihe nk'iki, turonka abanywanyi b'umurengera, ariko Brarudi iriko irakora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo ishobore gushimisha abakiriya bayo". Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu biteye imbere bimwe vyahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco. Ibanki y'isi ivuga ko mu 2015 ubutunzi bw'Uburundi bwagabanutse ku rugero rwa -3.9%, mu 2016 bukagabanuka ku rugero rwa -0.6%, mu 2017, ariko bukaduga kuri 0.5% nayo mu 2018 bukaduga kuri 1,6%. Iyi banki ariko ivuga ko iri duga ryo mu myaka ibiri iheze ari rito cane ugereranyije n'ivyo igihugu gikenera, ikena rikomeye ry'amafaranga y'agaciro, ihagarikwa ry'intererano z'amakungu ivyo bikagira ingaruka mbi ku rudandazwa rw'ibiva hanze.

column2: Perezida Nkurunziza w'u Burundi hari ivyo asaba amadini kwirinda, rimwe rivuga ko 'rizovuga ukuri'
column3: Perezida Petero Nkurunziza w'Uburundi asaba abarongoye amadini ko bokwirinda kugwa mu mutego muri kino gihe u Burundi buriko bwitegurira amatora yo mu mwaka uza wa 2020. Amwe mu madini nka Ekleziya Katolika yoyo ivuga ko bigisha iyobokamana ariko ryerekeye n'ivyo abantu barimwo. Mw'ijambo ryiwe yashikirije yibuka imyaka ine amaze atowe n'abanyagihugu ubwabo ku ncuro ya kabiri, Bwana Nkurunziza avuga ko bokwirinda "kugwa mu mutego w'abahanuzi b'ibinyoma n'inyigisho zikomoka hanze" avuga ko zitajanye n'ivy'Imana. Bwana Nkurunziza avuga ati: "Si ivy'imbeshere, bamwe mu bakozi b'Imana baraguye, abandi barakomereka bongera bakomeretsa abayoboke babo; babera umuzimagiza abo bajejwe aho kubabera urumuri n'icitegererezo". Ntadoma urutoke kw'idini iri canke ririya, gusa Ekleziya Katolika ni yo ikunze kwagirizwa ko yivanga mu vya politike. Bavuga ko ibi ibikora cane cane mu gihe ishikiriza aho ihagaze ku biraba ubuzima bw'igihugu mu butumwa bukunda gusomwa mu masengero yose ya Katolika mu gihugu. Abasenyeri ba Katolika bobo bamenyesha ko ata nyigisho za politike batanga, ahubwo ko bigisha iyobokamana ariko ryerekeye n'ivyo abantu barimwo "kuko iyobokamana rirangukira mu buzima bw'abantu". Mu ndwi iheze, mu birori vy'uguhimbaza umunsi mukuru wa Assomption, Pascal Nyabenda arongoye inama nshingamateka, yasavye abarongoye Ekleziya Katolika kuguma hagati na hagati, ntiberekane aho bahagaze mu vya politike kuko ngo bitsitaza abakirisu. Mu kumwishura, Umuvugizi w'inama y'abepiskopi mu Burundi, Yohakimu Ntahondereye, yamenyesheje ko bazovuga ijambo ry'Imana uko riri ata gucisha iruhande, "n'aho hari aho rigera rikababaza".

column2: Umunonotsi wa BBC w'umwaka muri Afrika: Tatjana Schoenmaker
column3: Tatjana Schoenmaker ari mu bahiganirwa agashimwe ka BBC k'umunonotsi w'umunye-Afrika yenuriye abandi mu 2021. Ushaka gutora tugusavye kuja ngaha https://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/africa/59089895 aho unasanga amategeko ajanye n'ubuzima bwite. Gutora bizohera kuwa Mungu itariki 19/12/2021 saa 23:59 GMT.

column2: UK: Abarongoye amakompanyi bemeye kwongereza abakozi b'abirabure
column3: Amakompanyi Barclays na Deloitte hamwe n'ayandi atari make mu Bwongereza yiyemeje kwongereza igitigiri c'abakozi b'abirabure, ni mu ntumbero yo kurwanya akarenganyo gakorerwa abirabure. Mw'ikete ryateweko umukono n'abarongoye amakompanyi 40, basavye n'ayandi makompanyi gukora gutyo. Umukuru w'umurwi witaho Uburinganire n'Uburenganzira bwa Muntu mu Bwongereza yabwiye BBC  ko amakompanyi ategerezwa kwiha intumbero yo kwongereza abakozi batari abazungu mu nzego zo hejuru. David Isaac avuga ko amakompanyi akeneye "kugira uruhara rukomeye" mu guha ikibanza gikomeye abantu mu butandukane bwabo. Avuga ko urupfu rwa George Floyd muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika rwashize ahabona akarenganyo gakorerwa abantu atari abazungu. Icegeranyo ciswe Colour of Power 2020, cakozwe n'ikigo Green Park gitanga ubuhanuzi ku bijanye n'ubutandukane, kivuga ko mu nzego zo hejuru mu makompanyi atari make mu Bwongereza, muri leta no mu bundi butegetsi bw'igihugu, inkehwa zingana n'ibice bidashika 5%. Kivuga ko ibiharuro bisa n'ivyagumye uko muri ino myaka mike iheze. Umukuru wa kompanyi E.On UK, Michael Lewis, yagize ico avuga ku vyo ayo makompanyi yiyemeje akavuga ati: "Tuzokwama duharanira ivyo twemera kandi twerekane ko dushize hamwe mu kurwanya ivanguramoko, kwigisha abandi no kwishimira ubudasa, ivyo bikazoduha inguvu zo guhindura isi ". Mu gutera igikumu kuri urwo rwandiko, abarongoye amakompanyi biyemeje gufata ingingo ziboneka mu ntumbero yo kwongereza igitigiri c'abirabure mu bakozi bayo. Zimwe muri izo ngingo harimwo: Suki Sandhu, uwatanguje akaba ari nawe arongoye ishirahamwe Imvolve ryishinze guhimiriza ubutandukane mu buzi, ni umwe mu bari muri iryo sekeza, avuga ko yatewe intege n'igitigiri c'abemeye gushira igikumu kuri urwo rwandiko. Avuga ati: "Akamo katewe n'isekeza Black Lives Matter ntikagiye uko, kandi amakompanyi akeneye guhaguruka agafata iya mbere mu mpinduka zigamije kwongereza abirabure mu buzi". "Ndafise icizere ko, mu gihe abayobozi benshi bateye igikumu kuri iri kete, dushobora gufatira ku ngingo biyemeje tukazana impinduka mu kazi kandi tukaguma dukurikirana ingene biguma bigenda, kuko amakompanyi ategerezwa kwama atanga ivyageranyo  buri mwaka ". Hagati aho, amakenga ntabura mu bakozi bamwe bamwe b'abirabure. Umwe mu bakozi ba Barclays atashatse ko izina ryiwe rimenyekana, yabwiye BBC ati: "Nzovyemera ndabibonye". Icegeranyo Colour of Power 2020 kivuga ko mu bantu 1,097 barongoye inzego nkuru nkuru mu Bwongereza, 1,046 bose ari abazungu.

column2: Mikel Arteta yizeye ko Aubameyang yemeye kubandanya akinira Arsenal
column3: Umumenyereza wa Arsenal, Mikel Arteta, afise icizere ko Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang "yagondojwe akemera kuguma muri uyo murwi" inyuma y'uruhara rukomeye yagize mu gutsinda Liverpool mu gikombe Community Shield. Aubameyang, kizigenza w'uyu murwi akaba afise amasezerano na Arsenal azorangira mu ci riza, yinjije igitsindo giteye igomwe - imbere y'uko Takumi Minamino akigaruza. Uru rukino rwa nijoro rwagiye kurangira iyi mirwi yompi inganya 1-1 biba ngombwa ko bayibangurukanya biciye kuri ya mipira itererwa ku metero 11, ariho Aubameyang yagiye kwinjiza igitsindo cahaye intsinzi Arsenal kuri 5-4. Arteta yabwiye iradiyo  BBC Radio 5 Live ati: "Ikikorwa canje ni ukumwumvisha ko ari mu kibanza nyaco mu mwanya nyawo". "Nibaza ko ico twagishitseko, hasigaye gusa kubishira ku rukaratasi, ibi navyo bikaba bisaba akanya". Haciye igihe Arsenal igerageza kugiriranira ayandi masezerano na Aubameyang. Uyu musatirizi w'imyaka 31 akomoka muri Gabon  amaze gutsinda ibitsindo 71 mu nkino 110 amaze gukinira uyu murwi kuva awushitsemwo mu kwa mbere 2018, aguzwe imiliyoni hafi 75 z'amadolari. Ni kizigenza w'uyu murwi kuva mu kwa cumi na rimwe asubiriye Granit Xhaka. Igitsindo ca nijoro yatsinze ku mupira yateye ari ku metero 20 cagize gatanu Aubameyang atsindiye ku kibuga ca Wembley. Igihe Arsenal ihura na Manchester City mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma c'igikombe ca FA, Aubameyang yateye ibitsindo bibiri vyose muri urwo rukino rwarangiye uyu murwi wa Arteta wirahiye Man City  2-0. Eka n'igihe Arsenal ihura na Chelsea mu gice ca nyuma ca FA (final), Aubameyang yarongeye atera ibindi bibiri muri uru rukino rwarangiye Arsenal itsinze Chelsea 2-1. Abajijwe ibijanye na kazoza kiwe inyuma yo gutahana igikombe ca Community Shield, Aubameyang yavuze ati: "Tuzoraba muri ino minsi. Uno munsi ni ukwigina igikombe. Nta bindi". "Turiko turatera imbere. Nivyo ko hakiri vyinshi vyo gukora, ariko dishimye rwose kandi ni igihe gishimishije co kuba umukinyi wa Arsenal". Igihe yakina mu murwi Dortmund mw'ihiganwa ryo mu Budagi, Aubameyang yatsindiye ikirato c'inzahabu mu 2017.

column2: Malawi irasaba Tyson kuyibera intumwa ku giterwa c'urumogi
column3: Umushikiranganji wa Malawi ajejwe uburimyi yandikiye rurangiranwa mu gukubitana ingu mu mugwi w'abaremereye cane Mike Tyson amusaba kuba intumwa y'ico gihugu ku giterwa c'urumogi. Umushikiranganji Lobin Lowe avuga ko amategeko agenga urumogi yemejwe mu mwaka uheze muri Malawi yatanze akaryo kubaba mu gihugu hagati no kw'isi yose. Uwo mushikiranganji yavuze ko ishirahamwe ry'urumogi muri Reta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ryafashije gushika ku masezerano na Tyson. Lowe yanditse ati:"Malawi ishobora kutikorana yonyene kuko ivyerekeye ico giterwa kigoye bikaba bikenewe gukorera hamwe. Nshobora rero kukugena wewe Tyson, nk'intumwa iserukira igisata c'urumogi rwo muri Malawi." Tyson kandi ni umugwizatunga akaba yarashize n'umutahe mw'irima ry'urumogi. Ibinyamakuru vyo muri marawi vyanditse ko Tyson yari yitezwe muri Malawi mu ndwi iheze ariko ko urugendo rwiwe rwungururijwe ku rindi sango. Urumogi rwo muri Malawi, na cane cane uruzwi kw'izina ry'inzahabo ya Malawi, rufatwa n'abarunywa mu kwinezereza nka rumwe mu ruryoshe cane.

column2: Burundi : 17 bapfunzwe bikekwa gushaka kunyaga abanyagihugu mu rudandazwa rw'amafaranga
column3: Abantu 17 bo mw'ishirahamwe Crowd1 ricuruza amafaranga ku buhinga ngurukanabumenyi bari mu minwe y'igipolisi bagirizwa gukora inama y'ishirahamwe ritazwi n'amategeko. Umuvugizi w'ubushikiranganji bw'umutekano yabwiye Radio Isanganiro ko abo barobowe mu bandi barenga 300 bari bafashwe bari muri iyo nama ejo ku wa kabiri ku mugoroba n'igipolisi c'u Burundi. Pierre Nkurikiye avugira ubwo bushikiranganji avuga y'uko abo bantu bafashwe n'igipolisi bari mu nama muri zone Rohero mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. Avuga ko abari mu minwe y'igipolisi ari abariko bakorwako amatohoza kubijanye n'uko  ishirahamwe Crowd1 ryoba rifise intumbero yo kwiba abanyagihugu. Haciye amezi make ibanki nkuru y'igihugu, BRB, igabishije Abarundi kwirinda urudandazwa rw'amafaranga rukorwa biciye mu mihora ngurukanabumenyi bita 'monnaies virtuelles' canke crypto-monnaies. Mw'itangazo yasohoye mu kw'umunani umwaka uheze, BRB yavuze ko urudandazwa rw'amafaranga yo kuri iyo mihora nka Bitcoin, Ether, Litecoin, Onecoin,  Fahari Cash Coin, Ello Cash Coin rutemewe. Jean Ciza, umukuru w'iyo banki, yavuze ko ayo mafaranga akoreshwa mu buryo butagira amategeko bwisunga ahantu na hamwe kw'isi, kuko ngo nta banki n'imwe y'igihugu kw'isi yose irayemera. Ati: "Ivyo bituma ibikorwa muri ayo mafaranga bisa n'ivyo ubusuma…" Abatari bacye muri iki gihe barinjira mu rudandazwa rw'amafaranga mu buryo butandukanye leta z'ibihugu zimwe zivuga ko rutemewe.

column2: Kidum nawe yasohoye indirimbo ihimiriza kwirinda coronavirus
column3: Umuririmvyi Jean Pierre Nimbona, Kidum, nawe yasohoye indirimbo ihimiriza kwirinda coronavirus. Abajijwe igituma yasohoye  iyi ndirimbo Kidum yagize: "Ni kubera ari ikiza kuri ubu kibangamiye isi yose kandi caduteye umutima uhagaze twese". Umviriza iyo ndirimbo aho hejuru.

column2: US yasubije igihugu ca Cuba ku rutonde rw'ibihugu bifasha iterabwoba kw'isi
column3: Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zasubije Cuba ku rutonde rw'ibihugu bifasha iterabwoba kw'isi, afatiye ku ngendo y'iki gihugu c'abakomunista yo gushigikira Venezuela. Ubutegetsi bwa Perezida Donald Trump butangaje iyi ngingo mu gihe hasigaye imisi imparurwa ngo ave muri Maison Blanche/White House. Mu gihe yiteze gushikirizwa ubutegetsi ku wa 20 z'uku kwa mbere, umukuru w'igihugu aherutse gutorwa Joe Biden yaravuze ko yipfuza gukomeza imigenderanire hagati ya Amerika na Cuba. Cuba ivuga ko iyi ngingo "ifise imvo za politike". Biden avuga ko ariko ararondera ubucuti bwa hafi n'iki kihugu camaze imyaka itari mike gihanganye na Amerika, ariko rero iyi ngingo ya Trump ikaba ije gusa n'iyibangamira utwigoro two kunagura iyi migenderanire. Abihweza ibintu n'ibindi bavuga ko ivyo gushira Cuba kuri uru rutonde ari ibintu bishobora gufata amezi kugira ngo vyemezwe. Iri zinga ryo mu mazinga ya Karayibe ryari ryakuwe kuri uru rutonde na Perezida Barack Obama mu 2015, ariko Trump akaba yahavuye afata ingendo itoroshe na gato ku bijanye n'iki gihugu. Igihe bariko barasigura iyi ngingo, abategetsi bavuga ko yafashwe kubera Cuba ishigikiye umukuru w'igihugu ca Venezuela, Nicolas Maduro, atemerwa na Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Mw'itangazo ryiwe ejo ku wa mbere, umunyamabanga wa Reta, Mike Pompeo, yavuze ati: "Muri iyi ngingo, reta ya Cuba itegerezwa kuvyishura kandi ihabwe ubutumwa: ubutegetsi bwa Castro butegerezwa guhagarika gufata mu mugongo iterabwoba mpuzamakungu kandi ikareka kugarariza ubutungane bwa Amerika". Mu nyishu yatanze, umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire wa Cuba, Bruno Rodriguez, yanditse kuri Twitter ati: "Turiyamirije iyi ngendo y'ukwikunda n'ubwibone mu gufata ko Cuba ari igihugu gifasha iterabwoba nk'uko vyatangajwe na Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika". Imbere y'uko iyi ngingo itangazwa, umushingamateka w'umu Democrate, Gregory Meeks yayise ko ari "akandi kigoro ka Perezida Trump na Pompeo, ko kugerageza kubohera amaboko imugongo ubutegetsi bwimirije bwa Biden mu gihe bariko baragenda". Mu nteguro za  Biden harimwo kwemerera Abanyamerika bakomoka muri Cuba gushobora kugendera imiryango yabo no kuyirungikira amahera. Perezida Obama yatanguye kunagura imigenderanire na Cuba mu 2015. Ico gihe yavuga ko utwigoro twa Amerika twamaze imyaka mirongo two kugerageza gukumira iki gihugu "ataco twashitseko". Kuva muri ca gihe c'intambara y'ukwikekana (Guerre Froide/ Cold War), Amerika yabandanije ifata ingingo zitandukanye zo gukumira Cuba yafata nk'umwansi rutura. Ubu rero Cuba ihambije ibindi bihugu biri kuri uru rutonde rw'ibihugu bifasha iterabwoba, harimwo Irani na Koreya y'Uburaruko. Mu ngaruka z'iyi ngingo kuri iri zinga, harimwo igabanuka rikomeye ry'abashoramitahe mpuzamakungu muri ico gihugu.

column2: Umugambwe CNL mu Burundi urongowe na Agathon Rwasa usaba ko amabi uvuga ko ukorerwa ahagarara
column3: Umugambwe CNL uriyamiriza ingendo y'ukutihanganiranira mu vya politike uvuga ko ikorwa na "bamwe bamwe mu bategetsi bo mu ntwaro n'umutekano" mu Burundi. Ivyo nivyo biri mw'itangazo ryasohowe n'uwo mugambwe ejo ku wa gatanu i Bujumbura, ni mu gihe havugwa ko abanywanyi b'uwo mugambwe baburabuzwa irya n'ino mu gihugu. Muri iryo tangazo ryatewe ko igikumu n'umushingamateka Simon Bizimungu, umunyamabanga mukuru w'uwo mugambwe ari nawe yarisomye, umugambwe CNL urashikiriza ivyo uvuga ko ari intambamyi zidasanzwe ugira mu bikorwa vyawo mu gihugu. Bimwe mu bibazo abanywanyi bawo bahanganye navyo ku rubuga harimwo "kwandika ibiranga umunywanyi wese agendeye ingoro y'umugambwe ku rwego rw'igihugu, Bwana Bizimungu akavuga ko ivyo bikorwa n'abajejwe umutekano, kandi ko biteye amakenga. Eka ngo umugambwe ntazi intumbero y'izo ntonde n'iherezo ryayo. CNL ivuga kandi ko abanywanyi bayo "bahohoterwa, baterwa ubwoba, bafatwa bagapfungwa ata mategeko yubahirijwe, bagasinzikarizwa ubuzima, eka bagakorerwa amarementanya". Umushingamateka Bizimungu avugako umugamwe CNL "wama uriko urabuzwa uburenganzira bwo kwugurura ingoro zawo mu ntara zimwe zimwe no mu ma komine". Hampande y'ivyo vyose, CNL iriyamiriza ingendo yo "gusibanganya ingoro zawo", umushingamateka Bizimungu akamenyesha ko iyo ngendo yibonekeje mu ma komine Muhuta mu ntara ya Rumonge, Buganda mu ntara ya Cibitoke, be no muri komine Gashikanwa, ni mu ntara ya Ngozi. Kuri ivyo, iryo tangazo ryongera ko riti: "Uko gusibanganya ingoro z'umugambwe vyarenze urugero aho haturiwe hongera harasamburwa ingoro y'umugambwe ku rwego rw'intara ya Bujumbura iri i Nyabiraba mw'ijoro ryo ku wa 15 rishira 16 ruheshi 2019 buca yugururwa". Ivyo biri uko mu gihe Uburundi bwitegurira amatora ategekanijwe mu mwaka uza wa 2020, amatora azotangura ku wa 20 z'ukwezi kwa gatanu nk'uko vyaraye bishikirijwe n'umukuru w'umurwi ujejwe gutuganya amatora muri ico gihugu. Aha, umugambwe CNL ukabona ko ivyo vyose uriko urakorerwa bifise intumbero yo "kugabanya canke kwugara urubuga rwa politike bifise intumbero yo gutoteza abatavuga rumwe na reta muri rusangi, cane cane CNL". Uwo mugambwe urongowe na Agathon Rwasa, icegera ca mbere c'umukuru w'Inama Nshingamateka, usaba reta y'Uburundi kurekura abanywanyi bawo uvuga ko bafashwe bagapfungwa  "bazira ivyiyumviro vyabo vya politike". Abajijwe n'abamenyeshamakuru igitigiri c'abapfunzwe gushika ubu mu kiganiro yagiranye nabo kuri uyu wa gatanu ku ngoro yawo i Bujumbura, umushingamateka Bizumungu avuga ko abanywanyi b'uwo mugambwe barenga 60 ari bo bapfungiwe mu busho butandukanye mu gihugu. Bwana Bizimungu yagiriza bamwe mu batware ko bahungabanya ibikorwa vy'imigambwe yemewe n'amategeko kubera ukudatahura ibwirizwa ryerekeye imyiyerekano iba ku mugaragaro, agasaba reta ko yorikwiragiza hose. Abarongoye umugambwe CNL basaba reta ko yohagarika ico bise "ihohoterwa rikorwa na bamwe mu bagize ama komite y'umutekano ahurikiyemwo bose". Umugambwe CNL kandi usaba amakungu n'akarere gukurikiranira hafi uko ibintu vyifashe mu Burundi muri bino bihe. Leta y'Uburundi ntaco irashikiriza kuri ivyo bivugwa n'umugambwe CNL uherutse kwemererwa mu kwezi kwa kabiri uno mwaka, ukaba uboneka ko uri mu migambwe ifise igihagararo kini mu gihugu.

column2: Umukinyi w'umupira w'amaguru, Zlatan Ibrahimovic ngo yoba agira agaruke muri Manchester United
column3: Manchester United ngo yoba iri mu biganiro n'umukinyi Zlatan Ibrahimovic mu ntumbero yo kumugarukana Oldtrafford, nyuma y'aho aviriye muri LA Galaxy n'igihuha c'uko agira ahebe gukina, nk'uko vyatangajwe n'ikinyamakuru MailOnline. Uwo mukinyi rurangiranwa w'imyaka 38 yavuye Old Trafford aja mw'ikipe LA Galaxy yo mw'ihiganwa MLS ryo muri Amerika mu 2018, nyuma yo kwinjiza ibitsindo 29 mu myaka ibiri yakiniye United. Kandi ikinyamakuru candikirwa kuri internet co mu Butariyano, TuttoMercatoWeb, kivuga ko United ishobora kumuha akazi mu gihe irondera inguvu mu bakinyi b'imbere. Ibrahimovic yatwaye ibikombe vya Europa League na Carabao Cup akinira United igihe yamenyerezwa na Mourinho, kandi yinjiza igitsindo c'intsinzi mu rukino rwa nyuma na Southampton. United ubu imenyerezwa na Ole Gunnar Solskhaer, imaze iminsi ifise ibibazo vyo kwinjiza ibitsindo, kandi kugerageza kugura Mario Mandzukic wo muri Juventus vyigijwe mu ci riza. Kandi nyuma yo kugenda kwa Romelu Lukaku na Alexis Sanchez muri Inter Milan, Ibrahimovic asa n'uwigaragaje nk'uwuronderwa bwa mbere na United.

column2: Funke Abimbola: ‘Izina ryanje ry’ikinyafrika ryambujije kuronka akazi’
column3: Umunyamategeko akongera akaba n'umwe mu baharanira uburenganzira bw'inkehwa, Funke Abimbola,  avuga ko "yamye arenganywa" igihe cose yagerageje kurondera akazi. Hafi icagatatu c'ama kompanyi 100 adandaza imitahe (FTSE) nta nkehwa afise mu nzego zifata ingingo, nk'uko icegeranyo kibivuga. Ikigo kijejwe kwihweza ingene ubwoko buserukiwe mu ma kompanyi atandukanye, Parker Review Committee, mu gihugu c'Ubwongereza, kimenyesha ko inkehwa zidaserukiwe mu nzego zifata ingingo mu makompanyi atari make. Umupfasoni Abimbola avuga ati: "Nahuye n'inzitizi nyinshi  igihe nariko ndondera akazi kubera nari mfise izina ry'ikinyafirika, kandi kubera ndi umwirabure, nta gukekeranya". Yabwiye BBC ko yaterefonye incuro zirenga ijana kugira ngo ashobore guhonyoza ikirenge  mu kazi. Ati: "Baranyinuvye, barankarira cane gusumba abandi  kubera kwitwa umugore w'umwirabure". "Biroroshe kukubona uwo uri we kandi biroroshe cane rwose kukurenganya iyo uri mu nkehwa". Icegeranyo c'ikigo Parker Review Committee  cerekana ko mu makompanyi adandaza imitahe ashika 250 casanze inkehwa zidaserukiwe mu nzego zifata ingingo, aho 119 kuri 179 amoko adaserukiwe. Umupfasoni Abimbola avuga ati: "Ico cegeranyo ntikintangaza. Hari inzitizi nyinshi  cane kugira ngo inkehwa zishobore kuronka ikibanza mu nzego zo hejuru". Ico kigo Parker Review Committee cashinzwe kugira ngo gikore ubushakashatsi ku kungene amoko atandukanye aserukiwe mu nzego zifata ingingo  mu makompanyi atandukanye, casohoye icegeranyo caco kuri ico kibazo mu 2017. Ico gihe, mu makompanyi 51 kw'ijana adandaza imitahe inkehwa ntizari ziserukiwe mu nzego zifata ingingo, ugereranije n'ubu ari 33%. Ico cegeranyo gisaba ko gushika mu 2021 buri kompanyi mu makompanyi 100 ya FTSE yoba ifise n'imiburiburi indongozi imwe iva mu nkehwa, hanyuma gushika mu 2024 naho mu makompanyi 250 ya FTSE yoba yamaze gukora gutyo. Mu ntumbero yo gufasha kugira ngo inkehwa ziserukirwe, ico cegeranyo gisaba ko buri kompanyi yokwama itanga icegeranyo c'ingene inkehwa ziserukiwe mu nzego zifata ingingo, n'ingene ubwoko butandukanye buserukiwe. Umupfasoni Abimbola arizeye ko mu gihe hoba integuro yoha ibibanza kanaka inkehwa vyofasha mu gutorera inyishu ico kibazo. Ati: "Hariho amashirahamwe makeya mu Bwongereza aha akazi amoko atandukanye. "Ayo mashirahamwe yama ategura intonde z'abantu bafise ubuhinga butandukanye muy bwoko butandukanye buri mwaka, rero iyo wipfuza kurondera abirabure, abanyaziya hamwe n'inkehwa, biba ngombwa ko uja kuronderera muri izo ntonde". Umushikiranganji w'ubudandaji, Andrea Leadsom, avuga ko ico cegeranyo cerekana ko "amakompanyi agifise igikorwa kitari gito" kugira ngo ashobore guhimiriza abakozi b'abirabure, Abanya Aziya hamwe n'inkehwa.

column2: Papa asaba ko haboneka inyishu "ruhasha" ku bihe mu butumwa kuri BBC yonyene
column3: Mu butumwa bw'ijwi yahaye BBC yonyene, Papa François asaba abategetsi b'isi bazohurira  ku ndwi iza mu nama ya ONU  ku bihe i Glasgow (muri Ecosse), gutanga "inyishu ziri n'ico zishikako" ku vyihutirwa ku bidukikije no guha "icizere gifadika" abariko bararuka. Muri ubwo butumwa bwafatiwe amajwi i Vaticano  bugahabwa ikiganiro Thought for the Day ca Radio 4 ya BBC, Papa yagarutse ku bihanze isi birimwo ikiza ca Covid -19, ihindagurika ry'ibihe hamwe n'ibibazo vy'ubutunzi, aca asaba abarongoye isi kubitorera inyishu mu buryo bw'icerekezo n'ingingo ruhasha , kugira "amahirwe" atangwa n'ivyo bihanze isi "ntatakare". Umwungere wa Ekereziya Katorika yavuze ati: "Duhangana n'ivyo vyugarije isi mu nzira za  nyamwigendako, kwigumizako ivyacu no gukoresha ivy'abandi, canke tukabibonamwo amahirwe nyayo y'impinduka". Yagarutse ku kuba hakenewe "ugusubira kwumva uruhara dusangiye rwo kwitaho isi yacu", yongerako ati "umwe wese muri twebwe - uwo ari we wese n'aho ari hose - ashobora kugira  ico aterereye mu guhindura inyishu ya twese ku ngeramizi zitari bwigere ziboneka  kw'ihindagurika ry'ibihe n'itituka ry'inzu dusangiye." Papa mu mwanya uza aja kubonana na prezida wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika Joe Biden. Imigambi ya Biden ku bijanye n'ibihe mu gihugu iwe iracari mu mayira abiri inyuma y'aho umugambwe wiwe wigirije inyuma gutora itegeko rigenda  integuro z'amafaranga yo gukoresha. Ubwo butumwa n'ubwibutsa ingene Papa François yashize imbere ibijanye no gukingira ibidukikije mu burongozi bwiwe bwa Ekereziya. Mu majambo ashikiriza, aramaze kugaruka kenshi ku kaga k'ibihe, mu 2015 akaba yasohoye ikete rya  Papa (enciclyque), ryitwa  Laudato Si' rishimikiye kuri ico kibazo. Muri iyo nyandiko inyito yayo yahinduwe mu zindi ndimi nka "Ku kwitaho inzu dusangiye" , yiyamirije ugusambura ibidukikije, yerekana ko hakenewe ingingo zofasha  kugabanya iryo hindagurika, aca yemeza ata guca hirya no hino ko ihindagurika ry'ibihe ahanini riterwa n'ibikorwa vy'umuntu. Iryo kete ryasohotse imbere y'uko haba inama ya ONU y'i Paris mu 2015, COP21, rikaba ryabonywe nk'iryagize ico rifashije mu gutuma abategetsi bashika ku masezerano. Inyuma y'imyaka itandatu, abategetsi b'isi bariko baritegurira gukoranira i Glasgow mu nama y'uyu mwaka, COP26. Mu gihe biguma bigaragara ko ivyiyemejwe i Paris bitariko birashikwako kugira  ukwiyongera kw'ubushuhe bw'isi ntikurenge 1.5C, ugereranije n'urugero rw'imbere y'uko hatagura amahinguriro,  Papa François yasubiye gushimika kuri ico kibazo  yizigiye ko ijambo ryiwe rizosubira kugira ico rifashije nka mbere.

column2: Margaret Wambui: Umunya-Kenya afise umudari wa olympic asaba ko haba umugwi wa gatatu w'abanonotsi
column3: Urwego ruraba inkino z'abanonotsi (World Athletics) rukwiye gushiraho umugwi ugira gatatu mu mahiganwa kugirango ruhe amahirwe abafise urugero runini rwa testosterone yo guhiganwa ku nkino bifuza, ivyo vyasabwe n'umugore w'umunya-Kenya, Margaret Wambui yiruka imetero 800. Co kimwe n'abandi banonotsi  bashirwa mu mugwi w'abafise icitwa 'Differences of Sexual Development' canke DSD -Wambui ntashobora guhiganwa ku kirere kiri hagati y'imetero 400 na mile imwe (1.6km) hamwe n'abandi bagore kiretse abanje gufata imiti igabanya iyo nkabuzo canke uwo musemburo ya/wa testosterone. Uwo munya-Kenya yatsindiye umudari wa bronze ku metero 800 mu nkino za Olympic zo mu 2016. Wambui yabwiye BBC Sport Africa ati: "Vyoba vyiza bashizeho umugwi ugira gatatu w'abanonotsi bafise testosterone nyinshi - kuko sivyo kubuza abantu gukoresha impano zabo." Urwego rujejwe izo nkino kw'isi , World Athletics, ruvuga ko ata mugambi wo gushiraho uwo mugwi rufise kandi ko ruzobandanya gushira abanonotsi mu migwu ibiri ihasanzwe y'abagabo n'abagore. Iciyumviro c'umugwi ugira  gatatu mu nkino zo kunonora imitsi cari kimaze kuvugwa, ariko Wambui abaye uwa mbere agishigikiye ku mugaragaro. Yavuze  ati: "Twoba aba mbere duhiganywe muri uwo mugwi - twoca duha intege abandi banyegeza ingene baremwe. "Twobereka ko atari amakosa yabo, ko uko ariko baremwe, kandi ko ata kibi bakoze." Uwo munonotsi w'imyaka 25, atarahiganwa kuva mu kwezi kw'indwi mu 2019, ntazokwitaba inkino za olympic za Tokyo, mu gihe vyamugoye guhitamwo kwiruka ku metero nke (100-200) canke ku kirere kirekire. Kuva World Athletics ishizeho ingingo zigenga abanonotsi bafise DSD mu 2018, nta n'umwe mu bari batahanye imidari ku metero 800 mu nkino za Rio arasubira kwiruka izo metero mu mahinganwa mpuzamakungu. Mu nkino za 2016, Wambui yabaye uwa gatatu inyuma ya Caster Semenya wo muri Afrika y'Epfo yaronse umudari w'inzahabu n'umurundikazi Francine Niyonsaba yaronse umudari w'ifeza. Wambui ati: "Birababaje kubona muri abo batatu bose ata n'umwe azoba ahari. ''Baratubujije kubandanya amahiganwa, kuko siko twari twabiteguye. Ndababaye kubona ntazokwitaba Olympic  kubera amategeko ya World Athletics." Ku wa gatatu  Francine Niyonsaba yaronse umwanya usabwa kugira azohiganwe ku metero 5000. Abo batatu bashirwa mu mugwi y'abafise "differences of sexual development" kubera urugero ruruni kurusha urusanzwe ku bagore rw'umusemburo(inkabuzo) wa testosterone. Ku mategeko ya World Athletics yasohotse mu 2018, abanonotsi b'abagore bafise DSD ntibashobora guhiganwa ku birere biri hagati ya metero 400 na mile imwe (1.6km) - kiretse babanje kugabanura urwo rugero rwa testosterone, World Athletics ivuga ko ruha abanonotsi akarusho kadakwiriye ku bandi baba bariko barahiganwa nabo. Urwo rwego ruvuga ko testosterone bimwe mu vyo ituma ariko ishobora kwongereza ubushobozi bwo kutaruha n'inguvu z'imitsi, kandi ko amategeko ajanye n'aba DSD akenewe kugira ''habe ihiganwa ritarenganya kandi riri n'ico rivuze mu murwi w'anbagore". Abanonotsi barashobora  kugabanya urugero rwa testosterone mu gufata iminti canke mu kwibagisha - n'ubwo kwibagisha bidahanurwa cane. Semenya yatwaye umudari w'inzahabu wa Olympic kabiri, ari imbere ku rugamba rwo kurwanya amategeko ajanye n'abafise DSD. N'ubwo amaze gutsindwa kenshi muri sentare za Buraya, aracabandanya urugamba. Mu kwezi kwa kabiri, yajanye urubanza rwiwe muri sentare ya Buraya y'agateka ka zina muntu, avuga ko ingingo yo gusaba abanonotsi ko bahindura imibiri yabo ari ugohonyanga uburenganzira bwa zina muntu. Umugwi w'abuganganira Semenya (w'imyaka 30) , baranakema icitwa urwego rujejwe inkino - gushika ubu rufatwa nk'amashirahamwe yikorera ivyayo - mu nzira yo kurwanya amategeko ya DSD ya World Athletics. Patrick Bracher  , umwe mu bunganizi mu mategeko avuga ati: "Hamwe tworonka ingingo ya sentare ya Buraya ijejwe agateka kja zina muntu ivuga ko inzego mpuzamamakungu z'inkino atari inzego zikorera ivyazo kandi zirengeye amasezerano mpuzamakungu yereyeke agateka ka zina muntu, ico coba ari ikintu gihambaye cane ku nkino muri rusangi." "Inzego mpuamakungu z'inkino zizoca ziba nk'inzego zikora imirimo ijanye n'ama reta - kuko zitunganya ibintu ku rugero mpuzamakungu - ico coba ari ikintu gihambaye ku nkino. "World Athletics izotegerezwa guca ibifatirako kuko bazoca bamenye ko iyo bagiye muri sentare ica imanza z'inkino (urwego rw'amategeko rwa mbere rwisumbuye mu nkino) muri kazoza, amaherezo bazotegerzwa kwisunga ibintu mu buryo bwagutse gusumba: mu yandi majambo, ibibazo vy'agateka ka zina muntu." Hamwe botsindwa,  Bracher avuga ko urugamba rw'amategeko rwa  Semenya ruzoba rurangiye. Bibonwa mu buryo butandukanye Ariko , bitandukanye na Wambui, Semenya  ntashaka ko hazanwa umugwi wa gatatu mu nkino z'ubunonotsi. Bracher avuga ati : " Caster Semenya yavutse, akura, yiga kwiruka, abaho yongera ahiganwa nk'umugore, urubanza rwose rero rukaba ar'urwo uburenganzira bwiwe bwo kubikora." "Bibi gusumba ngaho ni uko ushizeho umugwi nk'uwo, bivuga ko ata muntu n'umwe yoheza ngo yiruke muri uwo mugwi atabanje kwerekana icese ibijanye n'amagara yiwe. Vyoba bisubiye kuba ibindi bipimo bifatiye ku gitsina biciye ku ngingo y'uko umuntu abivuga ubwiwe." Hagati aho World Athletics yarahakanye ko ata mugwi wa gatatu uzoshirwaho. Mw'itangazo yahaye BBC, World  Athletics yavuze iti: " Abanu bamenye ko  abanonotsi bafise DSD bagize 0.7% y'abanonotsi bose b'abagore, gutyo umugwi ugira gatatu ntiwkora ku nkino zitari nke." Gufata ibintu gutyo bisigura ko Wambui - avuga ngo "gufata imiti [igabanura testosterone] ntivyigeze binca mu mutwe" - ntazokwigera ashobora gusubira  guhiganwa ku kirere yifuza. Amaze kuvyiyumvira cane , uwo munonotsi w'imyaka 26, yaciye ahitamwo kugerageza imetero 5000, bivuze ko azomara igihe atasubira guhiganwa kuko azofata umwanya wo kumenyera ico kirere. Avuga ati: "Bizombabaza kuraba inkino za Olympic kuri television kandi nari kuba nashoboye kuzitaba. "Ariko nzoziraba kuko inkino [Sport] zindi mu maraso."

column2: Russia iriko yegeranya ingabo hafi ya Ukraine, OTAN/NATO ifise amakenga
column3: Uburusiya buragabisha ishirahamwe ryo kwivunira umwansi hamwe OTAN/NATO rihurikiyemwo ibihugu vyo mu burengero ko ritohirahira ngo rirungike ingabo gufasha Ukraine, ni mu gihe hari amakuru avuga ko abasirikare benshi b'Uburusiya bariko biyegeraniriza ku rubibe buhana na Ukraine. Umuvugizi wa Kremlin (ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburusiya), Dmitry Peskov, avuga ko Uburusiya bushobora gufata "izindi ngingo" mu gihe OTAN yofata iyo ngingo. Hari ukurasana kubandanya ku rugero rwo hasi mu buseruko bwa ukraine hagati y'ingabo zayo n'inyeshamba zishaka kwiyonkora zishigikiwe n'Uburusiya. Ingabo za Amerika ku mugabane wa Bulaya zameze magabo cane, zivuga ko "ibitero vy'Uburusiya biriko birarenga inkombe" muri ako karere. Umutegetsi wa OTAN yabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters ko Uburusiya buriko burahonyanga utwigoro two kugabanya imishamirano mu buseruko bwa Ukraine, kandi ko abaserukira ibihugu vyabo muri iri shirahamwe bakoranye ku wa kane kugira ngo bihweze ingene ibintu bimeze. Ati: "Ibihugu vyose bifise impungenge ku bikorwa vya gisirikare vy'Uburusiya biherutse kuba muri Ukraine no mu micungararo yaho". Umukuru w'igihugu ca Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky nawe yaneguye iyo ngendo y'Uburusiya, akavuga ko "Uburusiya bwamye bufise ingeso yo gukorera imyimenyerezo ya gisirikare ku mbibe no gusotorana". Mu kiyago yaraye agiranye na Perezida Zelensky ejo ku wa gatanu, Perezida Joe Biden  "yashimangiye ko Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zishigikiye cane ubwigenge n'ubusugire bwa Ukraine mu gihe Uburusiya bubandanya ibikorwa vyabwo vy'ubusotoranyi mu turere twa Donbas na Crimea", nk'uko biri mw'itangazo ry'ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu Maison Blanche/White House. Hagati aho, Peskov yagiriza ingabo za Ukraine ziri ku rubuga rw'intambara mu buseruko "ibikorwa vy'agasotoro", aho amasezerano y'uguhagarika intambara yama ariko arahonyangwa uko bukeye uko bwije. Umushikiranganji wa Ukraine ajejwe imigenderanire Dmytro Kuleba yabwiye BBC ko igisirikare c'Uburusiya carungitse ingabo ku rubibe ibi bihugu bisangiye mu buraruko bwa ukraine, co kimwe no mu buseruko, "hamwe kandi no mu karere ka Crimea kigaruriwe bidaciye mu mategeko". Ati: "Twabonye ingabo z'Uburusiya ziriko ziriyubaka mu mpande zitatu. Ukraine ntishaka ko ibintu biyangara, ntabwo dukeneye intambara". Mu gihe amazi yarenga inkombe mu mezi aheze, abasirikare bane ba Ukraine barapfiriye mu gitero cakozwe n'inyeshamba ziharanira ukwiyonkora ku wa 26 z'ukwa gatatu hafi y'umutumba wa Shuma uri mu ntara ya Donesk. Kuva ico gihe hagiye haba ibikorwa bito bito vyo gusotorana. Mu kwezi guheze, Uburusiya bwarakoze imyimenyerezo ya gisirikare mu ntara ya Crimea izungurutswe n'ikiyaga cirabura (Mer Rouge/Black Sea), intara bwigaruriye buyinyaze Ukraine mu 2014. Inyeshamba zirwanira mu ntara ya Donbas iri mu buseruko bwa Ukraine nazo nyene zifashwa n'Uburusiya. Ibihugu vyo mu burengero bivuga ko Uburusiya bubandanya burungika ingabo muri ako gace, hamwe n'ibirwanisjho bikomeye. Kremlin irahakana ayo makuru, ikavuga ko ahubwo "abakorerabushake" b'Abarusiya ari bo bariko bafasha inyeshamba zigaruriye uturere tw'intara za Donetsk na Luhansk mu kwa kane 2014. Hari ireresi itashoboye kwemezwa yakwiragijwe ku rubuga rwa Twitter mu misi iheze yerekana ibimodoka vya burende, inkoho zikomakomeye n'izindi modoka za gisirikare vy'Uburusiya biriko bija ku rubibe rwa Ukraine. Umukuru w'igisirikare ca Ukraine Jenerali Ruslan Khomchak avuga ko Uburusiya bwarungitse za batayo 28 hafi y'urubibe rwa ukraine mu buseruko, hamwe no muri Crimea, ibi bikavuga ko bwoba bwarungitse abasirikare bari hagati ya 20.000 na 25.000. Abategetsi b'Uburusiya ntibemeza aya makuru canke ngo batange ibitigiri nyavyo. Nk'uko Jenerali Khomchak abivuga, Uburusiya bufise hafi  intwazangabo n'abigisha ba gisirikare bababa 3000 mu mirwi y'inyeshamba mu buseruko bwa Ukraine. Umuvugizi wa Kremlin  Peskov avuga ati: "Ni uburenganzira bw'Uburusiya kwimurira ingabo zabwo ahantu aho ari ho hose mu gihugu ku butaka bwabwo. Nta n'umwe vyotera umutima uhagaze kandi nta n'umwe bibangamiye". Igisirikare c'Uburusiya cemeje ko muri uno mwaka indege ziriko zirimura abasirikare bangana 4000 zibakura mu ntara ya Volgograd iri mu bumanuko bw'Uburusiya zibajana muri Crimea. Kuva mu 2014, Uburusiya bwarakomeje ibirindiro vy'ingabo zabwo muri Crimea, harimwo n'ikigo gikomeye c'abasirikare barwanira mu mazi kiri ahitwa Sevastopol.

column2: 'Cristiano Ronaldo ntagurishwa' - Erik ten Hag
column3: Umumenyereza wa Manchester United Erik ten Hag avuga ko umukinyi w'imbere wa Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo ari "mu mugambi wabo" mu mwaka ugira utangure ko rero "atagurishwa". Uwo mukinyi w'imyaka 37 ntazokina inkino z'igice ca mbere zibaziriza ihiganwa zizobera muri Thailand kandi yashaka kuva muri uwo mugwi. Yari yagarutse muri United mu mwaka uheze inyuma yo gukinira Real Madrid na Juventus. Uwo yahoze amenyereza Ajax, Ten Hag agira ati:"Ntari kumwe nacu kubera imvo bwite ziwe. Tumufiseko umugambi muri uyu mwaka. Ni ko biri." "Mfise igishika co gukorana na we. Cristiano si uwo kugurisha. Ari mu mugambi wacu. Dushaka amahirwe turi kumwe." Isiba ry'uwo munye Portugal muri urwo rugendo ryatumye haba ibihuha kuri kazoza kiwe, inyuma kandi yo kutagaragara mu myimenyerezo y'uwo mugwi   yo kwitegurira ihiganwa ryimirije i Carrington. Ahubwo Ronaldo yagize imyimenyerezo n'umugwi nserukiragihu wa Portugal aho basanzwe bimenyerereza. Manchester United izotana mu mitwe na Liverpool muri Thailand  ku musi wa kabiri imbere yo kwurira indege baja muri Australia, Ten Hag akavuga ko ataramenya nimba Ronaldo azobasangayo mu nyuma. Uwo mumenyereza w'umudagi yongeyeko ko yavuganye na Ronaldo imbere y'urwo rugendo, asigura:"Twayaze neza. Ivyo biri hagati yanje na Ronaldo, ico nokwemeza n'uko twagiraniye ibiganiro vyiza cane." Ten Hag  yagize kandi ico acuga kuvyerekeye uwoba kizigenza, cabaye ikibazo kuva mu mwaka uheze kubera Harry Maguire adahagaze neza. Yagize ati: "Harry Maguire azoba kizigenza. Amaze umwaka urenga ari kizigenza. Amaze gushika kuri vyinshi. Nta nkeka mfise kuri ivyo." Umukinyi wenyene United imaze kuzana muri iri ci n'umukinyi w'inyuma Tyrell Malacia yakuye mu mugwi wa Feyenoord. Biteze kunaza umukinyi w'inyuma Christian Eriksen ata n'urumeya bamutanzeko, bakaba kandi begereje kugiriranira amasezerano na Barcelone ku mukinyi Frenkie de Jong. Ten Hag yacishijemwo avuga ko United izozana abakinyi mu gihe ibonye ko bahuje uko bakina. Yongeyeko ati:"Dushaka kwongeramwo abakinyi babikwiye. Dufise umugwi mwiza cane, turiko turakora mu guteza imbere uburyo dukina, kandi akaryo karahari tuzotsinda."

column2: Tanzania: Ekleziya Katorika iragabisha ko Covid-19 iriko iriyongera ku rugero ruteye ubwoba
column3: Ekleziya Katorika muri Tanzania yaraye isohoye itangazo aho igabisha ko ibitigiri  vy'abandura coronavirus n'abicwa na Covid-19 bigenda vyiyongera, ihamagarira abanyagihugu gukurikiza ingingo zose zo kwikingira. Iri tangazo ryo kugabisha ryasohowe n'umukuru w'Inama y'Abepiskopi Katorika muri Tanzania  (TEC), Musenyeri Gervas Nyaisonga ku wa kabiri. Ariko , ntirivuga nimba no muri Tanzania hariho abariko barandura bwa bwoko bushasha bwa coronavirus, rigasaba abantu kuba maso bafatiye ku bivugwa mu zindi mpande z'isi. Iri tangazo rya Ekleziya Katorika rivuga riti: "Mu mwaka uheze igihugu cacu carashoboye kurwanya uwu mugera. Abandura baragabanutse  mu nyuma turizera ko twatsinze". "Ubu hari iyongerekana rishasha ry'abandura. Ibihugu bitari bike biremeza ko biri mu bihe bitoroshe aho corona iriko iriyongera abantu bagapfa. Igihugu cacu si izinga, ni ngombwa ko twikingira, tukaba maso, tugatakambira cane Imana kugira ngo iturinde". Ekleziya Katorika muri ico gihugu yagiye ifata ingingo zitandukanye kuva mu 2020 igihe iki kiza gitangazwa ko cinjiye muri Tanzania, iri tangazo rigasaba ko izo ngingo zibandanya zikurikizwa. Rishimangira riti: "Duhimirize intambara yo kurwanya umugera wa coronavirus mu gukoresha ibirwanisho vyose vy'umutima, umubiri, ubuhinga no mu kibano. Ntiturambirwe no guhimiriza igisabisho, kwirinda gukorakorana, gukaraba n'amazi n'isabuni igihe cose, gufata ingingo igihe cose twiketse ibimenyetso vyayo, tukirinda kandi no kwegerana". Umunyamabanga mukuru w'Inama y'Abepiskopi, Patiri Charles Kitima, yabwiye BBC igisata c'igiswahili ko vyabaye ngombwa ko Ekleziya isohora iri tangazo ryo kugabisha mu gihe bakirindiriye insiguro z'abahinga zizotangwa na reta ku bijanye n'iki kiza karanda. Ati: "Duherutse kubona impfu ziyongera. Mu bisagara, twari tumenyereye kugira imisa imwe canke zibiri mu ndwi zo gusabira abapfuye, ariko ubu ni imisi yose. Hategerezwa kuba hari ikintu kitagenda neza". Abategetsi ba Tanzania babandanya bemeza y'uko ata mugera wa coronavirus uri mu gihugu. Inyuma y'iri tangazo, icegera c'umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu, Dr Goodluck Mollel, yabwiye ikinyamakuru Mwananchi co muri ico gihugu ko abanyagihugu bobandanya batekanye mu kurindira amabwirizwa bahabwa na reta. Dr. Mollel ati: "Ibi bintu reka tubirekere abahinga. Mu gihe hoba ingorane, reta izobisigura. Abantu bobandanya n'ibikorwa vy'ukugwiza umwimbu". Mu mpera z'indwi iheze, ibinyamakuru vyo muri Danmark vyatangaje ko ingenzi zibiri zari zivuye muri Tanzania zatowe umugera mushasha wa coronavirus wadutse muri Afrika y'Epfo. Mu ndwi iheze nyene, reta y'Ubwongereza yarafashe ingingo yo kubuza ingenzi zivuye nuri  Tanzania na Repubulika ya Demokrasi ya  Congo kwinjira muri ico gihugu mu ntumbero yo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry'ubwoko bushasha bw'umugera wa Covid-19 bwatowe ubwa mbere muri Afrika y'Epfo. Ibihugu bindi 12 nivyo bimaze guhagarikirwa ingendo muri ico gihugu hagati y'ukwa cumi na kabiri n'intango y'ukwa mbere.

column2: Ubufaransa bwemeje amakori ataguye neza Amerika
column3: Inama nshingamateka y'Ubufaransa yemeje integuro y'itegeko rigena amakori acibwa ibigo bikomakomeye nka Google, Facebook na Apple. Guca 3% nk'ikori ku bikorwa vy'ibigo bikoresha itumatumanako bigera ku 30 birwiriyemwo ivyo muri Leta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika bishobora kuzanira leta y'Ubufaransa miliyoni 400 z'ama euros muri uyu mwaka wonyene. Abashingamateka birengagije akamo ka Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zavuga ko ari akarenganyo, kandi ko zigiye kwihora mu kuzoshiraho amakori nk'ayo. Umushikiranganji w'ikigega ca Leta w'Ubufaransa Bruno Le Maire yiyamirije impungenge za Amerika, avuga ko ibintu nk'ibi bikwiye gutoregwa umuti mu biganiro. Ubufaransa buvuga ko bikwiye ko ibigo vyifashisha itumatumanako, bitanga amakori aho bikorera aho kuyatanga aho bifise icicaro gikuru, ivyinshi bikaba bibarizwa muri Amerika. Ubufaransa bwananiwe kwumvisha ibindi bihugu gufatira hamwe iyo ngingo mw'ishirahamwe rya Bulaya, bari kwita 'GAFAs' mu majambo avunaguye, n'ukuvuga Google, Apple, Facebook na Amazon. Ubu rero bwahisemwo gutangura bwo nyene guca ayo makori, ariko bukizera ko iyi ngingo yabwo izoba iy'igihe gito. Hari ibiganiro hagati y'ibihugu bitunze kuruta ibindi bigize umugwi G7 hamwe n'ikigo kijejwe kuraba  imigenderanire mu butunzi n'iterambere mu kugabangana amakori avanwa mw'ikoreshwa ry'itumatumanako muri kino gihe rifise ikibanza gikomeye. Gutyo rero hakaboneka umwumvikano uvuye mu nama ugasubirira ingingo nka bene iyi y'Ubufaransa. Ubwongereza bwatangaje umugambi wo gushiraho amakori asa n'aya y'Ubufaransa, ico cemezo kikazoshobora kuja mu bikorwa mu mwaka uza. Espagne yo yakoze umushinge w'itegeko muri uyu mwaka. Umunyamakuru Dave Lee akorera muri Amerika ya ruguru ati 'Ubufaransa burikumiriye'. Ubutegetsi bwa Washington bwamaze kuvuga ko bugiye kwugurura ingingo yitwa 'Section 301', mu nzira yo gutohoza nimba hari aho burenganywa. Ni ingingo yakoreshejwe mbere, nk'inzira yo gushiraho ibiciro bishasha ku bihugu ubutegetsi bwa Trump bwibaza ko biriko biburiramwo mbege. Nimba Ubufaransa bugiye gukura miliyoni amajana z'ama euros mu mifuko y'ibi bihangange vyo muri Amerika, Amerika nayo ishobora kuvuga iti :'kuki tweho tutokura amafranga mu vyo Ubufaransa bukorera iwacu?' Uko niko vyagenze ku Bushinwa,  bigahamba Amerika mu ntambara y'ubudandaji ishobora no gukomera muri kazoza. Amakori ku bikorwa vy'itumatumanako, ni ikibazo giteye impungenge ku Bufaransa, kuko bwikumiriye. Ibiganiro vyigeze gutangura hagati y'ibihugu kuri ayo makori vyahavuye biburizwamwo kuko bamwe muri bo batari bashigikiye ayo makori. Aha umuntu yovuga nka Irland yavyungukiyemwo mu guhamagara abashoramitahe bashaka isoko ku mugabane wa Bulaya. Ibindi bihugu nk'Ubwongereza, Espagne na Autriche biracagonanwa gufata iyo nzira. Ico impande zompi zihuriyeko n'uko igihe carenze co kwiyumvira ingene ibigo vyungukira mw'itumatumanako bitozwa amakori. Ubufaransa bushobora kwitega ibintu bibiri. N'uko ibihugu bitera ikirenge mu cabwo bishiraho amategeko yavyo, bigatuma Ubufaransa butaba nyamwigendako. Ikindi n'uko iyo ntambwe Ubufaransa bwateye ishobora gutuma n'ibindi bihugu bibona ko hageze kwumvikana uko bitoza ayo makori biri hamwe. Ivyo vyotuma amafranga ivyo bigo vyahora vyikwegerako ataha mu bigega vy'ibihugu.

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Varane, Bellerin, Kane, Haaland, Jesus, Griezmann
column3: Manchester United iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano n'umukinyi w'inyuma wa Real Madrid umufaransa Raphael Varane w'imyaka 28 amaze igihe kirekire aronderwa kugira ngo afashanye na Harry Maguire. (Mail) Hector Bellerin yabwiye  Arsenal ko yipfuza kugenda muri rino ci. Uyu mukinyi w'inyuma w'umunya Espagne w'inyaka 26, umukinyi amaze igihe kirekire gusumba abandi muri uyo murwi wa Mikel Arteta, yizeye ko ashobora kwimukira muri Inter Milan. (Metro) Manchester City yakuye akarenge mu ruhigi rwo kurondera umusatirizi wa Barcelona umufaransa  Antoine Griezmann w'imyaka 30, ariko ikaba igiye guhindukirira umusatirizi wa Borussia Dortmund umunya Norvege Erling Braut Haaland w'imyaka 20 hamwe na Harry Kane w'imyaka 27 akinira Tottenham akongera akaba kizigenza w'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubwongereza.  (Sun) Chelsea yiteguye gutanga "igifovya" c'amafaranga kugira irabe ko yoronka Haaland. (Star) Griezmann ashobora kuba ariko arasubira mu murwi yahoze akinira Atletico Madrid, biciye mu kumuguzanya n'umukinyi wo hagati wa Espagne Saul Niguez w'imyaka 26. (Express) Bayern Munich iriko irarondera uwosubirira umusatirizi wa Pologne Robert Lewandowski w'imyaka 32 ashobora kuba yipfuza kwimukira muri  Real Madrid mu ci ry'umwaka uza mu gihe asigaje umwaka umwe gusa mu masezerano afitaniye n'uyu murwi wo mu Budagi. (AS - in Spanish) Ubutumwa yacishije kuri Twitter ariko agaca abufuta, umukinyi wo hagati wa Real Madrid  Isco buvuga ko uyu mukinyi w'umunya Espagne azova muri uyu murwi mu gihe amezi 12 asigaje mu masezerano afitaniye n'umurwi wiwe azoba arangiye, mu gihe imirwi ya Arsenal, Tottenham Hotspur na Napoli imwipfuza. (Mirror) Manchester City na Wolverhampton Wanderers yompi iripfuza umukinyi w'inyuma wa Fulham Antonee Robinson w'imyaka 23. (Mirror) Juventus iriko irarondera umusatirizi wa Manchester City umunya Brésil Gabriel Jesus w'imyaka 24. Uyu murwi w'Ubutaliyano urarondera kandi n'umusatirizi wa Everton umutaliyano Moise Kean w'imyaka 21. (Tuttosport, via Mail) Arsenal iriko iregereza amasezerano n'umukinyi wo hagati wa Lyonumufaransa Houssem Aouar w'imyaka 23 hamwe n'umubirigi akina hagati Albert Sambi Lokonga w'imyaka 21 asanzwe akina muri Anderlecht.Iriko kandi irakurikiranira hagufi umukinyi wo hagati wa Leicester City umwongereza James Maddison w'imyaka 24. (Sun) Umumenyereza mushasha wa Crystal Palace Patrick Vieira ariko ararondera umunyegori w'umwongereza Remi Matthews w'imyaka 27 aherutse kuronka uburenganzira bwo kuva mu murwi Sunderland wo mu cicaro ca kabiri asanzwe asamira. (Mirror) West Brom iriko iragerageza kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Chelseaumwongereza Trevoh Chalobah w'imyaka 22, ariko iriko imurwanira n'uwundi murwi uvugwa ko woba iri Brentforduherutse kuduga muri Premier league, hamwe n'umurwi w'Ubufaransa Lorient, iyi ikaba ari imwe mu yiriko iramurondera. (Express & Star)

column2: Umunyarwandakazi Isabelle Kamariza ku rutonde rwa Forbes
column3: Umunyarwandakazi Isabelle Kamariza ari ku rutonde rw'ikinyamakuru co muri Amerika, gitanga udushimwe, Forbes. Ni urutonde rw'abagore 8 ba mbere muri Afrika, baranzwe n'ibikorwa bihindura ubuzima bw'abandi cane cane abari mu bibazo bakeneye gufashwa. Isabelle Kamariza yashimwe kubera ikigo ciwe 'SolidAfrica', kigemurira abarwayi badashobora kwifungurira mu bitaro bine mu Rwanda. Yavuganye na Florentine Kwizera, atangura amubaza uko yakiriye ako gashimwe (umviriza aho hejuru).

column2: Patrice Motsepe kuva kuri uyu wa gatanu niwe aramutswa Caf
column3: Patrice Motsepe wo muri Afrika y'Epfo kuva uwu munsi niwe aramutswa Caf, urwego rujejwe umupira w'amaguru muri Afrika inyuma yo gutorwa atagira uwo bahiganwa. Inzira yo gushikira ico kibanza ntiyagoye uwo mugabo w'imyaka 59 mu gihe ku ndwi iheze abo bari guhiganwa basokoye, uwundi nawe yari kuba umukeba - Ahmad wo muri Madagascar - akagira intambamyi zo guhiganwa. Ashikiriza ijambo abakuru b'amashirahamwe y'umupira w'amaguru muri Afrika ahabereye amatora,  ku murwa mukuru wa Maroc Rabat, Motsepe yavuze ingene ubumwe bushobora kuba imburi y'ikiringo  c'ibihe bishasha mu mupira w'amaguru. Motsepe yavuze ati: "N'iteka rikomeye cane kuri jewe [kuba umukuru wa Caf]. Aza  ubugira icenda mu bantu bakize cane muri Afrika, ku bwa Forbes. ''Reka nshimire umuvukanyi [Umukuru wa FIFA] Gianni [Infantino] ku cerekezo no gutera intege ubumwe. Tuzohangana n'ibibazo vya Afrika kandi tuzobishobora, ariko ivyo tuzobishikako ari uko twunze ubumwe." Mu nyuma Motsepe yahindukiriye abagize abakuru b'amashirahamwe y'umupira w'amaguru muri Afrika n'inama nshingwabikorwa mu gihe yerekeza  kuri kazoza keza  gusumba. ''Uburongozi dufise muri Afrika (hamwe)  n'uburongozi dufise mu mupira w'amaguru muri buri gihugu  bimpa  kurema no kumpa urufatiro. "Ndaremye cane ko dukoreye  hamwe, koko tuzoshobora ivyo twiyemeje mu gutuma umupira w'amaguru udashika kw'isonga gusa ariko ube mu ya mbere myiza kw'isi." Motsepe, asanzwe afise  umugwi Mamelodi Sundowns watsindiye igikombe ca Afrika c'imigwi co mu 2016 , yari amaze gushikiriza icifuzo ciwe co kubona umugwi wo muri Afrika utsindiye igikombe c'isi. Muri iyo nama ya bose, abayigize 52 - uretse Chad, ishirahamwe ryayo ryafuswe na reta ku wa kane, na Eritrea arivyo bihugu bibiri bititavye - batoye kwongereza ibibanza vy'ivyegera vy'umukuru wa Caf kuva kuri batatu bakaba batanu.
